Some people write these reviews using the correct terminology but they still dont have a clue what they are doing. I see them saying that the wifi doesnt work on them. Thats because they were to stupid to find the button in the gui to turn it on. One guy said you have to get a subscription to a dns service. You dont. he doesnt know what he is doing either. You could call your isp and get static ip's for less than 20 a month or just deal with it when your ip changes. If you have at&t; uverse it never does unless a tech changes equipment. Finally I will wrap this up by saying that you dont check into a motel 6 and expect a mini bar with 5 star room service. If you want a 5 hundred dollar camera, than go buy one. If you want a -100. dollar camera that does almost all the same stuff as the 5 hundred dollar camera than buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Frustrating
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: The camera itself works fine and has great features for wired connection or static IP use. If you get the mobile app (on iPhone for $6.99), you'll supposedly be able to control and record directly into your phone, which is awesome. That being said, I'm having  a terrible time going through installation. Camera loses connectivity all the time because its IP keeps changing and the permanent IP setting just won't work. Without that I have no remote access to the camera (on computer, phone, tablet, etc), and I see no point on accessing the camera only when I'm home.  I'm in contact with support by email (they work only Mon-Fri and during business hours) but we haven't moved forward an inch, at least they reply. I have been in contact with them for 5 days now. I'll update this review if the issue ever gets solved.

Reviews.Title: Two cameras and neither work
Reviews.Author: Dr. James C. Griffin
Reviews.Content: Myself and 2 other tech knowledgeable people have tried to install the two cameras on multiple systems and have not been successful.  My intent is to return the cameras.  The item is definitely not plug and play.

Reviews.Title: IR-Cut Filter WAY too sensitive
Reviews.Author: John T
Reviews.Content: Foscam FI8910W Wireless/Wired Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with IR-Cut Filter for True Color Images - 8 Meter Night Vision and 3.6mm Lens (67° Viewing Angle) - Black NEWEST MODELThe Foscam FI8910W is the successor to the original FI8918W camera which is a fine camera for the price. The FI8910W however, while billed as an improvement, does not live up to it's claims. The FI8910W adds an  Automatic IR-Cut Filter which filters out IR light from normal daytime pictures which greatly enhances the color quality over that of the FI8918W. When in almost total darkness, the IR-Cut Filter drops out, and you get the typical grey/green picture of the darkend room like all other IR cameras. The problem with the FI8910W is that the automatic IR-Cut Filter is so sensitive that with only a very small amount light in the room, either low light, or a small point source in an otherwise dark room, it IR-Cut Filter doesn't drop out. So even though the IR lights are illuminating the room, the IR-Cut Filter, filters all the IR light out, and the room appears the same as if the IR lights were not on. There is no way to either adjust the sensitivity of this feature, or to disengage it all together. This is a serious shortcoming which makes this camera inferior to it's predicessor for about twice the price. Until Foscam can fix the sensitivity issue, Avoid this camera at any price. You WILL be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get it to work; instructions are atrocious
Reviews.Author: Baroke
Reviews.Content: I'm usually pretty tech-savvy and have a lot of experience with unorthodox networking solutions, but I'm not a professional.  I could not get this to work at all.  My setup wasn't totally straightforward - I needed the camera hooked up to a router connected to a powerline adapter.  Maybe if the setup had been more straightforward it would've worked. Regardless, the instructions are horribly written and unclear.I was bummed, because it is really a nifty piece of hardware and I would've loved to be able to access the video stream from my Blackberry.  Hopefully they'll figure out a way to improve their instructions and streamline the setup process a bit - then I'll try again.

Reviews.Title: Foscam IP Camera for Remote Viewing
Reviews.Author: Eric G.
Reviews.Content: The camera is way better than expected. For the money it is hard to beat. The picture quality is very good.I spent $6 on a great iPhone app to control it as well.I had an issue getting the camera set up to view remotely. After spending hours with Comcast and Netgear, I figured I would give Foscam a try. They remoted in and had me up and running in 5 minutes. Their technical support specialist, Sandra, knew her way around the entire process, even the Comcast business class modem/firewall. I was thoroughly impressed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W not compatible with Windows 7 64bit
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: I consider myself fairly computer literate; more knowledgeable than the average person.  So in spite of all the negative reviews regarding installation problems, I thought I could have it up and running in a few hours.  Well, after more than 10 hours of trying, following the directions carefully and even watching someone's YouTube installation instructions, I gave up.  I lost one hour due to Foscam's defective ethernet cable. I did not bother to contact Foscam technical support, because the reviews indicated they are not helpful.  Foscam recognizes that if you are running Windows 7 with 64 bits, there is a compatibility problem.  Hence, they have a downloadable patch.  But in spite of turning off my Firewall, virus protection, and Active X filtering, as recommended, I couldn't get it to download.  The reviews indicated your big problems start when you try to go wireless and connection to your smart phone.  I had big problems before even that, so I decided to return it to Amazon.  I have an Amazon Prime account and the Foscam was Prime eligible ....so no handling or shipping expenses.  It was my first time ever returning anything to Amazon.  I was easy printing their return label and dropping it off at UPS; Amazon paid for the return shipping and money appeared back on my credit card within days.  Outstanding job Amazon!  So, in the end I bought a Panasonic BL-230A. Yeah, it cost more (it has more features) but I got it up and running within 2 hours.  I only had to phone Panasonic once and they were very helpful and spoke English.

Reviews.Title: Complicate & Unreliable Remote Access
Reviews.Author: garrys
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our vacation home in Florida. We called technical support at Foscam (located in India) to set up remote access and got it working and also tested it from our neighbours ISP. However the camera stopped working one day after we left our vacation home. We called the Foscam tech support again and they said that their first mistake was assuming that our ISP Verizon uses static IP addresses (almost all ISP's in The US use dynamic IP addresses). They said that if we called Verizon and got the IP address of the router we could access it remotely. However we called Verizon and our router still has the same IP address as before we left but the camera is still not working. I think that the problem with Foscam is that their tech guys (located in India) are too fast in doing the initial set up and are not conscientious enough to think it through. The Foscam tech guy told us that we would need to be back at the house to set the camera up properly. However the primary reason why we bought the camera in the first place was to have remote access - isn't that why most customers buy these cameras?! If we were able to be back at the house every time the Foscam camera stops working then we would not need a remote access IP camera! The remote access set up is way too complicated & unreliable and the tech guys in India don't do their job properly!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: DennisTheAmazon
Reviews.Content: I've opened a total of four cameras - have two more to go: I couldn't get the IR to work on two of the four. The one I successfully set-up last night would not work today until I unplugged and replugged it. Something I cannot do because they will be remote from my location.The picture and camera movement controls are very good and so is the "N" wireless reception.However ...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, even better Technical Support
Reviews.Author: GDaddy8
Reviews.Content: Bought the FI8910W online direct from Foscam. The camera works great and the resolution is quite impressive. The setup was relatively easy. I managed to get everything setup except for the audio. Apparently there is no direct audio connection for Macs... HOWEVER, I called technical support and they set everything up for me so that I could get audio through a third party media player. Tech support is very knowledgeable, patient, friendly and efficient. I would definitely buy another camera from a company that backs it's products like Foscam. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I though.
Reviews.Author: Jack Wong
Reviews.Content: The setup is very easy, I didn't read the guide at all, just pick up the new IP address from the router DHCP table then you can go into the web interface of the webcam.As for the quality... it could be better right? We are in the HD-stage since... years ago... to me, I am back to the VCD quality.I like it the most because I can record the video with the Synology NAS instead of a computer.

Reviews.Title: Poor Service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: C T Polk "Shooter0202"
Reviews.Content: Just received the camera, CD-ROM was broke and the only option I have is to return to seller.No fault of packaging, everything looked good; no dings in exterior and interior box.Really I just want a replacement CD-ROM.Only option is to return entire purchase.No option to contact seller to get a replacement.What a waste.Should have bought off E-Bay.What a pain.ONE STAR FOR AMAZON!**UPDATE**One star to five. The update is for the performance of the product only; still miffed at the rigid return policy.The camera performs well enough: Image quality is on par for the price paid. All remote and alarm features work. I'm using it as a security camera for my apartment living room.

Reviews.Title: worthless junk
Reviews.Author: Frogman
Reviews.Content: i have spent hours with this contraption. Had it work for a while and then phased out. send it back to china. dont waste your money

Reviews.Title: Camera Is Not Secure and Foscam Support Non Existent
Reviews.Author: joogle
Reviews.Content: I  bought three of these cameras less than a month ago and the only good thing is 360 degrees pan/tilt.Cons1. Wireless Range is poor and it uses Wireless G.  Well now they are shipping this exact same model with Wireless N, and if you bought this previously with Wireless G like I did, which was less than a month ago, this is their response from their e-mail team."The manufacturer continues to improve product features with new technologies several times a year. Originally the FI8910W was launched with 802.11b/g and six months later new design and production has released the FI8910W with 802.11b/g/n. The manufacturer will not upgrade the camera to the latest model. But we can speak to the manufacturer if they'll except trade-ins of used models to offer a better price on new models."This makes no sense, it's the exact same model and price, yet some people get Wireless G and some Wireless N ridiculous.2. Their 2 year replacement policy is just a marketing scheme.3. Now to the Security part, do you know the password and username you transmit to login to the see camera are broadcast in plain text!!! Anyone with some know how can get access to it and jeopardize your "Security" camera.My advice, avoid this company and camera, look out for the D-link DCS-932L for sale, that's a good camera, only con about it has no 360 tilt.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for the Cash!
Reviews.Author: Anchrman
Reviews.Content: Ok... I bought this camera 2 weeks ago based on the reviews.  I was a little concerned because I am far from computer savvy.  Also, I have a 3 year old MacBook so I was worried about the Foscam/Apple interactions.  My router is a Netgear and I have Road Runner cable internet.  The directions are good, by not very thorough.  Don't get discouraged when you hit a stumbling block.  Just follow the directions again, and invite one of your computer literate buddies over for a couple of free beers.  Contrary to popular misconceptions you can run this on a secured network, and one other than WEP.  Again, follow the directions.  You will need to set the port forwarding correctly and get a domain from dyndns.com.  Apparently they use to be free.  They are no longer.... at least I couldn't find them free.  But, for $20 a year it is worth the price.  The default port for my router was 88, and for the camera 80.  That held me up for a couple days.  After I figured that out, it was smooth sailing.  Now I am able to view remotely.  Also I purchased Foscam Pro Surveillance from the Itunes store for 5 bucks.  That was a breeze to set up after I got the port correct and the password for the device, not the domain correctly entered into the ap.  All and all it was a small struggle for me to get everything dialed in.... but totally worth it.  The picture is very high quality considering the price, and the infrared works well.  I was not able to contact customer service by phone.  They transfer you around and then hang up on you.  They do reference you to blogs which I found to be not so useful.  It was more bitching than assistance.  So the camera gets 5 stars from me, and I will probably buy at least one more.  I hope that helps.

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Love the App
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a solution to a baby monitor, although it is a bit more expensive than a traditional monitor the FOSCAM IP Control 2 app for only 3.99 on iTunes has allowed me to hook my camera's up to my iPhone and iPad all using the iCloud. This makes it easy to check on my children from wherever I may be. It gives me a piece of mind knowing i can watch them even at work. Great all around product i love where the technology is going.

Reviews.Title: Camera Performing as Advertised
Reviews.Author: akakpaws "akakpaws"
Reviews.Content: So this is a follow up to my initial review of this camera after being in service a little over a month and having had the chance to access the unit via wifi and 3G.  So far this VCam has performed flawlessly.  After the growing pains I had to go thru to get things up and running via DNS, it has been smooth sailing.  On a recent vacation I had 2 of my neighbors  watching my home while I was away on my email alert list.  They had no problem receiving and viewing the test video I sent them.  They also advised they planned to purchase these units themselves.  A tip on Presets, out of the box presets are set to disable, so they don't work.  I went thru a period of frustration trying to get presets going until I finally discovered this.  Go to the PTZ setting and enable them and you will be fine on presets.  I highly recommend these units.  It is great peace of mind to be able to check on things at home from anywhere!

Reviews.Title: Works great.  Video Quality isn't great, but sufficient.
Reviews.Author: Robert Fong-Diaz
Reviews.Content: I got this to watch my home and dog while I am at work.  It was fairly easy to set up.  There are some good videos that showed exactly what I needed to do.  The mobile app does not connect well when I am out of the house, but works fine from any browser so far.  Hopefully the app will be updated with a fix.  There is a model with much better video quality, which costs about $40-50 more.  I was a bit torn, but ultimately this works fine for me.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for Basic Viewing and Security
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: Preface:  My camera experienced a reboot and freeze when I maxxed out the contrast to "6" from the preset of "4".  I noticed no picture quality difference so I returned the contrast setting to 4 after the reboot.I am finding this 640 x 480 quality camera perfect for basic surveillance and security.  It has an excellent mounting bracket and utility/control program.  I mounted it on the ceiling upside down.  The daylight picture quality is adequate and the nighttime infared (doesn't work through windows) is surprisingly good IMHO for such a relatively cheap camera that has two way audio.  The 270 degree rotation plus the up and down range provides an ample range of view.  I was able to figure out how to setup remote viewing by using the port forwarding instructions provided on the website.  The wait for tech support was surprisingly short.  I actually was able to speak to a live person from some offshore help desk.  My questions were pretty basic but I was able to get everything setup and running with a matter of a couple of hours.  I had to hop in my car and drive to an internet café to confirm the remote viewing.  I couldn't confirm remote access in my house.  Doh!  I followed the security advice and purchased a DDNS provider for $19.95 per year to get a unique web address (no need to make things easy for hackers that flock to the free Foscam DDNS site).  The basic utility that allows you to setup users with ADMIN, OPERATOR, or VISITOR levels of access along with their passwords is pretty straight forward.  All this for about $70 plus the $19.95/yr for a unique DDNS.  In short, I am pleasantly surprised how easy it is to do this for such little money.Additional note on the Freezing Issue:  The Contrast is set to 4 and it works fine (backyard/garden/trees view).  I experienced the freezing and reboot when I set the contrast to 6.  It gave some warning signs when part of the picture started to freeze.  I set the contrast back down to 4 when it rebooted itself.  Given that I saw no discernible difference between a contrast of 4 and 6 (looking through a window to the outside) I am not concerned.  The indoor picture quality is acceptable.  Given the slow internet in my area and my desire to add additional cameras, I am happy with the 640 x 480 quality.  People looking for HD video surveillance should look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: surprisingly good little camera
Reviews.Author: Leala
Reviews.Content: this is a rather decent camera.  Has issues with light saturation outdoors though.  That said, it is an indoor camera, and works well indoors.

Reviews.Title: My second camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph L. Patterson
Reviews.Content: Irish was wonderful in setting up my camera.  If you are like me and not very tech savy do not hesitate to call Foscam tech support and let them install it for you.  the service is free and worth it.  I can now view my camera from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Linda S.
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, it's exactly what I wanted and what I expected.  The only reason it didn't get a 5 star rating was that it was too difficult for me to install.  I had to pay someone with a bit more technical ability but it's up and running and I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great tool once it's set up!
Reviews.Author: Libby
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, I use it to check in on my dogs while I'm away. But it was impossible to set up, I'm pretty good with computers, but I had to a get a friend that's a computer engineer over to help with all the networking and such. Once it is set up, it's a great little gadget, with a free app!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: cindi
Reviews.Content: After I received the first camera and set it up I loved it.  I purchased it so that I can see my elderly mother in her home.  The picture is so clear even when the lights are off.  I can see,. listen and talk to her any time thru the camera with the utmost clarity.Customer care is fantastic an will help you with the set up with viewing thru your computer and cell phone. I now have 3 cameras.Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jesus A. Ortiz Vazquez
Reviews.Content: I needed an IP camera son I can monitor my home while I'm away. You don't need to pay for services like Yoics, Foscam includes a free domain if you don't have a fixed IP address. You do need to configure your router, so some technical knowledge is needed. Once properly set up it works great. You can access the camera from my Mac, iPhone, and iPad. You can also set motion and/or sound alarms to take a series of pictures and email them to you.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: stoebnerd
Reviews.Content: Hooked up to garage door opener bracket so I can keep an eye on my dogs while i am away. Wifi is 50 feet away through a couple of walls with good reception. Picture is great in light and dark. Pan function is great. Microphone is not great. Speaker is not great.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Luiz Eduardo Mendonça Simões
Reviews.Content: I love it! It has a good quality. I recommend it. Excellent purchase and I would buy it again. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Next best thing
Reviews.Author: Brit Quarnberg
Reviews.Content: This is the next best thing to actually being there to check on things. Great night vision. Pretty good detail. Super nice that you can control where the camera looks from any mobile device or computer. Fairly easy setup. I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this and I'm very pleased. I would for sure recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: we use this as a nanny cam
Reviews.Author: Michael & Mindy
Reviews.Content: use this as a nanny cam. works great  the sound has a bad feed back wish that could be solved but was great for video.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeri D
Reviews.Content: Easy setup and great price.  Support for product is top rate.  Would recommend this product to anyone who wants to set up a wireless security system without all the expense.

Reviews.Title: cant go wrong with an IP cam
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: even now these things still impress me for what they do for you, keep an eye open for you. setting it up the right way will always leave a good impression on me, knowing my stuff is safe.

Reviews.Title: Good dogs
Reviews.Author: pamela hays
Reviews.Content: I love it, it's clear except when the sun comes in and my dogs seem to know that someone is watching them. They have not done a bad thing since I got the camera. Lol

Reviews.Title: I've got two now
Reviews.Author: J. Ogann "Kimo from IA"
Reviews.Content: What a nice little camera. Clear, easy to set up and really rugged. You can't go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and support
Reviews.Author: Hefeweizen
Reviews.Content: It an amazing camera for the price.  Foscam's support is excellent.  Only the basic setup to your wifi network is easy.  Port forwarding for your router will likely take support from Foscam.  It is not easy.  Blue Iris software is excellent, but also not intuitive or easy for the initial setup.

Reviews.Title: Pros and Cons
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I have a big family and use multiple of these 8910s as both security and as a baby monitor. BY FAR THE MOST INEXPENSIVE VIDEO MONITOR OUT THERE.  I was looking for a android and Internet based cam that was cheap enough that I could buy multiple. The baby monitor cams were 200-400$, and only worked on iPhone or a handheld monitor. Plus, I can watch all my cams at the same time on the app.BE SURE TO PASSWORD PROTECTION YOUR DEVICE! Scary story about the 2 way audio... I herd someone had the same model as for a baby monitor as was awoken by someone that hacked in and was screaming at their baby.Installation isn't easy at all. Had to call tech support who was able to get it working pretty quickly. Apps arnt incredibly easy to set up either. And the ones I have tried only work when connected to the same wifi band. That's not a huge deal as long as you don't want to look in while you are away. Tech support helped me set up a url to go to as long as I have Internet service, which is great, I just wouldn't have been able to figure out myself with just manual.I tried 2 or 3 different apps. The one I settled with is the foscam viewer. Has all the movement and audio functions, but the IR doesn't turn on or off by the button. However, the url view has all the movement and IR functions, but no audio.4th star is for the AMAZING price.

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: B. Graham
Reviews.Content: It's fine. Seems to work well. Heard the HD models are buggy. This one just works. It was easy to set up too.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: Build quality is what you'd expect for a camera this cheap.  But, it works well!  We use 2 of them for baby cameras and the video quality is great during the day or night.  My only complaints with this versus a traditional baby video monitor is that the two-way audio is awkward and the speakers on this camera are pretty bad.  You can't understand what the person is saying, really.  I also have connectivity problems sometimes.  But, these are typical, known issues with using IP cameras for baby monitors, I believe.  I'm still happy I purchased this instead of another video monitor when our old one broke.

Reviews.Title: Very good little tool
Reviews.Author: Rosie Cross
Reviews.Content: While this is a bit confusing for a techno-challenged person to set up, I do indeed love this. Wonderful and inexpensive security device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Renato Ramírez
Reviews.Content: Is my first IP Camer and It is everything I was expecting, very easy to configure, excellent gadjet. I reccomend it

Reviews.Title: Flawless
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J Schall
Reviews.Content: This camera has been connected to my Diskstation for about a year. Its connected through a power line ethernet connection. I never trusted that wireless would work as well so I never tried it that way. I cannot comment on camera software or setup as the Diskstation controls all aspects of the device. The hardware is flawless in that regard.

Reviews.Title: Camera good...app update bad !
Reviews.Author: Gary Jay
Reviews.Content: The camera was as good as advertised.  If the app update didn't erase all of my previous settings...I would have given it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: These are really Nice
Reviews.Author: Dwayne
Reviews.Content: We have two of these now. They both cost less than the fancy baby monitor we have. I plan to get at least two more.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Carol Wyatt
Reviews.Content: Used for a litter of puppies we had - what fun for owners to be able to watch them grow.

Reviews.Title: Beats Wansview
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: I have a Wansview wireless IP camera that takes some coaching to get connected. The Foscam worked immediately. If you're not technically computer proficient then this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: is not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel Sierraalta
Reviews.Content: is a bit complicated to set up, the size is great, Good quality image but it is better to invest a little more on a better system

Reviews.Title: Moderate setup effort. Works beautifully
Reviews.Author: Rational
Reviews.Content: I followed the setup instructions posted by a helpful commenter upstream. Took some effort to get the camera's configuration site to work (particularly the email service; you have to submit a couple of times and try test a couple of times before it worked for me. Double check ports if it doesn't work at all), but once setup, it works very well.Camera works reliably over wi fi (indoors, but looking indoor/outdoor through a window). Will get a couple more. Great deal at this price (bought for less than 80).Only had it for a day so can't comment about longevity of the camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent video quality
Reviews.Author: Maria Augusteijn
Reviews.Content: We recently bought this camera so that we can "see" the inside of our home when we are away.  We are very happy with our purchase; the quality of the video is excellent.  Installing the camera on our computer was easy until we reached the part about "port forwarding."  This is necessary to view the video over the internet.  After trying for about an hour I called the company, and a few minutes later everything was working correctly.  I am really impressed with their customer service.  I also like the fact that this camera has audio, so one can talk with someone in the house while on vacation.  It is a very good investment in home security.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: tjharrison
Reviews.Content: its a sleek little camera and works great for what i need. we went on vacation and i still got to check in on my furry freinds back home

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup and Use
Reviews.Author: David Oleynik
Reviews.Content: I've had several wired and wireless IP cameras over the past 5 years and this one by far was the best (and most inexpensive). The setup was very easy and I was up and running in less than 15 minutes. I've been using it with BlueIris' software and found that to be a good match. I've set this up for the kids to keep watch on our dog and it is perfect. In conjunction with No-IP.com and a little wriggling wtih port forwarding in my router's firewall, they can view and control the cam from anywhere through their iPods or browser.

Reviews.Title: Too difficult to set up.
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Camera is very difficult to set up. Too many steps that leave you frustrated. We are not using the camera at all and cannot return it after only having it since late January.

Reviews.Title: Great for what it is
Reviews.Author: Skinner
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not HD! (at least not anywhere near 720/1080) That is the biggest thing to understand when ordering.Update the FW/Web UI first and then set up all your settings. Back that up.The scheduler is nice but seems to have conflict when you set it up on a PC and then edit it on the Android App.Use DynDNS to get your stream anywhere. Android app is very nice/easy to use.It is GREAT as a baby monitor/pet monitor. Will it identify burglars? Possibly. Most of the time it just catches people I know as they enter my apartment so I already know there body type/face. I have not tried it on unknown people to see if I could make them out after the fact, and frankly I hope I don't ever have to.This provides me a small piece of mind when I am at work and my Fiancee loves being able to remote in and see our dog/cat wherever she is. I would buy again but I will definitely go up a model for better picture clarity (yet larger price).

Reviews.Title: I can't get it installed
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Starcher "Starcher"
Reviews.Content: If anyone can help, I will take itI called Foscam 3 different times everytime there is a 20-30 min waitI can get it hooked to computer, but not wireless.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Maureen Glynn
Reviews.Content: Great so far!  Just what I was looking for!  Easy to set up.  Loaded an app on my phone to access from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Liked it, so I bought another one!
Reviews.Author: KWinkel
Reviews.Content: I bought a Foscam FI8910W and was able to readily get it connected to my home WIFI. I had trouble getting it configured so that I could view it via the internet on my iPhone. I called the tech help line and got a live person within a matter of minutes and they quickly solved the problem. FYI the iPhone app is $5.99.After using it for a couple weeks we concluded it worked very well so we bought a second one! It remotely pans left to right, tilts up and down, zooms, has infrared for at night, and has audio. Be sure to call the techs if you have difficulties, they are quick to answer and will have you up and going in short order.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Linda Troise
Reviews.Content: I hung it upside down under the eve of the house out of the weather and it works fine although it's somewhat sentive to motion. Lots of wind in trees seem to set it off but I may have not dialed the motion level in properly.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: ABC
Reviews.Content: Product works as expected, I had no issues with it, been running fine for several months.  Quality is ok, I will get the 720p next time.

Reviews.Title: stay away
Reviews.Author: Edward J Mckie
Reviews.Content: Lasted 2 weeks then completely died. Wont reset and will not show up on computer . Bought it in December but did not hook up till a couple weeks ago .Does anybody know if Foscam will warranty this item as I am beyond my return date with Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great Networkable Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Corey Herman
Reviews.Content: Purchased Dec. 2012 and it has been operation 365/7 since it arrived and I couldn't be happier.  The interface is wonderful and the controls from my Samsung Galaxy S3 are flawless.  Super happy with the performance.

Reviews.Title: Portforwarding NIGHTMARE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Brown-Hite
Reviews.Content: I LOVE the "idea" of the two-way audio function on the camera but the Port Forwarding required to make it happen remotely is a total, complete NIGHTMARE!!!!!!!!!!  I have spent two days trying to get it to work remotely, which is the only reason I wanted this particuliar camera, and it STILL doesn't work.  It does work when I'm on my home wi-fi network but even the cable/internet company can't figure out why it won't work remotely. They even set up the port forwarding for me and it still doesn't work.  I tried contacting FOSCAM directly too. I was online using the online chat and they just stopped responding. I waited 10, 15, 20, 30 minutes before I gave up. I kept asking if they were there still??  Hello? It's been 10 mins, then 20 mins, then 30....still no response after the first 5 mins. Can you say extremely FRUSTRATED!!  I already had camera's with one way audio so now these are pretty much wasted money since I can't use them remotely.

Reviews.Title: Not as easy to get up & running as it should have been.....
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I thought this item was going to be easy to install.  Instead, I ended up calling Foscam.  I could not understand the person on the other end of the phone.  I ended up giving the foscam rep remote access to my computer to get the camera to work.  It took him about 40 minutes to get it working.  While his customer service was good, I had to have him repeat almost everything he said because I just could not understand him.Also, I should be able to see the camera from a remote location and I can not.  Today, the camera quit working.  I am very disappointed as I was hoping for better as this camera came recommended.I have not even had the camera hooked up for a week yet.  I will give it more time to get it working once again but at this point, I do not recommend the camera.

Reviews.Title: Works ok, albeit grainy images.
Reviews.Author: E. Tran
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera a year ago (March 2013) for light surveillance (take a picture and send it to me if motion detected), which it advertised that it could do easily.Well, I was able to set up everything on the camera just fine, including port-forwarding to be able to view/manage the camera from outside my home network.  However, I could never get this one feature to work and gave up on it - I don't require a constant, real time image of my front door.  I should have been more disciplined and returned it when I had the chance.Now that I'm getting a dog and would like to monitor her, I'm going to give it another try - I don't think I'll need an 'intruder alert/snapshot' with the new dog, but it would have been nice to have that functionality which I'd originally purchased it for.Who knows - maybe I'll spring for one of the very impressive DropCams that my colleague showed me - but I can't stomach the idea of paying for this basic functionality twice.  Wish I'd just sprung for it the first time.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: hawkmeadow "hawkmeadow"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and use. Able to access from work via 4G or internet access. Does what I wanted it to do. Good value.

Reviews.Title: Good, Reliable Camera for Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Christopher P. B. "Chris"
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th Foscam that I have purchased.  Two for my house and two for my parents.  All have proven to be reliable, with good-enough resolution and the right price.  In fact, I have been pleasantly surprised by the durability.  Several of the cameras have taken toddler blows with no signs of wear and one got covered in cat vomit with only slight loss in wireless signal strength after being cleaned and dried.  If you need a good, basic wireless camera for most purposes, I recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Dane
Reviews.Content: I did not have high expectations for this camera but now that I've had it a couple weeks I'm really impressed.  The included CD with a setup movie walked me through the setup without any problems and the camera operates reliably one floor lower than our router.  The IR illuminators work quite well and give surprising night vision range indoors.

Reviews.Title: Beware if you want more than a baby cam
Reviews.Author: Allen C. Deckard
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to keep track of a condo I own when I'm not there.Thought according to everything I've read that this was a very easy or at least not super hard camera to setup on the internet.  Well B.S.FIRST:Their live chat is non existent.  I tried over and over to get someone to answer their live chat that comes up every 2 seconds asking if I want support threw chat.SecondI'm not computer illiterate not a genius either but I'd say above average.  The camera comes with a domain that is from foscam well That didn't work and yah port forwarding is setup I've went threw step by step several times over setting things up since it's usually just some stupid thing you've missed even reset it to factory default settings and started fresh twice with no luck.I don't know if the dns they give you for the camera is a feature they eliminated or what.Then they say in the directions that you can go to a third party site they give you and use theirs if you want.  Yah at 20 bucks a year and even then I don't know if it's the camera or their site so if I pay the 20 bucks it still might not work.The camera seems to work decient picture is no bad as long as I'm using the wireless or cat 5 and if I could get the internet part to work without a nightmare it might be worth what I paid.  Right now I'm ready to throw it across the parking lot haven't been this pissed at a product in years.

Reviews.Title: Perfect security cam
Reviews.Author: Kristy
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  I love that it has night vision.  It also has pan and tilt to view a wide area.  It was easy to install and I was even able to figure out port forwarding to see my camera outside my network.

Reviews.Title: Does not work well
Reviews.Author: isabelle  Buell
Reviews.Content: This camera does not work well at all! Difficult to navigate. Want only be focused on the ceiling! May return.

Reviews.Title: Works fine, very difficult setup with 4 year old router.
Reviews.Author: Doug McElroy
Reviews.Content: Had to replace our Century Link router with a new one to make the port forwarding work.  Now we lost our ability to communicate with the router by an older computer.  The ripple effect was costly to us.

Reviews.Title: Incredibly difficult to set up-unreliable
Reviews.Author: DeniseD "Bayle"
Reviews.Content: Unless you have great confidence in your computer skills and several hours of free time to set up the camera, do not bother with this item.  I did spend the time to get it set up and then connected it wirelessly.  It worked for a few weeks, but now I cannot log on from my iPhone.  I dread setting this up again.

Reviews.Title: Security camera that doesn't provide secure communications
Reviews.Author: nagarkar
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and found out it's insecure, so returned it. The main source of insecurity is the fact it can only be accessed remotely using http basic authentication, which transmits user name and password in cleartext over the wire. Anyone with a packet sniffer can get your password, and start observing you while you are in your own home. Once I realized this limitation, the only place I could safely put it was in my crawlspace, to watch the mice activity. I decided to return it instead.Other than that, I also had plenty of trouble setting up the email notifications (never worked). Note that it's just a .3 MP (megapixel) camera, and most of hte others in this price range are 1 MP and above. For reference an iphone 4s has an 8 MP camera. So the resolution is poor to say the least.

Reviews.Title: Awful user interface, poor documentation, no wifi
Reviews.Author: Duffy Mazan
Reviews.Content: The user interface is convoluted, the documentation is poorly written with lots of words but not much information, and the wifi doesn't work at all with modern BGN equipment.  I have a large wifi network with multiple access point supporting as many as two dozen devices, all working fine.  Except for the FOSCAM camera.  In fact, it can use WPS to acquire the SSID and security settings but can't use them to connect.  Waste of time.A quick update before I return the camera: If I reconfigure a wifi access point to use WEP instead of the more secure WPA or WPA2, the camera is able to connect just fine.  But it will not connect if the access point requires WPA or WPA2.  I am not willing to lower the security of my network to let this camera connect.  Back it goes.

Reviews.Title: It does not work wireless well.
Reviews.Author: Guk Hyun
Reviews.Content: It does not work wireless well. Wirelessly set, the camera is often initiated. Using the wire, only LAN cable bundled well, when purchased separately connected to the LAN cable is also often initiated.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera but IP address keeps changing
Reviews.Author: Rex Bibendi
Reviews.Content: The IP address of my camera keeps changing and when it does, the Foscam Blue Iris software that I use it with loses the camera.  I come home every day to find it pointed nowhere after disconnecting or resetting.  Sometimes it is connected to the software, sometimes the IP address is messed up again.  This small issue really undermines the value.

Reviews.Title: Gotta Buy!
Reviews.Author: Geri P.
Reviews.Content: These cameras are so easy to set up!  I have 6 of them now!!  Anyone can set these cameras up!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: E. Gould
Reviews.Content: Super affordable & work great! We have 2 of them & we use them as dog cams with the app for our phones.

Reviews.Title: Good camera; difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these. They are great cameras; however, the set up for port forwarding and email alerts are crazily difficult.I contacted Foscam support team for assistance with port forwarding (allows you to view the cameras anywhere there is internet) and setting up alarm alerts when there is motion detection. The port forwarding was successful and easy for the tech guy, but the alarm alerts set up was difficult. Jake Taylor, the rep couldn't figure it out. We kept receiving error messages. He then said that he would have an Tech Manager contact me the following day. I still have yet to hear back from them since. It is now the second day. I will keep you posted if I do or do not hear from them at all. My plan is to return the cameras if I do not hear back from them or they will not be able to help me set up the email alerts. While the cameras are great, they are useless to me without those email alerts unless you will monitor the cameras 24/7.

Reviews.Title: A bit hard to setup, but fantastic once it is going!
Reviews.Author: Tahoe Dad
Reviews.Content: Definately find a web resource for setup instructions, as the provided instructions and software will likely not get the job done.The image is great, plus you can set it up (if techy) to be viewed out of the house also.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: MICHELE SMITH
Reviews.Content: This camera only works when it feels like working. The main reason that I purchased it was to view my house from my android smart phone. The Verizon connection changes every month, so you must keep re-programing it which is a hassle. Also there is a lot of static when you try to speak/communicate. If your going to use your smart phone with this item.......beware because it uses a huge amount of data.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Riah Constantine "Riah Con"
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the quality for the price, black or white color models, 360 degrees rotation, night vision, two way audio,  & it's reliable.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up if you are a nerd.
Reviews.Author: Ezra
Reviews.Content: Here's the deal. If you want a wireless IP camera you HAVE to be a nerd to set it up.  All cameras have this issue and this one is no different.  With that said you only need to be a part time nerd to get this guy going so it s your best choice.  It has all the features you need and the performance (pic quality, reliability, etc) is very good.  I would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: I hate this camera
Reviews.Author: Billie Gilmore
Reviews.Content: Camera doesn't work as advertised.  I am returning it. No way to view remotely as stated. Nice wish but doesn't work.  I watched you tube videos and read the net about it.  Still could not get it to work remotely.  Wasted two days trying.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and image
Reviews.Author: James Seibert
Reviews.Content: This camera covers the best I've ever used. Its sound pick is excellent and night vision in the room is vey clear. There are many apps for Apple, PC, Android.

Reviews.Title: Item sent to me without setup disk
Reviews.Author: Ivan A. Campbell
Reviews.Content: This item was sent to me without the setup disk and I was unable to get it to work till this day. After calling the assistance line, I was given directions to download the driver online and that still didn't work.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Donna Burke
Reviews.Content: This is the third camera of this model I have purchased. The camera is great. The software could be more user friendly. The Set and Go setting for each profile (eight are provided) are not responsive enough to let the user know that it indeed was Set. It is a JavaScript that provides no confirmation, but it seems to work. Also don't assume that the defaults are what you want. It took me awhile to determine how I needed the camera to be set to my requirements. The camera is a great value for the price. I do recommend it and I would not hesitate to add an additional one if my requirement demands a 4th camera.

Reviews.Title: Great security camera
Reviews.Author: James E. Humphrey
Reviews.Content: Great performance. Everything I hoped it would be. Night vision is fantastic. Very reasonable price but a little complicated to set up for viewing away from home network.

Reviews.Title: Just what you SHOULD expect
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did some experimenting with purchases of used Cams.  I had already purchased several of this model new, and hoped that I could handle the increase I wanted by filling out with used.  So far, 1 for 3 :(.  All the vendors so far have been upfront as problems were found, but this one was right, right out of the box.I have set a few of these up, so knew what I should expect.  I'm not an expert by any means, but this purchase went quite smoothly.I'd try this vendor again for my next set of purchases.

Reviews.Title: Dont believe the hype
Reviews.Author: Knuckle_Head
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 returned 2. Messed with these things for a few days before deciding to return them. I had done alot of research on which camera would serve my needs of security, I only wanted to monitor my home while i was away via my phone. One reason i chose these was not having to sign up for a cloud service. Turns out my Belkin router will only let me use a service they recommend which cost after the free trial. Now that's not Foscams fault but i feel it should have been noted at some point. As for the cameras they were no where near the quality i expected and the image quality was bad after about 15 to 20 feet away (from the camera i put in my living room i couldnt even read the writing on a box that was in my kitchen about 13 feet away , So unless a thief sticks his face right up to the camera i doubt if i could even get a good look. So back to the drawing board.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Roger Moffat
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to provide a video feed of my basement sump pump so that I can keep an eye on the water level (and so possible failure of the sump pump) while away from home.It works great with the Foscam app on the iPhone to quickly check this from wherever you are.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Lynette Catt
Reviews.Content: Good picture, was trouble to set up if your a novice, had to go to youtube and had it set up in no time.

Reviews.Title: Just awful
Reviews.Author: Raptor
Reviews.Content: First of all, it is a nightmare to set up remote viewing.  If you don't have experience networking computers, I wouldn't even consider it.  The manufacturer of this camera expects you to sign up for third party services and make advanced changes to the settings of your wireless router.Secondly, it doesn't work.  After originally detecting my wireless network (and all the neighbors'), it stopped detecting any wireless network during setup.

Reviews.Title: great fun product
Reviews.Author: Michael Cyhaniuk
Reviews.Content: Manual support is difficult but phone in technical support is excellent. It might take awhile to configure your router to the camera but it does work. Email notification is great.

Reviews.Title: Cool IP camera
Reviews.Author: PGB
Reviews.Content: This is a great quality IP camera, and at a great price. After installing several of my friends have also purchased, and they love theirs as well.

Reviews.Title: It has been working every day since I got it.
Reviews.Author: gadgetjunki "gadgetjunki"
Reviews.Content: I use this all the time.  I am not good at networking and was expecting it to be difficult, it was, took me an hour to set up but it worked out fine.  I just followed the instructions, step by step and followed other reviewers tips when I didn't understand the engrish instructions.  The night vision works quite well and the quality is better than your standard analog cctv, it isn't HD though.  You have to use a server, free ones are available online.  The features work well and thanks to a good android app  (ip cam from David Chong)  I can control it from around the world.I would definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Time consuming to set up
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Schmitz
Reviews.Content: It was time consuming to set up. I wish they had a better way of doing it. Other than that  it works great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It works, but can't make it work over the internet. So it works in my home for remote view and control perfect. But can't make my router works to allow me to access this.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Matthew T. Smith "iimatt"
Reviews.Content: This camera/software/browser login all work great and do exactly what it says it'll do.  I actually use mine through ninja blocks.  It is also compatible with zoneminder.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, UI not so much
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Babeshkin
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for monitoring your house while you are away.My only dislike, is the WebUI. It is very simplistic.  You are better off using Apps from the Apple or Android store. Most of the good ones are not free.

Reviews.Title: Could improve the clearness of the video
Reviews.Author: Sir Roberto
Reviews.Content: The camera works somewhat as described it's not a very high-end camera the viewing is scratchy lens is not very good I would recommend upgrading to a better quality picture

Reviews.Title: Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: L. English
Reviews.Content: I like this camera.  Provides another layer of security.  It moves all over and sends notifications to my email.  The picture quality is not the greatest, but it still gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Read this before you buy...
Reviews.Author: J. Deavers
Reviews.Content: The physical camera hardware seems fine, but be aware that you must connect to the manufacture's website in order to access your camera.  You cannot connect to the device wirelessly through your own LAN.  This can cause all types of issues depending on how your home or business network is set up.

Reviews.Title: great.
Reviews.Author: Brandon W.
Reviews.Content: Matched description, works great for a baby monitor. Wish the ir cut wasn't so loud and that the ir lights didn't glow red.

Reviews.Title: Unstable on wireless
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Ferioli
Reviews.Content: Unless this unit is either right next to the wifi access point or connected directly via Ethernet, expect spotty results.  I put a high gain antenna on it and it still does not connect reliably and will often reboot.  When it works, it works well, however.

Reviews.Title: Quality is awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Williamson "Juheenuna"
Reviews.Content: The video quality is awesome, and I use Foscam IP camera app for iPHONE to monitor my kittens.  It does make a little loud noise so whenever i control it remotely, it wakes them up.  It does seem to require a little bit more configuration than NetGear Vuezone.  I installed four VueZone cameras (one of which is night-vision) and this one.  I love how clear the image quality is.  I love how easy it is to install the VueZone cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Tech_Toot
Reviews.Content: Relatively easy to set up within your local WiFi and can be readily viewed from any computer or smart phone on the same network. But if you want to access it remotely through the internet, you will need to be comfortable with changing the administrative settings on your existing WiFi router to set up port forwarding. Instructions for doing this were actually pretty good, though.Colors are not true but that doesn't bother me. The night time infrared is pretty awesome. You can also remotely capture and record stills and video through your computer or smartphone control panel. You can send sound to the unit via your PC microphone, or monitor sounds in the room with the camera's built in microphone. We use it for security and to monitor our pets when we are not at home.All and all, I am pretty pleased with this unit. I ordered the unit in black, but I received white. Other than that little ordering problem, I think the camera is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great $75 webcam.  Don't expect a Mercedes for a Hyundai price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I find this to be a great webcam.  It's resolution is pretty good.  At 640X480 resolution, the frame rate I get over the internet is very low, down at 5 fps for my MacPro and sometimes 1 fps for my Samsung Notepad.  But as I said, don't expect a Mercedes for a Hyundai price.The controls from the webpage works pretty good.  You can set options, and do controls okay.  My Android phone uses a paid Foscam App and IPCam (for free) which works much better in terms of control layout.  But you don't need to pay $2.99 for an App.  The benefits are marginal.Set up was pretty easy.  For those that have had trouble probably didn't read the instructions.  The only tough part was setting up the Verizon Fios port forwarding.  It took at least 5 minutes to do a Google search to figure it out.I have dynamic DDNS service, but used the IP address and the 4 digit port I set up.  It's been a week and the public IP address hasn't changed.  I was starting to use the public IP forwarding service, but figured that for the infrequent times that my dynamic IP changes (I got it a month ago, and hasn't changed yet), that when it does change, I'll just cross the bridge when I come to it and change the IP address when I log in.You can turn on the IR light remotely.  You can control the camera direction by clicking on a control and on touch pads, swipe with your finger.  There are 8 preset positions which are great, and you can set it to automatically sweep vertically or horizontally.A great feature is a motion sensor that when triggered, will send by e-mail 6 pics from the camera.  I use it with my security system.There is a feature that periodically allows video to upload to an FTP service, but Verizon doesn't allow FTP hosting so I haven't been able to get it to work.  But, from your app or webpage create snapshots and videos.Finally, the apps allow you to view several cameras at the same time.  I haven't tried it because I only have one cam, but since several apps have it and you can view one window which the other(s) with no signal, I assume it should work.In summary, it has great features and it seems to work well.  If you want an inexpensive camera that can work wirelessly and over the internet that has a host of practical features, this is it.  If you want a professional grade camera, this is not for you.  You need a camera that costs hundreds of dollars.  I think it's not fair to give a Toyota Camry a lower rating just because it doesn't have the features and performance of a Bentley.

Reviews.Title: recomendation
Reviews.Author: Geyner M.
Reviews.Content: hello, the camera works very well, in fact I have three chambers, I am very satisfied, I recommend them, Greetings from Costa Rica.this is the best option

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Ernie T.
Reviews.Content: took a while for me to set up port forwarding on my router but it has been consistently working well.  planning to order more.

Reviews.Title: Poor image and app support
Reviews.Author: Remus
Reviews.Content: The image quality is not that great.The biggest minus is the mobile application support. The application provided by Foscam on the App Store is very basic, unintuitive and ugly.

Reviews.Title: Good for what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Matt Haller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a baby monitor.  I only set this up for local access (i.e., I don't need to access this camera while away from home).  The included instructions and software were sufficient for my needs and I didn't run into any troubles

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: luise
Reviews.Content: The camera was difficult for to install. I had to call Foscam Support 3 X to finally get it working. Once installed it worked great. Unfortunately I can not use it because it does not work the distance needed to monitor my elderly relative. She lives in the same building but not close enough to my router.

Reviews.Title: Perfect baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: nataliejoyc
Reviews.Content: We've been using this monitor for about 3 months now and it's been awesome. It is WAY cheaper than the other video baby monitors we were looking at. There are several apps that work with it (I use the one called "Foscam Video"). It comes with a mount so we just screwed it into the corner of the nursery. You can pan all around the room, take snapshots and videos, have two-way audio, etc. We aren't super tech-savvy but we were able to set it up easily in about 15 minutes. I love that we can check on our baby whether we're on our phone, iPad, or computer. It's perfect!

Reviews.Title: Works as it should
Reviews.Author: marcin wosik
Reviews.Content: Great cam for multiuse. I use it as a baby monitor in my kids nursery.Set up can be a little difficult for people who do are not computer friendly.One way audio works great.. Two way.. Not so much. there is a lot of feedback since the microphone and speakers are in close proximity of one another. However there are out/inputs for both and can be adjusted.Good buy.. Might consider getting another one for different use

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: sheila povoski-butler
Reviews.Content: bought to watch my cat who was ill.  I could log in with smart device (additional app cost $5.99) and monitor her when I had to leave the house.  I can think of many other applications for it.  Easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeff Bennett "LogicalMethod .com"
Reviews.Content: If you have more than one, it can be a bit complex. Good forum at Cam-it. Have 4 of these and one outdoor cam using Blue Iris to get a few more features and it works. Took some time and was a bit complex and clunky to setup but it really stabilized and does what I need.Note: if you put this on an inside window sill pointed out, the Infrared lights reflect on the window glass and don't work but that is a physics problem. Not a camera issue.

Reviews.Title: Terrific camera for great price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Butler
Reviews.Content: I've bought one of these before and it works terrific.  I use IP Cam Viewer with it and the controls are simple and the picture is clear.  The microphone is reasonable quality, the speakers are definitely not.  Very difficult to understand.  It does have jacks for mic and speakers though if you want to buy different ones and hook them up.The biggest complaint I have with this camera is that it's not secure.  As long as you only access it from secure networks (secured home WiFi, cell phone network, etc.) I think it's pretty safe, but If you accessed it from public WiFi anyone who wanted to could get into it easily.

Reviews.Title: Overall good product
Reviews.Author: Hani F Kaldas
Reviews.Content: Good quality video for the price. Audio is not great, too much echo with internal MIC. Motion detection is not great. Easily affected by light sensitivity. Alarm on audio is better than motion detection.

Reviews.Title: Had to get a replacement, but it's now solid
Reviews.Author: J. Barr
Reviews.Content: I purchased the FI8910W camera, and was very excited after I installed it. It worked very smoothly using a local Web browser on my laptop, and it worked very well using one of several Android apps remotely from my smartphone.Unfortunately, it suffered from a known issue described elsewhere in these reviews: When the camera was pointed a a very bright scene, it would reboot causing it to go offline for a while, and then go through its initial "pan around everywhere" routine until it would finally settle at the first preset. I had it pointing at some dog crates near a bright window, so it would just continually reboot and reboot rendering it useless.I contacted Foscam Support, and they quickly diagnosed the issue. The fix was to get a replacement camera. I was still within the Amazon return period, so I could return it for an exchange, otherwise I could get an RMA from Foscam directly and have them replace it. Given the number of occurrences of this issue here on Amazon, I had no guarantee that a replacement from Amazon would not have the same issue, so I opted for the RMA directly from Foscam since they assured me that the replacement would work properly.I sent it back, and in about a week, I received a replacement. I installed it, and it now works reliably pointing to the same bright scene that caused the other camera to fail.I'm giving it only 4 stars because the camera did have a known issue, and I did have to pay extra shipping to send it back for the RMA. But other than that, I have to give this camera very high marks. I highly recommend it, and if you have ANY problems, by all means contact Foscam Support--they are rock solid in resolving issues with their products.

Reviews.Title: Work great
Reviews.Author: Todd Graff
Reviews.Content: Have had the camera's for a few months now and they work great! Had a bit of difficulty initially setting them up but once I figured it out they work like a charm. I especially like the motion alert where if you have it trained on a doorway and if there is any movement such at the door opening, it takes a series of pictures and sends them to you in an email. The only thing I would have done different is to have bought the 720p HD camera's.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Rod J. Kardorff
Reviews.Content: I use two of these, one to watch my young boys playing in their room and one in the main room of our house, just as a security precaution. They are fairly easy to set up, the viewing quality is excellent and I like being able to monitor the house over the web if I am away.This is a very good quality camera and excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install... if your modem is inside your apartment
Reviews.Author: Guilherme S.
Reviews.Content: Great camera - Great video quality during day and very good image with Infra red.Native app - I never made it work. I am using another free app (android) and it works perfectly.Installation can be tricky - not for beginners. You will need to set up "port forwarding" in your router and modem.In my case, my building provides internet connection to every apartment and I do not have access to the modem... I had to call the IT manager of the firm that manages the apartments in this building. Tricky but possible.Camera works perfectly with Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Google Chrome on Ipad and Android apps.I am glad I got this one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but it's missing a very important feature!!!
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: This camera has a great price for the quality of video and audio. The main letdown is the control panel which varies from Explorer to Chrome to Mobile. Each one with less features than the other. However the big miss here is the patrol option. This camera will only let you patrol horizontally and/or vertically, but not to your presets. If you are not able to patrol through the preset spots then why even bother to let you set them??? The importance of presets is for you to choose exactly which places are you most interested in watching, so to let you select them but not patrol them is plainly nuts. Hope they figure this out soon and may fix this major let down. Has a much better experience with D-Link cameras software.

Reviews.Title: Couldnt connect
Reviews.Author: Kris K
Reviews.Content: Could not connect to mac mini 10.6.8. In fact after installing the software, i couldnt even see the camera in the software looking for the camera. Wasted time and effort. Too bad...looks like others are successfull. Didnt bother calling support after reading reviews

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Tatom
Reviews.Content: good camera, fast resolution. You can view it on your Iphone.  Don't use the installer that comes with it though.

Reviews.Title: Nice little lower cost camera
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for our alpaca building, so I could keep tabs on what goes on out there with our animals.  Our building is probably 150-175 ft. from the house, so I liked the idea of wireless viewing AND the night vision.  BUT...between the metal walls/roofing of our building and our router location (in our basement - for various reasons not easy to relocate),  we could not get a strong enough signal (even with a range extender placed upstairs) to go wireless.So we purchased 250 ft. of outdoor rated cat5 cable ($45 including shipping, which was less than the cost of the range extender I'd purchased, and later returned).  We ran that out to the building (buried) and the camera works just fine.  The night vision works well, the colors of day vision are true, and the sound carries easily.  As far as I know, this is not an outdoor rated camera, but I have it up in the rafters, well under roof, so I'm hoping it will be fine.  Time will tell.  My husband keeps saying he wishes it had a zoom feature, and I agree.  But for the price, I think it's a pretty good deal!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Karl Kasper
Reviews.Content: Was a little tricky setting up, but now it works great. Better clarity than my old camera, and great to be able to see from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Quality is good
Reviews.Author: GWS "network-sidewinder-guy"
Reviews.Content: The video quality is outstanding and I like the ability to talk back through the camera.  However, there is no true guest option that doesn't require a login action.  That's the only reason to bring it down a star.

Reviews.Title: Wifi option not fun at all
Reviews.Author: Huffdaddy
Reviews.Content: I did my research on various Wifi and Ethernet connected cameras for the use inside my home. After the reviews of the model I decided to give it a try. I needed this camera for the Wifi option and it did NOT perform as advertised.Pros:The packaging was very nicethe camera itself seems to be built with quality in mindGreat looking cameraCons:Would not connect via wifi at allcustomer support is not the greatestInstructions are somewhat lackingBottom line there are other companies out there that have better products. So like they always say, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: This is awesome for a baby camera
Reviews.Author: EM
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this thing. It was a bit complicated to set up. I recommend doing it BEFORE baby comes as you have no time to do anything once baby comes :) It links to my phone with the foscam app. I can see and hear whats happening and talk on it even when I'm away from the house. The only annoying thing is I can't get the audio to come up on my computer.Highly recommend as a baby monitor. The night vision is super clear too.

Reviews.Title: These are awesome
Reviews.Author: William H. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Cool puppy cam - great price on a pan tilt camera with IR - the audio is pretty weak, but who cares.  Great toy

Reviews.Title: Makes baby sleep training and safety so much better!
Reviews.Author: Chris Van Andel
Reviews.Content: Tired of being ambushed by what I thought was our sleeping baby, we installed this camera.  I wish we had gotten it ages ago!  Now I can see clearly if she is wide awake and ballistic, or just very noisily falling asleep.  Since getting this camera, there have been numerous naps and bedtimes which I would have interfered with based on the sounds from the monitor, but being able to see what she's doing has given her a chance to fall asleep on her own without me messing her up.  Makes me wonder if part of her sleeping troubles now are because I went in too often before she had a chance to get herself settled.  Also, good for safety as she rolls herself onto her tummy and gets stuck there and very mad.  Great for knowing when to go in and when to let her work herself out!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product I give it a 5 star
Reviews.Author: FoxyLinda
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it has a really clear picture, and the quality of the video is awesome. I would recommend it to anyone who purchased. I just purchased another one for my kitchen so I'm able to see who makes the mess while I'm gone. I also like the sound quality. And the fact that I can take a snapshot with my phone. The only thing I'm having trouble with right now is getting hookup with my ipad but that's not really a problem it's just that I need to update my ipad and things will work. Buy this camera you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Okay for monitoring by PC but doesn't work well by iPhone
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Behm "Jeff B."
Reviews.Content: I was optimistic about this product because it connected to my WiFi very easily and within a few minutes I was able to use the camera via my laptop. However, when I tried to then connect it to my iPhone, to be able to use the remote viewing capability -- wow! What a nightmare! First, when you try to access the Mac version of the instructions on the included DVD or on the website, that section has may things that refer to a Windows environment. Huh? The process of porting your iPhone to try and connect to this webcam is ridiculously difficult, and even after 35 minutes on the phone with the Foscam tech support person (who had to take control of my Mac temporarily), it didn't work. But that didn't stop the tech person from trying to convince me to go into Amazon while he waited, and give him a good review! I admire this person's spirit, but it came across as quite pushy, especially since he wasn't able to get the unit to work properly. It was very difficult to understand the Foscam tech support person, due to a very heavy non-English accent. I'm sorry but that's the fact, and it definitely made the process harder. So in summary, I ended up returning the unit because I can't afford to spend anymore time messing around with a device that was evidently launched ahead of it's time.

Reviews.Title: Impossible to Set up via Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Amanda L. Lomax
Reviews.Content: Was super easy to set up to view camera on our computer/laptop.  However, making it accessible to view on the Smart Phone is impossible for a mom with average technological knowledge like myself.  Got this instead of a video monitor and can't view it on my phone (which was the whole purpose).  Extremely frustrated.  Disappointed Foscam doesn't support their own app for this.

Reviews.Title: Foscam says Issue Fixed
Reviews.Author: Dan Lynch
Reviews.Content: 4 stars because difficult (for me) to setup.Here is Foscams response to my email re rebooting, etc issue from J Den.Yes its been fixed by the manufacturer, all the cameras manufactured after September do not have this issue. I believe it requires a firmware flashing that we can do at our Houston location, for which the camera would have to be shipped to us.Best Regards,ZohaibFoscam Digital Technologies LLCSupport TeamTime will tell if fixed.

Reviews.Title: This Camera is the best one I've seen
Reviews.Author: twitte
Reviews.Content: I have about 8 of the Foscam cameras and the latest version is the best of them all.  Great for vision in the dark.  Best price and excellent quality.  Works well with my tablets (using IP CAM app).  I'm able to rotate the camera and listen in my home or take photos and e-mail them to myself.  Perfect if you have 2 homes or are away a lot on trips.  Also good to watch the pets (or talk to them when you are away).

Reviews.Title: Wifi does not work, must use ethernet cable to view image. Had to purchase a D-Link DCS-5020L that worked much better.
Reviews.Author: robert newell
Reviews.Content: Tried numerous times to install Foscam F18910W following directions provided, however could only get it to work via cable.  Wifi never worked.  Purchased a D-Link DCS-5020L and in one  hour had it working.  Love the D-Link camera.  Unfortunately I am outside my 30 day return window and stuck with a piece of Foscam junk

Reviews.Title: The set up is RIDICULES!!
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: The description never mentioned that you need a computer science degree to be able to set up this camera. I consider myself pretty tech savvy but this camera is far beyond me to set up. We returned this and went with the Dropcam.

Reviews.Title: two cameras
Reviews.Author: Nikolai Pechenov
Reviews.Content: camera works well. set up was some what easy.called foscam support for help mason was very helpful.would recomend

Reviews.Title: works!
Reviews.Author: mer
Reviews.Content: Love this little camera. The only negative is that it makes sound when you rotate it, so you can't use it without alarming a potential intruder

Reviews.Title: Don't know why all the positive reviews
Reviews.Author: KOOKOO
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get it to work with Apple router and PC or Mac laptop, couldn't get through to tech support.  Bought a refurbished Samsung SmartCam and was hooked up in less than 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Am I missing something?
Reviews.Author: Mike Callery
Reviews.Content: Either I am missing something, or this is the worse designed IP camera I can think of.I bought my Belkin Netcam, set it up, ran their software and was up in 10 minutes, able to see it from my iPhone, iPad and the net via a website.Not this piece of crap.  Oh, the camera is working well and I can see it on my WiFi network, but having to fight with my Cisco DPC3825 DOCSIS 3.0 Gateway, which is very typical of Cox network's, is enough to make me throw this thing against the wall.  Why is a company so enlightened with their IP camera business making it so difficult.  Why am I having to fool with some other company's hardware to get your hardware to work?  Maybe I am missing something and if so, I apologize, but I'm going to take a baseball bat to something really soon.

Reviews.Title: Works great, at a cheap price.
Reviews.Author: Jim Wings
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to monitor my dog when he was sick, and I was away from home.  This little camera works great.  I was able to monitor my dog via my iPhone over 4G cell network using Safari or Google Chrome.  Connect the camera via a network cable to configure the WiFi setup, then you never need the cable again.  Has built in infrared lights that work great in the dark (black and white picture).  Over 4G using the controls to move up/down, left/right do not work really well (network is too slow), but there is a button that allows you do an automatic left/right complete scan.  That is what I normally use, so I can scan the whole room with the touch of one button.  For the price, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Jose Dente
Reviews.Content: Sorry for my bad english ... this camera is excellent, buy this camera in July 2013, and work to 24 hours full day and never failed. Recently by some security issues I decided to move it a distance of about 25 meters and continues to work fine.

Reviews.Title: I use it as a baby cam
Reviews.Author: Mark Burwen
Reviews.Content: Paired it was an app by Robert Chou, and it's awesome.  Audio, video, motion sensor, background audio, etc and it's all on my phone and I'm not carrying around a second device.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: AmazonBuyer
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera, not for outside use of course.  It pans and tilts, and just what I need.  Good quality image and good customer service.  Instructions relatively easy to follow.  Needed to change the channel on my router from Auto to another numbered channel in order to make the cameras not drop connections daily.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and service
Reviews.Author: Dr. Ken Adams
Reviews.Content: John provided excellent support from Foscam to help me get me multi cameras visible remotely.  I'm very pleased with the service.

Reviews.Title: Work Great but very hard ot set up
Reviews.Author: Shelley Teel
Reviews.Content: I don't know if it was our router or what but this was practically impossible to set up. We had to have a friend who is a computer genius come and set these up for us and it took him over 6 hours to get three set up so that we could see the cameras while we are at work.

Reviews.Title: geat piece fo gear
Reviews.Author: DLS
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Setup was a little clunky in places but nothing too bad.  It might give a non-techie a bit of headache to get connected past a firewall.

Reviews.Title: Good economic nursery cam option
Reviews.Author: R. Weeden
