Reviews.Content: We use this in our sons room, and can monitor him from our phones, tablets, wherever. Especially cool when I am at work and can just bring up an app to see him! Set up instructions were slightly confusing but I was able to figure it out with trial and error.

Reviews.Title: Works well with app on WiFi only
Reviews.Author: Bridget K Cooper
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this on the recommendation of a friend who uses this camera to keep an eye on her dog while she is at work.  We figured we could use it similarly as a baby monitor.  We hit some snags during installation - 1)  Windows 8 wouldn't support the camera unless it was hard-wired to the router.  Since our Baby's room will not be in the same room as the router this was a problem.  2) We installed it on the Mac next which took to the WiFi without issue, BUT my operating system wouldn't support the audio (I have been meaning to update it but don't feel like spending the money). Since hearing the baby is more important than seeing him, this was also a problem.Once we installed the app "Foscam Viewer" on our Droid devices all functionality worked perfectly.  The only downside is that if we aren't on WiFi, the app doesn't work.  There is a private IP address you can use rather than the app, but works better on a computer than the phone.Overall, this will work perfectly as a baby monitor since we'll be in the house with WiFi access when we need the app.

Reviews.Title: Great, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Timmins
Reviews.Content: I have no issue with this camera. I have it connected to a Zoneminder system so I can use it to record motion detection events. The quality is perfectly adequate for my purposes (monitoring toddler's bedroom), and I am considering buying a couple more for security. Easy to use, and very well specified. I don't think anything else comes close for the price.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for a few months then kaput!
Reviews.Author: Gamer7 "seekyr"
Reviews.Content: Worked great for a few months then kaput! I mean it will no longer alert me of movement! The software will only work on one pc. I am having problems getting it to work on more than one. I spoke to a representative and they want me to buy their software per pc, tablet, and laptop. Still waiting of getting help to my cameras working again. Next time I will just bite the bullet and hire a security company.

Reviews.Title: Great and inexpensive baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Kerry A
Reviews.Content: My sister recommended this product to me to watch my 2 year old.  We learned, since we only had a sound monitor in the past, that he actually stays up for more time than we thought.The product is pretty easy to set up, if you can set up a modem, you can set it up pretty easily.We bought an app for our iPhone to use with it and so we can monitor my son with our iPhones, and iPad using this camera, including 2 way talking, sound and movement notification.The camera itself could be more "solid", but it works very well and we've loved it, especially for the price and convenience compared to other products like this.

Reviews.Title: Really a good IP camera
Reviews.Author: Syuen "Spencer"
Reviews.Content: I was really worry while thinking about the configuration process, I have some tech knowledge but not a lot and some reviews scared the hell out of me. Took the risk and bought it. Configuration process for the camera itself (network and then wireless settings) was a piece of cake, open the port from the router to see the camera from internet caused me some pain. It was not that easy but I'm sure you can find some good videos in youtube like I did.Camera works fine and no reboots so far. It is really a foscam IP camera and not a knock off product. It also has a foscam DDNS number/configuration so you don't have to pay Dyn DNS.I must say that I've never had any problem while buying directly from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with this camera....
Reviews.Author: Steve Laub
Reviews.Content: This one great camera!!!! Bought it to keep an eye on my pets, but it became so much more. I use it for security too... Can't wait to get some more this Spring. I get email notifications, can take video and still pictures. With a $6 Foscam App I can watch and communicate with my house any where in the World. The mic and the sound is extremely sensitive, I can hear things going on in other rooms.Only negative is like everyone else says, the setup is a bear!!!! But with a little patience and the help of youtube setup videos, just about anyone can do it..... Very happy with this purchase......

Reviews.Title: Makes a fantastic baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Ellen True
Reviews.Content: After much research and stalling, we finally bought this for our 5 month old. What a wonderful tool - it makes all the difference in being able to know whether going to check on baby will help or hurt. This plus the $10 app I bought is cheaper than any other video solution we could find and yet is way way way better since I can see baby from anywhere I can connect to the internet (even 3g). The quality is better than the video monitors I've seen. And honestly I really don't want another little screened device to tote around when my phone, ipad, and computer can all accomplish the task much better.

Reviews.Title: Nice Hardware
Reviews.Author: Rick Mathews
Reviews.Content: Nice Hardware but the software could use some improvements. I have four cameras of this brand, so far so good

Reviews.Title: I have maybe 6-7 now!
Reviews.Author: K. Mosmen
Reviews.Content: These are great cameras.  I have the Foscam app on my phone and love being able to view, pan and tilt, and actually record on my phone.  The two way communications via the app are great too!  This is a no-brainer!

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Harold L. Shiflett
Reviews.Content: works fair, i cannot pick on all the puters i try, im not sure of the problem but for the price its a 4

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Von bailey
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It works as advertised. I have been using it as indoor security in a multi-story home. Works great. If your Heater/AC unit is loud, it can be difficult to set the sound detection.

Reviews.Title: great camera, can view anywhere
Reviews.Author: H. Alaouie
Reviews.Content: Able to see the entire room by panning. Found a nice android and apple app that works great with this. I have two, and am able to see both either using the software, and the app I found in the app stores. Docked it a star because it is a bit delayed. This might just be because of network bandwidth, but would be great to see some sort of quick connect mechanism.

Reviews.Title: Foscam 8910w a great product for little money.
Reviews.Author: B. Brooks
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from the great reviews and let me tell you they were correct. I watched a few videos on YouTube so setup was a snap. I use the Foscam App on my iPhone and iPad and it works great too. I work in IT so port forwarding and setting up a domain address was something I have seen before though never done myself till now. Turns out it was very easy with my Asus router.This is a great camera. Highly recommend you buy one. My only complaint would be the alert pictures it sends by email are way to slow to capture anyone that moves past the camera and doesn't sit in front of it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera to watch my puppy
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Chow "superkid7"
Reviews.Content: Being a new dog owner, I needed a way to watch my puppy from anywhere outside of my house. It wasn't super easy to setup, but once I got it setup, it works great. I can log in from my iPhone to my house and scan the area where it's setup. Never had any issues of it not working and it's in a location where the dog cannot reach it. The quality of the picture is great, but I don't think the audio works very well. I wanted to have the two way audio to scold my dog if he was doing something he wasn't supposed to but it doesn't work. The picture quality is great though.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Darkfalz
Reviews.Content: Only have had this camera since the beginning of February. This camera was easy to setup. I did have to play with the wireless settings due to my network in my house doesn’t broadcast. Once I was able to get around that it was easy. Camera picture quality is decent. Def not anything like HD, but good quality. I didn’t purchase the additional antenna cause I wanted to try it with my router and it works flawlessly.  It really opened my eyes as to what is capable of these cameras and I will be adding more. I do wish you could adj exposure etc. I will update after a few months.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, but complicated set up
Reviews.Author: EW
Reviews.Content: Once you figure out how to set it up, it is very nice. Have to buy Foscam pro for $5.99, other free apps are junk. If you are not technically inclined, will likely get lost with a set up.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Yang
Reviews.Content: Great customer service.  Cameras are very clear and can work on both laptop and mobile. I use IPcam viewer basic from my android phone and it is working. I use this camera for my business monitoring.  Recording capabilities are astounding that we can record and view via wireless internet and mobile.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Jay Marcotte
Reviews.Content: We use this camera as a baby monitor and it works great on all our devices!  We use in place of our old sound baby monitor and the apps allow for both video and sound with alarm fucntions.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the headache! Mac User!
Reviews.Author: chris cudal
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking the reviews spoke for how well the product was made but as soon as I seen it I knew it was of cheap quality. I got it to work with my Mac at first but after messing with the settings. I reset to default before I can really get to see what it was all about. That's when the problem started.  I could not get it to work again. And after a continuing  waiting game with the operators putting me on hold for 45 minutes I finally got through just to have the operator not interested in helping me. I actually cussed him out and returned it the next day. This is my first return of an Amazon product out of many products from Amazon that I was perfectly happy with.  My description of the Foscam's claims of easy setup is False Advertising especially after an Independent costumer invented the products app for Mac. Instead of The Manufacturer doing it themselves!  And the tech support is useless. They are uninterested in helping the customer and waiting time climbs. My experience went from 6 minutes to 45 minutes??? What a joke!! I'm definitely going for Dropcam. If I had to choose between the products Foscam's cheaper price compared to Dropcam' more expensive price??? I'd definitely go for the more expensive ease of use of Dropcam. I'm paying for the quality and skipping the headache.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: timOBX
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. I bought the 2nd after I got the first. I have them in my garage and in another house that is usually vacant in another town. I can check on that house and swing the camera around to see the thermostat setting to make sure the heat is ok there. I must admit they were both hard to setup on the internet and I am pretty computer savvy. Luckily you can call their customer service and a tech will log onto your computer (you give permission) and adjust the setting for you, it takes them about 5-10 min and then it works. I tried for hours, it was just a simple setting I missed on my router. Just call them and let them set it up remotely.Love it !!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Kirpalani
Reviews.Content: Really works good, especially the motion sensor and email alerts.If I could change one thing though it would be to be able to up the resolution

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I found this Network Camera very easy to use. The LED lights are a big annoying, but other than that, this unit has worked fine.

Reviews.Title: great product for basic security!
Reviews.Author: Christopher J.
Reviews.Content: Dont buy those drop cameras that require subscription for you to record!  Get this product!  Easy setup, great customer support, SUPER PRICE!

Reviews.Title: Good for baby's room use
Reviews.Author: anna yee
Reviews.Content: Use it for my new born baby's room.  It works great.  I can see her from my phone instead of walk in to her room.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: tactech
Reviews.Content: not for outdoors and I'm not sure how the audio part works but its not badIT WILL however pickup changes in lighting as "motion". So if you're going to use motion detection be prepared to capture 30 separate sets of pictures everyday around noon.

Reviews.Title: Very Crisp Clear, Good Two Way Audio
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Bergstrom
Reviews.Content: For a .3 megapixel camera I was very impressed with the video quality.  Two way audio sounds great.I wish it was easier to install. I saw a video on youtube that helped but didn't I wasn't able to do it all by myself.  I had a friend that is more computer savvy come over and complete the setup for my wifi network and dns etc.But after it is all hooked up I couldn't be happier.  I bought the $5.99 app from Foscam also, it works over wifi and cellular so I am never without ability to view what the camera sees.I am using this as a baby monitor for now so my expectations were small.  For the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: super great
Reviews.Author: Jayesh jain
Reviews.Content: this has very very clearity and a very good operation function .. straming is also very good .only thing missing is the cloud functionality .. setting  up the  cloud thinmg is very very difficulty

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Martin J Kelly
Reviews.Content: Easy to install but instructions are not very clear.  While I could set it up and view from inside my home network, instructions on how to view from outside the home network are just about non-existent.  Also, when accessing remotely via iPad I can view, but there is no sound on either end.

Reviews.Title: Great product unless you get a defective one
Reviews.Author: MndSpwn
Reviews.Content: Great product. Does everything advertised. Easy to setup. I bought six of them 4 months ago and two of them keeps constantly resetting itself. I have tried updating to the latest firmware and resetting all setting to factory defaults and it helped fix one of them. However, the other still constantly keeps rebooting itself. I have searched online and found others with the same issue with no solution yet. Manufacturer warranty needs you to pay for shipping the item to them as well as for their shipping cost back to you. At the price I bought it at, shipping cost will be almost half the price of the camera so I do not plan on returning it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these cameras. They were very easy to install following the enclosed instructions. I hit a bit of a snag when it came to remote viewing, but one call to their tech support, and they got me up and running in no time at all. I downloaded their app and can now see all 3 of my cameras right from my iPad! I LOVE excellent customer service...Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Good product but hard to install
Reviews.Author: Jack Huang
Reviews.Content: Nice and convenient but not easy to install. As not enough instruction in the manual and my router is not on their list,  It took me a while to set up

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Arenson
Reviews.Content: Has been working very well - easy to control remotely and very good low light images.  The camera is a bit difficult to set up but I managed to do it.

Reviews.Title: Very good Cam
Reviews.Author: Helberth
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this Foscam. It is very easy to set up and its performance is really good. I also like the features it has. For instance it is priceless the mic inside it that allows you open the mic and wherever you are, listen what is happen in the place you are viewing.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: frances
Reviews.Content: dosent work like it was supposed to. it dosent do what they adverstised THEM to  I bought 3 camers still in boxes .

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Denise Hare
Reviews.Content: I got these to watch the foster kittens I have. I wanted to make sure they stayed out of trouble while I was at work. Works  great for checking on ur animals while ur gone. Picture has a delay but not bad. We can't get the speaker to work though. I can hear what is going on through camera but my voice cannot be heard out the speaker. Would love some help with that.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Eric Yambao
Reviews.Content: Got this before leaving for a long vacation so I can watch my house while we were gone.  I can see and hear everything going on in the room and can pan and tilt quickly. A little lag on the sound and video but that's expected. I got my other relatives to buy  also.

Reviews.Title: I little difficult to set up, buts works okay
Reviews.Author: adventurer
Reviews.Content: The set up takes some technical skill. There are many web site articles to guide you through the modem port-forwarding needed to go live. The picture can be grainy in low light conditions. Otherwise - okay.

Reviews.Title: Solid IP Cam
Reviews.Author: Pra "PL"
Reviews.Content: Want a basic IP Camera with decent picture quality and features? This is it. Know what you want and buy accordingly. Works great via TinyCam (Android App) and very reliable. Once you're familiar with basic networking, it's not too hard and the free DDNS that Foscam provides makes it a snap for remote access.  Hard to beat value for $65.

Reviews.Title: Setup software is too complicated!!
Reviews.Author: S KUMAR
Reviews.Content: i am not a techno geek but can do most basic stuff including installs and also desktop hardware setup etc, but this one seems to be a toughie. bought it to use it before going on a long vaca but could not figure out the setup, the software is not user friendly at all.now the camera just sits at home as a visual deterrent, just a expensive dummy camera as far as i am concerned.

Reviews.Title: great for the price.  set up can be tricky for wireless etc.
Reviews.Author: eric dant
Reviews.Content: documentation is fair.  was able to get it working on my own out of the box and connected directly to my router.  had to call tech support for wireless.  waited an hour the first time (late at night) and only 2 min. when i called the next morning.  tech support was helpful and successful after taking control of my computer which as not ideal but much quicker. ( it seemed that they were working with multiple clients at the same time.) will now try the remote access.  will likely buy another if all goes well.

Reviews.Title: Foscam f18910 cam and support
Reviews.Author: Nancy Hoang
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my home security. Good night vision , it can rotate upto 320, picture clarity is ok....The camera works wirelessly. Good tech support. I recommend this camera for home security.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: lou
Reviews.Content: Works great and easy setup.1) Do NOT install the software on the CD.2) Connect the camera by Cat-5 wire to your router.3) Login to your router (via browser) and find the IP address assigned to your camera.4) Login to the camera at that IP address (via browser) and IMMEDIATELY turn OFF the DHCP.5) Give your camera a fixed IP address on your network and fill in the subnet mask with what you normally use.6) The Gateway and DNS fields should normally be the IP address of your router.7) Fill in the SSID, encryption type, and share key used by your wireless network.8) Pick a 4 digit number to use for the HTTP port number. (I have no idea what "Network Lamp" is so I left it checked.)9) Disconnect the Cat-5 cable and re-boot the camera.10) Re-login to the camera at the new fixed IP address to verify that everything's working.11) Login to your router and set a port-forwarding entry to map to the fixed IP address and HTTP port you gave your camera.12) Use the "What's My IP" site to find your outside IP address.13) Enter your outside IP address and HTTP port number into a browser and verify that you can get into the camera from outside your house.14) You're done.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Louis D
Reviews.Content: I bought two of them.  Very good product does everything said!Easy software and installation.I recommend the camera and brand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby can, half the price
Reviews.Author: Boiler98
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera! Great picture quality in both light and dark. Easy to setup and connect via phone app. Watch YouTube videos for setup help. Bought it to test before our baby is born. Totally exceeds our expectations and half the price of any baby cam with way more options and flexibility. Totally silent when moving. Will have to wait and see how good it lasts over the years.

Reviews.Title: Simple to set up and access from anywhere
Reviews.Author: Bordeauxdan
Reviews.Content: These are great. Easy to set up and configure on wireless network. Used youtube videos to help define how to configure with IP/port to enable viewing from my iPhone (downloaded software from istore) Great clear picture both day and night. The nighttime view clarity was a big surprise. I ordered 2 more!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: G. Pester "theater junky"
Reviews.Content: This camera is rock solid. I've had it running for about a month with no trouble what so ever. Set up is a bit technical if you want to view the camera outside your network, but with a little basic knowledge its no big deal. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone. there are higher rez cameras with a zoom feature but you'll pay far more for them. I liked this camera so much I have another one on the way.

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: It's an alright product. For the price, for sure get it. But I still can't figure out how to get the audio to play back to me. Great for watching baby's.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations for price.
Reviews.Author: Greg Lawson
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these cameras plus one 9821W and one 8905W outdoor and a 9804W outdoor on order. Three of the 8910's are outside under an eve and I have not had any problems after changing to a longer range router. I had a good dual band router but one camera kept loosing signal and rebooting. The camera worked perfect closer to the router so after replacing the router I have not had any problems. I am using Blue Iris software instead of the built-in software. I set up all cameras with fixed IP addresses and unique ports, and all are connected to surge protected power sources. Easy setup using the IP Camera tool software that comes with the camera. I have satelite internet and DynDns service to connect remotely to the Blue Iris web server on my computer with excellent results. The audio works good from the camera to the computer and iPhone but have not tried it the other direction. Great price, great features, and reliable so far. I have only been using these for a few weeks at home but several have been in use at work for two years with very few issues which were limited to earlier versions. I recommend this camera to anyone interested in setting up their own cameras without a larger investment.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: eod
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to do some testing before investing too much in IP cameras. It's decent for indoor use. I updated the firmware and it still seems to reboot randomly. The sensitivity setting is not that great. It will generate a response from light changes but not movement in front of the camera sometimes when pointed outside from the window. In general OK camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just like all of Foscams products - it's fantastic for the price
Reviews.Author: Dave-by-the-Beach "DitW"
Reviews.Content: I have almost a dozen of various Foscam models in several locations. I have yet to experience any significant problems with quality. Keeping the firmware updated has been the biggest problem solver for any little issues that have come up (like problems with ftp uploading images or issues with the web interface)  This company rocks!  (no, I don't work for them)

Reviews.Title: if you can figure out how to set it up, its a great product
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: It was near impossible to figure out how to get it properly set up. And I am pretty familiar when it comes to "techy" things like this. But it was very difficult. Not sure how anyone with little to no experience in computers/technology could do this. Once set up though I love it. I got an app for a couple dollars to make it easier and quicker to check in on my home. I recommend with caution and a suggestion of making sure you have HOURS to deal with this. I literally wasted an entire saturday and part of my sunday trying to get it set up. I spent maybe around 7 hours on Saturday, and another 1-2 on Sunday. Of course that's with some breaks when I couldn't bare to deal with it anymore. I initially had it up and running quick but anytime I tried to turn the camera it would keep going black.BE WARNED. Great camera, HORRIBLE set up.

Reviews.Title: great investment
Reviews.Author: Lou Wingfield
Reviews.Content: I love this thing i use it all the time i put it in different locations around the house it was hard to set up but once it got running it was awesome

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Lisa H.
Reviews.Content: good camera, good quality video; have not experienced the audio yet.Will purchase additional cameras in the future; great sense of security with this.

Reviews.Title: Patience pays off
Reviews.Author: Poppa Stronzo
Reviews.Content: If you aren't using the camera as a wireless and strictly on your home network, you can "plug and play" and use the camera out of the box. However, if you are using this as a wireless IP camera that has a good picture and sound, it is definitely worth going through the port-forwarding setup. I don't consider myself tech savvy, but as intimidating as getting online and wireless sounds, it's not difficult. You will need to do your research (like being able to access the software inside your router, which can be found using Google-Fu), and follow the manual. Have patience, and it shouldn't take more than 20-30 minutes, even at a slow pace.One thing that you need to remember once you set the camera up is that you'll have two ways to access it. From your home network, you'll use your local IP address, and while you're out, you need to use your internet IP address.There are a lot of ways to get frustrated, but relax, and you'll get through it.Once it's hooked up, the camera itself is very clear and has a microphone built-in, so you can listen while monitoring. It also has inputs and outputs for a microphone and speakers, so you can also talk through the camera to people that are in the room. I use IP Cam Viewer Lite, and I can listen and talk through my iPhone. I hooked up a small speaker to the camera so I can "speak" to it. Sometimes the audio may cut in and out, but that depends mostly on your connection to the internet from your viewing device.I haven't used the email alerts for motion-detection, so I can't comment on that. Bur for the money this was a great buy, and I would buy another one when I need to. I've had the camera connected for about 7 months now and it still works just as well as when I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Integrates with VeraLite
Reviews.Author: ChurchSkiz
Reviews.Content: For the price you really can't beat this camera. I purchased for my new VeraLite and I was very impressed. The camera took about 30 minutes to get working with my VeraLite, just getting settings changed and rebooting and upgrading firmware and adding plugins, but at the end it pans and tilts and I can view it from a browser, Vera, and the Foscam phone app.TBH the camera is a little less responsive from Vera, if you just bought this camera as an IP camera and wanted to view what was going on in your house without worrying about integrating into Z-wave, the setup is much simpler and the remote viewing is great.  You will not be disappointed with the cameras functionality or it's ease of integrating in your network.The IR functionality also worked much better than anticipated.  I was expecting this to be more of a gimmick, like the "night recording" on my digital camera.  When I turned off the lights and looked at my phone I was amazed at how well the video comes out even in pitch black conditions. I didn't test the range with a measuring stick but it's in the end of one bedroom and I can see a picture hanging across the hall and on the back wall of the other bedroom, probably about 35-40 feet? This is in pitch black conditions.

Reviews.Title: meets expectations
Reviews.Author: Lester R. Drewes "brain barrier buster"
Reviews.Content: This item works as described. Setup was not simple, but the directions for remote online access were clear, detailed and accurate.Adjusts to a wide range of light conditions.Better resolution would achieve a better rating.Overall, the unit receives a solid recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Installation difficult.
Reviews.Author: ABS
Reviews.Content: Had to return this product as installation seemed very complicated. My husband is an engineer and can quickly figure these things out, but he also did not approve of this product

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Bernin
Reviews.Content: It's a very great Camera. We use it for our daughters room to see what she is doing and we love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Much better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Joseph Reilly
Reviews.Content: To fully configure all the features some understanding of your network and router will be required. The image quality is good and the night vision was better than I expected. I like the email alarm feature which can be set on a schedule to send you emails with a series of still images when motion is detected. Remote video access with guest accounts is good to have friends and family help keep an eye on things when you can't.I will be ordering two more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera fot my application
Reviews.Author: Ivan Jemelka
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for. Ease to setup for LAN, Internet access was little tricky since I have VoIP telephone and I needed to do port forwarding. I called Technical support and they did it remotely in few minutes. Documentation is very nice. I also downloaded application for my cell phone and iPad so I can monitor and administer camera from Internet. Motion detection is very useful, camera will send email with sequence of 5 pictures. Adjusting position of the camera is very sensitive so I can monitor whole apartment - even in the complete dark.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive & Effective
Reviews.Author: Robert R. Nase
Reviews.Content: I use it to monitor thermometer while I'm in FL. I can now relax during a cold bitter winter in IA.

Reviews.Title: it works well enough
Reviews.Author: Jordan A. Wright
Reviews.Content: this camera was pretty easy to set up and get running on the computer and multiple mobile devices.  the audio feature is less than reliable, and requires an external mic allow 2 way talk.  the resolution is as good as can be expected for a VGA camera. Bottom line is that for a nursery camera, this will get the job done just fine i think.  I can see where the HD version would be nice though.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: hellimedic
Reviews.Content: We use this camera in the baby's room to spy on him.  It works well, but the software and website are, well... really crappy.  I mean horrible.  The hardware gets 5 stars, the software gets 1.  I'll never understand why more companies don't realize that with today's technology, the software is just as important.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup on a Mac
Reviews.Author: Lior Leser "Web 2.0 Lawyer"
Reviews.Content: Price is great. Setup was fast and easy. I bought it for outdoor use (under cover). Easy setup. I followed the YouTube instructions provided by FOSCAM. in 10 minutes I was viewing videos. Port forwarding was simple if you follow the video.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI1910W - the inexpensive one
Reviews.Author: JayHutch
Reviews.Content: I love IP Cams. Great for home security, etc. Baby viewing. Many uses. Be aware that if you intend to view these IP Cams remotely (iPhone, smart phone, remote internet connection) that you do need to know how to port forward from your WiFi router. Not a huge big deal & can be done easily, but with security of the connection in mind - MAKE SURE you do it right. Instructions are in broken english so they can be challenging. However if you, or a friend, has some knowledge of your WiFi internal settings, you can do it. There are a few good YouTube vid's on setting these up. They are better than the instructions. Also good tips on the FOSCAM site. You you've never tried them, you HAVE to get a few of these IP Cams. So much fun viewing what is going on an a few rooms of your home when you are away.However I'm not sure the HD cam's are worth the extra cost or bandwidth/response time remotely. I also bought the higher priced FI9821W V2 2-pack and they work well. I'm not sure they work ENOUGH better to make the trip, but they are HD and that seems like a must have right?This low def version has acceptable quality and IR operates about the same as HD models. Not quite as wide angle as the HD cams. In anything but perfect light the HD cams don't really come into their own. Often where you choose to place the cam, you have less than perfect light.I'm glad I have the 2-pack, but don't automatically shy away from these lower def ones. They are pretty capable. Software available is good. Tried them all. Steer clear of the FOSCAM smart phone app. You may find it in the App Store, but I don't think even FOSCAM recommends it. It doesn't operate all the controls of the newer IP cams, and somewhat limited on the older ones too. I ended up with LiveCam Pro and find it just what I was looking for in an iPhone app.I've only had them a few weeks, so I don't know if they will hold up. We'll see. I like what I have so far and am tickled pink I pulled the trigger and bought these.

Reviews.Title: Camera works well, setup took some work.
Reviews.Author: Leigh Ann Carman
Reviews.Content: Once I got it set up, this camera is awesome!  Can check on my dogs anytime by using iphone or ipad apps or on any computer using the ip address and port for the camera.  Just know that for someone who is a complete tech novice, you will probably end up calling customer service for help at some point.  Basically there are 2 steps in set up: 1) get the camera on your wifi, and 2) set up port forwarding so you can view the camera's feed when you are not at home.  I followed all the steps in the manual to get the camera set up on my network, but I still couldn't get it to work wirelessly.  I called customer service and within a few minutes they had that working for me.  Getting the port forwarding to work was tougher.  Since I have a router from my cable company I had to use the IP address on the side of the router to access the router settings, and through some digging online I figured out how to set up port forwarding for the camera through the router.  I finally figured out that to view the camera using apps or using web browsers when not at home that I have to use my home IP address followed by the port number that I set up for the camera. Now everything is great.  I can even turn on the mic in my iphone app and talk through the camera when I'm not home, or turn on the audio and hear what's going on!

Reviews.Title: Network experience helpful
Reviews.Author: Joseph Kovar III
Reviews.Content: I have a bit of networking and programming experience so I just tossed the instructions aside when I opened the box. Everything network-wise follows common standards, and it only took a minute to get up and running. If/when setting up static IP addresses keep in mind there are two different MAC addresses, one for the ethernet connection, and another for WiFi.Video performance has been best via the Foscam Android application for us. Followed by Internet Explorer on the laptops/desktops. It's usable, but frustrating in other browsers compared to the performance in IE and more so the phones/tablets.

Reviews.Title: Great hardware; so-so software
Reviews.Author: David T. Buxton
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing gadget. I just wish it were simpler to configure and that there were better software tools to make use of it, particularly from mobile or hand-held devices.

Reviews.Title: Works well, would have preferred a better resolution
Reviews.Author: Mounir Doumani
Reviews.Content: Camera works well. It took effort to establish ability to connect from outside the home network but this is not an issue with the camera.Downloaded the "Baby monitor" app from iOS store for USD 6 which works perfectly.I just wished the resolution of the camera was better

Reviews.Title: ok camera for the price
Reviews.Author: itsvance
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  Not the best quality image, but very easy to set up.  I have recommended these cameras to friends.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price.
Reviews.Author: JohnnyH
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. It took all of about 10 minutes to setup (had to download VLC from videolan for the audio plugin)I like the fact it came with a foscam DDNS service. Quality is as expected for a 640x480, maybe I'll try the HD version next.I like the tilt/pan feature. Minus 1 star because the wireless setup is clunky in the sense you have to setup it up via ethernet first. Also the executable that came with it didn't work to scan for the IP address.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: James Torney
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything it is supposed to do......300 degrees of rotation, color, night vision, works from anywhere. I recommend this camera for home use. Setup was ok if you understand IP addresses, if not, help is available by phone. It takes about 1/2 hour or less to get it up and running. Great product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: MicBuyer
Reviews.Content: Very cool! Easy to set up and works perfectly. Now we know our dog does not sleep the whole time when we are away.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup.....works great as a baby cam
Reviews.Author: Spitfire
Reviews.Content: Good:I'm moderately tech savy and the setup was super easy.I did not install any software at all. The cameras were configured through their own web interface in about 15 minutes. I spent another 10 minutes configuring static IP addresses through my router.When I was ready to access them away from home network I spent another 10 minutes configuring my router and the camera's for port forwarding.I found all instructions on the internet--most of them on Foscam's site.I ran Ethernet cable, but the wireless performance has been so good that I never bothered hooking it up.I mostly monitor with FoscamPro on my iphone--it supports 2 way audio, pan+tilt etc.I also run an XBMC HTPC (RaspMC) and setup streaming to the TV (*.strm)--so I can check on the kids through the TV, my iphone, any computer web browser etc.These replaced a broken baby cam, that was more expensive and totally inferior.I work a lot and it's great to "check-in" on my little ones from anywhere anytime.I have 2, and will buy 2 more in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Just a tip and a rave for this product
Reviews.Author: Andrew or not hear i come
Reviews.Content: I first got this and wasn't thinking. I mounted outside under an awning and it rained. Looks like it was directly in path with a gutter and was wet. I took it off and put it in rice for 2 days. Thinking I was screwed I tried it and works 100% now. has been working for 5 months and counting. I hooked it up to my blue iris software and works 100%

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera - Good tech support for Novice users
Reviews.Author: Tracy G.
Reviews.Content: This is my first Wifi Camera. I was a novice when it came to Port Forwarding & DDNS. But it only took a little while and some help from Foscam tech support to get everything working.It is important to also have a good Router on your home network to make the camera work seamlessly.Some router (like Asus) even provide DDNS service for free so if your ISP provides dynamic IP you have no problem.Love the 'Foscam IP Viewer' for my phone as well (Make sure to get the one by Foscam). Important: Change the default from HD Definition to Standard definition in the App - otherwise it will not connect to this camera and will just time out.

Reviews.Title: Vertical tilt not working.
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Poteet "Rockdweller"
Reviews.Content: I really have been satisfied with this camera but just today my tilt quit working and I have only had it a short while.  Does anyone know if there is something minor that I might could fix for this?  I hate to send it back

Reviews.Title: perfect baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: lindy adams
Reviews.Content: the best baby monitor! the features, the price, everything. would recommend it to anyone. just call when it arrives and have foscam set it up over the phone.

Reviews.Title: Works great finally
Reviews.Author: matt Scanlan
Reviews.Content: Well, I am tempted to rate this higher, but cannot considering I have had this Camera over a year, and JUST finally figured it out. I recommend going to the foscam website where I found a lot of helpful video tutorials and some amazing people on the forums to help me work through the problems I was having. The port forwarding thing had me baffled, and if you aren't comfortable diving into your router settings DO NOT buy this camera if you want to view it outside of your home network. We are using it as a nanny cam/baby monitor now that I finally figured it out.... Only took me a year. Really though I started from scratch yesterday spent about an hour on it then spent about 5-6 hours on it today and the problem was with my home security which runs through our internet. Once I found out that was the problem I had it working in no time.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic value for non-mission-critical use
Reviews.Author: Sean W. Franklin
Reviews.Content: I volunteer for a small, shoestring-budget dog rescue that is spread out across 4 buildings and 2 acres of land.  I bought a couple of these cameras so that our rescue director can keep an eye on the puppy building and the kennel room while she's working on her computer, arranging adoptions.  It gives her peace of mind to be able to watch over the dogs during off-hours.  For $65 with Amazon Prime free shipping, this was something that I could afford to buy as a donation and the rescue is making excellent use of them.I installed "IP Camera Viewer 2" on her Mac, from the Mac App Store - and "Foscam Viewer" on her iPad.  Both apps were free and work great (although the Mac app doesn't support audio from this camera, it's still a great free app).I did review the lengthy negative app regarding issues some users have had with the camera.  I take reports like this with a grain of salt - First, it's an inexpensive camera - I don't expect MILSPEC hardware, and I'm willing to make a gamble at this price, as compared to other IP cameras that cost a LOT more.  Second, working in the customer support industry I know a lot of minor issues can get blown WAY out of proportion by a small group of vocal on-line users.  Third, I am comfortable & confident with Amazon's return policy.I've had zero problems with the cameras, working great for a week so far but I'll update the review if I find any significant issues.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: roland bouchard
Reviews.Content: the camera did all required  except cannot find out to record and play from camera does foscam have outdoor version

Reviews.Title: Best value for a Pan Tilt wireless camera when used with the BI software
Reviews.Author: D. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: For less than $66 with prime, this is a no brainer. I have replaced all my wireless cams with foscams, and I've had a few, Panasonics BL 131CA, Linksys, Astek Moles, . At that price point, you can't beat the quality and features. I have put them outside under eaves they are so affordable. The mobile app is nice they as they have upgraded the UI and it looks cleaner. The two way audio is a neat feature and works pretty good, I talk o my kids at home because they are not allowed to pick up the home phone. the web interface is basic and has some alerting features although I don't use them. I use the Blue Iris software.When paired with the BI software to centralize and manage alerts / recordings, it's invaluable.Check out my review. here of the Blue Iris software.http://www.amazon.com/review/R1UJP9315C03RT/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&ASIN;=B008YD80KC&nodeID;=541966&store;=pc

Reviews.Title: A lot of positives - but I sent it back
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this camera. My cats have been doing a whole lot of things they shouldn't be, and I was hoping to do a little sleuthing to suss out the culprit(s). This did not turn out to be the camera for the job.On the positive side, the build quality seems good, at least externally. Unpacking and setup was reasonably straightforward, and within half an hour I had established a WiFi connection to the camera and was viewing images. The image quality is excellent, even using the night vision. I had no doubt that if I could catch one of my felines in the act, I'd have no trouble discerning which one it was.For a few hours, things went well. I was using a freeware program to record snippets of video whenever the camera detected motion. However, I noticed about 6 hours in that the recordings had stopped. On troubleshooting, I discovered that the camera was no longer on my WiFi network.Figuring that maybe it was too far from the router (although it was only about 20' away, max), I repositioned the camera just on the other side of a wall from the router. The total distance was less than 5', with only one thickness of wall between them. Even at this distance, the camera dropped off the network again after 3 hours. The only way I could revive it was to power-cycle it. After three days of this, it's gotten to where it will only connect intermittently, even after doing the unplug/plug shuffle.Either there's a problem with the antenna or the internals. Either way, if you're willing to lay wires, you'll probably like this camera. I was not willing.

Reviews.Title: convenient, powerful
Reviews.Author: Grace "Grace"
Reviews.Content: High quality, configurable, very reasonable price. Used for front / back door, playroom, and with static IP I can view them all on my nexus7.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: We use this along with an iphone app called Baby Monitor for IP Camera as a video baby monitor and couldn't be happier!  Easy access and great video quality even in night vision.  Would highly recommend as a viable option for a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Foscam 8910 in White
Reviews.Author: Thomas Tomczak
Reviews.Content: Camera works great, the set up was easy, the DDNS threw me off a bit but when I set up port forwarding it worked great...  Just ordered another pair...

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W Camera
Reviews.Author: cwalton3
Reviews.Content: Camera for the price is a great product and i would suggest it to anyone that wants a start up monitoring system.  Setup is a little confusing but once it setup it runs without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Works as promised
Reviews.Author: MRN66
Reviews.Content: Set this camera up in about a day. If you read the manual set up is easy. Looks hard at first but if u take it step by step you will be up and running in no time! Also helpful are the tutorial videos on YouTube! Resolution is good. Use my ipad and iPhone to view when I am away from home. Happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. I did have one fail on me and had to have it replaced. The other two are still going strong.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Loiacono
Reviews.Content: Camera works pretty well to do what I bought it for, which is a baby cam to be viewed through Android Phones & Android Tablets used in conjunction with the Android app "IP Cam Viewer" <---fantastic program to use in tandem with this device.Easy to setup, although in the settings (through the included software) I wasn't able to find a place to set a static IP address.  The camera is handed an IP Address through DHCP, so if you'd like the camera to stay the same IP address, you'd better hope your router supports DHCP reservation.The 2 way audio works, however the speaker(s) that are inside this camera are GARBAGE and not loud at all.  You sound like a horrible old NES 8-bit version of yourself.  Not sure if my particular unit or the speaker is faulty... I'd like a response from Foscam or Amazon regarding this..The only respite is the audio out jack on the back of the camera that allows connection to external speakers (which I haven't tested yet).Frame rate is pretty good too, watching it and controlling it on 4G is no problem... there is little lag using controls and viewing, about as much as one would expect from a 70 dollar network cam.In summation... Good price, good performance, good fps, good picture, fantastic night vision, internal speaker is very very bad.

Reviews.Title: Makes life easier!
Reviews.Author: Lori Newman
Reviews.Content: Love it! highly recommend this product. I use it for a baby monitor for my grandson...very pleased with it! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: bit of a pain to set up, but works wonderfully
Reviews.Author: noelleb
Reviews.Content: We recently transitioned our 2 year old into a big boy bed in the room he's now sharing with his older brother and we were concerned there would be playing around rather than sleeping going on. (And there is!) We wanted a way to see the boys and hear them, and also to be able to tell them to go to bed without having to run upstairs every time they were messing around, and this is the perfect camera. It was a pain to set up, but once it was installed on the computer and hooked up to the WiFi it's been a lifesaver! I only give it three stars because although the apps work great for it, you have to call for each device individually (kindle, Samsung galaxy, iPad, and iPhone) to be able to have remote access to the camera. It's something to do with the firewalls, and I appreciate the privacy concerns, but it didn't make it any less of a hassle!

Reviews.Title: Hard to set up
Reviews.Author: princess1252
Reviews.Content: o.k. camera but hard to set up and sometimes works and sometimes it doesn't. I do like how I can see what is going on with my iphone app though.

Reviews.Title: Way better than regular baby monitors
Reviews.Author: Heather Foster
Reviews.Content: These cameras are awesome! They have night vision, 2 way communication and built in wifi, all while not slowing down your internet speeds. The IOS app works great too!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Giles
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is decent, night mode works outstandingly. When the brightness goes from sunny to dark the camera takes a while to adjust to this and will trigger the motion alarm even when detection is set halfway. Overall decent camera though for the price.

Reviews.Title: frustrating setup
Reviews.Author: greg30808
Reviews.Content: After hours on the phone with support I got the camera working over the internet.  Next time I tried it it didn't work.

Reviews.Title: Varying Quality Depending on Batch -- some great some wont keep wifi connection
Reviews.Author: DSH
Reviews.Content: I own 7 of these cameras.  The set-up was not the easiest but the instructions that come with the cameras were clear enough for me to follow (follow instructions as exactly written -- exactly is the key word if you want the camera to work).  This camera gives a lot of bang for the buck, especially since you can remotely review the images and listen to the audio with an iphone/ipad app.  I paid $5.99 for the deluxe version, worth every penny.The problem seems to be quality control.  Two of the 7 cameras just can't seem to keep the wifi connection even though one is less than 10 ft away from the router with no obstruction whatsoever.  (I have a good one that is mounted outside under the eve and was all the way at the other end of the house and yet that one has never had any issue with wifi connection despite the freezing temperature or heavy rains, etc.)  Fortunately for me, the problem happened right away so I was able to return the cameras to Amazon and exchange non-defective ones.So overall, I would still recommend the camera.  Just don't sit on it after delivery; otherwise, if you get a defective unit, you may have missed the return window!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Hussung
Reviews.Content: Works great.  I would recommend. It has great night vision.  Love the rotation feature.  Works great as a baby cam.

Reviews.Title: Set up a bit tricky but good otherwise
Reviews.Author: Jacob Lyman
Reviews.Content: Set up was a bit of a chore, but there were good resources provided and it went ok.  Haven't bothered setting up sound because I'm lazy and after 5 minutes of trying I gave up.  Camera has good quality picture day and night, works well.  Pleased customer.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipment and a nice camera for the $$
Reviews.Author: Jamie L Seibt
Reviews.Content: Fast Shipment and a nice camera for the money spent. The live stream is clear and nice. I have (2) of these and I'm happy with them and for the amount of money other cameras cost this is by far worth the savings!

Reviews.Title: Great surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: J. Masiakos "Avid hunter - outdoorsman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Foscam with the intentions of building a wireless trail camera. I am waiting on the the other parts to complete the project but in the mean time I set this up in my office.  The camera works great. I can access the camera from my computer, iPad, or Samsung S4 using various free apps.  It was easy to set up the DDNS service to be able to access the camera from outside my network. The only downside is that with the small antenna it often loses connection unless it is in my office where my router is located. I plan on investing in a wifi extender so I can set this up on a different floor of my house.  I would definitely recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Best product of the year.
Reviews.Author: madrigan "muttman"
Reviews.Content: So far I've really enjoyed having this Foscam.  Works extremely well with the Android and iOS Apps.  A little less so using mobile and a web browser.  Installation was a little clunky for me but I was reading more into it than necessary.  Once I went through all the steps in the book it made sense to me and it works fine.  The trick is to read the book completely and then go step by step.  Power cord is long enough for most applications.  You will need an extension if you have more than about an 8 foot reach or so.  I'll be getting another one.  A mount is included so that you can mount it upside down, right side up, sideways and there are toggles on the program to flip and/or mirror so that you get the right aspect.  I have a Macbook, iPad, and Galaxy S4 android.  All work well.Using a web browser instead of the App is ok but there is no sound.  The apps are superb.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: kelly meckes
Reviews.Content: it did take awhile for me to get this working unfortunately.  however, when i called the help line they proxyed into my computer and fixed all of my settings.  it works great now.  We found some free apps so we can view the house all the time now - I would totally recommend!

Reviews.Title: Camera is ok.  No APP??
Reviews.Author: Fennomenal
Reviews.Content: Bought this to add to a security system that I can't add anymore cameras to and since I had a 'gap' in coverage, I thought I could use this and jump from app to app to monitor this and my other system.  Quality of image is great, functionality is great (movement, attachment).  However, the description never mentioned that it came with it's own bracket and I ended up buying one separately.  Instructions and clarity of design could use a bit of help.  BTW...yes, it does work great off my computer, however, I still can't access it off a remote computer (just using the software and IP address didn't do it).  Bottom Line: works, but not as I need.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price, be a great baby monitor and has other capabilities!
Reviews.Author: Adam W
Reviews.Content: Bottom line: Yes, I would recommend it. For inside the home viewing while your phone or tablet is connected to your wireless network (as a baby monitor for example) it is a piece of cake! It isn't 100% plug and play for viewing while you are outside of your wireless network, but it is definitely doable so read more below.Why I bought it: I bought this camera as a supplement to my home alarm system. Essentially, if I get a call from the alarm company, I'd like the ability to pull up my cameras and see if anything looks out of place or God forbid, someone is in the home. I am currently using it to check in on a dog we are fostering for a local rescue! I have also used to to check our basement for any leaks/signs of water during very cold temperatures. The possibilities are endless. I am receiving another one from Amazon today.The good: $65-ish camera that has pretty good image quality, night vision, and can be viewed from almost anywhere. Free (or cheap) apps allow you to check in on your home or child with relative ease. The mount that comes with it is not bad at all and no other components are required for a basic installation.The not-as-good: I'm a fairly tech-savvy guy, but my weakness is network settings, router configuration and port forwarding. That is required to set up this camera for viewing it from outside your wireless network. Now, do not let that discourage you, because there are some great youtube videos by Foscam themselves and a guy that goes by AwkwardHamster on how to do this. Also, buying from Amazon you have tech support from Foscam if you need it.Overall, great camera so far. I've had it since Christmas and use it multiple times per day. I plan to continue to add more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Problems connecting wirelessly
Reviews.Author: Lorie K
Reviews.Content: Although I was able to set it up and see the room image, the image quality was not very good. Also, it worked if wired, but I could not get it to work wirelessly so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: "Amazonia Steve"
Reviews.Content: I never thought I could get this setup but a guy named Irish helped me over the phone and stayed with me until I had a hub link and wireless and phone remote access on ipviewer and setup to get short picture videos by remote access on my android. I am using this for home security.  The picture quality is good and I have not tried it at night but supposed to have night vision and sound.  The Tech support was incredible and worked with my for about 30min remotely.  I am happy I got this camera  to add to my security system.  I can get emails with pictures on yahoo mail or gmail and triggered by movement.

Reviews.Title: You'd better be tech-savvy
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Even though I am a computer programmer by training, it took me about half day to set this whole thing up. I am using a mac and Apple's airport extreme router. The manual is not that great. It required a bit of try-and-error and some internet resource to make it work. Once it is set up, it works as advertised. So I'd say it is a pretty good product, but not a walk-in-the-park in setting this thing up.

Reviews.Title: With assiatance over the phone, they essentially got this configured
Reviews.Author: John W. B. "John"
Reviews.Content: and it would have taken me days to figure it out if ever.  They take over your screen, and it's impressive how they are able to set it up to be controlled via your iPhone and send you an eMail when there's motion.  Great item, great support, and that support is essential for its configuration.  I bought two, with different resolutions.  One to monitor, the other to view the lake.

Reviews.Title: Being a Pan-Tilt IP Camera it is Good for price But DC Jack/Plug is Loose!!
Reviews.Author: A. Y.
Reviews.Content: Being a Pan-Tilt IP Camera it is Good for price But DC Jack/Plug is Loose!!There is almost no help from customer service. Just forget it, either Chat or Phone. If you will plug unplug it more than some times during its life span, better get something else, otherwise good for plug it once and leave condition.

Reviews.Title: It's a numbers game--sometimes they work, other times not so much.
Reviews.Author: EJRea
Reviews.Content: I have a theory...if you buy enough Foscam cameras, eventually you'll get enough of them that will work.  We had three, returned two of them because of problems including this one.  The black version of the FI8910W is working well (baby monitor) and continues to do so.This white one, so fickle.  It started rebooting constantly after a few weeks of use.  It also had a hard time staying connected via wifi.  Both are known issues experienced by others if you do a search.  If you like starring at inanimate objects thinking you can will them to magically start working, this might be the camera for you.  It's a bit ironic---a device designed to look at people ends up forcing people to look at it.The image quality is good; the interface works well; apps play nice with it.  Solid camera if you get one that operates reliably.Happy hunting.Buy it! (well, you might need to 'Buy Them!')

Reviews.Title: Great for keeping an eye on your pets!
Reviews.Author: C. Thomas "FilmBuff"
Reviews.Content: My friend has 5 cats and has 4 of these cameras installed throughout his home.  He uses his iphone and ipad to check in on them.  I thought this was a genius idea, so I bought one to try out.  The only reason this product gets four stars instead of five is because installation can be tricky.  I got about 80% through the installation and then had to call my friend who is an IT specialist.  He was able to walk me through the rest of the process.  This camera is pretty sweet.  The smartphone app lets you control (pan/tilt) the camera, turn the infrared lights on/off and even listen and speak through a two-way microphone.  I can now check on my pets (and, more importantly, my home) from anywhere throughout my workday with the click of an app.  Warning: it can be a little addictive.  I just ordered another camera to place in another part of my home for more coverage.One piece of advice: If you have a limited data plan, the streaming video eats up data like Pac-Man.  So, if you are planning to set your ipad/iphone up like a permanent security monitor, make sure it is connected to a wi-fi network.

Reviews.Title: no audio for Mac, and plugin workaround is worthless
Reviews.Author: Daveron
Reviews.Content: The camera and setup is 5 stars, but I am taking away 2 for the lack of Audio support on Mac.The best they can offer is to download a "shareware" VLC to get audio. It s*cks! there is a 1-8 second lag for voice even when both camera and mac are within my local network, and you need to open one stream for VLC and one for the Foscam monitor.How hard is it for a company to add in Mac Audio support? When they do, I will bump it to a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Got this as a nanny cam - not a simple set up but great customer service
Reviews.Author: hjp79
Reviews.Content: I am a first time mom so going back to work is nerve wracking for me so I bought this to use as a nanny cam.  I consider myself pretty tech savvy but I still needed a little help completing the set up because of the way out home network is set up.  Foscam has great customer service - you call and they remote into your computer and they fixed it in literally 5 minutes.Camera works well - the picture isn't the best quality but good enough to know what's going on.  I have an Android so downloaded the IP Cam app (per the Foscam customer service suggestion) and I can watch everything from outside the house.

Reviews.Title: User Beware
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Vermillion
Reviews.Content: This will be quick and to the point:1. You must be more than a novice to set this up OR have foscam tech support set it up for you2. Tech support is actually pretty good as far as taking the initiative to help with issues BUT be aware that support may be outsourced and they dont seem terribly interested in hearing that their product does not work well3. If you plan on using this wirelessly or even hardwired for that matter, you will need a highspeed connection.  If you are running on something under a few Mbps connection speeds, you will be experience lag all around on this or really most IP cameras.It is a so so IP camera for a so so price.  Video will not be excellent, audio will not be excellent, setup can prove to be a pain.  I get better quality and smoother video/audio out of my Summer basic baby monitor which operates only on frequency.Side note: for those who claim my negative review is probably a lack of user knowledge and/or poor network setup/speeds, with any device in our home (PC, ipad, iphone, android, bluray) the connection speed is a consistent 23 Mbps hardwired or close to the router.Last Note which actually let me to this poor review.  After tech support went through and helped me set this up and set up port forwarding for access outside of my LAN, they pushed me to make a 4 or 5 star rating on Amazon (or wherever you purchase the device from) WHILE THEY ARE STILL CONNECTED TO YOUR SUPPORT SESSION.  Fishy!Bottom Line:  Cheap price, average video quality/sound most likely with some lag at some point, difficult setup, good tech support until they basically force you to give them a good review at the end

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, you save 100's by doing port mapping yourself, instead of expensive ipcams.
Reviews.Author: Jose Cuevas
Reviews.Content: I have tried many ipcams, the most expensive ones I found were only expensive because they basically build expensive software that does port mapping for u. Well, if you have a 14 year old son, nephew, neighbor etc, that can follow step by step instructions for port mapping, you will realize it is an awesome product. Obviously, you have to have a dedicated computer, tablet, or phone, to run an application that will capture video, as this product doesn't have a hard, drive. Dvr, or sd card. People that have written bad reviews probably didn't know that this is like a tv with no TiVo, u can watch all you want, but the camera needs something to store the data. They do offer a newer model with sd, but for the price, might as well use an old laptop with an upgraded hard drive. Discard the disc, download the latest software from foscam.us, keeping in mind that this only modifies the network, and so on data on the camera itself, and they offer a very basic web app that allows you to view and control some features. But you can get software or apps that have way more options like speed it up (about 4 times faster). Youtube people, if you don't know how to do anything, use YouTube, more than knowledge, the key now days is knowing how to ask the right question.

Reviews.Title: better than wansview
Reviews.Author: Kalendrinn
Reviews.Content: better than a wansview but still not terribly great.  it has been dropped off a low window sill a couple times and still works fine but it is pretty slow to turn.  will see if I can adjust that in the settings...I did once already.  otherwise it functions ok.  I did have a problem using 3rd party apps with it after updating the firmware, but those issues have been resolved by the app developer.

Reviews.Title: Feature rich, great value
Reviews.Author: A. Kaplan
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that when I was growing up my father had a security consulting business. I have always been exposed to both commercial and home video surveillance technology. You can't approach my father's home without showing up on a few cameras :)This little Foscam camera is cheap. The body is rattly and not particularly well built. The whole thing is just a little larger and uglier than it needs to be. The control software/website looks like a college student's project (I am a software engineer by trade).With that said, this camera is still awesome and I highly recommend it!The equivalent commercial-grade IP camera would probably run north of $800. This one packs just about every feature I can think of into a tiny self-contained package that is accessible and affordable by normal people. The network connection via WiFi works fine. The camera integrates with various free No-IP services to provide access from the internet. The control software isn't fantastic, but it works reliably, is free and makes up for quality by providing a surprising level of configurability. Image quality is OK, resolution is better than competitors, night IR works really well and the motors respond quickly to provide a wide range of angles.The one thing that I _really_ don't like about the camera is that the security level it provides is lacking. Most people probably won't care... but I wouldn't be surprised if somebody could hack it with a bit of effort.

Reviews.Title: Needed Tech Help
Reviews.Author: SCHERYLL RICHARDS
Reviews.Content: Having trouble connecting it to cell phone even after tech support. Asked them to call me and walk me thru but they didnt. Will be returning it.

Reviews.Title: If you live in New York and have Time Warner wifi
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: This has the hallmarks of a good product. However, TWC and Foscam struggle to get it working in NY - I've had a litany of reasons it doesnt work from both parties - security issues with router setting changes in NY, software hasn't updated for Apple Maverick, cant get remote access to make router changes, the list goes on. Now I have a camera that can only be used if I am in the same room as it. Kind of pointless. Tele support by both parties was good but ultimately unable to get this working. be careful if you live in NYC and want to buy this.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: G. Glass "Instrumentation Scientist"
Reviews.Content: This is a very cheap device.  But it does work as promised.  So I'd say it is a very good value.It is tricky to set up the networking configuration for trans firewall viewing the first time.  I own five and now it is a piece of cake to set one up.  All the info is on the Foscam site or in the instruction book but if you cannot follow instructions and set settings in the camera and router with a web browser then you'll have trouble.I use the cam to watch an elderly parent.  If Foscam were smart enough to market to people with aging parents who have to arrange care remotely they could double their sales.  That is, they need to make a one button setup cam and show all the iPhone carrying people what they're missing.  My system is the envy of all my friends who have aging parents..  As of now, they are the camera of tinkerers.

Reviews.Title: Good one!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Henrique Azevedo Miotto
Reviews.Content: I bought 2. One is used as baby monitor and I can not imagine myself without it anymore. The other one is used in the room. Was in doubt between buying this one or the one with HD. The footage is great and, with a bit of work to set up, I can monitor my 3 months baby over the Internet. Features like Two-Way Audio and Pan/Tilt are just great. Very pleased with the choice. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: So far unsuccessful in set-up
Reviews.Author: Doogie
Reviews.Content: Ok...I tried to ask my questions in the Q&A; section but it exceeds the number of characters allowed so I'm hoping I might get some help via reviews.I ordered two of these cameras as a Christmas present on excellent recommendations from a techie friend who said they were easy to set up. I am now aware how inferior my tech knowledge is after trying to make these cameras work for a few hours last night.Here is a rundown of the basics.2x FOSCAM FI8910W camerasVerizon FIOS home internet, wirelessMac OSX MavericksiOS7 - iPhones and iPadsI purchased the cameras via Amazon.com from Warehouse Deals, Inc. and they were listed as refurbished (so used but back to new). One of the cameras did not come with any instructions or the software CD - bad customer service on the part of Warehouse Deals, Inc?Last night we tried to set up the camera using the iPhone app. That did not work so we plugged the cameras into the router and tried to connect that way. We both have new mac laptops so we no longer have a CD Drive in our house so we could not run the software from the CD included in the camera boxes. I tried downloaded the IP Camera software from the FOSCAM site and it was able to pick up the "Anonymous" camera on the network and take me to the IP page to start ActiveX. Once I clicked on ActiveX, though, I could never get the "Device Management" portion to work (I would click on it and nothing would happen; "Javascript:administrator()" would appear in the lower left of the browser window. I used Chrome, Firefox, and Safari and had the same results for all three. Cookies are enabled in all of the browsers. Internet Explorer is no longer supported by Apple so that is not an option for us.After these tries, we went back to the iPhone app. The app would sporadically 'find' the camera but settings could never be updated. It would drop the camera then find it again. And we would get an error notification that the user name and password were not correct OR we exceeded the number of devices on our network. We checked the devices on our network and that was not the problem.We gave up in frustration at 1am last night having made NO progress or having any luck at all in making the cameras work. The cameras would cycle through its motions but we never got a picture from it in any way.This morning we discovered through the iPhone app that each camera has an odd user name that we did not set up. Now we are curious if this means that our refurbished items were never restored to factory default and we don't have the old user name/password so we can't login because of that...?For the price and capabilities, we want to keep these cameras and get them set up...I just need some help from the interwebs to step me through the process like I've never touched a computer before.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Relatively easy setup and works well in cold temperatures outside
Reviews.Author: Sammy G "Sammy G"
Reviews.Content: Like many other users, I've installed this outside under a large awning.  I wanted to write this review to confirm that it is -29 Celsius outside and still working perfectly in this frigid weather!

Reviews.Title: Unreliable
Reviews.Author: Stephen Bennett
Reviews.Content: This camera has proven to be unreliable for use.  The network interface locks up regularly and from online forums this appears to be a common theme among users of this device. Rumor is that other Foscam models work better but I am reluctant to try them after the frustrations I have experienced with this device.  While the price on this device is attractive, this may be the perfect example of you get what you pay for (except I paid more than I got).

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: s
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera and the higher resolution one. I like this one better for what i was using it for and it is cheaper. It was easy to set up the FI8921 wirelessly. i was able to hook this one up with a Cat 5 cable, but unable to get it to work wirelessly. I decided for other reasons (not product reasons) that I needed to return this and Foscam took them back no questions asked. I will most likely buy this product in the future when I get all of my needs figured out. It has amazing night vision. In pitch darkness it looks like there is a light on in the room. And it pans and tilts well. I like the app with Iphone, but not as many options with the Android, however, works more than fine with Android.Again, I never called to try to get the wireless working. It may have been my router as well.

Reviews.Title: A bit tricky to set up, but then excellent
Reviews.Author: Tom Curious
Reviews.Content: The installation was a bit tricky (through no fault of this camera vendor, it is tricky in general to set up a  camera so that you can access it from anywhere around the world via internet), and I learned a bit more about port forwarding etc than I ever wanted to know. But once it works, it is terrific. We use one is our 2nd home, and it has been very reliable. Keeps working for months remotely and allows us to keep an eye on our home while we are not there.

Reviews.Title: not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Everett & Debbie Carrell
Reviews.Content: Can only view live picture will not record. need a degree in electronics to operate. just wanted a camera to record while i was at work to see who is coming in my house.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - Easy to install (for the most part) - OUTSTANDING customer service (24/7)
Reviews.Author: Mr Mode
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras to keep an eye on our baby...what a positive investment.They work great, for the most part...The panning is a little sticky (not fluid).  I do not feel like I have easy control, however the pic is great once it get's to where I want it.  Night vision is cool and the audio and mic are great to have.My MAC did not receive audio and it needed plug-ins to get it going, not happy about that.  But I called the customer service center and spoke with a very cordial, patient person who actually let me speak in order to hear what I had to say, even though he probably knew what I was going to say next about my issue.  He guided me to a "Team Viewer session" and BAM BAM BAM, he took care of it in a snap, however...I should have known how to do it if the install was a little more intuitive to tell me what he did, that would have been better.  Then I came find, that I have to open the URL in VLC and I will have audio, but no control. Lame.Then, I told him I had another camera, he waited to help me with that one as well.  "Thanks Calvin".Overall, (somewhat) good experience with this camera and stoked about the customer service, I feel comfortable enough to say "if you  know now and go in, you're good. Otherwise, you'll be let down a little...like me."

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Diane M Jividen
Reviews.Content: great even in low light. set up for external monitoring is a bit of a pain but it works pretty good

Reviews.Title: Great Value, only one complaint
Reviews.Author: Craig A. Rice
Reviews.Content: Great remote camera, we use it all the time to keep on eye on our house and pets when away.
