I can use my cell phone to monitor my cams when I'm away or to check to see what's going on should I have a false alarm which has only happened once when one of my dogs set off a motion detector. Forget the software that comes with it and just use the paid version of IP Cam Viewer.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Matt Barry "Dancing Boy"
Reviews.Content: The reviews are pretty accurate - one of the things Foscam has upgraded is their support - trying to configure it was like trying to learn Farsi BUT when I called Tech support, they linked right into my computer and configured it in about 10 minutes so that I could watch on-line, on my phone, on my ipdad, etc.It's a pretty decent product with good imaging, the ONLY problem I have is when my wife chimes in and says "hello" while "spying" on me at the office. She can hear me, but half the time her voice cuts out. That was the only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars.Otherwise, a pretty decent product with excellent tech support.

Reviews.Title: Good, but...
Reviews.Author: Rex "Rex"
Reviews.Content: I received my camera last week, and so far I think it *could* be a cool system.  I can watch my kids through my phone and communicate back and forth with them when they're home.  That's cool.  The problem is that the motion sensing and emailing functions don't seem to work for me.  It will sense motion, and it will send email, but it sometimes sends emails when it detects motion, though it never attaches snapshots from the camera when it sends email (it's supposed to send 6 at a time).I've been in IT for 15 years so I'm pretty sure I'm doing it right.  Part of the problem is that the documentation is old and/or confusing.  For example, in the documentation online, it says Gmail, which I'm using as my email provider. won't work.  However, in the web UI it tells you how to set up Gmail.I bought this camera explicitly for the purpose of monitoring our home while we're away so to me, the product fails to do the one thing we wanted it to do.  I sent an email to Foscam support, so hopefully they'll have a solution so I can give this camera the stars it deserves.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: CodeMonkey
Reviews.Content: Camera works good with free DDNS so you can access it with your own web url.No smartphone app to control it available, controls via a web browser only. The motion sensor sucks, shadows and clouds that change the room lighting will set it off. No easy way to turn on and off the motion alarm. It only works off a set schedule and you cant quickly access the menu to turn it on and off.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Scott Gascoyne
Reviews.Content: Great cam I have it mounted on my front porch in AZ. set to motion alarm so if any one walks up my sidewalk it takes pictures of them every 1 second and emails them to me. I can access it via my android cell phone or my pc to see live 24/7 video. Only reason I don't give it all 5 stars is it came with no Android or apple phone software you have to purchase that separate. There is free software but it does nothing till you purchase the full version. Also the Audio stinks on it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam BBM Group
Reviews.Author: DF
Reviews.Content: I have created a BBM chatgroup for us Foscam users.1. If you are not Blackberry users, you need to install BBM for iPhone / Android[...]* If you want to skip the waiting, follows these steps[...]2. Leave your PIN here and I will add you to the group chat[...]

Reviews.Title: Just got it today
Reviews.Author: Andy Churchill
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy. Setup may not be easy for a novice. Night vision is very good. Works on my android phone and wife's iPhone. I will give review in about a couple years or when it breaks.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: J. D. Hyde
Reviews.Content: I have been using this cam for several months now and could not be happier. Setup was easy and they are very dependable. We have ours setup to send us emails with motion detection. I am an Android user and I use the Little Cam Pro app to access the cameras. Foscam does have its own free app , but I prefer Little Cam Pro. I would definitely recommend these cams.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set up without tech support, but nice camera
Reviews.Author: javachic
Reviews.Content: First of all, I like this camera.  I have no complaints.  The image is what you expect for a $79 camera.  It was easy to set up to view inside your home network.  However, I'm fairly tech savvy and this camera gave me fits setting up to view outside of my home network.  Save yourself hours of frustration and just call tech support (I wish I would've!) - 15 min and they had it all set up so I could see my camera from outside my home network.  I'm using the iPhone app Foscam Pro($5.99)and it also was easy to set up to view the camera remotely. Going to buy a 2nd camera for another area of my house.

Reviews.Title: good value, good camera, worst support
Reviews.Author: gotmoretoys
Reviews.Content: I don't want to discourage anyone from getting this great value of a webcam.The camera functionality is good and stable and offers useful features at a undeniably great price.For the most part everything works well and there is a some very good help files in the Foscam forum written by 'TheUberOverLord'  there are even developer API's and utility programs for the technically inclined.There are also some excellent end user programs that are not front and center on the forum.however.. if you encounter an after sales problem and contact customer support I hope you don't have the same experience i did.The chat app opens and a Foscam agent answers then ignores you..then they transfer you to another agent...who then transfers you to another agent...who transfers you to customer service who doesn't type anything at all.These 10 minute waits add up and this has happened on 3 separate occasions.I've now given up on foscam support.Please be aware, I'm a good customer, im not rude or anything, and when i have tech support encounters with other firms they are usually useful, sometimes they even solve the problem and sometimes they don't,  but Foscams customer support is simply an unacceptable waste of time and an insult to the customer.I'd still buy another Foscam camera because they are that good and a great value, but I sure hope I never need tech support.I took off 1 star for the pathetic customer support.  please note that this is regarding FOSCAM support from the manufacturer and NOT amazon or the vendor that is selling the camera.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Joseph H
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use as a baby monitor.  I like the fact that it has a built-in url that you can use to access it outside your wifi network.  I have no complaints about audio or video quality.  The IR mode works great as well.

Reviews.Title: Works Well for the Price
Reviews.Author: BrotherDave
Reviews.Content: Let's face it, this is not a professional level camera, but it's not nearly as expensive as one either. The pan/tilt work well, the zoom is digital, so it's grainy, but what can you expect for the price. The night Infra Red (IR) works well, illuminates around 25 feet.I have two of these mounted outside (even though these are clearly noted as indoor cameras) under the eves of my house. So far no weather has adversely affected them, but they've only been up a couple of months. I also have them wired with cat-5 ethernet cable, so I am not relying on the wifi capability. (I tried it with wifi at first, but the distance I could place the camera was fairly limited).Overall for the price, good cameras.

Reviews.Title: Returned Very Quickly
Reviews.Author: Tyler A.
Reviews.Content: Computers have generally come naturally to me so I was surprised to find that this was very difficult for me to set up. I had to call their tech support and spent hours searching and watching how to videos online. Their tech support was stumped my issues so I had no choice but to return the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice indoor camera....
Reviews.Author: Bo the Iceman
Reviews.Content: Nice indoor camera, but has a few problems. Night vision is limited both in distance and brightness. Also difficult to see into a brightly lit room from outside the room....bright spots are hard to see.

Reviews.Title: good product. Bought 1  first, 3 wks later, buy another one
Reviews.Author: Y. Lin "Tek Idiot"
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup. Clear picture even thousand miles away from home. Need to improve software on browser other than  MSFT explorer.good customer service.

Reviews.Title: limited range
Reviews.Author: Elect. Eng.
Reviews.Content: I purchased a two pack of FI8910W with the higher performance antenna.  I also have a dlink 930 camera.The Dlink has better range than the Foscam with no external antenna.  I live in a 1200 sq foot single story house. I managed toget one camera 15 ft away and the other 20 ft away.  They occasionally lose signal at these distances.  The one15 feet away is outside under a large lanai with a large sliding glass door in between.  This monitors a pool.The other is at the front door 20 feet away.  All in all very disappointing performance.  I will probably hardwire into theLAN.  The dlink has a clearer image.  I am using blue iris software to monitor the three cameras.  I purchased the dlink from amazon and the foscam's from foscam.I am going to try to add a cable to the antenna to see if position will help the range.I should mention that our cell phones, tablets and laptops access the wifi anywhere in the house and outside.  I do havea strong signal available.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: samuel
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, very clear and high resolution color vision. I monitor it across all my devices: laptop, tablet and phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera - Works as expected
Reviews.Author: stephen
Reviews.Content: Very good camera - Works as expectedCustomer support was very helpful to help setup the wireless part.Will recommend for any use in your house.Calvin helped to fix the User Settings > Set path Alarm Fail Error.

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: Steven  Brandon
Reviews.Content: this Camra was a great help w watching my 3 year old as i went about my day.. i alway felt connected with her day by the use of these great camras. Also, Calvin was  great help with setting up my camras up via network..... excellent service excellent pduct.

Reviews.Title: No BS--The Customer Support Was Really Good And It Works Great!!
Reviews.Author: Sam Dedio
Reviews.Content: There is a LOT written about this camera and this company.  I'm just a regular guy who wanted to install a wifi camera for my kitchen and playroom area. Here is how I see it. Foscam is very defensive right now because of a lot of bad reviews and accusations of some falsies (reviews). There are trying really hard to get it right--based strictly on my experience. I agree with the previous customers that connecting with the included cat 5 cable is the quickest way to get an IP address and "get it working." I was then able to follow the manual directions and get a wireless connection.  The big pain in the process is port forwarding--I wouldn't even bother trying--just call them and they will remote in to your computer, change some router settings and then a pin hole will be created to allow your camera to be viewed by any device and any computer in the world. It took me 10 minutes to get this done from opening the box to hanging up the phone.  Note: they will encourage you to buy the Foscam App for iPhone ($5.99) while on the support line and will help you configure it--while I didn't really want to spend the $5.99, I rationalized I had a tech support guy set me up for free--glad I did it. This camera works well and I love the presets that give you 10 or more views at the push of a button.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Wendy Duke
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera.  Works great for watching m kids. The support there is second to none. They took care of my set up and then when I called back with a problem, Sarah, got me back up a running. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: I Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to keep an eye on my sick husband and his caregivers. It is great. I can pan around and I can talk to him and hear him through the camera. I can see it online or from my phone, I can record or save a snapshop. I can also see in the house when it's dark and i can set it to send me allerts when there is motion in the house. I love it.Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (White)

Reviews.Title: Once more I was convinced  that FOSCAM is the best
Reviews.Author: David Melamed "Kaban"
Reviews.Content: I was not able to set up the cam. The representative Felix took a control of my computer and helped me to do that. He was knowledgeable, professionally correct and amazingly patient. Thanks FOSCAM, thank you Felix. I strongly recommend this product to other people.Once more I asked for the FOSCAM assistance and again the service was perfect! This time my helper Sandra taught and trained me how to use the cell phone control of my camera. Set up of the alarms and so on. Wonderful! Now can see everything what is going on in the room, tilt and pan camera and many options more, and BTW it is so sensitive, that can feel a mosquito flying along! Thanks FOSCAM, thank you, Sandra! Again, I strongly recommend to by FOSCAM at my favorite place AMAZON!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a really nice camara
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Espinosa
Reviews.Content: she was kind knowledgeable and very professional .... i was helped by Kate Miller.... who was prompt and very helpful ...I will recommend this product to my friends... the instructions fromt eh manufacturer where in my opinion average .... but the customer support was excellent

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and...
Reviews.Author: Roland E. Latiolais "Latitude"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not an outdoor camera.  Installation instructions and software are buggy.  Software does not have all the bells and whistles of Blue Iris 3 software but is passable.  The management software that comes with the camera on the CD does not work.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, not the easiest to set up remote access
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera seems great. I set it up to view it on my phone and laptop, but while I'm still in the range of my home network. I've had difficulty following the instructions for how to see / control the camera once I am on my laptop or phone and away from my home. Might adjust my rating after I figure that out.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Phil Ricardi
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera! Above expectations. I am going to be purchasing 2 more. Easy to set up if you know the basics of port forwarding.

Reviews.Title: Pretty happy with my Foscam
Reviews.Author: Jordan Zazzara
Reviews.Content: So, I spent an hour or so under the impression that the camera was broken when it arrived. It worked, somewhat, but seemed to drop connection intermittently. I realized that if you take the web-panel off of port 80 you'll get flawless performance from the camera. The quality is meh, and the angle is not wide at all, but it's pretty good. The mounting hardware it comes with is actually really awesome. All in all I'm happy with my purchase, but I took one star off for the annoyingness of having to figure out the port issue. C'mon Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Difficult set up but good after that
Reviews.Author: SarahG
Reviews.Content: The instructions are difficult to follow, so be ready to search youtube for help videos and experiment with it. It works well once it's set up though. I'm looking to get another for a different area of the house.

Reviews.Title: Meeting expectations - Great support
Reviews.Author: rf-sprinter
Reviews.Content: Still setting this up, but so far it is working great. Out of I.T. ignorance, had trouble setting up remote access, but Foscam Customer support was fantastic, and "Kate" had us in business in less than 10 minutes.  Nice picture clarity. Easy to manipulate the camera via the on-screen interface. Extremely refreshing to be able to call and speak to a real customer service person, who is extremely helpful. Good job Foscam!Update - Forgot to mention ...the only downer was the supplied retractable ethernet cable, used for initial setup, was cheap and not shielded, so had some connection reliability problems.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Rocks!
Reviews.Author: knockiesockie
Reviews.Content: The ability to switch from day to night is awesome the adjustment is fast the ability to see in complete darkness is amazing and not that green like a lot of other night vision cameras. I plan to buy more when I see a good price. Not good to use through a window to record at night ,the reflection from the IR on the window will not allow this.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit for the price. Works well, but. . . .
Reviews.Author: Kevin M Agard
Reviews.Content: . . .you really need to know your way around your router and have a decent understanding of port forwarding.I have 4 of these cameras in use now and overall I'm pretty happy with them. I bought the first two when they cam up for sale on Woot a while back and added the 2-pack from Amazon a couple of weeks ago. I use them for home security and as "Kitten cams" for the wife when she is away on business and suffering feline separation anxiety.Prior to getting the Foscams I was using a couple of Astek Moles. Comparing these the Foscams have a slightly wider field of view and their IR "night vision" is head and shoulders above the Moles.These are indoor cameras and can not be used safely outdoors but I do have 2 mounted on windows viewing well lit areas outside the home and they work well under these conditions.The CONS:The built-in web interface sucks! The design is actually quite nice but the implementation leaves a great deal to be desired. The thing will give you various errors when attempting to make simple changes to the config, often requiring a reset and reconfig and some playing with the sequencing of the set up, the browser you use or, how you access the device's web page (Directly through your LAN, via the WAN through the forwarded port or putting the thing in the DMZ and hitting it directly. And despite repeated tries and a couple of calls to tech support. I have yet to be able to get the multi-camera view working utilizing the built-in interface.Foscam's tech support is hit or miss at best. And their standard answer seems to be reset the device and if that doesn't work, send it back.Having said that, once you get past the above issues and adjust for the camera's foibles, they work well once configured.After testing a number of remote apps on my various android devices, I wound up going with Blue Iris on my desktop and it's associated Android app. It was well worth the $10. It works very well with the Foscams and fairly well with the Moles.

Reviews.Title: Great, Useful Camera
Reviews.Author: Sage
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. A theft in front of my apartment prompted me to put one of these up to deter/catch any thieves. I have it set up to automatically E-Mail me whenever it detects motion along with pictures. My only beef with it is that the connection it maintains to the DDNS is pretty choppy. I can connect to it fairly reliably, but the connection goes in and out, especially when sending movement commands. This could probably be fixed if I used a wired connection instead of WiFi. Other than that, the thing delivers GREAT bang-for-your-buck.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to setup.
Reviews.Author: D G "USA"
Reviews.Content: I have prior experience setting up IP cams from Axis and Sony rz models.  This was no different.  Plug into local lan, DHCP kicks in, enter web admin setup, change to static dhcp, setup wireless. Sharp images, ez control, miss not having zoom oh wells, cant go wrong cheap.The one thing that freaks me out was the AUTO-ENABLED DDNS they have to lol "help" you getting it online. WTF, hello china here's my cam that I activated reporting back haha.  I turn off that sucker right away.Plan to keep this with several foscams on a closed offline network for security viewing and recording.  The last thing I need is those cams lagging my bandwith if I am streaming movies or gaming online.I tested with an alternate DDNS it works easily, so I have the option of IP viewing on certain cameras if I need it.5 stars for ease of setup and start.  Next up, operational tests on WIFI. LAN. RECORDING usage.*** updated 10/18/13 ***WIFI-CONTROL only Test.The camera image tends to lock up (REPEATEDLY) while operating the pan-tilt once a movable object (person) appears on view.  This is while I was testing a little further.  All wifi-cabling and control is on a desk while I am doing this and noticed the consistancy of the FREEZING and rebooting.  The cam seems to reboot and goes to its park position.  Other than that, controlling it seems to be no problem when there is no motion detected not sure why, but once a person enters the frame while controlling it BAM locks-up and reboots.I personally don't trust wifi-connections for cameras because the high possibility of dropped frames but for $90 guess this wasnt surprising.  The one positive sort-of is it reboots and is controllable in a few minutes, so for non-critical monitoring this could be fine. Will see if the trusted LAN line does better next.3 stars for repeated image lockups/reboot under WIFI control.

Reviews.Title: good product, exelent customer service
Reviews.Author: HUNG DANG
Reviews.Content: I already buy some for me and strong recommend for my friends, my familyI been using foscam camera long time agoThanks foscam for everything

Reviews.Title: Good Value and Support
Reviews.Author: Bucky "Dave B."
Reviews.Content: I was originally having a problem identifying the camera on my network, but I called the tech support line and got excellent support from Michelle. She accessed my network remotely through a secure access point and completely configured my camera and even the port forwarding feature for remote access using my phone or tablet while I watched and learned. I think I can follow that for future configurations.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: GracieBebe
Reviews.Content: We got these cameras to check in on our puppies (6 months old and 8 months old) since they have never been left home alone yet.  These cameras work great, once you can figure out how to set it up.  Turns out, our router frequency had to be adjusted.  I called Customer Service the first night and I don't think they have many people working at night because I was on hold for over 45 minutes and was still the 7th person in line.  I figured they might have more staff working during the day and since most people are at work during the day and probably not setting up their cameras, they might have less calls.  I was connected to Albert within 2 mintutes of calling and he set up the wireless connection for both of my cameras and even set up the IP forwarding so that I could access the cameras remotely through an Android app called IP Cam Viewer Basic.  He helped me set up the app as well.  He was so polite and nice on the phone!  One of the best customer service experiences ever, once you can get through.The cameras themselves are awesome!  It does exactly as they say.  The pan/tilt function works well and the picture is pretty crisp and clear.  I am able to see exactly what is going on and the responsiveness is good.  I have not tried out the sound yet, but am looking forward to seeing how our puppies react when they hear our voice when we are not there.  The app on the phone does not allow voice unless you upgrade to the pay version.  We will see if we decide to do that.  All in all, I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Quality camera at a low price
Reviews.Author: Scott60402
Reviews.Content: Quality images. Semi difficult to set up, requiring trial and error processes and looking many thing up on the internet. Can't beat the usefulness of this at the price it is going for.

Reviews.Title: Keep on trying
Reviews.Author: frank chan
Reviews.Content: I must say at first I was pretty frustrated with the customer service. Wait time is pretty long unless you call at 5:AM. After a few calls I was up and running. Parker from Foscam customer service was the most helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Support!
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: We use this camera primarily as a baby monitor.  It works great and is considerably cheaper than actual baby monitors.  We can monitor our little guy with our phones, Ipad,  and computers, from in our house and remotely.  The nightvision is remarkable.I recently called and waited forever to get to customer service.  But when I got through the help was great.Irish is great.  He helped me get my camera up remotely in minutes.I would recommend Foscam to anyone

Reviews.Title: Was a little intimdated on install, but it was EASY!
Reviews.Author: Eric Shouse
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use as a baby monitor.I had read some reviews and it looked like what I might want to buy. So much less expensive then a strictly "baby monitor" and it has so many functions including pan/tilt, 2-way audio, good video quality, motion detection, infrared and remote viewing... If I'm at home and my wife is working, she'll be able to see our little one sleeping from her work computer or even from her iPhone!As I went through the setup process I hit a snag when I wasn't getting picture from the camera (though everything up to that point was working perfectly). I called Foscam tech support and SOMEONE ANSWERED right away! Not only did Sarah help me by talking me through a quick reboot, but she also set up the IP for the camera, gave me all the info I needed for remote access and showed me how to change the password. This is all stuff I would've figured out from the manual, but it was such a treat to have someone go above and beyond in service.Kudos to Foscam for a great product at a great price, AND for caring about customer service!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: flaburthe
Reviews.Content: Have been using it for 4 weeks or so and so far does the job very well.Had to turn on and off a couple of time to force a reboot and that helped revive it after it was stuck with image unavailable.Great value !!

Reviews.Title: customer support
Reviews.Author: Tommy
Reviews.Content: I just wanna say the customer support form foscam was amazing. Irish Cena helped me the whole way fast and efficient. I am very happy with the help I got.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Summer Rauchle
Reviews.Content: Great service, I had issues setting up my camera and found the support line very helpful. I look forward to using this camera.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: A. Y.
Reviews.Content: I had bought it so my wife and I can keep track of our baby in her room. Its easy to setup and install the software. Its got good sensor to switch to IR. Its quiet. The only thing I have concerned about is the wifi security of it. This was what prompt me to return it:[...]

Reviews.Title: PT (Pan Tilt)  on the Cheap
Reviews.Author: Damon Hendrickson "White Pines Electric"
Reviews.Content: This ip camera is great for the money.Pros:Pan Tilt, Wireless, Good picture quality, does not require a DVR!Mobile and Internet Explore Access with Pan Tilt control!Cons:Initial setup can be a little tricky if your not familiar with basic networking.Not outdoor rated, No ZoomOther:Works great and can be installed anywhere you have wifi access and AC power.Lots of great features for under $100

Reviews.Title: Never got it to work online.
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I think it was both the At&T; modem and Foscam's fault. Worked great at the house though, not why I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Good alternative to expensive video baby monitors
Reviews.Author: BWN
Reviews.Content: This works well if the user has enough skills to set up a wireless router for home use.  For safety, password protect the camera as it states in the instructions.My intent for this camera was to just watch our baby from the confines of our home within the range of our home network and not anything further.  It is a bit challenging to set up if you would like to set up the camera to be visible globally.  I did not take the time to figure this out.The cost of this camera is a fraction of the price of ones made by Motorola and the like.  It can be used from the web browser of any smartphone or tablet.

Reviews.Title: For a wireless camera, the wireless performance is anemic at best
Reviews.Author: Wizard One
Reviews.Content: The camera performance on a wired network is quite decent. On a wireless network, problematic, to be generous.I have other Foscam models as well as clones. None have given me the grief that this one has.First, one cannot simply add in one's SSID and shared secret, in spite of those standard options. No, you have to scan, then select the network, then the shared secret previously entered works.Wireless performance is horrible. Figure ping times between 400ms to 1900ms and loads of dropped packets, regardless of range to the access point. Mine came with the high gain antenna, so I then tried that.Performance was barely acceptable then, but no other wireless device in the house could then compete with the excessive signal strength.If I put this outside, I'll have to run a cat5 line to it, otherwise, it'll never work for me.I'm putting it in the dining room and I'll run a cat5 line to it.I'm just shocked that Foscam is selling such a lousy performing camera! Their other cameras are quite good.Optical performance is good. Pan/tilt work well when wired, uncontrollable when wireless.IR performance is excellent.Wireless has enough power, as with the high gain antenna, it drowned out my network. So, I have to wonder what is wrong with the receiver. This isn't new technology, this kind of issue should never occur today.Update: Took the unit outside, distance to wireless access point was around 20 feet. Connects to the access point, but barely and can't handle any IP traffic at all, even with the high gain antenna.I opened a ticket with Foscam. They can't fix an issue if they're not aware of it.

Reviews.Title: Wireless does not work
Reviews.Author: Katherine Lee
Reviews.Content: I got this in Dec 2012 and it's Oct 2013 and now it does not work.  I was selling my home so I wanted a nanny cam via wireless.  I had the function if there was motion or noise I would get an email.  Well I had as least 40 people come into my home and I got 2 email alerts.  If you want to use it as a security camera then this is no good.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: jimvan
Reviews.Content: The camera works as advertised. It was a good value because evidently a newer version has been released, and this was a closeout of the older version..

Reviews.Title: Severe Security Issue (hackeable)
Reviews.Author: ZDJ™
Reviews.Content: The device itself is amazing.Too bad the guys behind it couldn't manage to protect it's remote access over the web.In the future it will sure become a nice baby-monitor but in the meantime it'll stay in the box...Reference: [...]

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and configuration and great view.  Also very nice interface.
Reviews.Author: W. Rieger
Reviews.Content: This camera was about the easest one I have every setup.  Quick configuration, nice controls.  Instructions were a little plain but going on to their website was able to find the additional information and got this work right the first time.Great view and controls.  Only reason I did not get it 5 stars was due to not being able to center it back to a prime location if the power gets bounced from it, other than that it is great camera for its price.

Reviews.Title: Useful product.
Reviews.Author: Fred S.
Reviews.Content: Item again is as described and works well.  A little trouble downloading info to computer but was solved with a phone call to the toll free number and speaking with their tech support, which was also excellent.

Reviews.Title: just as described
Reviews.Author: powerby50
Reviews.Content: camera works well, once hooked up to the router there are multiple programs you can download on your phone to access the camera while away, i am extremely happy with the item. on a  side note the foscam phone app uses an enormous amount of data.....

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: IR "mad4pc"
Reviews.Content: Works great day or night. Can set motion detection and email alert or manual recording. I would recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: Security camera help
Reviews.Author: kenneth black
Reviews.Content: Camera appears to working well. The set up was a little complicated. The instructions for remote viewing to too complicated for a DIY. It requires support and of course, you cannot understand the person on the other end due to heavy accent. Customer service must gain remote access to your CPU to stepup. Do not like that. Why don't they have simpler instructions for that. I would recommend ahead of some of the other cameras on the market.

Reviews.Title: It is cheap but you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: greypoint
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't recommend anyone to buy this if you plan to use WIFI.  I bought 3.  Initially I started with WIFI.  If you pay attention, the camera will auto reboot if WIFI signal is weak.  You will notice it because IR will auto turn on.  Alert email sent out will have corrupted pictures.  I found out and run a ping monitor.  It reboots 20+ per day.  One of camera kept reboot and died eventually.  I finally connect one camera to wire.  It works fine.  So if you plan to use WIFI, think again.  I have another camera connect to a WIFI bridge where is the same place as camera. Then camera runs fine.  So their WIFI sucks!  Don't be fooled by 802.11n support.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: RA Chura
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to monitor my front yard (through the front window) so I could see what is going on while working in my basement office. The thing I like best about the camera is that it is self contain. It has a web browser built in (to be used for configuration) and doesn't require a desktop application to work. You just plug the camera into the network. It needs to be hard wired initially to get it configured. Once configured it can work via hard wire or wireless.The video quality is very good and very responsive. I have had some cameras that had several second delays which is annoying, this is real time. I used the iPhone app to control and watch the camera. Note, the free version of the app does not allow you to pan and tilt. I splurged on the $3 app that allows full control of the camera. I like being able to move the camera around with my phone and iPad.When not at home I access the camera via VPN so I can't comment on setting up the port fowarding, but I image if you know basic networking that wouldn't be hard.Overall, I was impressed at how well the camera worked. I may purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Amazon purchase, Foscam Technical Assistance
Reviews.Author: Dianne Leonetti
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster, foscam.com, did a fantastic job remotely setting my Foscam up so that I now can watch it and control it from my Samsung Galaxy4. Great job. Took maybe 20 minutes to complete the whole process from start to finish.Thank you! Love the camera.

Reviews.Title: I like the camera but hate the instructions.
Reviews.Author: Jhon "Jhon"
Reviews.Content: I set the camera up in my house so you can view the picture with my home network. there were a few minor issues, but that is to be expected. The picture is good and the control work good as well. You have to pay for the full app for you phone. I think that sucks. The problems started when I tried to set up the remote access through the web. You have to subscribe to a web host for a minimal charge in order to be able to view your camera remotely from the web. The instructions are very vague and the quality of the instruction video that is on the install CD is really poor. It looks like they took the picture with a toaster. You would think a camera company would have a pristine video. Well it has been two weeks and I have played with it a few time, but still no luck. I have two weeks to get this set up as I wanted it to check on my house when I go on a extended vacation. I just don't get why they have to make things so difficult. I am no dummy when it comes to computers and networking. If I do ever figure this thing out, I will probably buy one or two more to spread out in my house.Update 11/9/13: I called Foscam and they remoted on to my computer and set up the web browsing for me. Turns out that I had done everything right, it is just that you need to use a different network connection to view your camera over the web than the one the camera is on. They should state this loud and clear somewhere. Also, you do not need to sign up to a web host to get access. Foscam gives you a free connection. The remote app works great over WiFi or a wired connection, but is very sluggish and slow over a cell connection. I used this while we went on vacation for two weeks. You can set up alarms so when the camera detects sound or motion it will email you 6 pictures. Got worried one AM when it showed people in my house. Turns out it was the cleaning lady who got the dates mixed up. I was not able to figure out who was in the picture by sight, but when I put two and two together and figured out that was her normal day, I could see it was her. So, the picture could be better. I ordered a new one today for the bedroom. It is supposed to have a sharper picture, I will let you know.

Reviews.Title: Best value IP camera
Reviews.Author: MI Photographer "Randy"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these when they were on Gold Box for a day about a year ago.  I have them setup as baby monitors and they are outstanding.  They cost less than a baby monitor with stand alone display, and I can see all my kids on one screen in my iPhone or iPad.  I also have the ability to pan and tilt if they aren't in their beds.  The IR is very good.  The image quality isn't the best, but for the intended purpose they work great.  I have no trouble with the 2 way audio.  Again, it's not home theater quality but it doesn't need to be.  I want to know if the kids are quiet and be able to talk to them if they aren't.  I bought 2 more cameras in Feb 13 and again have no problems with them.  I am about to order a couple more to start monitoring more of the inside and outside of my house.  These things are simply an outstanding value.They took a little tinkering to get all set up, but once it is done it has been 100% reliable.  I love that they provide you with a remote monitoring method if you don't receive a static IP from your ISP.  Fortunately I have never had to deal with their customer service, which seems to be what many complaints are about here.  I would highly recommend these over a traditional baby monitor.  There is really no comparison.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Shawn Millican
Reviews.Content: +Remotely operated PT controls+Two-way audio+Reliable and durable+Lots of alert options to choose from-Issues connecting to wireless networks (B/G/N)

Reviews.Title: alarm function quit after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: the camera is not easy to set up and in fact I put 2 on the same router and only 1 would work wirelessly, so that was a problem.  I set them to send photos when there was movement.  It worked for a while, then I turned that function off when someone was in the space for an extended time and then turned the function back on when they left.  However the alarm function didn't work at all when I turned it back on.  I rebooted it, updated it.  Did everything I could think of , and still, it does not send and email that the alarm has been triggered nor does it send a photo of what triggered it.  So the camera is just about worthless to me now, but I can no longer send it back as the warranty time is short.  I am going to look for another maker.  Do not bother with this one.

Reviews.Title: Good camera; great customer support
Reviews.Author: Steve Hollis
Reviews.Content: We have been using this camera as our baby monitor, and it has been working great. My only complaint is that it is difficult to set up, but they have great customer support, and they can get you set up in minutes if you have any issues.  I spoke with Harry Foster on their support team, and he was great.  Really friendly and was able to fix my issue right away. My only issue with the camera is that I sometimes get some sound feedback through my mobile phone app.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: todd
Reviews.Content: Very good service. Allen Smith was very helpful in setting up my cameras and set it all up for me over the phone. Very good service.

Reviews.Title: Can NOT link with my Ipad with the app
Reviews.Author: jeremy townsend
Reviews.Content: Can NOT link with my Ipad with the app. I finally gave up on it. It is very hard to link

Reviews.Title: Serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: Sam_M
Reviews.Content: I have only good things to say about the product. The assembly as well as the setup is pretty simple and straight forward. Some reviewers had mentioned difficulty in setting up the product but I had no problems and I don't consider myself computer savvy.It gives good pan and tilt coverage. I have the whole living room and parts of the hallway and kitchen covered. It would be great to have a web cam that could zoom in and out as well.

Reviews.Title: Great product An Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Great installation service from Foscam customer service. My representative was Parker. We look forward to communicating with my mother across the country.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Steve_M
Reviews.Content: Purchase this to monitor my house when away. The setp was easy. Had some issues with port forwarding with the uverse 2wire router. Spent a lot of time researching the issue thinking it was the way I set it up. Called ATT who blew it off and said call the camera mfg, so I did. Ralph at Foscam was very helpful. I let him access my computer using teamviewer and he found the issue in a few minutes and had the camera up nd running remotely in a few minutes. Since he used team viewer I could see everything he did and now know what I did wrong. This too was very helpful as i plan to add more foscams so setup to view remotely with port forwarding will e much easier. I would recommend the Foscam to othets but DO NOT by the add of Blue Iris whicjAmazon recommends

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, a few firmware quirks, but SNEAKY SPAMMERS!!!
Reviews.Author: Al Gator "Al"
Reviews.Content: I really hesitate to write negative reviews, especially for decent products.  I also hate when people rate products poorly for reasons that are not the product or the company's fault.  I struggled with this one because the product itself is really decent.  I've had these cameras for a while to watch my pets when I'm away and I've even got some for friends.  They do the job well and you don't need to be an expert to get it to work.  I've updated the firmware once and unfortunately it required me to manually input the IP address instead of using DHCP but no big deal.Now for the reason for my low rating:  Business practices and customer service should figure into ratings so customers are aware of the total package.  I can't speak for customer service since I've never had to use it but...There are many review that cover this product itself, so I'll leave that alone.  The biggest problem for this device for me comes with their email communications.  Having the latest firmware updates and patches for an IP camera for me is as important as operating system patches.  If you don't want someone taking advantage of a security flaw and viewing your cams, you should update them.  Therefore, I've signed up for Foscam's firmware updates email list.Unfortunately, they take advantage of you and I receive at least one sales pitch or promotional email from them every day.  I specifically did NOT sign up for that list.  The list I signed up for was the firmware updates.  It is NOT COOL to take advantage of your customers by spamming them while holding the carrot of security firmware updates over their heads.  Even FREE antivirus software definition updates don't spam you just to get updates.  Do you hear this Foscam?  NOT COOL!!!You have disgraced an otherwise 4+ star product.  I don't even read your emails anymore unless they say "firmware update".  (and I sincerely hope that doesn't mean you will start putting "firmware update" in your email subject lines just for me to open them.)  For a while, I was OK just deleting them, but this is getting ridiculous.  PLEASE, reverse this inappropriate and disturbing business practice!  I'd rate this one star purely out of emotion, but it is an otherwise decent product, so please do yourself a favor and stop ticking off customers who just want to know when there is an important update.  I'm willing to bet most people buying these cameras aren't corporations with large needs.  You're not selling bathroom tissue or paper towels where customers are going to say "Gee, I'm really glad I got that coupon for another camera in my email, I was fresh out!"  Make a good product, they will find you...the power of the Internet...use it for GOOD things only, not to spam your customers!!

Reviews.Title: Would buy another one.
Reviews.Author: Stuardo Ovalle
Reviews.Content: After watching a lot of reviews in youtube I finally bought it because of the tilt and pan.Pros:PriceWirelessIt has a Android and ios appGood costumer support!Excelent pdf guides in the manufacturer homepageCons:It could be smaller!!! Everybody in my house asks, what is that small R2d2?Need some skills to make it workDepending on you ISP provider and your ISP router it would be easy or hard to see your camera in your phone. In my case, carrier CLARO, it was a very difficult.You have to give your email address to be able to use their web interfaceWeb interface could be betterConclusion:For the price, the pan and tilt, it is the only option available.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would say more a 4.5 star as it doesn't have zoom but i knew that before buying. They all should come with zoom. Having said that this camera is perfect and can do everything I want it to. I have it as a security/pet monitor. I have it set up so I can record after motion activated and upload it to my dropbox account. Its great. Night vision is quality, actually, the image is all around perfect. I use the ispy freeware program to upload the recording to dropbox and use my phone to use as on demand viewing when I am away from home. You can also set alerts to your phone to tell you when motion activation has triggered the camera.

Reviews.Title: Customer service is awesome
Reviews.Author: Elaine Ver Halen
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech guru and this camera can be a little cumbersome to set up if you are not.  However, tech support set it up for me remotely. Great camera so far!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Setup
Reviews.Author: PatF "PatinMaryland"
Reviews.Content: Bradley did a great job of helping me setup my Foscam Camera.  He was very helpfuland knowledgeable.  He was able to do the setup quickly and assist with setting upemail notifications to my Android.

Reviews.Title: For the money, you can't beat this camera
Reviews.Author: Photoknut "Photoknut"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is decent, not super HD or anything - but detailed enough.  Being able to view my camera when away from home and pan/tilt - as well as talk through the camera is fantastic.  We are using it as a baby monitor, and I use it when I travel to keep tabs on the family.  I am able to fire it up on my iPad or laptop, or droid/iPhone.  I researched a ton a cameras and options - for the price, this was certainly the best gamble and it paid off!  I highly recommend the camera.

Reviews.Title: Ok, but you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: tom "tom"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to provide video of a second home, and the Foscam 8910W does that to a degree.The Good  - price. you really can't argue with the price.  - ease of set up. It really was quite easy to set up and even updates your dyndns.org domain with the correct IP address. (bonus in my book).  - IR LEDs and sensor, provides decent night images.  - easy to navigate web interface either from your LAN or over the WANThe Bad  - picture quality is only 640x480, compounded with a fixed focus lens. The image is good a few feet away (where the focus point seems to be), but is really  pretty bad at 12-15 feet. This could be set up better.  -  It would be nice if it could at least try to encrypt passwords. If get admin access, you can dump the passwords as raw text.The Ugly  - motion detection with alerts. This was a feature I really wanted. And it sort of works, assuming that the light levels never change, but that's not a good  assumption, even indoors, light through the windows cause false alarms like crazy. I think I had 15 in a two hour period. This feature is utterly useless.

Reviews.Title: Camera loses connection to network
Reviews.Author: Amy R
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a video baby monitor.  So far we've only tried to use it on our wi-fi network, not over the internet.  We've had the camera "lose" the network three times now in the past week, twice during the night resulting in us not hearing our baby.  I would only recommend this to be used in conjunction with an audio monitor since it's so unreliable.  In addition, we had to search around to find a reasonable app to use on our smartphones to be able to use all the functionality of the camera.  The one that comes with the camera is useless!  This camera is going back and we're buying a dedicated baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Great Service! Top Notch!
Reviews.Author: rwb38071
Reviews.Content: Great Price, Great Product, Great Service. Helped me get port forwarding set up with no issues. Allen Smith is the Best! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Nice quality.
Reviews.Author: Joel Cruz
Reviews.Content: Has a very nice image,better than my $160 Lynksys WVC80N.For the price you can't beat it,with pan/tilt and night vision.worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera is very nice.  Very simple (relatively) to setup, a video is included on the software cd that takes you step by step thru the process.So far I have nothing negative to say about this, I will update my review if I have issues in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Wireless webcam
Reviews.Author: A. Au
Reviews.Content: High Quality product. Still have no try the audio function of this camera, but video quality is great. Power cord is longer than expected. I have it mounted on the ceiling without using an extension cable.

Reviews.Title: too hard to install
Reviews.Author: Ming
Reviews.Content: too complicated to install. The video from the CD is not HD quality, so people can not see clearly. It took me 2 hours to install.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT ,WELL MADE PRODUCT! GREAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT !
Reviews.Author: deano "OLD TIME SHAVER"
Reviews.Content: I have been involved with computers for a long time,. bought a lot of dude products and to add insult to injury,terrible customer support to back up of those products!Foscam is a class act!It's a little complicated to set these up to run wirelessly,enleast for me . But with the help of a very talented & wonderful support person,Michelle , my two F18910 W are working like a charm ! I purchase Foscam Pro software for wireless,easiest setup in the world. Works slick ! Best money I've ever spent !

Reviews.Title: Not what was expected!
Reviews.Author: MZ
Reviews.Content: Camera works well. Good picture. Not as easy to install as it says. Does not install automatically. Had to watch install instructions provided.  Once installed, difficult to access.Eventually, it will do the job and you can access from your primary PC which you installed it on. Will record when motion is detected, but you have to play with the settings to get it set up correctly because there is not a complete instruction booklet included.  Difficult to access remotely without setting up new DNS service which may cost you a yearly fee if you can't find a free service.  Expected better than this after reading reviews.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the money
Reviews.Author: Steven J Paquette
Reviews.Content: If you don't need a complete network of cameras and a monitor, this is a good solution, easy to hook up, all you need is a WIFI connection after your initial install through your router to set it up. It's easier than it looks and they have good tech support if you have a question. Picture quality not bad, it's great to be able to view your cam from anywhere through a smart phone,tablet or PC.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera as a baby cam
Reviews.Author: Nkat
Reviews.Content: We used it in the nursery for my baby.  We LOVE IT!!!  We have connected it to our computer, ipad and iphone.  You can set a pass code to make it more secure.  So happy with this product and the price.

Reviews.Title: nice wireless webcam!
Reviews.Author: Janak and Shamita
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought 3 of these, and set these up to function as webcams to watch our newborn with the nanny. We are very happy with these.  We are able to view and listen in on all three cameras using an app on our iphone. Set-up was relatively easy for the 1st two. On the last one I was having difficulty with connecting to my local wireless network. I then called customer support and Leo was able to expertly guide me to get things to work.

Reviews.Title: Choose white for outdoor use
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Decent performance for the price, and go with white if you're going to use them outside.I've used a number of this model (8910) and had generally good success. Wi-Fi performance isn't stellar, and motion sensing is a bit challenged, but overall I think the camera performs well.  Most of mine our outside (out of rain's reach) and perform well in Mediterranean climate.  If you're going to put these outside, I advise go with white over black. The white is a glossy finish and easy to clean whereas the black is just shy of a soft-touch finish and is hard to wipe down.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: IKT
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the technical support and with the camera, great product for the price and very helpful customer service. I would recommend this camera to other customers.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Holly DiJoseph
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  It was very easy to setup and use (it took about an hour).  I would highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but lousy service from Foscam
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The camera initially came defective.  I.E. would go no video after a few minutes.  Foscam support worked hard to fix it and they thought they had by updating the firmware etc.  However, it was still bad.  Foscam had me ship the camera back at my expenseand then sent me a replacement which was also defective as the wireless didn't work.  The replacement seemed like it wasused as it had old firmware.  Many many calls, hours and attempts to work with Foscam proved to be useless.  I finally gave up and called Amazon and they made everything ok by replacing it with a new unit including all postage paid. I would rate Amazon highly and Foscam business support to be alarmingly worthless.

Reviews.Title: Good IP Cam
Reviews.Author: George Beauchamp
Reviews.Content: I received a defective mode but the OEM was quick and professional to resolve. Setup was easy but video quality I think could have been better.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Baby Cam
Reviews.Author: DallasLonghorn
Reviews.Content: These little cameras are fantastic.  You need to be tech savvy to set them up, but they work really well and pair nicely with the foscam pro app for Android.  We have three setup in our home.

Reviews.Title: opened the box to find the power cord cut in half!
Reviews.Author: Josh Crick
Reviews.Content: i ordered my second foscam FI8910W for another room & when my friend ( I don't know how to set these up by myself ) came over to finally set it up ( 3 weeks after I received it ) I opened the box to find the power cord cut in half! - I don't know how this was possible, i am returning it and will be replacing it with another one. Pretty bummed about this experience.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: PM "peterom"
Reviews.Content: Even though it took me awhile to set the camera up correctly, it now works perfectly.  Anyone who is having problems, I suggest you first set it up to your router as described in the instruction book that comes with the camera.  Once you do this, and get the IP address, you can then detach it and take it anywhere in reach of your Wi-Fi.  Also the instruction book provides information that allows you to connect to the camera over the internet (away from your home/work Wi-Fi).  I was also able to easily set up the camera on my iPad and iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Wayne rajkumar
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up but took a little to more time when making connection via Internet..overall good ip cameraHighly recomended

Reviews.Title: Cheap camera, cheap software
Reviews.Author: Michael Goodman
Reviews.Content: Honestly, I don't think I'm asking for much:- A camera which takes decent resolution pictures so that you can make out facial features- A camera which can automatically email pictures upon motion detection events during certain hours- A camera which can stream video to a remote FTP/SCP location based on motion or certain hoursThis camera has horrible resolution. Pretty useless for anything.Additionally the software claims to be able to do a lot, but you'll find is really buggy and actually fails at most tasks. The auto email function is broken when you want to exclude certain time frames or events. Lots of issues in general.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for price
Reviews.Author: Sam De Long
Reviews.Content: This is a great wireless ip camera for the price. I did not use the install disc, instead followed a review bellow showing how to do it all through the router.Awesome to be able to access the camera from anywhere. Having alot of fun watching what our dog does when we are not home.Planning on buying another one to put somewhere else in the house.

Reviews.Title: Reviewed, bad support, wireless broke and Foscam does not reply to my warranty request via their website
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: Reviewed, bad support, wireless broke and Foscam does not reply to my warranty request via their website. I am unable to return or exchange and the specifications state a 2 year warranty not fulfilled so far.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: clear picture.wide angel.It's easy to install and operate for me. Night vision is good.  I bought two of them for different rooms

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: francisco Castillo
Reviews.Content: I like the unit, it arrived on time and it has been working as expected.  I guess I wanted more options, but the price points the unit is right on point

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all
Reviews.Author: P. Poto "yaro1972"
Reviews.Content: I don't understand all the bad reviews, It works great once setup.Picture quality is Ok .Built in speaker and microphone are nice but only microphone is usable , anything coming from the speaker is not recognizable .Works with Micasa Verde Lite .I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Mace Moneta
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what it's supposed to do, and does it well. I also use the motion and sound detection alarms to send me emails, and they work nicely as well. This is a great little device, and my only suggestion would be to allow upgrading firmware via WiFi (transfer and verify the firmware before loading it), so that it doesn't have to be direct connected to Ethernet to upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Way Exceeds My Expectations!!!!
Reviews.Author: Steve Darwin
Reviews.Content: I was introduced to this camera from a couple of co-workers. I bought it and the install wasn't quite as easy as I had initially thought. I'm not sure if it was me, my AT&T; Uverse or just difficult. Either way, one phone call to the technical suport and I was up and running in no time. I now have it on my iPhone and can check on my home at any time. I can pan, tilt, etc. This is a really great product with a very resonable price and the customer service is great. I highly recommend this product for home surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Returned it
Reviews.Author: Jeff D'Alessio
Reviews.Content: Returned it. Didn't work wirelessly like advertised. Still worked ok if u can wire to it. Just didn't work well for my application

Reviews.Title: Thanks for great cusomer service
Reviews.Author: JC "JCB"
Reviews.Content: I have 7 of these cameras.  All work as advertised, but setup was a nightmare.  I now know how to set them up with motion detection iPhone, and email. etc.  I thought I was computer savvy, but ended up going to the customer service people who got me up and running in no time.  They signed on to my computer and then setup was a breeze.  Recommend you go to their customer service first to avoid major headaches.  So far so good and so far a great investment to my home security system.

Reviews.Title: Working well
Reviews.Author: emon
Reviews.Content: You should educate your self before you buy the cam on how to configure the cam , you tube the best place to get this info. Port forwarding is the hardest part .

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: T. Bourgeois
Reviews.Content: We use a pair of these to watch the house (and cats) when we're on vacation.  They work extremely well for the price.  I wish they'd come out with an Android/iPhone app.  Right now you have to log in through the web and its a little cumbersome to navigate when on our phones.

Reviews.Title: It works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bonney
Reviews.Content: Overall, it is a good camera and has some good features for the price.  One thing that can be annoying is that it is sensitive to changes in lighting, which it uses for detection of motion.  I am using it in a garage, and the changes in contrast between inside the garage and the daylight that comes either through the open door or windows when the door is closed cause it to give a lot of false alarms.  I have it set to send me pictures by email when it detects motion, so I am constantly deleting emails from things like a passing cloud changing the brightness.  It does have adjustments to set the sensitivity, but this hasn't worked out yet.One other thing that I am puzzled about is that it doesn't always record the video when it detects the motion.  I get the pictures, but don't always get video at the same time.The port forwarding would have been a lot quicker and easier to set up if I could have had an explanation of some of the terms involved.  I gave my camera its own unique port number.  I then set up my router - it has an option for setting up port forwarding.  I then used one of the dynamic ip address web sites (I used no-ip.com).  Once I had my web address for my router, all I had to do was to figure out that the camera's port number has to be used at the end of the address, e.g., mycamera.no-ip.biz:1234.Other than a lot of extra emails, it is way cool to be able to monitor what is going on at any time from any location.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Money
Reviews.Author: VonFang
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased one of these cameras for my brother because he had his bike stolen off of his porch.  He set the camera up and we are both able to access it via the Foscam iPhone app.  I thought it was pretty cool so I bought one too.  The setup is a bit tricky, as I was expecting from the other reviews on here.  I was able to follow the instructions that it came with to set it up and get it working wirelessly pretty easily.  I had a hard time getting it setup for remote access.  So I called Foscam's 24 hour customer support.  I didn't have to wait at all to talk to a representative and they were able to get me setup in just a few minutes.  Good customer support.  Camera works well.  Its not super high-res, but for the money I can't complain about it.  The voice feature is really cool, my brother and I can talk back and forth easily using the iPhone app.

Reviews.Title: PT ...
Reviews.Author: Damon Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, easy setup.  Love the interface and the iPhone apps that allow viewing and usage.  Wish I'd gotten the Zoom!

Reviews.Title: 2 DOA's and third has failed after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Poldim
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for.  Two camera's came DOA and my third just stopped working after ~4 months of use.  Just red LED, and nothing else.

Reviews.Title: 3/5 meh
Reviews.Author: andrew hook
Reviews.Content: the range of the wireless is very small...range extender is needed...however...when on wifi the fps is around 3 (7fps hard lined).....very "choppy" vid signal....also it likes 2 reset itself thus changing it's IP....overall it's a nice cam but i would NOT buy again....also the supplied software is 1/5

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: Stephen Hill
Reviews.Content: Found out ONLY after purchasing it that you can ONLY get customer support if you buy directly from Foscam.The are pushing their products out without customer support.  Beware if you have a N type router, I can notget my FI8910 to work wireless.  I will not buy another product from FoScam.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: T. Rhodes "Old Skool Gamer"
Reviews.Content: Had to call support, not much of a wait and they walked me through getting this set up and working. Tech was very helpful although I did have to ask him to repeat often because of the language barrier.  Overall good experience and and the camera is working great.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Scott H
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need. Helps keep on eye on our Lab pup! Very easy to set up and good price from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Works but guests thought it was a bit wierd
Reviews.Author: Simon Costanzo
Reviews.Content: Plus there have been all these security issues. Bit of messing about to get it working on a mac. It works though!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Will Fugette
Reviews.Content: Received this camera and had it up and running in just an hour or so.  I'm using it with Blue Iris and for the most part, it works great.  PTZ can be a little touchy but overall I will by more of these.

Reviews.Title: Hard to program
Reviews.Author: Touch My Monkey
Reviews.Content: Still struggling to get camera working via internet. Not worth the aggravation.  Again with the 20 words. I think short and sweet is the way to go. It's hard to program.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: GW
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera as an indoor camera.  This camera has a good picture and adequate pan & tilt functions.  The coverage works fine for my installation.  It also supports two way audio and motion detection!  The FosCam software shipped with the unit is easy to setup and internet access works fine.  You can setup UserId and Password access.  There are many camera applications available on the android applications market.  I use TinyCam Pro.  It work's fine for my implementation of the camera.  Other software is available adding greater functionality and better support of multiple cameras (I. E. Blue Iris).  I will be adding more of these cameras to my network in the future.Thanks!G.W.

Reviews.Title: It is Less than Reasonable
Reviews.Author: Dawoud
Reviews.Content: I spent more than 2 hours to do the initial configuration (connecting this camera to the local area network and setup the wireless connection). For the other part, that is related to the remote access through the internet, it was for me a nightmare!!!!I spent more than 6 hours in the configuration and read here and there in order to find ways to have this thing setup. It is definitively not for a beginner or someone who does not know much about network configuration. This camera needs an expert (Specialist) in this field to be configured.  One more thing that made it even worse is the very bad instruction manual made by Chinese. In addition, the Media file inside was almost good but not as expected.I know that assigning the correct addresses and ports is very important. Also, knowing how to configure your own router can play an important role in making this easier but I think the manufacturer should have made it easier!!Also, the picture quality is not more than average. When a light is directed toward the camera it the picture will be effected for long time and it will become very very bright even after eliminating the source.I will not by foscam products again!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Calvin provided valuable service and helped me to resolve the issue quickly! Camera was very affordable and is working very smoothly. Perfect for monitoring my little ones.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive wireless cam
Reviews.Author: Jay Garcia
Reviews.Content: Little background - I've owned several different model Foscams, and set up some for family.  We also use this as a baby monitor.  I've worked with many different IP cameras, mainly 3-megapixel+ PoE security cams.Setup is simple enough (although I am in IT field), plug this guy into your router - goto your router's arp table and match up the mac address from the bottom of the camera to figure out the IP.  Pull up a webbrower, go configure your new camera, set a static IP if you want, and change your remote port, change login info etc.  Go back to your router and setup port forwarding to that IP/port so you can view the camera remotely and you are done.The camera is a decent quality camera, nothing crazy - although nice it now has a IR-cut filter and IR leds.  Makes the colors better during the day.  Works excellent in a pitch black room to watch the baby sleeping.While the colors, accuracy and detail is not as good as some more expensive cameras, thats exactly the point - this is an inexpensive wireless IP camera that works.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Cambeiro
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, It's not necessary a deep knowlegde in IT.I can see perfectly what happens at home while I'm working.

Reviews.Title: Good when its not re-booting!
Reviews.Author: JV
Reviews.Content: Known manufacturing defect that can't be fixed by end user. Bright image overloads DSP causing it to re-boot. Firmware fix needs to be done by FOSCAM.Read all about it: [...]

Reviews.Title: Foscam f18910W
Reviews.Author: Ralphy007 "Rafael D Ortiz"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera because besides it being wireless and it's an IP cam as well I could be away from home and still see my apartment and pan back-and-forth all around and see everything

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: brians
Reviews.Content: I am a novice at this technology and Allen at customer service was excellent in helping me with several installation issues.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Just installed my new Foscam with the help of Allen Smith, and he was AWESOME!!! He was patient with me and did the whole thing. We were on the phone for over an hour and he did it all! SO super helpful!!! I think I'm going love my new camera!

Reviews.Title: Foscam wireless product support
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I spoke with bradley from Foscam support, and he was very helpful in setting up my camera with wireless access on my home network, as well as setting up internet forwarding to access the camera anywhere in the world. This service was very helpful and professional.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Cam
Reviews.Author: John K. Kirkpatrick
Reviews.Content: When its all worked out, this is a great Camera. Planning on getting two more for the house and being able to view off my cell phone is great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Hun Kim
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera and just installed it. I was reading the reviews before I bought it and was worried that it wasn't going to be good. But I think, although it took sometime to install, it's totally worth the price. I don't know why some people are writing 1 star and 5 star reviews but, the camera itself is pretty nice. My favorite feature is the moving camera. I hope this review was helpful and I totally recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech support
Reviews.Author: Everiste
Reviews.Content: Calvin has been extremely helpful in the tech support dept. The camera is wondeful got it in black and can't wait to explore all the many things. Thx Calvin in tech support for helping me with a seamless se

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: Bryan J.
Reviews.Content: Great camera and excellent customer support. Would recommend to others about this product. This camera is small and inconspicous for securities purposes.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Christina was very helpful in helping me set up the Foscam camera we just purchased. she led me through the process and basically set up the camera for me. Her help saved me so much time. I am very grateful to Christina and her assistance.

Reviews.Title: Mobile & PC access
Reviews.Author: Mystic
Reviews.Content: Calvin gave excellent customer service, as he was very helpful and very patient in helping me with mobile and PC access directions.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I got my first one a year ago. This is an awesome camera for the price. Easy to use, setup, update. I still haven't explored all you can do with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Murali
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera & the initial set up was done pretty easy & quick, since I didn't have much patience I called Foscam Tech Allen Smith for the advance setup for remote access & motion alert etc., through his help everything was completed very quick. I am very impressed the way I was assisted for the full use of this camera, for which I gave 5 star for the best customer support & nice camera for the price.I will re commend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for a while now (about nine months) and the wireless feature works great.  The Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera works very well. I have mounted the camera under a dome (" 7" Outdoor Dome Encloser for Loftek Foscam) without the cover outside attached to my garage overlooking my driveway, front door and the side of my home. Even though the camera is I belive should be used inside I have used it outside this whole time in the rain and fog (again it is in a enclosure but extends out from the bottom about 7 inches in the elements. I have had no problems and the wireless format works well. I am able to see what is going outside my house from anywhere in the US on my Android phone. I love it...

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W support
Reviews.Author: Betty742
Reviews.Content: Bought this Foscam last October and it has been working great. I called Foscam for help with a firmware upgrade and help with changing my password and Calvin at Foscam was fabulous with helping me through the quirks of actually, resetting up the camera. Things are great again.  Love this Foscam F18910W.  It does everything I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera but,
Reviews.Author: James R Ralph
Reviews.Content: Camera works as advertised but wireless refused to work!I am using POE to connect to router.Cam has two Mac Addresses-tried everything and decided no more foscams for me.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: was very excited when item arrived. spent 30 minutes installing everything only to find that the camera didn't pan left. Exchanging it. will update review after I inspect replacement camera.

Reviews.Title: The setup is difficult, especially for the Iphone/Ipad
Reviews.Author: Jared T. Hopkinson
Reviews.Content: I just spent 2 hours completing the "easy set up" after tech support and Utube videos I still cannot access the camera from a device.  If you have lots of networking experience...go for it.  If not Steer far, far away from this camera

Reviews.Title: Works exactly as advertized.
Reviews.Author: Raymond J Isaacson
Reviews.Content: What else can I say about this.  At first I thought my wife would find it creepy that I had installed this to watch her sleep... just kidding, it's for the baby's room and we love it.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera!
Reviews.Author: StraykatzOC
Reviews.Content: Love the pan and tilt. Excellent night vision! Complicated setup though. Locked up my Dell laptop. Had to use my MacBook Pro to install for wireless. Getting outside the local network takes some doing, but I guess that's good for security of your network.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Support
Reviews.Author: Jason G Simon
Reviews.Content: I have two Foscams and they are great. When setting up both of my cameras, I have required the help of the support staff to get them online. This evening I called the 24 hour support line and despite the 40 minute wait (while the automated system started off telling me it would be a six minute wait), the tech Irish solved my problem in less than 5 minutes. My camera is up and running and I will definitely buy additional Foscams

Reviews.Title: amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Chase Crouch
Reviews.Content: great tech support from Irish. love the camera! makes us feel like our child is safe and scure all night long.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, but to complicated to set up for what I want it to do.
Reviews.Author: Eric D. Washburn "EDw"
Reviews.Content: Awesome, but to complicated to set up for what I want it to do.  I want to view it on my smart phone, but it was next to impossible to get it to work.  I returned it.  If Foscam made this easier, I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Pain to set up if you dont have a router (like clearspot)
Reviews.Author: llh251
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize it was basically mandatory to have a router for this to work (instead of 4g internet like clearspot), so I had to call tech support to figure it out. A painful process, but Derrick was really helpful and knowledgeable and worked with me for over an hour until it worked correctly. Thanks to Derrick I won't be returning this product!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: The camera has excelent features for the price. However, it needs wider angle lens/view. One camera will not cover enitre smaller room.

Reviews.Title: easy steps if you are patient
Reviews.Author: flameboy
