Reviews.Content: this is a fantastic product for its price. i bought this product since to monitor my house remotely when i am away.It took me 30mins to set it up. It comes with quick installation manual which I read to see if I understood all the steps or not and then followed it. If you are patient enough to go through these you will be streaming video with audio in 30mins.First - it takes you step by step on how to set it up with wired connection to your router.Second - it shows you how to set up the wireless connection.Third - all the fun stuff about recording and installing multi camera, etc.For me, I stopped on second. I am probably need another to dedicate another 30mins of time and figure out how much I want to record, format, etc. but I have no intention of doing it now.For the picture quality and audio it is an excellent camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Scott Levine
Reviews.Content: It was a little tough to get set up as my network didn't recognize it at first.  I called tech support and they were extremely helpful and stayed with me until the camera was going.  If your network doesn't see it with the camera tool, you can attach it directly to your computer's Ethernet port.  Once there, its visible and can be set up.  When it has its address the network will find it and it will be no problem.  The resolution is great for what we need it for.  Sound works well as well.  Seems solid.

Reviews.Title: Tech support service
Reviews.Author: Robert Knox
Reviews.Content: Had to call tech support to set up cam wireless,, I had great and quick service, had cam up and running in no time.Yes I would recommend cam to friends.

Reviews.Title: The best IP cameras on the market
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: For the price you cannot go wrong with Foscam they seem to make the best IP cameras on the market very good quality and durable the only problem is this set up but if you go to Foscam website and watch some of their videos they'll take you through step-by-step and port forwarding setting up the cameras on your network which helped out immensely

Reviews.Title: Excellent for my house
Reviews.Author: Wilson
Reviews.Content: I gave it 4 stars because it was very difficult to set up and because it lacks from a good mobile client, besides that you can do pretty much with it, it has many many options for example what I liked the most were the night vision and that you can customize alarms for motion and sound detection in periods begging in 15 minutes selecting from a calendar.

Reviews.Title: Foscam review
Reviews.Author: Walter Priest
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the performance of my new Foscam IP camera. This unit is a great bargin for the price. I was able to get the camera operational using my local wifi and my laptop. I do plan to purchase more in the future for a security system for my home.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: TV Gopal
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted and it works as advertised. Very happy. Was able to configure in minutes. Port forwarding was a bit tricky but managed with a bit of googling. Works fine on the internet too. Not the best quality video/audio but enough for monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Tough to install
Reviews.Author: ira josowitz
Reviews.Content: DIFFICULT INSTALL, must have a good degree of pc and router skills. Tech support takes cntrol of your pc to try and make it work.

Reviews.Title: I bought more!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Arca
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup!  Very reliable especially when hard wired.  Infrared is a nice feature at night.  Also a plus that I am not required to sign up for a DNS account - just need to remember that URL supplied after setup/configuration.  Just make sure to update your security settings w/ a password and a user name other than ADMIN and update the firmware version to the latest version to prevent other eyes from using your cam.  Nice that I don't need to install Active-X to make it work compared to a more expensive Cisco wireless IP cam that I have.  Pan and tilt is nice too!  Reception is strong as well.

Reviews.Title: video is fine, on-board speaker stopped working
Reviews.Author: OneWayBabyMonitor
Reviews.Content: This IP camera works great as a video and audio feed, but the on-board speaker stopped working on all 3 cameras I've purchased. My current two cameras have been through 4 months of continuous, daily use. I returned one of these, a refurbished one I got on sale, because of the speaker problem - only to have the new unit and the old unit crap out on me at nearly the same time (about 2 months into use)I'm giving this item 3 stars because the video is cool and so is the on-board microphone. We did not have any of the microphone issues others have commented on. 2 points off for advertising a product as two-way, then not performing as such.As an aside, I'm using the iPhone foscam software and my wife is using the android version - the speaker does not work for either phone on either ip camera.

Reviews.Title: Keeping an Eye on Things
Reviews.Author: Texas Bill
Reviews.Content: Great way to see what is happening at home when you are not there.  Small size but with a great quality picture!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product with great Customer Support
Reviews.Author: D. Boritt "db"
Reviews.Content: We've had great luck using this product as a baby camera.  Allows me to walk the dogs up and down the street knowing I'm never more than 30 seconds run away from our sun.  Not being the most tech savvy person i've had a bit of trouble configuring it, but Allen Smith and the foscam support team quickly solve all problems!  Highly recommended to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Works well.  Nice crisp picture
Reviews.Author: Revconguy "Revconguy"
Reviews.Content: Works well with a nice crisp picture.  I have this mounted upside down on my front porch monitoring my front door.  When used with the BlueIris software product, it allows me to monitor my porch with both video and audio.  Been using a couple of months with no problems

Reviews.Title: Perfect for home security
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: Don't expect a really great camera but it does get the job done.  I've had it for almost a year now and its worked well.  No issues except that 6 months into the life of mine, the IR cut just decided to turn off by itself.  I didn't know this until i needed to see a room at night and didn't understand why i didn't see the low green glow of the room.  Foscam has come a long way with their products and software.Love the motion and sound sensor, but it really is too sensitive for what number its selected for. But i think thats a software problem.  Other than software, this is a great pan/tilt security camera and has a speaker in case you need to speak to someone on the other side of the camera. Their software also allow for preset locations for your camera to remember.TIP: for you mobile phone users, find the mobile app "IP cam viewer" and you'll have more peace of mind being able to see your cameras on the go.

Reviews.Title: a bit ugly and sensitive to wifi placement, but it works
Reviews.Author: Peet Peet
Reviews.Content: - wifi is ok but its sensitive to placement, range is not great- it would work then it would disappear from network and come back after plugging power back. I thought it was some firmware or board issue but turned out it didnt like the wifi signal. I jerry-rigged a bigger antenna taken from a usb wifi adapter and it has not had any more problems.- ok resolution, colors, but over-sharpened with sharpening artifacts, video has compression blocking artifacts but its not terrible.- not liking the form factor with that thick dish under it, it stands out and screams look at meee- good sound and mic, no issues as i've read in reviews- not convinced on the pan-tilt feature- you can get a replacement wide angle lens for more coverage... and then the whole pan-tilt is useless imho...- and with the above its price is not that great... but its compatible with many software/apps unlike other weird/knockoffs or cheap clones.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer support
Reviews.Author: Theresa R Walker
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. Got great help setting it up with Kate at Foscam headquarters. I recommend buying.The picture quality is great and I love that it can be operated from my smartphone and Ipad.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM Tech Support and Product
Reviews.Author: GM
Reviews.Content: Derrick Shepherd is da man!!!!!  Setup was easy, but we had trouble with the remote accessibility, and once Derrick came on the line, he fixed it immediately.  Great product....Great service!  Hold time was a little long but worth it.  Thanks again Derrick.

Reviews.Title: Works great with Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: Absolut Sake "dragonboats"
Reviews.Content: If you have Windows Phone, you can get an app called IP Cam Controller. I can see video from the camera via the app, and control the tilt remotely. The camera sends me emails with motion detection. We put the camera inside the house, and turn off the infra-red so it will take pictures through the glass at night. You need to be detailed oriented enough to read through detailed instructions because this isn't plug and play. It is more like following a recipe with 50 lines of step by step instructions. The product is great, and I plan to buy another. The one thing they left out is that you should download new firmware. Before setting up all your settings.

Reviews.Title: Super camera
Reviews.Author: Delores Blankenship
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and the tech support went overboard to help. Highly recommend this camera to anyone that is considering security cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and software
Reviews.Author: J. Giron "JG"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, i just followed the instructions to the letter, the software that comes with it is really good, I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: FRANK W.
Reviews.Content: Really like it for remotely checking in on our vacation home.great customer service to help final touches of install

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Medline
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster hooked me up. Great Camera great Customer Service. They remotely logged in to my computer and did some NSA quality work.

Reviews.Title: Home Security
Reviews.Author: akoslof
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera, after finding that someone had been in my home. It's a little more reassuring that I can check on my home anytime I feel the need. The live feed is great, and the installation wasn't too bad. If you're tech savvy, you should have no problem (and even if you're not - the manual and online assistance is great!). The sound quality is great, as well as the night vision! You can set up a schedule for the times during the day/week that it should alarm you for motions and sounds detected. You can also adjust the sensitivity, so if you have animals, it doesn't go off every 3 seconds. I'd recommend this camera to anyone looking for a quality IP camera. Its definitely worth the buck, and it has an app for androids and iphones which comes in handy when you're not on your home network.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Chucktowndcroz
Reviews.Content: This camera is more than I thought it would be.  Even comes with a mounting bracket.  Only thing I don't like is that it isn't 360 degrees.  It turns to a certain spot then you have to go back the other way.  Don't get me wrong it's like 340 degrees so it's not bad just note that.  It was really easy to set up and the email feature is really neat too.  Two way audio is ehhhh but you aren't ordering it for the audio.

Reviews.Title: Work as Advertise
Reviews.Author: HappyDaddy
Reviews.Content: I returned my Dead-Link cam, and bought two of these units. They are pretty easy to setup. They can do in wire and wireless, motion detection with email to phone, recording and free to see through internet. This internet cam is the most I like, we can check home during in vacation. The night vision is worked fine. With enought light, the picture or movie is good enough for details. At night, picture quality is just ok which this is pretty common to all cam. The only very minor concern is the power adapter get warmer than normal in my gut feeling. I serach internet piece by piece to setup all the features. The audio is not setup yet. Overall, this is a very good cam in price vs performance. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I needed help with setting up the cameras remotely to access it from outside my network. Ralph Mendez. He did an excellent job in helping with my issue. The product is very good and am looking to purchase another.

Reviews.Title: These cameras are as addictive as alcohol or drugs
Reviews.Author: Kira
Reviews.Content: These cameras are as addictive as alcohol or drugs. Once you set them up and can see what you need to see, you will find they become a part of your life like the doors or windows. If they turn off for some reason you will feel anxious and want to immediately restore them to functional condition.I have a battery of these cameras covering the house. The monitor seriously feels like one of the windows. But instead of having to go to the window, move the curtains, and then look out, I just glance at the monitor. It is impossible to describe how life changing it is to be able to see what is going on outside of the house without having to look out a window or go outside.The neighbor's cats are always crawling around outside. If I hear a noise I can just look at the monitor to see if it is them or a person instead of having to go outside. Racoons are also always making a racket I always had to check on. Now I sit and watch them on the monitor while they snoop around.The cameras are a fantastic help with the delivery guys. Since I put one up on the doorway all of my packages are laid very carefully on the steps instead of being hurled up there like they used to be. The delivery guys are always polite and smiling when they see the camera looking at them. I even ended up putting a monitor in every room to watch them. If I am cooking I can see who is at the door or out front. If I am in bed I can see what is going on. If I am in the dining room or living room I don't have to move a muscle to see who is knocking.I would not install them in the interior of a house though. The hacking threat is too great.You will find a million and one uses for these cameras and you will never be able to stop watching them once they are installed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to setup surveillance around my garage and the patio area.  I needed help setting up wireless remote and port forwarding, so I called Foscam tech support.  I was able to get hold off, Irish, who was able to help me setup wireless remote and port forward after 30 minutes or so.  Irish was a great help and I wouldn't be able setup myself.  Thank you Irish for all your help, you're great!!!

Reviews.Title: needed help? call Derrick at foscam us.
Reviews.Author: great job Foscam support
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera, went step by step with the install; could only view while on my network even after setting up port forwarding.  I called support spoke with Derrick which was about two minutes before end of day. He was very helpful, he took control of my PC and checked the settings; while I was on the phone with him I lost the connection....  he opened up a notepad and asked if I was still here. I was able to still communicate with him, and he said that he had fixed the Thank you so much Derrick was almost ready to send it back.  He went the EXTRA mile Thanks again Derrick!!!!!!!!!!!Stephen Crossett

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910w
Reviews.Author: Gay Greenberg
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, use 2 in our home to keep an eye remotely on our dog who has separation anxiety.the service I got from Kate at foscam in configuring remotely the camera was outstanding,she is a real professional and knows her stuff.I would highly recommend this camera to anyone needing security or baby cam type camera. Dr. Lewis Beddall

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality product
Reviews.Author: Dr. Steven Shoshany "Dr. Steven Shoshany New ...
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of these cameras for home and office and I am impressed with the quality of video and sound.The setup was a bit difficult but the 24 hour tech support was able to login into my computer and setup quickly.I recommend that you pay the $5.00 for the Ipad program Foscam Pro to fully use all the options on these cameras.I plan on buying two more of these cameras-I haven't figured out how to use the built in  Microphone yet.Great overall product and great tech support.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: phuong le
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a great price.  Michelle from tech support did a great job helping with the setup.  Very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Alex Miranda
Reviews.Content: Had a problem setting up the camera. Called customer support and a gentleman named Calvin walked my through everything from email setup to port forwarding. He did it all remotely.The camera works wonderfully. Going on vacation and now I will be able to view everything in color. I can even talk into the camera from my iPhone.Awesome!!

Reviews.Title: Tech Support Bailed Me Out!
Reviews.Author: G. Rule
Reviews.Content: Returned the Wansview camera because it wasn't showing green colors at all. But never got it to work with external access either.Bought the Foscam to replace it because of the IR filter and the report that Foscam had better tech support than the non-existant support of Wansview.Well.  #1, green worked! Yay! Nice to have green in your pictures after all!#2. While I had no problem getting the camera going wireless on our home network, and felt pretty good I'd done port forwarding correctly on my Netgear R6300 router. . . still no joy on external access.So I called Foscam Tech support. They were able to do a remote session, sign on to my computer, determine that my Comcast business internet ISP was the issue (it had a separate firewall setting that also needed port forwarding set in it), log into that and do it. . . and now my camera is viewable remotely from the public internet on my wife's smartphone and everybody is happy.I never, ever would have figured that out on my own, particularly since I actually called Comcast *first* to see if they might be the issue, and they claimed it was nothing to do with them! So I believed them!So thanks, Foscam, you made a very happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Perfect For Me
Reviews.Author: Sindhu
Reviews.Content: 100 % Satisfied with the product. And it is excaty as advertised and even comes with a free dydns service. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W puppy & security camera
Reviews.Author: 4G63 SPOOLin' "Joey"
Reviews.Content: Camera was fairly simple to setup.  If you search online you can easily find tutorials and videos to help with camera setup and LAN settings.  Using a 3rd party app on Droid phone has been great for viewing on the go.  Had some trouble updating to the latest firmware, but a quick call to Foscam support fixed that issue.  Volume on the camera speaker is a bit weak when using the mic, but for the money you can't beat this camera.  Will likely try Foscam's HD camera next to compare video quality with the FI89010W.  Don't get me wrong the video is pretty clear on the FI8910W, but likely not as crisp as the HD version.  Zoom capability would be a nice upgrade for the next model.

Reviews.Title: Love these cameras!
Reviews.Author: James J. Knox
Reviews.Content: I have three of these and they work great!  I especially like the motion detection/email function, so it works like a security camera inside my home.  Customer service at Foscam was excellent, helped me set them up when I had questions.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support was awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: BeauRidgePhotography
Reviews.Content: Had trouble setting up device and called tech support. They were able to log into my computer remotely and did the setup for me while I continued working!!! Super easy!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service from Foscam
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Miller
Reviews.Content: After having a phd student trying to set up my Foscams as baby monitors for 2 days, he gave up and I, a sleep deprived mom of a toddler and colicky newborn, decided to give it a whirl.  I was smart though and just called customer service right away.  Calvin, from Foscam, is awesome! He set up both of my cameras remotely and I had to do very little, just plugging in the cameras and reading numbers.  Have all of the information you need available for set up including you wireless password and wires and router, and you are good to go.  Also, have your app downloaded and ready to enter the IP addresses.  All in all, it took Calvin about 1 hour to set up the cameras and port the IP addresses, etc so that now I can view both cameras remotely and use any apple application I want to as a baby monitor. This set up was painless, the PHD student would have done himself a favor to call Foscam customer service, but secretly, I think that he enjoyed spending some time with our crazy family:)  I really look forward to using the Foscam cameras as baby monitors and nanny cams in the future!  Calvin- you are awesome!!!! Thanks!Also, for half the price of one of those fancy baby monitors I got two fancy Foscam cameras that work off of devices that I already have (iPad, iPhone, Macbook, and any computer anywhere)!

Reviews.Title: Works Great As Pet Cam
Reviews.Author: Ameliacatz
Reviews.Content: This works great to check on my senior age cats when away from home.  I love that I can pan and tilt to look for them if not sleeping in their usual places as their food bowls are their second favorite place.  I was also pleased to find third party software that will allow me to zoom digitally if I need to.  I have used the microphone too, but there is seldom anything to hear.Being wireless, it is easy to move if I want to also.  I had it on our DRY front porch to watch a nest of baby birds until they fledged this summer.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Richard Johnston-Nott
Reviews.Content: If you are technical (know networking) this is a great product to use.The setup can be very difficult. If you are not comfortable with router/networking technology. Dont even bother.

Reviews.Title: foacam
Reviews.Author: Gary G. Books "Minfan"
Reviews.Content: Yhe camera wworks good and have good tec support. It has a real good pic. and turns a a good speed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Port Forwarding
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: I was having an issue with port forwarding.  I called Andrew at Foscam and he was very helpful.  They set up everything for me while on the phone in a matter of minutes.  The camera works flawlessly day and night.  Will purchase more from Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and value
Reviews.Author: Wolfgang Stiller
Reviews.Content: I own three of the Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Cameras.  I did a considerable amount of research prior to purchasing this and found it provided  capabilities better than cameras costing hundreds more.My criteria was I needed something 100% reliable that I could access from anywhere in the world with a web browser. (I have had no issues with the cameras dropping off line due to network issues. They have excellent reliability so I can be gone for an extended period of time and still monitor my home.)I needed a camera that did not use much internet bandwidth (this camera achieves that by only using bandwidth when you actually are asking it to send video plus you can record video locally without using outside bandwidth.)I needed something that could sense motion and/or sound and send me photos of the activity.I didn't want to upgrade my home network. I have a 12 year old wireless router. All three cameras work quite well and even work with my old G wireless router even when all three are sending video at once and someone else is using our network as well.The last nice thing is the setup was easy. I set it up using the CD (no issue there) and with DDNS but found I didn't really need to use that at all. The fact the camera will send me an email if my IP should change covers that. So far my Comcast based IP has never changed (in two years).

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install and works great
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I am always careful in web based cameras but this one was relatively easy to set up and works great.I can remote in from my desktop or iphone and stream live video from the camera. The detail is not bad andI can pan the camera as needed. I just have it propped up on a window sill.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Torres
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for $66. Great price for a great camera. It included the mounting bracket to my surprise and it was an easy install, although the screws provided broke. Easy fix using screws i already had. Great video... very clear.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: kam
Reviews.Content: Foscam has excellent tech support. Me being not the smartest when it comes to computer and wireless stuff, I was able to call their tech support and have them set everything up for me. christina was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Security concerns
Reviews.Author: TedT
Reviews.Content: I did not like the Internet security aspects of this device so I am returning it.  Their DDNS site is enabled by default even though it says it is Disabled by default.  Once that site gets your IP address it is latched on to it just like any DNS site so even once you turn off the DDNS it will still resolve to your IP address.  If you have a static IP I don't know if there is anyway to disassociate the address.I ran a one of the built in cgi scripts get_params.cgi and this will show your unencrypted WiFi password if you have already set that up.I was not too happy with that feature. I am looking for a security camera that has better built in Internet security.

Reviews.Title: Nice little IP cam
Reviews.Author: C. Mentzer "Gadget Chad"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it had a promotion for under $70.  My expectations were mid-range to low, but I have been pleasantly surprised.  Nice work Foscam!  It is a lot of fun to check up on the family when I am away from the house.  I can't convince the wife that I need more than one of these toys but I hope to invest in the outdoor camera soon.Getting it to work through the router might be a little advanced for may users.  Luckily, it worked like a charm after I set up port forwarding.

Reviews.Title: Meh... Another unreliable IP camera
Reviews.Author: R. Sandridge
Reviews.Content: This was the 3rd purchase we've made in attempts to find a reliable way to monitor our baby while she sleeps. If it weren't for the fact that other cameras I've tried are worse, I'd probably have given this only 1 or 2 stars. It is packed with decent features, but even with a wired connection, the camera just drops out sometime. The web interface isn't so great, and I've still not figured out how to get sound via the web interface. I've still not figured out how to talk to my baby via any interface through the camera's 2 way speaker.I think the biggest problem is that most of the apps are written by a 3rd party. Foscam does make a freely available app, but it is small on features. There are many 3rd party apps (I've tried 3 of them), and they all seem buggy. The apps crash periodically. That is a small inconvenience when we are awake and able to relaunch them, but totally unacceptable for a baby monitor when you are sleeping!We ended up using a high quality audio only monitor when we sleep, and if we want to peek in on our little angel with video, the Foscam gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Great ip camera
Reviews.Author: ism
Reviews.Content: It is a very neat and clear two-way camera. It also captures sounds quite well. You can also pan and tilt it remotely. I wish it had easier setup for, for instance recording videos to a computer. I am sure I will figure that out soon, that and port-forwarding for remote monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Andrew to the rescue!
Reviews.Author: Adirondack "Bob"
Reviews.Content: Foscam service had me up and running in five minutes.  Andrew the service tech was excellent.  I cannot say enough about their tech service.  I'll let you know about the camera after I have worked with for a while.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W meets my needs perfectly.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for security and to keep an eye on my pets, and it does an exceptional job.  I used to use a wired system that hooked to my computer with a card, but I always had trouble with a wavy image that made it difficult to get good responses from the motion detector.  I either got no hits, or it triggered regularly because of detecting the wavy image as motion.  This camera does not have that issue.After setting the camera up in my Blue Iris software, I set it where i used to have one of the old cameras, and it has a solid image, a definite improvement.  The furthest location tested so far is in my basement, about 30 feet from my router on the first floor.I tinkered with connecting to it via the internet, and it worked, but if I decide to use internet connectivity in the future, I will do it through the Blue Iris software to allow for viewing videos triggered by detecting motion, and viewing multiple cameras at once.The motion when scanning a room is smooth, and allows for significant coverage.  The infrared night vision works well, and during he day the color seems clear.I was tempted to go with the HD version, but I am glad I got what I did, since it gives me enough detail without the extra space required for storing HD video.  However, if I had a need/desire for HD, I wouldn't hesitate to try the HD model from Foscam.For the price, I would definitely consider the Foscam camera line for any security and/or monitoring in my home.

Reviews.Title: Wish was cheaper
Reviews.Author: ATL
Reviews.Content: Hated to spend this much on cameras but the pan & tilt really sold me.  Clear picture, using off a wired network.  Using a third party app of apple store and boom you got something good to go.

Reviews.Title: Quality of Video not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: When first connected by wire I was able to view the video and move the camera.  I had some trouble getting the wireless to work but after a dozen tries it finally worked.  It works in all the rooms inside my 1,100 square foot home.  Trying to take video of the outside with the camera inside was a problem at night.  The window reflected the IR light ring and you could not see outside.  I expected a higher resolution from the color video.  It is an OK camera.  I have not yet set it up for viewing outside my home wireless.  It seems time consuming to do it so I have put it off for a later date.  If you don't have any experience setting up wireless systems I don't recommend it.  I purchased it to get familiar with using a wireless camera.  For that purpose the cost is reasonable.  Storing images takes a lot of memory and I would recommend using a separate computer solely for this purpose.  Works better with Internet Explorer for me.  Firefox seemed to have some setup issues more that Internet Explorer.  It appears that different version of IE and Firefox respond differently to the Foscam camera.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: i have bought many cameras and by far this is one of the best ones works great you should buy it

Reviews.Title: good product, poor manual
Reviews.Author: David Chang
Reviews.Content: product was very good, but installation manual wasn't quite right. I had to call foscam and wait almost 2 hours to get thru. After that everything was smooth.If manual was right in first place I would give 5 star.Wasted my valuable time to talk to service rep. Overall I am happy.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA - GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
Reviews.Author: Tara Dotson
Reviews.Content: i had a little trouble with installation, so I called Irish at the Foscam customer support and got fast accurate help!! I highly reccommend this camera for the price / customer service / and usefulness!!!

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Michael W Robison
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd one I had to return due to not being able to get it/them to connect wirelessly.

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: jessica p.
Reviews.Content: Camera is exactly what we wanted. We are using it in our nursery for our first baby. It's everything we need safe and secure with our new baby.

Reviews.Title: great catch for the money
Reviews.Author: bijan azim
Reviews.Content: great features only don side is you have to pay for the software if you want the full functions. it can work as a baby monitor also

Reviews.Title: Leo rocks!
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Clark
Reviews.Content: Being somewhat technical myself, I was a bit frustrated when I couldn't get the product to work on my own.  I phoned up the 24 hour support and Leo was able to remote into my machine and fix the issue in 5 minutes.  To be honest, the problem I had was not giving the camera enough time to reconnect with the router after disconnecting the hard wire cable from router after initial setup.In any case, product seems good so far, but the support and service was great.  Leo the support guy was very polite and professional and knew his stuff.  Plus I was only on hold for 3 minutes max when dialing the support number.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Sandra D Evans
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have stated, these are not the easiest buggers to get connected. I did finally figure it out, but it was a frustrating process of looking up youtube videos and googling other information. Finally got it, but it did take awhile. Still, now that that part is done, I really like them.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Luis Garcia
Reviews.Content: Instructions are not clear, manufacturer has to work on them to make them more clear, they are confusing and missing steps.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, great product
Reviews.Author: Dbeer4u
Reviews.Content: These are great cameras for the price. It's a very difficult setup for remote access for any novice computer user. Foscam's tech support was great. I called and they set the whole thing up for me remotely. Derrick was very helpful. I will buy more of these cameras and I recommend the product and company to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: YouTube setup videos and it is easy to get this camera set up to access anywhere.  It does help having some networking knowledge though.  The only thing I have to complain is that I still have issues getting it to send alarms to my gmail.  There is a suggested email provider for this but I have not tried to get it to work with that yet.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great customer service
Reviews.Author: Eddie M.
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to keep an eye on dog and her newborn puppies, and to share the view with family, friends, and prospective adopters. Puppy Cam was up and running wirelessly in less than an hour--the initial setup is pretty straightforward for an advanced amateur computer user, but novices may find it a bit trickier. Features we love are the ability to pan and tilt remotely and the night vision.I did run into the problem of my home wireless network changing the IP address of the camera slightly; I hadn't installed the included IP Camera Tool software, which I should have done, bc it shows you the camera's current IP address (you can also see this from your wireless router's control panel). Andrew and Judy with Foscam technical support were very helpful over the phone, helped me set a static IP address for the camera and get the camera live and running again in just a few minutes.In short, a great product with great features, and great technical support from Foscam when needed.

Reviews.Title: Adding a second camera
Reviews.Author: Todd Carlson
Reviews.Content: I needed help adding a second Foscam FI8910W camera.  Calvin was great. He got the extra camera working very quickly and everything is working fine.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Geekeew
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the amount of money spent. Software just needs to be updated so it makes it easier to install and manage.

Reviews.Title: This camera is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Sannes "golfbrew"
Reviews.Content: We bought this to use as a baby monitor.  The baby has not arrived yet so I can't speak to how well it works for that but I'm extremely impressed with the functionality of this camera so far. Some of my favorite features are that you can save multiple preset positions, so you don't have to scan all over, so I have set presets on the crib, rocking chair, door, etc.  The receiving audio seems to work well, I'm not sure how consistent the transmitting audio works yet, and I also have not had a chance to play around too much with the motion detection feature.  Considering how well the wireless works, and the multitude of great features, this camera is an unbelievable deal.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and works great
Reviews.Author: Trey M.
Reviews.Content: This IP camera works just as hoped it would.  It took just a few minutes to get it running and connected to my wireless network.  Once that was done, controlling the camera from my laptop, phone, and tablet was very easy.  I can move the camera to different locations in my house, and within seconds of plugging it in, it is back on my wireless network and visible from my computer and other devices.I have used this mostly for monitoring my 2-year-old daughter, who just transitioned from a crib to a toddler bed.  We initially wanted to keep an eye on her due to her newly discovered ability to get out of bed.  That is no longer a problem, but we still keep the camera in her room for piece of mind.My only complaints/issues:I haven't figured out how to get audio to work on a Macbook Pro or Windows PC.  I have used different browsers with no luck.  That's not much of a problem, though, as I use my iPad to monitor the live video, and the app I use has perfect two-way audio.  That brings me to my only other complaint...the lack of an iOS and/or Android app provided by Foscam.  When I purchased this cameral, I assumed the manufacturer would have their own app and that it would be free to use.  I assumed wrong.  You have to use third-party apps, some of which are free.  However, the free ones, as you would expect, have very few features.  Most, if not all, do not allow two-way audio.  To get full functionality, plan on spending $3 to $6 for a good iOS app.Despite those issues, I still love the camera, and I will probably get another one in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Excellent features, but ZERO security
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic when it comes to features for the price.  My only complaint is that it sends authentication parameters in CLEARTEXT over the wire with almost EVERY REQUEST.  This is OK on my home network, but I refuse to use it from anywhere else.  It really needs to use SSL.

Reviews.Title: Nice IP camera
Reviews.Author: M. Charthern
Reviews.Content: Will keep it simple. Overall good camera. Well built.Con: zoom would be nice, and software needs improvementThat being said, it's a bit overpriced and could use some more features before deserving 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: good customer service
Reviews.Author: Mengwei Liu
Reviews.Content: I purchased two Foscam from amazon back in June. But I was not able to set up the remoteaccess. Two cams worked fine in sending in alarm emails. After about two month, I foundone cam stopped sending alarm email, which the other continues to work fine. I calledthe customer service, Alen Smith helped me fix the problem and also he helped me set upthe remote control. He's very professional and very patient. The customer servicewas great, much better than some other big companies.  I only give four start becauseone of the cam suddenly stopped working for now reason ( I didn't change any settings).That was kind of weird. The other cam, which was set in identical way, however, neverfailed. Overall  Foscam is a very decent option.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Amir Saad
Reviews.Content: This webcam is just awesome, not only can we view it on any mobile device at home, but I was at work and was still able to use it. Setup is a hassle and so are the updates with Foscam constantly harassing about any update or one day sale that you MUST subscribe to to get your own firmware updates but other than that, love it.

Reviews.Title: technical support fr
Reviews.Author: S. Hamre
Reviews.Content: I had to contact support for help setting up the camera. Felix had me up and going very quickly! So far the camera and features are just what I expected.

Reviews.Title: irish is very helpful from Foscam customer support
Reviews.Author: chari
Reviews.Content: Love this cam clear and can be useful for my family.....Best security system so far, I have Dlink cam which is not comparable to Foscam at all...

Reviews.Title: Ma'am is happy with her CAM
Reviews.Author: HAKU
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reading all the reviews. I was scared to get it because I never bought something like this before and after reading some reviews, some say Don't install the CD it comes with (I thought oh darn there goes the easy of it) and some nice reviewers even gave what they call pretty easy instructions (I thought I can do this) but they were right!!  Don't try it on your own if you have only a little knowledge. Knowing your router# is not enough lol! Anyway I ended up calling Sarah @ Foscam and she hooked it right up for me. I'm up and running and this is the best buy I ever did for home security, it tilts, it pans your perimeter, you have the control to stop and go and it's clear not fuzzy like some might say...I only have it for the day so my best review at the moment is I'm not disappointed and I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: hackeart
Reviews.Content: A little hard to set up for a novice user. But after it IS set up it is Flawless! Picture quality, sound even the application on Iphone, Ipad, Android is amazing. For the price you cant go wrong for quality, and value. A great product!

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Lisa J. Szlosek "lisa"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to monitor our house when we are away. The setup video is very confusing, and the woman narrating is not proficient in English. After some difficultly, I managed to set it up on my home network. I can watch it from another room, and it works fine. Viewing over the Internet is another matter. I have spent hours trying to figure this out, watching Foscam's setup video, as well as third party videos on YouTube. It's hopeless.Unless you are an IT professional or an avid computer hobbyist, or want to hire one, you can forget about viewing this thing remotely.

Reviews.Title: Software is Buggy
Reviews.Author: Rawesome
Reviews.Content: Camera works, but the software is buggy.  It "alarms" on motion detected, but being able to record and send an email/txt to your mobile does not work as described.  The software that comes with the camera allows for these settings, but they don't work.  I am looking for something else to meet my needs

Reviews.Title: Set up is impossible
Reviews.Author: johng
Reviews.Content: Good luck if you buy this product. Setting the camera up to connect with your internal router is very easy. But configuring it to be accessible from the internet is like trying to learn German from a French textbook. A round robin of websites, control panels that don't match the ones shown and "easy" steps that just don't work. I'm pretty tech savvy and this process was ridiculously complex. Count on another $100 to get a tech guru to set it up for you. Camera works great, but seeing my living room from my office across the hall is not the remote camera access I had in mind.

Reviews.Title: Customer service excellent
Reviews.Author: Jdnuke
Reviews.Content: I needed help setting up my new foscam camera for remote viewing, and Irish Cena was extremely helpful in accomplishing this. He was able to remotely access my computer (with my permission of course) and I was able to sit back and watch him set it up for me in minutes, what would have taken me hours! Excellent service! very polite and knowledgeable! Great Job Foscam!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: William J. Doherty
Reviews.Content: Did a bunch of research and the Foscam seemed the best overall.  It was very easy to set up following the directions.  The picture quality is excellent and the ability to scan left/right and up/down is a big plus.  My next step is to set-up 'port forwarding' so I can access the camera from a remote location.  If it does as well, I will be getting a few more of these.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, low quality camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Rohl
Reviews.Content: The good: It's cheap and offers pan/tilt controlsThe bad: audio is pretty much useless. video quality is limited to a max of 640x480 at 30fps. I would definitely get an HD camera if quality is a concern.My experience: I bought this as a security camera for my business, but have been playing with it at home just pointed out my window. It's nice to be able to use my computer or smartphone to watch my front driveway. I keep watch for friends, food delivery, etc. It's also nice to check on things while away.Basically, you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have zoom BUT
Reviews.Author: hm86
Reviews.Content: I was upset to find this didn't have zoom (clearly my problem for expecting it rather than researching it.) It's actually wonderful and all you have to do is double tap the pic on your app and it'll zoom up for you. I use this as a baby monitor. The presets are amazing, it is very quiet, and the night vision is absolutely flawless!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Saiten Vei
Reviews.Content: I really love the product. Allen and Cristina helped me a lot in setting the camera. Great customer service. Camera view is great in all directions.

Reviews.Title: My review
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: Hello....This is a great product.  The gentleman that helped me set this up did a great job  I could not have done this by my self.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: It does what it was intended for
Reviews.Author: Jand3bs
Reviews.Content: the biggest problem we have with it is the darn power cord is only like 3 feet long and where we want to place it there isn't an outlet close enough.  It would be nice if they would think of things like this.

Reviews.Title: very good value
Reviews.Author: Andras Mikite
Reviews.Content: I purchased two Axis 207W cameras a few years ago - they work really well, but I needed tilt feature,and higher end axis models are really expensive.I read a bunch of review of foscam - many warned about quality issues, but I have not had any problem.I have 2 foscams now - both works perfectly. Night vision feature is very useful indoors.The only minor issue is the software is pretty basic, not very well designed, but works ok.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: R.A.
Reviews.Content: Have a few of these already. They are very reliable and serve its purpose as a basic security camera. The video is pretty clear however the motion detect could be a bit better as its flaky with lighting changes. You can't expect more for the price of these units.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Easy!
Reviews.Author: Angelia C Jannicelli
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  I have another one and it so easy to use wirelessly.  I would definately recommend it to anyone.  Also,  if you need help setting it up, the customer service reps are very helpful, kind and speedy!

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: c. lam
Reviews.Content: I own several brands of ip cameras, and all of them works as expected.  This one too.  No more and no less.  Simply follow their instructions and everything's fine.Image is quite good, video is good.  Color is nice. Night time viewing is adequate. Only the viewing angle is a bit narrower than the I'd prefer, but no big deal because of its ability to pan.  Software works on all devices that I am using, including cell phones.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie Vander Meer
Reviews.Content: This is an amazingly inexpensive wireless IP camera. In addition to infrared capability, it also has two way audio to listen and speak. Although I consider myself somewhat tech savvy, I find some of the wifi configuration settings to be confusing ... lots of DDNS, IP and wireless router settings -- to my great surprise, I called the 1-800 customer support number and a representative (probably at a call center in India) walked me through it step by step. He did a nice job and it works great. I recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Great technical support. Very pleased with product
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Technical support took a very complex install and made it extremely easy. Great product and support, Will definitely recommend to friends!

Reviews.Title: Works great but a hassle to set up for non-techie folk like me
Reviews.Author: helen_in_tn
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera, which arrived on July 30.  After plugged in the network cable and power per the instruction booklet, the camera didn't tilt nor pan nor move at all. The camera lit up, and that's it. After one hour of trying to figure this camera out, I realized the camera that I received could be broken. So next day, I phoned Amazon customer service and asked for a replacement. Amazon sent me a new replacement camera the next day. (Amazon also emailed me a return label for the broken one, which I returned to Amazon immediately.)I plugged in the network cable and power into the replacement camera, this time, the camera moved: it would rotate, tilt/pan. Afterward, I copy/paste the IP Camera tool from the CD onto my desktop per the instruction booklet.  I double click on the IP Camera tool, and I see my IP address pops up. I double clicked on the IP address, a web page popped up to allow me to proceed to the next step of "wireless set up". This is where I got lost. I couldn't set my camera up via wireless no matter which way I tried. Finally, I phoned Foscam toll free number listed in the instruction booklet. This was a Sunday afternoon Pacific standard time when I called Foscam for support. I selected technical support.  And in a few minutes, it connected me to a man on the other line. The man remote connected into my computer, then copy/paste my WPS wireless password, and got me to connected to remote IP address. He did it in the matter of a few minutes. He was professional, polite, efficient and clear in his communication. He disconnected. And I was able to see my camera view via wireless mode.Afterwards, I downloaded the Foscam APP on my iPhone, which isn't free. Costs $5.99. Now I can see my pets in action on my iPhone.I'm not a computer techie nor into networking.The wire set up was easy for me. The wireless set up was challenging. Compare this camera to my dLink camera, I found the dLink camera has an easier wireless set up than Foscam.  However, Foscam camera has a better quality of resolution and functionality of the pan/tilt/rotate and sound. My dLink camera is stationary and doesn't pan/tilt/rotate.I bought this for keeping an eye on my pets as well as for security.Thank Goodness to Foscam excellent and fast customer support to help me set up this camera on a weekend day! Otherwise, I wouldn't have kept it. My week days are too hectic to have time to set up anything else. The fact that Foscam tech support was able to help me in a matter of a few minutes on a weekend day.  It was a big plus for me.  I would give it 5 stars if the wireless set up instruction was clearer, or for "tech dummies like me", in the enclosed instruction booklet.I'm happy with the fact that I can keep an eye on my precious pets, who sleep most of the day and ruin my furniture. :)(Also, thumbs up for Amazon's customer support service in sending me the replacement camera.)

Reviews.Title: Customer support
Reviews.Author: Valerie
Reviews.Content: Calvin is incredible.  He is literally the best customer support agent I have ever come across from any company.  He was able to professionally and quickly resolve all my issues with setup of camera as well as wifi and stayed after his shift to help.  I would give 6 stars (on scale of 0-5) if I could!!  He represents Foscam extremely well and I am delighted with my experience with Calvin and Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Good home security camera
Reviews.Author: J.W.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use in conjunction with a Skylink SC-1000 Complete Wireless Alarm System, White. The alarm system is setup to call my cell phone whenever there is an activation. I then use the Foscam Viewer Lite app on my Android phone to connect to the camera and determine what activated the alarm. Worked well during our recent vacation, even though we had no alarms, I still checked in on the house every so often. Gave me some peace of mind.The setup instructions may be a bit too much for some people. I worked for many years in the computer & networking field, so even though the instructions were a bit confused I had the camera setup on my network in about 20 minutes. I use a static IP for the camera inside my LAN. I suggest you first configure it with a dynamic LAN IP and test it out, then use the static IP if necessary. I used the static IP as it was easier to configure my broadband router to do port forwarding with an IP rather than a MAC address. Your configuration may be different. The port forwarding option combined with a dynamic DNS service such as DynDNS or No-IP will let you connect to a public server within your LAN from the internet. In this case the public server is the HTTP (web) server built into the Foscam FI8910W. Once you get this setup you do not need your computer on; just have the cable/DSL modem and router powered and the camera of course.A couple of tips: remember to change the default user name and password in the device; second - don't connect to the camera as administrator from outside your LAN. I setup a viewer account and an operator account. The viewer can only see what the camera is pointing at (they can't move it), the operator can move the camera, but can't change the settings. The admin can do anything.Anyway worked good for me and my use, though a bit over complex to setup & configure for internet access (but the good thing is that it can be adapted to just about any network configuration or use). I only had one problem with connecting to it during vacation and that was after exiting the phone app without using the exit button in the app. This seemed to hang the camera, but a few hours later I tried it again and it was working. I was using the myfoscam.org dynamic DNS service they might have had an issue as I could not connect to the camera from a laptop either until some time passed.

Reviews.Title: I do not usually write reviews but................
Reviews.Author: J. Zand
Reviews.Content: This little product is just amazing.  Almost as fantastic as the tech support the company provided to set it up.  I do not usually write reviews, but every once in a while I come across a product or service where I feel motivated to share a great experience.  So in many ways I am not sure where to begin.  Part of my happiness is that technology has arrived to the point where one can have a remote controlled camera, day and night with sound and bells and whistles that one could only have imagined years ago.  I originally bought this camera so that if the alarm at work ever went off that I could see what was going on before remotely disabling the alarm.Let's face it technology is great these days.  But here is where Foscam really shined.  I called tech support and ended up speaking to India and what a great experience.  First the Tech Support line tells you what number you are in line and how long the wait is.  Right from the start you never feel like you are blowing in the wind.  They are available from 7am-9pm 7 days a week.  I ended up talking with this gentleman whose name was Derrick.  I am not sure I ever had better tech support in my life.  He logged onto my computer remotely,  set up the whole system, told me what program was best for my iPhone to integrate with the camera, and then had me open up a blank note pad and typed out every setting for me to enter into the iPhone application.  Finally he typed his email address, extension number, and hours he works in case I had any more questions.  All I can say is WOW!  Yes the Foscam is cute.  Yes it has some very very cool features.  But the customer service was absolutely outstanding.Oh a couple more things.  To get the free tech support, you have to purchase from the Foscam store or an authorized dealer.  So get ready to pay $15-20 more.  Foscam has a store on Amazon, and I also believe Ebay, as well as direct.  Also, if you want to use this as a baby monitor, it has some very cool features, like notifying you of sound or movement all with adjustable sensitivities.  The whole thing is great, and I couldn't be happier.Thanks Foscam and Derrick!  Your the best.Jay

Reviews.Title: Great WebCam
Reviews.Author: Ryan Konrad
Reviews.Content: Very impressed. Good price, all the good features I needed. Some network experience and Port forwarding needed for outside internet access.

Reviews.Title: Needs better instructions...
Reviews.Author: William A. Bachman
Reviews.Content: Works great when you get it working, but it only works wirelessly when used in DHCP mode. Had to call tech support to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: J. R. Murphy
Reviews.Content: This camera was very easy to set-up.  It was a very good value for $75.  I now have a home security camera.  I would recommend downloading an app for your phone to use because using a browser can be diffcult to view on your phone.  I would have liked the camera to zoom and be a little clearer; however the overall value makes this camera very viable.

Reviews.Title: F18910W FOSCAM
Reviews.Author: FRED CRADDOLPH
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA, EASE OF USE. WELL BUILT, IMPRESSED HOW QUIET IT IS. TECH SUPPORT WAS GREAT. HAD PROBLEM WITH REMOTE CONNECTION. TECH SUPPORT LOGGED ON MY PC TO REMEDY THE PROBLEM. GREAT SERVICE...

Reviews.Title: easy set up, performs as expected
Reviews.Author: Adam Knapp
Reviews.Content: We use this to check in on the dogs when at work. For this purpose the item works very well. It was easy to set up, does what it says it will. We use a free iPhone app to check in at home when we are working( the website is blocked at work). We were pleased with the app options as well.

Reviews.Title: foscam report
Reviews.Author: mrds1
Reviews.Content: I had a problem stetting it up. called them on phone a guy name calvin helped me and now the camera works

Reviews.Title: Worst product and customer service
Reviews.Author: B. C. MS "Horse Woman"
Reviews.Content: I cannot even remember how many hours and many times we've called customer service on this product.  We send them back and have to wait literally months and months, many calls later to get another one.  We wait for days to get a representative to call us back.  They sort of work if you're in the home but away from the house (which is the point) ...you can forget it.  Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Very good baby monitor for the price!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: We bought this to use it as a baby monitor, and it is surprisingly good.  Why spend $300 on a true baby monitor when you can buy this camera and use your cell phone or tablet?  Most people carry something with them at all times, and this makes it easy.  I will preface with, it does take some setup and isn't absolutely the easiest thing to get working.  If you are tech savy or have someone in the family who is, buy it!  Once it is setup, it is dead simple to use.  You will need a stable network (wired or wireless) to use it, but I have had no problems.  If it dies, it will automatically reconnect so you don't really miss a beat.  Last, watch the prices on these.  You can get great deals on them from time to time.

Reviews.Title: These are easy to set up
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: We use these to keep an eye on our two boxers.The cameras are easy to set up and provide a great image.

Reviews.Title: Pretty neat
Reviews.Author: newkirk
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product, and despite negative reviews, found it very useful and well worth the price. I just set it up last night, and yes, it did take awhile, but I just watched 3 different how-to guides on You Tube which made it a lot easier. If you are novice at fooling with your router, I would recommend getting help, as I would have been very frustrated if I didn't already know how to adjust my settings and figure out how to find the IP information. Picture isn't HD quality, but for under $70, I wasn't expecting much. I really like that I with the pan and tilt function I can scan my whole living room/dining room area. I am using this as a critter cam to watch my cats during the day to see what they are getting up to. I would definitely purchase more, as I would like to set this up as a multi view system throughout my house. The audio feature isn't that great, as there is an echo and it is too loud and you cannot adjust the settings, but I most likely wouldn't use this feature much anyway. I would recommend buying this product, but just make sure you have the time to properly set it up, and be patient as it can get a little frustrating.

Reviews.Title: works well!
Reviews.Author: Lord BB
Reviews.Content: Got this unit to add to my Linksys wvc54gca cameras. This one is way cooler. Picture seems sharper, and of course the pan functions are kick-ass fun to have.  I only give it 4 stars because the first unit I got was a total dud. Thankfully Amazon's easy return saved me from any harm. As for sound, on mine listening in on the camera works well, and has better sensitivity than my Linksys units. I haven't really tried its speaker function. The IR vision is very impressive, fully lighting even large rooms-although the red glow of the LEDs is very visible. Another person wrote up how to add it to your network, I'd advise doing it the way they suggested.Good luck

Reviews.Title: Not easy to configure.
Reviews.Author: Payal Sanghi
Reviews.Content: Not easy to configure. Tech support is not very helpful. Once configured, quality is good. I got it for 65, so it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Set Up was Difficult
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This camera works exceptionally well. The Android app only cost an additional $4.99 which allows me to monitor my new dog wherever I am. The set up of this camera was too difficult for me. I had to have an IT expert come to my house (colleague from work), and she had to call Foscam for help with the configuration. Once they got it working, it has been working well. It allows me to scan, listen and speak from my smart phone. I originally put in a return request, but with the help from my colleague I canceled the return and have been quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Garza
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera. Very nice picture definition.Works great with my iPhone. I love that even when your iphone is in sleep mode and the baby cries, it warns you.

Reviews.Title: Foscam fi8910w ip Camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I purchased the foscam fi8910w direct from foscam.us and was very pleased to see the box arrive in 2 days. Upon inspection I found the camera to be well constructed. I began the set up and it went well -> until I tried to plug the camera in.. The camera did its initial pan and tilt then would never hook to the Pc (via the software).I went to the foscam.us website and clicked on the support tab.. Then noticed they have a "chat" system in the lower right corner.. So I opened a chat and had a tech working on my issue within 2min. (TWO min)After we couldn't get it going I called a tech and was issued an RMA no questions asked.The Camera wasn't working that's a solid 1 starThe support was EPIC (Web chat support & Phone support).. Solid 5 starsAverage 3 stars (Until I get the replacement set up and tested.. At which time I will update this review!)______________For now all I can say is that's exactly what I would expect when receiving a broken item (NOT sure about other complaints but my experience has been more then fine up to this point)Will update ASAP, thanks for viewing!

Reviews.Title: Camera Worked Good but Damaged Furniture
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: My husband and I tested this camera for use in our baby nursery.  We set it on top of a painted desk and it left permanent stains on the surface.  Not sure if it burned the wood or if the feet on the bottom of the product have some type of stain on them.  Nevertheless, the top of the desk has been ruined.We ended up sending the camera back and going with a traditional baby monitor with camera.  Even though the camera worked well, we didn't want to be tied to our phones or computer to monitor the nursery.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy to set up. Great Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Tennis0717 "Tennis0717"
Reviews.Content: These were super simple to set up. Almost plug and play. They work nicely with various third party application for monitoring and control via smartphone or tablet. Once you figure out port forwarding on your router you will have access to these from any internet connection.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: J. Shain
Reviews.Content: Personally, I thought it was going to be more difficult to setup from what I've read, but It was actually a breeze despite not being very intuitive. Had everything working, connected wireless, and accessible over the internet with Foscam's free DDNS in less than 15 minutes. Granted, I'm somewhat tech savvy and knew a thing or two about setting up stuff like this. Someone else might have a difficult time with it though.Also, it doesn't make sense why they disable presets by default. Had to enable them in PT Settings.Overall I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: We could never figure it out.
Reviews.Author: RLGF "RLGF"
Reviews.Content: Although we tried and tried, we could never get this to communicate with our computer.  It's been so long that I can't even remember what wouldn't work.  The camera turns on and we could see the results if we were looking right at our computer, but that is not the point.  We wanted to be at work or vacation and see remotely.  Three fairly tech smart people tried and we all failed.  Camera just sits on the desk useless.  Great idea if we could have ever figured it out.  I sure wish we could have.  Having a security camera was/is very important to us and we are disappointed that this didn't work out.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: i just got this foscam and needed help setting it up. i had a real human on the phone within 20mins which is amazing in itself. he logged on to my machine and fixed the problem. very impressed. much different than the experience i had when i bought a wansview. they have zero tech support, the instructions were crap. do yourself a favor and spend the extra money on the foscam!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and pretty good support
Reviews.Author: (0-0) "Readership"
Reviews.Content: I installed this device twice (first in home # 1 and needed to move it to home # 2). Each house has a different Router, IP, etc. but with a little help from their support people I was able to get it working and sending me emails both times. There were a few agents in India who I couldn't understand and I had to keep calling back until I got someone who could speak better English, but we got it done and tested.Works on my Android phone, I-Pad, I-Pod Touch and over my windows PC. I'm buying more for other locations in my homes.

Reviews.Title: I love these Cameras
Reviews.Author: A. Crochet
Reviews.Content: This is my second Foscam. It was a lightning deal so I decided to upgrade from my older one. They are easy to set up and dont cost you anything to view them. You can see them from anywhere with an internet connection. If you want to buy a $5 app on your phone you can view it there too. If you want to buy $50 software you can put it on your computer and record as much video from it as you want. It even has a motion detection feature to only record when it senses motion. This is a great camera for the money!

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Kevin Alofs
Reviews.Content: Outstanding support & even more outstanding support!  Very friendly!  Camera quality and features are outstanding!  Will be ordering at least one more of these cameras!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Awesome Support
Reviews.Author: Alfred V. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I looked at this several times but held off as the install sounded difficult.Ran into a question during install and called support.Within 10-15 minutes Derrick had me up and running wirelessly and connected to my Android!That made it extremely easy as it was set up for me remotely.Very happy as I now have remote home security for under $100!

Reviews.Title: Customer support excellant
Reviews.Author: madison Mckinney
Reviews.Content: Amazon delivered it quickly, I am not a computer guy so I had trouble setting it up.  I called Foscam and their customer service is outstanding, they took the time to setup everything for me.  This camera will move side to side and up and done remotely.  It is well designed and is durable.  I am view the real-time footage outside my network - on the road.  I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Won't take the heat.
Reviews.Author: William Talent
Reviews.Content: Stopped working after my room temp exceeded 90 F when ac failed...Watch it.  Keep it ventilated especially when mounted inverted.

Reviews.Title: Best baby monitor money can buy
Reviews.Author: Peter Boyet
Reviews.Content: This cam is a great baby monitor! It works exactly as described with no hardware issues in the months past that I've had it. It is still reliable and the setup was easy. I read a lot of reviews claiming that it was really difficult to set up so after I purchased it I researched the setup on youtube and google until it arrived. I didn't really need to go through the research effort it was pretty basic if you have ever set anything up port forwarding.

Reviews.Title: very good service
Reviews.Author: Timothy Luddy
Reviews.Content: bought cam onlinewas too complicated for me to hook upI called tech support and they had me up and running in no time.nice camera

Reviews.Title: open box or used item...
Reviews.Author: Henry M Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Just revieved my Foscam and already not happy with it. Camera and the misc parts came without any plastic cover/bag and a bit scratch up. This is suppose to be brand new item. Will test out the unit and update more at later time.

Reviews.Title: Great but security concerns
Reviews.Author: Praveen
Reviews.Content: Great product. But for these interior cameras hiw do we know someone else doesnt have unauthorized access to view camera?I realized late that the admin password is BLANK that means anyone who knows my IP and port can view the camera.What should we do to enable security?

Reviews.Title: Installed this for my sister-in-law
Reviews.Author: VuDooTechnology
Reviews.Content: So I recently installed these cameras for my sister-in-law, we actually got a deal off groupon but I have to say, I am surprised by many of the negative reviews on here.  Makes me wonder how much of it is a case of user error, rather than hardware issues.  The Web GUI is moderate at best, but once you can work through the kinks and get everything set up, its not that bad.  Too be honest, i've seen a lot worse.  I saw a few reviews saying to avoid using the installation cd that came with the camera but it has some nice features which let you change camera settings without the need for the GUI.  making some setting changes a breeze.  Also, the Foscam Pro app is a MUST HAVE, well worth the 5.99 as it takes the camera's to a whole new level in terms of stability, functionality.The multi-cam set up was a bit flaky in terms of loading all the cameras on to 1 screen but again, most of the issues were because of the web GUI.  The two way audio is nothing crazy but it wasnt high on her priority list.  The pan/tilt feature works great, and has adjustable speed for the rate of motion.  The motion sensor works as described and I've set her up with a second hard drive to store all the recordings.  If you've never set up port forwarding and changed settings on your router, it may be difficult at first.  Seeing as i have done this numerous times, everything worked like a charm.  I recommend use DHCP, but once your router assigns the camera(s) an IP address, make it static so it is linked with that mac address.  so no matter what happens to the camera, when it reconnects, no other device will take its IP address.  Wireless signal seemed fine, but she has a small place with a very open floor plan so i never had any concerns on that being an issue.  The quality was as expected since its only 640x480, having a 720p resolution would have been nice but since the main purpose of the cameras are to be a "nanny cam", its fine.  For those who download the app, one feature which is great, is you can zoom in on the image at the time, and if you choose snap-shot or record it will keep the recording/image on your phone.  So hypothetically if you witness a robbery in progress through your cameras, they can steal your computer but you still have the recording handy on your phone/tablet.I liked the cameras so much that I am actually looking to ditch the cameras that came with my home security system and put these in instead!

Reviews.Title: f18910w
Reviews.Author: Thomas M.
Reviews.Content: This a great product, work as is described in the web site.I highly recommend this product, very clear imaging.for recording I have to leave my computer on that's the drawback.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Desmond
Reviews.Content: Received the camera today and right away contacted Foscam Technical Support for help with setting it up. Agent Ralph Mendez had setup the camera within few minutes and I am already using it. Foscam support is excellent and very knowledgeable. Picture quality was great and I can't wait to buy an additional camera for other rooms.

Reviews.Title: great technical support
Reviews.Author: Gertraude Warren
Reviews.Content: Camera is pretty easy to connect and use and technical support was fast and very helpful!The images are clear and and it needs no additional software to use.

Reviews.Title: F18910W
Reviews.Author: daryl
Reviews.Content: This camera works great and the tech support was fabulous. Will be purchasing two more cameras. Would recommend this camera. Cameras picture is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to get set up
Reviews.Author: RocklandAussies
Reviews.Content: I spent numerous days trying to get this set up.  Tech support was able to get it on the network but, blamed carrier (internet provider) for port forwarding not working.  Changed carriers and it still does not work.  Very difficult!  Great while at home on the network.  Great pan and tilt, does not zoom as promised though unless on a smart phone, and night vision is good.  Only 1 way audio not 2 way as promised.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer care
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Bradley from foscam digital technologies was very patient in answering all my questions and with helping me with set up my foscam.  I am very pleased with foscams remote assistance and customer service.Thanks Foscam!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Weekend IT
Reviews.Content: I called for support on Saturday morning and although the wait was long (~60 minutes) when I finally did reach someone (Ralph Mendez) he was very helpful.  We ran through the quick diagnostics and determined that the camera was dead and I should email Foscam for an RMA replacement.  This is the second replacement in 4 months.  The cameras are nice if they stop failing.

Reviews.Title: Serves as baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: Zakatronics
Reviews.Content: We use this camera at home to keep an eye on our eye as opposed to a baby monitor. Advantages are being able to use the iPad or any one of our phones along with the Foscam app to watch him.The regular image during the day is great, infrared is also pretty good. Mind you, its not HD both ways but still serves its purposes and has a pretty nice image. My wife and I were impressed.The only thing I would have changed is the interface to set it up. It's very "old school" for lack of a better explanation. Needs to have some sort of Setup Wizard to make installing it on your network a breeze. Luckily my tech skills are almost top notch and I can manage but for others who aren't, might be a pain in the neck. DDNS needs to be simpler allowing people to just set it all up through a Foscam app perhaps or through their site. DDNS basically means being able to view it even while away from home so long as its connected to your network.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great for the price. You can have the camera email you whenever motion is detected or set it to record continuously. The quality of the color picture is good. The camera will reset automatically if the power goes out, and no PC is needed other than initial setup. Once set up, you can unplug and move it from room to room. Just plug it back in and it goes back online. Only thing that would make it better is if you could mount it outdoors. But set it up by a window and it records outside activity just fine.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: It definitely works.  It took me a while to figure out how to hook it up via wi-fi, but I found a youtube video that had a very simple explanation.  I followed the instructions that came with the camera, and downloaded the software for it.  The instructions were very easy to follow.  The only thing I had to do that is not mentioned in there is once the wi-fi router info (name, password) are programmed in the camera, unplug the camera and then take out the ethernet cable.  After that, plug the camera back in and the wi-fi should take over.  If you let the camera reboot and leave the ethernet cable in, it will take over and you won't get a wi-fi connection.I tried to call their customer support.  It was difficult to understand the person I was talking to and they wanted me to download software on my computer so they could have access to my computer in order to help.  I was not comfortable with that, and did not continue the call.  And as said, I was able to figure it out.  If I can do it, anyone can.  I'm no computer expert and it was easy.
