Just a little online research to help!!!

Reviews.Title: What I always wanted!
Reviews.Author: Drew "Drew"
Reviews.Content: I bought a $200 surveillance camera that connected to my VCR several years ago, I always wanted something that connected to my laptop to allow me to record in digital format. This was my dream come true.  Plus it's remote viewing AND you can control the position of the camera. I LOVE IT!I've only had it for a couple weeks but it's been great. Let me preface that I haven't tried to use it past my cable modem, i.e. outside my local router. That's a cool feature as well, but not what I need.I pulled it out of the box, connected it to my router, installed software and BAM! I had access to the camera.  Then I configured for wireless and put the camera in the front window and had remote control. It was very easy. If you can set up a router, you can set up this camera (at least for local viewing).I've been recording my property for the past two weeks and I love it. How nice not to have to use a VCR to review video.I have a question however, is there a way to schedule recording aside from motion detection or alarms?  This is my only issue to date. I'd like to be able to record while I'm away and schedule it. I can always use some macro that clicks on record, then clicks off record and schedule that on my computer.There were a few issues setting it up, namely it didn't initially say what the admin password was in the manual which it later revealed. Also, I hide the SSID on my router and I had to give that up to use this camera. I wasn't happy about that, but at least it's password protected.Also, the IR night vision is amazing, but you really can't use it through a window which is what I wanted.Overall 5 stars. For $80 this made me very happy. Just what I wanted. I may get another for the backyard!  Good quality so far.WARNING: If you have an older router, I had a Cisco wireless-G router, this camera will mess up your router. When I turned on the camera and then turned on my computer, the computer would not recognize the router. I replaced the router with a new wireless-N and it works like a charm now.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Garron Cotham
Reviews.Content: We've installed two of these at a local business and were really pleased with the versatility of this little camera.  The audio works great as long as you aren't too far from the wireless gateway and the ability to pan and tilt the camera remotely was a huge BONUS for our customer.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Michael Cotsenmoyer
Reviews.Content: So the Foscam requires a bit of technical knowhow, but it works great! We are able to use all our devices for viewing and controlling it. Android users beware: you will need to use the default password. Maybe it's just me, but the android app will not recognize the new user ID-PW I gave our cam.

Reviews.Title: Perfect low-cost Baby Video Monitor.
Reviews.Author: Noah Fleming "Noah Fleming"
Reviews.Content: We use this in our house to watch our babies. These cameras were VERY easy to set up. I can watch and control from every apple product in our house from iPad to iPhone to iMac.Night vision is great. I had concerns about the small red lights being bothersome. They don't really emit any light that would bother you. Our two and a half year old toddler doesn't even notice.Would highly recommend and buy again.

Reviews.Title: Network Camera
Reviews.Author: James Johnsen
Reviews.Content: Works perfect.  Easy to setup and install.  Brought online wired for initial setup then shifted to wireless.  The optics are acceptable but I will get another with higher resolution.  This is a great starter network camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: RobP
Reviews.Content: I had a little difficulty with the set up so I called the toll free Foscam number (800 930 0949).  Sandra was my customer service rep and she did a wonderful job.  She had the ability to securely take control of my PC, proceeded to provide the full configuration and then walked me through loading the app on my iPhone.  Overall, a great product with intuitive controls and excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy these unless you have a master's in technology!
Reviews.Author: Holly Heaven
Reviews.Content: Bought these per my son's suggestion but found them impossible to set up. They were ok for him because he has amaster's in technology. Finally my other son who also has a master's in technology was able to set them up and getthem integrated with my iphone but there are continuous problems with them (I have 4) Also they suck the livingdaylights out of your cell phone battery and I am always having to charge. If you are a plain Jane or Joe with justan average knowledge of technology, don't try setting these up----very complex, and the CD they send with itis made by a foreign woman who is difficult to understand. Would not buy them if I knew all this.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Alex Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Irish from foscam customer service was very helpful. He went through all the steps for setting up both of my foscam wireless ip cameras. Foscam FI8910W is a great overall camera for what we use it for. It makes our family aware of whats going on inside our home.

Reviews.Title: yay for wifi
Reviews.Author: Greg Fridder "Fridder"
Reviews.Content: Works well, picture quality is acceptable my only gripe with this is the built in speaker seems very quite, but plugging into a speaker, it works good, i like it

Reviews.Title: The camera works, but not the router...
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I was able to set-up the camera with the wired connection. The wireless connection was trickier, but I eventually got it. Currently, it works if I view it from within my home network, but not when I try to view from outside internet connections. I guess the AT&T; router didn't really open any ports.

Reviews.Title: Excellent resolution. App support could be better.
Reviews.Author: rajeshmathew "cmrj"
Reviews.Content: Sometime back I had a camera earlier which had terrible resolution and a great Android app. (Dont remember the brand)This one is awesome in terms of resolution. I give it 4 stars only because they could improve on the app support. As other reviewers state, there are good apps out there, but really, the manufacturers should be providing high quality apps with these devices nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: very good item as described, working 24/7 for more than 2 months,alarm email working well, audio tow way perfectly.easy to setup. comes with a free Dydns for 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera. Easy to use/setup and well priced
Reviews.Author: Pravin Pathak "Pravin Pathak"
Reviews.Content: I am using it for a month now.. Video Quality is good. Works well with IE and Chrome.  Access remotely is easy once ports are forwarded on firewall.  I took out one star as Audio gives problem. It does not work remotely.  It works locally. May be I will restore it if I get audio solution. I am also not able to access remotely from Andriod phones yet. Will update once done.Camera is small and cute. Night vision is quite good,

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: Reason I bought this camera:The price and functionality of this camera are excellent. I was appalled at the cost of baby monitors. I was very pleased to find a camera for a fraction of the cost that was also able to allow remote access. My husband travels for work often and it'll be nice that he can check in on the baby when he's away. As she gets older, the remote pan/tilt feature will prove useful for when she can get out of bed on her own.Experience with this camera: I like that I can use the monitor in color during the day or black/white night. The sound on the monitor is excellent.Experience with customer service:I am NOT technologically savvy and I was able to set up the camera through my wireless router to be shown on my laptop. I followed the directions for the default user name and password. After install, I decided that I wanted to change the user name and password to make my camera more secure. This is where I hit a roadblock. I couldn't log in to the camera properly after that.... and it was all my fault. I called customer service and they were able to restore everything for me. However, after the call, I tried changing the password again and encountered the same problem.I called back and spoke with another representative. She was able to restore everything a second time and then I asked if she would stay on the line while I attempted to change the password again. She asked me to type slowly to ensure that I wasn't mistyping something. I type very quickly and it was only when I did every letter individually that I was able to discover my error. In the user settings (where you change your password), you can only enter a limited number of characters, but the log-in allows you to enter more characters. Basically, I thought I was making my password something longer than it would allow. Once I realized that the characters were limited, I was able to log-in properly.I haven't set up the camera on my iPhone yet (I need to call my cable provider to open a port, whatever that means). However, the customer service person was able to tell me exactly how I could set it up on my own.Overall, I'm very pleased with this camera and the money I saved in choosing it over monitors that are marketed strictly as baby monitors. I've been telling all my mommy friends about it! I don't have anything to compare it to, as this is my first child. However, I know that I can use it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and use. Great stuff and affordable costs
Reviews.Author: Edwin Kang
Reviews.Content: The setup for this product is easy as there is a very detailed instructions provided. It can be used with a variety of apps from both android and iphone. configurations for these apps is also a breeze.Cons.need to apply for dns service to configure of internet use (monitoring from outside your home). It was said to be free setup in the instructions but not so when i proceeded with the setup so i exited and used the cam in private mode (restrict to use within home wifi).

Reviews.Title: Smart & esasy to manage and install
Reviews.Author: Saeid Maghdouri
Reviews.Content: I would recommend for an easy application and Monitoring your space from everywhere. Is a great IP camera for indoor

Reviews.Title: Comparison between FI8910W and FI9821W - Returned the FI8910W
Reviews.Author: TimCO
Reviews.Content: Returned my FI8910W to Amazon and bought the FI9821W, here's why:FI8910W Cons• My Foscam FI8910W consistently crashed and rebooted when panning to/from very dark to very bright areas. The Foscam fix was to significantly lower the brightness and contrast which resolved the issue but ruined the image quality. This was on the latest firmware as of 7/1/13.• The quality and size of the image were poor when viewed on my 1080p laptop display.• Panning was slow and choppy.• The web server didn't provide any SSL support. All credentials and data were passed unencrypted.• Ethernet cable provided was flat and recoiled into a spool making it only good for setup. You’ll need a real cable if you want to go wired.• Provided DDNS solution makes cameras easily detected on the internet.FI8910W Pros• The web interface was intuitive and easy to use.• The interface provided the ability to rename default users and to define multiple user classes (i.e. admin, power user, view only).• Software provided the ability to rename device and define ports.• I was able to quickly setup apps for my Android phone. I ended up buying “IP Cam Viewer” after trying several tools.• Wireless worked well and connected easily.• The included hardware mount and software mirror/flip options provided many possible orientations.• Field of view on the FI8910W more narrow than the FI9821W. I preferred the FI9810W view.• Web interface worked well with IE10 and Chrome.• Software provided the ability to disable the built in LED.• IR worked very well even in complete darkness.If you’re not frequently panning from light to dark, you don’t intend to expose the web server to the internet  and you’re OK with the resolution, this might be a good solution or you. However, the constant crashing and image quality were deal breakers for me. I ended up ordering (and keeping) the FI9821W. Check out the Amazon page for the FI9821W to see my review of it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!
Reviews.Author: Colby Ward "review monkey"
Reviews.Content: My husband originally purchased this as a home security cam for when we go on vacations. But we wanted to test it out and put it in our baby's room...well it has never moved from his room. I was looking at video monitors for his room for awhile and this one works as well as any I had seen, for half of the price. Also gives us the ability to check on him when we are out to dinner/movie/etc while he is home with grandpa or sitters, right from our smartphone. There is an app you can download that gives you the ability to actually listen and speak to him from your cell phone while out, or adjust the camera angle. Excellent product! We still use the regular sound monitor as well because I don't want to leave my cell screen on all night, but it works great! Excellent video quality...plus the ability to add cameras and record.

Reviews.Title: Does What it says
Reviews.Author: Skinner "Skinner"
Reviews.Content: Purchased,followed directions but had some problem getting wireless aspect working. First call to Foscam was frustrating as I was connected to a customer support rep. that was unhelpful. With my second call to Foscam Tech Support I spoke with a representative by the name, Christina, who was able to get the wireless recognized with a port change. As a result of her friendly and courteous assistance I would recommend to others. A product that works just as advertised and a support team, that if you dig deep enough, is competent. Nice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Use this outside under our porch for wildlife viewing. Holds up well under the outside covered porch. have actually since purchased another. has great color day images, and great IR for night vision, easily reaches 15-20 ft . Easy setup to network, and works well with some of the free iOS apps. would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works with Vera controller without setup
Reviews.Author: XiMiX
Reviews.Content: Looks like they sold so many of this camera based on many reviews.It really is easy to setup because they do not give that many options. It takes less than 15 minutes even if you want to setup everything, and much of the time is wasted on the camera to boot-up, especially because changing some options make it reboot.If you use Micasavera controller, it will find this camera on its own and it is immediately accessible, even remotely. Vera handles the port and security portion, so there is no need to change anything on the camera unless you want its own alerting.This is an OEM camera and Foscam is just one of the name. You can find it much cheaper under another name, though you may want to burn-in a more recent firmware. Stick with this Foscam if you don't know what this means.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value and quality
Reviews.Author: J. Ragan
Reviews.Content: Been using Foscam for years and am now up to about a dozen of these units.  Use them for keeping an eye on vacation homes, animals, etc and they work great!

Reviews.Title: Awsome Deal!
Reviews.Author: Jarrett A Miller
Reviews.Content: I Love That I Can Be Anywhere I Go And Still Got My Eye On My Stuff!The Best feature Is That Its Is A Rotating On The Go Camara!Rated @ 5 Stars!Foscam Has The Best Support Team!Thank You Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Richard Wagner
Reviews.Content: The service i received was very very good. The camera I bought was also excellent. I would recommend this camera to my friends and co workers.

Reviews.Title: Has to be the best WiFi camera I have used
Reviews.Author: B. Vincik
Reviews.Content: We use it to monitor our baby in the crib and to watch our cat when we are gone.  It has been rock solid as well as the preview Foscam device I have.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!!!
Reviews.Author: Johl Light
Reviews.Content: We got these as a replacement to our Summer Infant Video Monitor system we had for 2 1/2 years after the first one died and we ordered another system and it died after 3 months of having it.We started with only one camera as we read the reviews and were a little nervous.  They are very easy to setup and work well.  We have an android phone and an iOS phone and I was able to get them setup to view on both without to many problems.  The remote view can be temperamental at times as it does drop but it usually comes back fairly quick.  On the android we are using IP CAM VIEWER PRO and on the Iphone we are using Foscam Surveillance Pro.We have ordered 2 more of these which came today and I will write a separate review on those.Update:Did not realize that this was for all my cameras so I wanted to add the feedback since I setup the others.  We now have 3, 2 working and 1 being returned and replaced as the unit is bad.The 2 working ones are all setup and work great together and I can view both in both android and iOS apps!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the $$$$
Reviews.Author: John P Braglia
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. Works great over iPhone.Not bad video and audio. Firmware upgrades have improved it's performance.

Reviews.Title: Great product.  Customer service very helpful
Reviews.Author: Douglas Waage
Reviews.Content: Set up wired very quickly but wireless setup was tougher.  After a few tries I called tech support and they had it working in 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great Nightvision
Reviews.Author: Shawn Patrick "Shawn Patrick"
Reviews.Content: The Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera is a great piece of technology, though I think it's a bit overpriced and setting up the camera to view from outside the network is a task I have yet to accomplish. But the camera has a brilliant and clear picture in bright light, low light and no light. The infrared lights on here are fantastic. I hope to come back later and add to this mini-review once I figure out the settings (the voodoo I have to create) to allow me to view it remotely from outside of my home network. for now it's a 3 out of 5 simply because of the issues I'm having setting it up and the lack of resources available to the public from Foscam with regard to setting up this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: James Christensen
Reviews.Content: We use this as a baby monitor and it is great. The night vision is very clear. I recommend the FOSCAM Pro app by Logic Consulting LLC it has worked great on both my iPhone and iPad and adds some neat functionality. (The cost of the App when I bought it was around six dollars).Bang for the buck this is one of the best electronics purchases I have made.

Reviews.Title: A day in the life of my dogs!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have two little dogs at home and I like to be able to watch them when I'm away, I just want to make sure they are okay. (Yes I am one of those over-protective pet-mommies!) I originally bought the Cisco WVC80N but since it didn't pan or tilt I had to buy 4 just to cover half of the blind spots in the room and my dogs like to wander, so at $100 each that was getting too expensive, plus they didn't have 2 way audio, just one way and no night vision. Then I saw this Foscam and since it had good reviews I decided to give it a try. I absolutely love it!Setup was a breeze and I had it working in under a minute (i'm a bit of an electronics geeks so this may not be an average time estimate).The interface is easy to use and gives you multiple options to access the camera feed based on the browser you are using. I've tried it with IE, Firefox, and Chrome and IE gives you the most features (due to ActiveX) but I swear the resolution is better with Firefox (this could be because the image is slightly smaller and so it just appears better quality).I'm not overly thrilled with the Foscam Android app, as it didn't have controls to move the camera but it does have the 2 way audio. However there are plenty of other IP cam apps out there that you can use to control it, I use IPCamViewer Basic.The audio isn't the best, there tends to be feedback when you try to use the microphone while listening to the audio through speakers but its clear enough that my dogs seem to recognize my voice. I used it during a recent thunderstorm to calm my dogs while I was at work.The highest resolution the camera has is 640x480 which isn't the best but its good enough. There is a higher resolution camera from Foscam (I think its the 9810?) that looks like this one for $100 more but for my purposes, and probably most peoples purposes, this resolution is fine. Even in night vision mode the resolution is still pretty decent (at least for a network camera). And by the way night vision mode is awesome! I can easily make out my little pups when they are hiding in the dark corner when the world outside gets too scary.Overall I can't say enough good things about this camera. I highly recommend it, for its price point I think its one of the best on the market. Though a warning to all pet parents who have nosy animals, make sure you put it up high. When I first got the camera (before I mounted it) I set it on a high table and one of my dogs found it and started sticking his face into the camera and even now that i've mounted it I find him frequently staring directly into the camera. :-)

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera so far
Reviews.Author: Jayden17 "JD"
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera a week however I absolutely love it so far. I was able to get it setup on my wifi network in about 20 minutes. From there it took me about 2 hours to do port forwarding, get the dns mapped at no-ip.com and get it mounted in the position I wanted, which is upside down on the ceiling in a nursery - which was all fun to do anyway. I haven't had any issues with it besides the preset positions don't seem to want to work, but that's not really an issue for me anyway. I like the smoothness of the pan/tilt - it moves quite smoothly and adjusts to changing lighting conditions on the fly. I can go from viewing the crib in the nusery with low lighting to looking out the window at my front stairs and it adjusts quite quickly. The motion detection and alarm options work quite well too. I played with them and had pictures emailed to myself when it detected motion - very nice for security, but I don't need this option right now.I bought the Foscam Android app for $3 which complements this quite nicely. Now I can view the camera from anywhere on my phone, tablet or laptop. The picture quality is much better than expected and the IR cut is nice. Overall I'm very pleased with this camera. I might buy a few more and setup a video security system in my house with the Blue Iris software.

Reviews.Title: Good quality video
Reviews.Author: Thomas Pope
Reviews.Content: Well made unit. Good color quality. Too bad it has to work with port forwarding. Not easy for a layperson to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Bad audio
Reviews.Author: ed dematteo
Reviews.Content: Cam picture looks good but audio is real bad  try a different name for better sound ,set up was good

Reviews.Title: Really good and easy
Reviews.Author: Kat lim Ruiz Kuan
Reviews.Content: Good quality, good software, audio in only when using a pc which was unexpected but logical. Comes with wifi which is great.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, not bad for the price but picture quality is lacking
Reviews.Author: Steph
Reviews.Content: This cam was really easy to setup. You do have to have a little know how about your particular router however if you want to setup remote view. All in all this ai exactly what I was looking for. The picture quality could be better and a zoom feature would be nice. The audio and video come in great on my iPhone while I'm at work.

Reviews.Title: JUNK....
Reviews.Author: Edward P. Callahan "ECallahan"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a few months now. When it works it is great. The problem is it reboots every couple of minutes or so. The motion record function is great, when the camera is not resetting. It resets more than it works. Before you buy google "Foscam 8910 rebooting". Read and you will find out there is NO FIX!! I wish i was told by someone about this before I spent the money on it. Id rather spend more to have a camera that works.

Reviews.Title: Baby gift
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a baby gift so I hope they like it. My daughter recommended it to me. She loves hers.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cameras
Reviews.Author: Barbara Bosco
Reviews.Content: These are the best cameras ever.The support from the company is perfect and always availabe.I highly recommend these cameras to anyone who has a need to use them in any monitoring situation.!

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: JC-Reviews
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent. I had a little trouble setting it up on our second router, but I called tech support and they were excellent. I highly recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Camera keeps rebooting!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I got this camera last week in hopes of getting a "Higher Quality" wireless camera; I was wrong.  I do like the color and clarity of this camera, but it keeps rebooting when I connect to it remotely.  During this reboot, the camera does a full range of movement test which takes about 45 seconds.  I have 2 WansView cameras (bought on Amazon) that were half the price and have been working well for a while.  The thing I don't like about them is the firmware isn't updated and Customer Service is non-existent.Now, the reboot issue was there out of the box, I upgraded to the latest firmware, still happens.  Customer Support says it's a known issue.  I ask, if it's known, why not address the issue, No Reply.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Neo
Reviews.Content: After testing a couple D-Link stationary cams, I ran across this Foscam model and have since purchased four of them for remote monitoring in my home. The setup did take some time to figure out but once I did the others I purchased were easy to connect to my network. I would definitely recommend this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: So Far Very Good
Reviews.Author: sb "sb"
Reviews.Content: I'm not great with computers - I get it but don't have a lot of time to spare - but I was able to connect it to wi-fi in my home with no incident.  I did not attempt the port forwarding - seemed complex. I plan to download the Blue Iris software for that.  I bought this to replace my Samsung baby monitor (see my other review). that I paid twice as much for. Compared to the baby monitor this thing has an outstanding picture. The night vision is so clear! The tilt and pan are fabulous for tracking my son if he is playing and moving around the room. The mounting is decent, enough cord to keep the unit far out of reach (important if your child is old enough and curious).  The cons are the red lights for the infra red could upset my son if he wakes up - so far he has not complained. Also, the audio has a delay and the 2 way audio has interference and is useless. Because of the audio delay I bought a simple audio monitor (see my Motorola review) for nighttime in case my little one cries.  At one AM I am not going to examine the video anyway. I plan to update the review once I implement the Blue Iris and iPad App.  I want to see my son while I"m at work. If that works out, I will raise my rating from 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: CK
Reviews.Content: The camera quality it good. It has many features and when i had a little difficulty, i called Foscam and they were very helpful.  got me up and working fast.  Recommend definately.

Reviews.Title: New Foscam set up
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Got the Foscam for the turning feature to better watch the house. The wireless connection part was tricky at first, but Christina at tech support was great and helped us out. All up and running now!!!

Reviews.Title: Worked as Expected
Reviews.Author: Ken Stapley
Reviews.Content: I got the camera in just a few days.  I already had one so I knew what I was getting.  The cameras are easy to set up.  I am using them for an alarm system in my home.  I like the fact they are cheap, and you don't have to pay a monthly service fee.  When I arm them they send me pictures in emails, which come to my phone, of what is setting them off.  Also, I have them hooked up to my android so I can watch the video live if I want to.  They work perfect with your android, so you can do everything you want from anywhere, including arming them if you forget to arm them before you leave home.

Reviews.Title: F18910W
Reviews.Author: Carol A. NIlsen
Reviews.Content: We purchased these camera's to help us watch our mom in her apartment - we are very pleased and would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Love these cameras
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Not the highest quality picture but still a great buy. Plan on buying more for the rest of the house. Also works as a great baby room camera.

Reviews.Title: Not plug and play
Reviews.Author: Don G Purvis
Reviews.Content: Way too much effort to get working and spotty performance since. Will come on once, then just stop working. Regret the decision to buy this for sure.

Reviews.Title: A good security camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas Wman
Reviews.Content: This is IMHO the best value for the dollar of all security cameras available in 640X480.  I have 3 of them and one of theHD models.  Support is good and even though I messed up the firmware upgrade on the HD camera they arecovering it under warranty.  Foscam US is a good group to deal with and they offer a good forum for those of usinterested in the inner workings of the camera.

Reviews.Title: First day worked, the next day it stopped..
Reviews.Author: WilliamEks
Reviews.Content: I bought this cam keeping in mind all those positive reviews about it so i gave it a try and let me tell you this, be ready to have it working perfectly the first day or few first days and the next is bunch of headache!!!Mine worked the first few hours actually, i went to bed and the next day, all i did was plug the power back in and this is what i got:No WiFi connection so i had to wire it (very annoying if you have little kids at home) and even then, in the IP Camera Tool program the camera showed up, then disappeared, then showed up again, so i double click it, the web browser window pops up, shows the whole 3 Log In ways, i used Server Push (chrome browser) and all works nice, until you touch the pan buttons; the video goes black, but the cam responds to controls and moves, but no video.Then, i close it all and try to launch it again, but its nowhere in sight.Light is solid Green, router sees the cam, it has it's own IP, like i said, it worked like a charm first day (few hours) and the next is game over.Listen, take it from me, dont settle for the amount of reviews this or any cam has, anything below $150 is basically junk and headache.P.S.support of this product is horrible, even on the Foscam.us forum, there are no clear answers and asking one is like asking uncle Sam to give you a tax break..

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Deified Texan
Reviews.Content: Super easy to setup. It is a clean picture and the camera rotate feature is awesome.No negatives. I am buying another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam
Reviews.Author: Mfrancks
Reviews.Content: I received the camera in the mail and placed a call to Foscam tec support to help set it up. Calvin Harris with Foscam was my tec support guy and he walked me through every step to get it working perfectly. It was very easy with his help.

Reviews.Title: The machine seems to work great.
Reviews.Author: Ken Nechiporenko
Reviews.Content: But I am not a techie, so the instructions to connect it to the internet were a bit complicated and confusing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and great product
Reviews.Author: Atul
Reviews.Content: I just bought a new camera and seems like a really good product and ability to view on phone, computer remotely. The customer service was excellent and Sandra who was the remote service agent helping install was outstanding and able to get it done quickly in few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Dan M. Ondler
Reviews.Content: This does what is claimed.  The connection was pretty easy and it came with a nifty cable to set up the initial settings.  There were free available apps (not included but easily downloaded) for the iPod (Apple TM) and Kindle (another TM) which allow viewing and control wirelessly.  Pretty cool.  The Kindle had the best picture.  I bought for my daughter as a baby cam.  You can pick up sounds and it automatically switches to IR for pretty good night vision when the sun sets.  It really has loads of features, too numerous to mention, e.g. motion detection alarms, etc.  I thought it was definitely the best deal for the money and Amazon is an approved seller so the warranty is valid.

Reviews.Title: Novice says: Works OK but setup is tricky & no sound on Mac
Reviews.Author: you "you"
Reviews.Content: Just received mine today. Ordered via Amazon (sold and fulfilled by Amazon). Foscam now states that they do consider Amazon to be an authorized reseller, so at least that is an improvement from the past.My computer is an iMac running OSX 10.8.4. My router was made by Netgear.Setup:-I followed the instructions and plugged the camera into my router with ethernet wire supplied. Plugged in power cable also.-Installed the IP Camera Tool software (provided on the CD) onto my iMac. Logged into the camera via the software and everything looked good. Next, I needed to unplug the wire to set it up for wireless use on my home network.-First step of "specifying an http port number" other than 80 was fairly simple. Keep in mind that I really don't know what they mean by all the "port" talk. I just followed the instructions and everything went smoothly at this point.-My internet service supplier (Comcast) gives me a "static IP address", i.e. it always stays the same number no matter when I use my computer. So I could skip all of the DynamicIP Address stuff. I think that made it a lot easier for me.-At this point, the badly written installation manual makes it seem like you might be done, but no. Onward...-Next step was "port forwarding", whatever that means. The tricky thing here (for novices) is that the manual just says "login to the router". Uhh...what the hell? How do I do that?! No instructions. (At this point, the techy people reading this review are slapping their foreheads and/or getting a cramp from laughing).-I finally figured out how to get logged into my Netgear router by going to Netgear's website.-Then I followed the instructions to setup "port forwarding".At that point, I could get on the internet and go to the correct URL (they explain how to figure this out) and see the camera's view. Everything worked ok.Before I went any further, I used the IP Camera Software again to change the password for the camera. (the default is no password which did not sound very secure).So far, so good. Only problem is that when you use a Mac computer to view the camera, you can not hear any audio. After doing some research on the internet, there seems to be no way to solve this problem at this point.BUT the good news is that if you use the iCam app on your iPhone or iPad (like I do) then you will be able to hear the audio and see the video as well as control the pan/tilt of the camera.So for me, everything works fine, but it was a bit of a headache to set it up. The installation manual needs a thorough re-write by a NATIVE ENGLISH SPEAKER who tests the process each step of the way. Note that this is different than getting a native English speaker to brush up the grammar on the badly written manual. There needs to be a much simpler logic and flow written into the installation manual. Amazing that Foscam can not figure this out yet after thousands of complaints on Amazon.Finally, I just want to say that I feel there are hundreds of fake reviews here on Amazon for this product. Typically they are short, give 5 stars, and mention what great tech support they received from Mary, Lisa, Juan, etc. Another Amazon reviewer mentioned that it appears these fake reviews are being done by Foscam's tech support staff overseas. I am not sure if these allegations are true, but they sound genuine to me. In my view, if this is true, these fraudulent reviews must be stopped and past ones must be deleted by Foscam/Amazon. This is serious unethical behavior! Minus one star on this review as a penalty.Summary, it's a 4 star product with a 2 star installation manual for an average of 3 stars, BUT minus one star for unethical fake reviews allegedly by Foscam tech support staff. Total = 2 stars.

Reviews.Title: a little tricky install - but it's great now
Reviews.Author: Nurse Susan
Reviews.Content: Was a little tricky to set up on my high speed DSL - but I found good instructions at another website and bam - it works great!  If you have DSL - and you want a security system- with video and sound and one that will email you when it detects motion - for under about $75 - this is an incredible deal. I am going to add a couple more - to different locations including one outside.

Reviews.Title: Christina Rocks! Really nice camera, too.
Reviews.Author: David Anderson
Reviews.Content: I managed to get the Foscam to work on my home Intranet fairly easily but struggled deciphering how to install it for remote viewing. In the end, I was told that I had set it all up correctly BUT you cannot test remotely when you are still on your own Intranet(duh). I called the 1-800 Foscam service line, got through quickly, and talked to Christina (in India) who was both professional and tech savvy. She took control of my PC and worked out one little error on my part, then informed me about the 'catch' above. Thank you, Christina.

Reviews.Title: Technician
Reviews.Author: Renee Kay
Reviews.Content: The camera is wonderful and i am technical impaired. JEES was the technician that helped me and he was so very helpful and knowledgable.

Reviews.Title: Good but
Reviews.Author: Leen
Reviews.Content: Good control in the home wifi good picture quality BUT if you want to monitor from out side you have to pay monthly with a complicated online registration procedure. If they were clear about this I wouldn't buy this item because my main goal was to monitor my baby with the nanny when I am at work. But i don't want to pay monthly to activate this feature

Reviews.Title: camera fi8910w
Reviews.Author: R.S. "Rick"
Reviews.Content: Camera is a great product at a great price.  I had a bit of trouble installing as I am not computer savvy but the tech support for the camera was absolutely excellent.  Thanks for the help.  Now I can use my camera from anywhere viewing via my iphone.  I recommend this camera to anyone looking for a quality camera at a great price

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support for IP cam's
Reviews.Author: jimejoe
Reviews.Content: I just got some great help with my Foscam FI8910w IP cam's setup with Andrew at tech support, alot of help +++++ Great cam's too

Reviews.Title: Great video quality!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I would consider myself very technologically literate and I would say the set-up process on this camera to view remotely or upload images is very advanced. Be warned that it may take some time to figure out the steps, otherwise you just plug this thing in and you can see your video on screen almost right away!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Ryezen
Reviews.Content: Once I got it setup, which actually wasn't very difficult, this camera worked perfectly.  Even after a long power outage, it worked flawlessly even I went to view it with my Android app afterwards.  Only reason it didn't get four stars is that with two different cameras, the internal speaker stopped working the first day.  Plugging in an external speaker works perfectly and sounds better, anyhow.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Dan Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! I love being able to check up on my house while I'm away. Fairly easy to set up and works great. Wish the company would make an app specifically for their products but the apps that are on the market do everything they need to for a small fee.

Reviews.Title: Bad issue with light sensitive on motion alarm
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: I was using this camera for security but found out I kept getting motion alarms when the sun goes in or out from behind clouds. I set the sensitivity to every setting but they keep going off. I also check the box for motion compensate but no effect, still alarms. I emailed the company and they said yes it was very sensitive to light changes and will set off the motion alarm. I was going to use these models (F18918W & F18910W) for security when out of town but can't due to constant alarms when the sun goes in or out.I would not recommend this product due to the motion alarm issue.If you use this product at night it might be OK.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: Andrew,Was very patient and helped me with setting up my camera on both the Ipad and set me up for access from my phone. Very helpful walking me through the steps.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: HamDude
Reviews.Content: I have 8 Swann surveillance cameras around the exterior of my house and this Foscam camera has some much better video quality then all of my Swann cameras.  If I had the funding I would replace all my Swann cameras with these Foscam cameras.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Suzan Murphy "S Murphy"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 4 months and so far so good. It is mounted outside up under the eaves where it is protected from any direct sunlight and it cannot get wet when it rains. The setup was a tiny bit confusing but I have it setup wirelessly thru my Apple airport router. Managed to get the port forwarding done so am able to view the camera when away from home. The 2-way audio works ok. Found the best camera viewing software on the computer is Blue Iris and on my iPhone is Live Cam Pro from Eggman Technologies Inc. The color image when viewing is good, with decent area viewable at night with the IR. There is an IR turnoff if you have night lighting and don't need the IR on. Going to purchase another one to replace a less expensive camera that does not have the 2-way audio built in. Would recommend this camera based on the price. Just remember to turn on the wireless when setting up the camera for the first time.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Jordan Weiss
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent!  I use it to watch my dog when out of the house and love that it allows me to talk to her as well.  Foscam's support is absolutely wonderful as well.  I'd highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Setup support
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Calvin helped me set up the Foscam 8910W and it was great! He got it up and running very fast and helped me understand how to change the password and set up the iphone app as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great tech support from Foscam!
Reviews.Author: nespaky
Reviews.Content: Really like camera features and capabilities to see what's going on from anywhere in the world! Foscam tech support was great in assisting me with the installation and everything is running great! Would definitely recommend for indoor and outdoor monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended, best priced camera
Reviews.Author: F. Ong
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best PT, night capable camera available. It's being used to monitor relatives out of state to ensure they're okay. With the pan/tilt it can provide coverage across most of the living areas. video quality is okay, not HD but it provides just what is needed to monitor the home to ensure all is good. And it can't be beat for price.Nightshot video is adequate and a good bonus since theirs no other camera available at this price with these features. Monitoring can be done via free android apps or paid iOS apps so as long as you have an internet connection, wifi or cell, it can be used to monitor your home via your phone.

Reviews.Title: Great IP camera, not so great setup!
Reviews.Author: Schleppy
Reviews.Content: I have two of these cameras, and they are really pretty great, especially considering the price. If you are planning on using this camera hard wired over ethernet, it should work VERY well for you.If you want to use these cameras wirelessly (as I currently do), be prepared for a headache. These cameras are very particular about the type of wireless encryption used and the wireless channel you are on. They also don't seem to get along with 5ghz Wifi networks. The wireless settings section on the camera itself is also pretty unintuitive, and takes a few tries to get the settings to really "stick".Once you get through the wireless setup headaches though, the camera really does work well.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: KMBSM "Kathy"
Reviews.Content: I needed help with setting up the camera on the internet explorer browser and also to connect it wirelessly. Ralph Mendez was exceptional in helping me and so very patient and kind. He is a great representative for your service. I am very pleased with the camera's quality and sharpness. I highly recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Mary Kendall
Reviews.Content: Called technical help desk and though I waited 18 minutes, once on and talking with Scott, he was able to get me up and going with my wireless access.  Very troublesome at first, but Scott got it to work and he was patient and thorough.

Reviews.Title: Having security without buying the store...
Reviews.Author: 9430CBPAZ
Reviews.Content: They system was easy enough to set up and it works...just trying to tweak out the system if actions I can understand...kinda like a first smart phone

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CAMERA FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: adost
Reviews.Content: I love this thing.. got online and up and running within 10 minutes.The IP tool they give you isn't great, log into your router you will see a hostname of ipcamera_**Login and your good to go.. Great quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Gillette "Sharpie"
Reviews.Content: Got the camera today, easy setup initially, but ran into a problem with setting up wireless.  Called Foscam customer support and received excellent customer service.  Worked through my problem and was able to resolve my problem.  Now I'm on to trying it out.

Reviews.Title: tech. support
Reviews.Author: sassolino
Reviews.Content: Felix, the technician was very competent and resolved my problem within 5 min.I should have called for help 3 hours earlier. Great job

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my use
Reviews.Author: Jacques LHEUREUX
Reviews.Content: I needed to monitor my sick wife remotely and this unit fits the bill and at the right price. I first connected the camera directly to my router via the supplied Ethernet cable, installed the camera s/w that came with it on my Windows 7 system and followed the easy instructions in the manual. It gets an IP address from the router and in my case decided to use a fixed mode (preferable to DHCP as the number will never change). It also asks you for a port number (you pick a number between 1000 and 20,000) which is used later for monitoring from outside your own house network. Write down the IP address of the camera and the port number that you have chosen as you will need it later.I then disconnected the camera from the router, unplugged the power cord and rebooted it. I was then able to place the camera anywhere in the house and see the video on my laptop using a browser. All the camera needs is a power outlet. I added an add-on to my browser and was also able to hear sound from the room where the camera was located and was also able to talk to anyone in the room - with significant delay, but very useable. The is basically a web server. From the webpage that you receive from the camera, you can move the lens left ant right and up and down. If there is not enough light in the room, you can also turn the Infrared mode on. What you see is a B&W; image, even if it is in the middle of the night with the room completely dark. I then tested it using my laptop running Windows Vista and it worked fine. No s/w to install, all you use is your browser (IE, Firefox, Chrome or Safari which you point to the IP address of your camera (more on this later). It also works fine from mobile devices like iPhones, iPads, Android tablets and Android phones. I tried them all. The only things missing from the iOS and Android devices is the audio as no plugin is available for those devices.There are many other services that you can setup (like sending you an email in response to motion or sound in the room). These are not described in the little manual that comes with the camera but are fully described in the User Manual found online for this camera. You can change all these setting from the same web screen where your video shows up.My next step was to add the ability to view the video stream from outside my home network. This setup is well described in the online User Manual. It is simple but involves you logging into your router and set up "Port forwarding" to route traffic coming to your router for this port to go to the internal IP address of your IP Camera.. The support section of the FOSCAM website has lots of information on how to do this. Once you have done this, you can use your IP Camera from anywhere in the word by browsing to http://ww.xx.yy.zz:#### where ww.xx.yy.zz is the IP address for your incoming house connection and #### the port number that you have chosen when you set up the camera and when you set up the port forwarding.This camera is for indoor use only and has worked very well for me. You can have multiple cameras in your house, each one having its own port number and internal IP address.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera and the technical support!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Bertke
Reviews.Content: I just received my Foscam in the mail today and anxiously got started with the installation and set up.  When I had trouble adding my wireless, I contacted the customer support from the number on the instructions.  Scott from Foscam support was on the phone with me for close to 45 minutes.  He set up my remote wireless and then took the time to wakl me through setting up my iphones and ipad for access.  Doing so without him would have taken me a while as I am not computer savy.  I love the tilt and scan of the camera and cannot wait to mount it.  My friend recommended this product and they were correct, it's great!

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: AEP
Reviews.Content: I ordered this based on reviews and tried to set it up on my network.  I couldn't get it connected via wifi so I called support.  The tech support dialed in to my computer and changed my wireless channel width from auto to 20 mhz and it is now working great.  For the price, there probably isn't a better camera out there in terms of options and picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Foscam customer support ROCKS !!!
Reviews.Author: Mrunal
Reviews.Content: I had difficulty in port forwarding as manual was not very clear, if you have multiple devices how to do port forwardingWhen i called FosCam customer care, they resolved in minutes, I Thank Calvin for his wonderful support, he is good at what he is doing and knows how to do port forwarding and setting up the camera.

Reviews.Title: Spend a few extra dollars for this one
Reviews.Author: Clinton Keith
Reviews.Content: A month ago, I purchased a Wansview camera similar to this onehttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003LNZ1L6/ref=oh_details_o08_s00_i00?ie=UTF8&psc;=1and was disappointed enough to give it one star.  I decided to try a Foscam next because I had good luck with an exterior camera I bought a year ago.  I couldn't be more pleased with this one.  I'd give it 10 stars if they'd let me.Setup was very easy, especially considering I'm Mac based, which is usually not supported well.  The options and controls on the web interface are extensive AND intuitive; a rare combination.  The image quality is superb.  I set this up in our kitchen where I wanted a 300 degree view of the interior and a look out the window.  The image adjustment between these very differently lit scenes is accurate and fast.  Nighttime IR is very good as well: contrast is great.I should have spent the 25 dollars more for this one than the Wansview from the start.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Mike-D
Reviews.Content: My wife an I opted for this camera instead of one of the normal baby video monitors mostly because of price, and also because of the flexibility of configuration. If you're not at least somewhat savvy with networking, and IP protocols, this might not be the device for you, but the instructions are pretty straightforward, so if you're willing to learn a little networking, you can do all kinds of fun stuff with this camera.The foscam app that's on the Android / iOS marketplace is complete crap, so don't use it as a purchase point. The web interface works just fine on mobile devices that have a fairly current browser (Chrome on Nexus 7 works great).

Reviews.Title: Video quality is pretty good, but it's not great for iPad or iPhone usage
Reviews.Author: Lemming782
Reviews.Content: We already had an audio monitor and needed video. This was a cheaper way to go than buy a baby video monitor. Setup was not very easy (we never set up audio). But the connection sometimes takes forever (or just doesn't work) on our iPads or iPhones. So when we hear her cry sometimes it's not worth it and we just go into her room anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: aaronc8
Reviews.Content: Substituting two cameras and smart phone use for the baby cams that cost $189+++  The cameras were used and there was nothing wrong with the cameras.  Setup was easy but I am very good with networking....to others setup may be very difficult!Excellent picture quality!Excellent  IR coverage for indoors!Great overall Product

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: Greg Simpson
Reviews.Content: Set it up in minutes and does the job brilliantly.  This is a low cost alternative to the expensive security devices

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM TECH SUPPORT - EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Alvin English
Reviews.Content: I have several of the cameras. They work fine for additional layer of home security along with my alarm system.  Calvin, a tech support at FOSCAM helped me with the setup so that the cams could be accessed remotely.  Now everything is good-to-go for monitoring the house when shopping or away on weekend trips.  The IP cams are an excellent value.  When the cameras are purchased directly from FOSCAM the tech support is free.  I purchased some of them directly from FOSCAM and some from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Does as advertised
Reviews.Author: Paul "PW"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera up and running for about a month now. I don't think that you can purchase a surveillance camera that does all that this one reliably does for the price.I'm giving this only 4 stars because of the documentation. It could be better for sure. I found a couple videos on YouTube that basically showed me how to get it up and running (settings, port forwarding, email/text notifications, Third Party DDNS, etc).So far, it does as advertised. It has reliable motion detection but I am not seeing that it records a steady video stream to your computer or DVR. It can record short video clips (if you use IE for your browser) but you have to leave the application up and running to do so. Not too useful in my case. So if you need or want a video recording, you would likely want a different camera system.One last thing.... the camera requires power so there has to be an outlet close by to plug it into.All in all, I'm happy. I can view the feed from any computer or from my Android app at any time. I get texts and emails with multiple pictures when motion is detected... and no monthly fees from a monitoring company. It does what I need. After experiencing this first camera, I plan to purchase additional cameras to add to my network.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: hnia
Reviews.Content: i had some trouble with this camera at first until i called tech support and talked to a wonderful lady name christina she took her time with me helping me understand my foscam camera she took me step by step i really like this camera works great with my iphone 5 and my ipad 2 thank you so much christina for your help.keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: C. Kable
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up.  Good picture.  Easy to set up emails notification and program settings. Had a problem with internet access from outside the home due to dual routers but Foscam representatives tried hard to help solve the problem.  Even worked with me over the phone to try and resolve. Ended up requireing ISP to do something to fix it but they tried.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: peter gaddy
Reviews.Content: The camera was fairly easy to install and the picture is clear. I'm looking forward to getting another camera (or two) for the house. We are using this one in our daughters room. Well worth the price in my opinion! And viewing from our iPads and iPhones is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Don't be scared. Tech help sets it up for you.
Reviews.Author: Clifford W. Kinnaman "Clifford"
Reviews.Content: Like the title says. I am by no means a whiz but capable in dealing with set up of the Wi-Fi home entertainment gear, printers, etc. That allowed me to get the camera working wireless from my PC. I was totally lost when looking at the set up for connecting via the web. Called tech support and Andrew had me log into Foscam for remote access to my PC. At that point it was just a matter of kicking back and listening to Andrew explain each of the steps as he executed them on my screen. Andrew tested the camera and showed me the web address for logging into the camera. He was kind enough to type up a notes page with that information along with instructions on setting up my iPhone after installing the app and put it on my desktop. Andrew was also so helpful as to open this page for my review which he asked that I include his name. So here I am and this will deserve a follow up because.. I want to see about the motion detector function with an alert sent to my phone. sure other questions will arise.Pros: Don't be silly and worry about set up. They very efficiently do it for you without making you feel like an idiot as some jackass we all know from IT support at work.Cons: Will let you know...

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this product
Reviews.Author: J. Zhao
Reviews.Content: I use it to monitor my nanny during the day when I am at work.  It's easy to install, easy to use, the sound and picture quality is superb.  And on rare occasions when I have to view a dark room it gets the job done.  We will be ordering a second one for when my baby gets moved into her own room.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with even better service
Reviews.Author: jerome
Reviews.Content: I had some difficulty connecting the camera to the internet.  I called Foscam customer service and they had me up and running in no time.  The camera works great as well.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is Great
Reviews.Author: bharris58
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera. Had some issues connecting to wireless. Ryan in the technical support area was able to remote in a connect the camera, as well as set up to ensure I can use remote access and an iphone. He spent time with me to ensure I knew all the next steps of connecting, as well as saving notes in Notepad so I would have documentation to follow. Appreciate the extra effort.

Reviews.Title: For the price, hard to beat
Reviews.Author: pcmojo
Reviews.Content: The included security / dvr software makes these shine, I am able to view / record up to 64 at a time. The resolution is poor, but the pan and tilt work well, and the night vision is decent and ranges less than 15 feet.

Reviews.Title: Seems to work just fine
Reviews.Author: R. Cole
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on my experience with the Higher resolution version of the same camera.The camera has delivered on its promise and everything seems to be working just fine.It think its a good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good price value
Reviews.Author: Mazal "Mazal"
Reviews.Content: After reading the various helpful comments on Amazon I expected a complicated setup. This camera is indeed not for people without patience and basic router set-up experience. However I was surprised that by following the booklet instructions I was able to set up the camera (including remote viewing) within about 90 minutes.... Then suddenly the camera went back to factory settings without touching anything ! I went through the setup again (this time in 20 minutes) and everything works fine. The image quality is good, pan and tilt work fine, but there is no zoom.Anyway, unless the zoom is actually the lens zooming in instead of a digital zoom, zoom is highly overrated .I tried a few Ipad and android apps and I like Foscam pro best, though the free app is good as well.I am going to use my Foscam for a while and see if there are any more hiccups and if I am still happy in a few weeks then I will buy two more of these canmeras for the house.Now I am interested in what dvr system others recommment so that I can make god use of the motion detecting tools of the camera !

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Ziliang Lin
Reviews.Content: Had some hard time setting up the remote access.  But once that step is behind, really love what this little cute thing can do!

Reviews.Title: great ip camera...only if it auto reconnects when wifi router reboots...
Reviews.Author: psp gamer "gamer"
Reviews.Content: i fixed the connection using foscam mac address...when wifi router reboots...kaput !!! nada !!! i have to literally connect the ethernet wire to the camera to reestablish the wifi connection....

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Steven widdifield
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera and would recommend it to everyone.  the tech support was great as well.  easy installation, with there support, they remote logged in and setup my whole system in minutes! excellent!!!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: D. Gilbertson
Reviews.Content: I basically bought this just to see how it worked out and did a pretty good job.I haven't really used it other than to test it out initially. I did try to use the sound to see if I can get that to work as an intercom and couldn't figure it out on my own. I didn't dig any deeper into it and I haven't worked with you further to time constraints.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for price!
Reviews.Author: BobOki
Reviews.Content: Wireless works well on it, gets a good signal. 802.11gI have had mine up for awhile now and have not had one issue with it. The camera is not some super high quality CCD mind you, but you can clearly see faces and detail for any legal needs, the night vision on it is VERY clear and this little thing lights up my ENTIRE large living room without issue. The motor on it is VERY quiet.Speakers on it sucks, will get by if you want to talk into it, but really if you need that grab a cheap 3rd party addon speaker, like for a laptop or something. Mic is just fine. Foscam is THE name in home cameras so you will find the most compatibility with apps, phone apps, etcetc with them.

Reviews.Title: Cameras are AWESOME! Tech Support was pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Justin White
Reviews.Content: I recently bought to Foscam FI8910W cameras and I love them! However I followed the instructions and couldn't get the mobile app to work. So I reached out to Foscam for help. The tech was definitely not from the US, and though knowledgeable and helpful he was direct to the point where it was borderline rude. I'm chalking it up to a cultural difference.My issue was that I couldn't get the cameras to come up on the mobile app once I left my WIFI network. Leo was able to troubleshoot the issue by logging into my machine and resetting the PORTs to 4-digit ports instead of 2-digit (like the manual gives). But my only concern is that he directed me to download the IP Cam Viewer Basic app which is a secondary vendor app which is free (but has advertising banners throughout) until you want to use the audio. He should have directed me to the Foscam IPC app which is the Foscam company created app where all features are free. I was able to follow the same instructions and it worked!So overall I was satisfied with the support; I think Foscam may need to update their support team on their app instead of directing people to a secondary vendor app. Leo did a good job with the tools given and I am glad they even have a tech support. So no complaints here!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: L. NASCIMENTO "Music man"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera. A little hard to install specially that the instruction on the vieo that came with the camera was not update. I hade to call support and they did a good job. I am very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Worked just as expected!
Reviews.Author: Martin Cameron Smith
Reviews.Content: Setting up this IP camera was simple, as IP cameras go. The only problem I encountered was getting the camera to recognize my wireless network -  you might have to try it 2 or 3 times, after that it's connected.Another thing to be aware of, IF YOU UNPLUG YOUR MODEM OR ROUTER AFTER YOU HAVE SET THE CAMERA IP ADDRESS in your viewing app , your IP address will change and the new one will have to be entered into the viewing software to see video.If you have any problems setting these cameras up, go to YouTube and do a search, most problems are minor and should be able to be resolved from there.Picture is clear, colors are accurate. I'm using mine behind a glass window and turn the infrared feature off to avoid glare on the glass at night. Shoots well through glass.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera and great customer support
Reviews.Author: Ronald Disanto
Reviews.Content: This camera is a little complicated at first to set up to view remotely using "port forwarding" but is easy to set up with-in your wi-fi network. It is a very cool baby monitor alone if that's all you wanna use it for. Foscam's customer support is good, I was able to speak to someone in tech support with-in 2 minutes. very helpful and set up everything for me (port forwarding related) via remote access to my computer. Ask to speak to Hayden Taylor, he is the one who helped me and was very generous with his time.

Reviews.Title: Works as specified
Reviews.Author: J C
Reviews.Content: This product works as specified.Phone app is handy but use the 3rd party phone app is better.Should be tech savy to configure, you can follow instructions but a little complex.Con: *Picture quality is blury for motion pictures, need to upgrade camera tech for better quality.Pro: Lot's of settings to allow advanced survaliance.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W Camera
Reviews.Author: WANDA  ARCHER
Reviews.Content: Item was shipped safely, as described and within delivery time frame given.  I have it connected to view on my smartphone while I am away and gives me a sense of comfort.

Reviews.Title: Dropouts sometimes
Reviews.Author: B. Cohanim "spyder8"
Reviews.Content: I use this as baby cam. It is much better than what we had before. The best feature is being able to hook it up to your home network and being able to see it on your iPad or phone or when we're out to dinner. Sometimes there are dropouts, but I think that is more a function of our home network than the camera. When the camera goes from full color to IR mode, it makes a clicking sound, which is annoying

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Naomi Goodkin "ng1944"
Reviews.Content: love this little camera - at our front door and it's connected over wifi so we see the pictures on our smart phone, computer or any wifi unit

Reviews.Title: Superior Quality
Reviews.Author: Swift Cheetah
Reviews.Content: This camera is very well-made and is an incredible value - highly recommended!  I have another system that has security cameras worth thousands of dollars, yet this camera is actually better in many regards.  The night vision is perfect.  The image is extremely clear and is very impressive.Foscam has its own app which is by far the easiest one to set up and use.  You can rotate the camera on the app which is very useful.The downfall to this camera is that setup wasn't necessarily easy.  I have very limited experience with security camera setup in the first place, but I had a hard time getting around the static versus dynamic IP address.  The good thing is that Foscam has exceptional customer service.  They have many resources online that were helpful.This camera performs like an expensive security camera and is a great value!

Reviews.Title: Foscam 8910
Reviews.Author: Pappyiii
Reviews.Content: This camera has excellent build and performance characteristics. I especially appreciate the ease of setup by the Technical Support person, Andrew. He set up the camera and computer for internet access and was sure that I understood all the instructions. I congratulate myself for choosing Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Not dependable for use as a baby monitor in nursery
Reviews.Author: W. Rodriguez "Wendy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use in my toddlers nursery. The first one failed within Amazon's return window. The replacement failed within a couple of weeks. The IR LEDs started going out then the speaker stopped working. I also had problems with the camera moving (pan/tilt) on its own. I called Foscam and was given the runaround the first 3 times I called. After I insisted on calling they agreed to replace the camera but I would have to pay return shipping and send the broken camera in first before they would ship out the replacement. I even offered to give credit card information for an advance replacement but they wouldn't budge even after I told them I couldn't be without the camera because it's a nursery cam. Awful customer service.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Anatoli
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, full support web interface. takes just few minutes and you got it. Give's you very nice colors and you can see about 5 meters in fully darkness.

Reviews.Title: Works very well....... Good price
Reviews.Author: Mark Schrick
Reviews.Content: Works very well....... Good price  love it...... would love to use more if had time to install out doors but would take water

Reviews.Title: pleased
Reviews.Author: happy consumer
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the end results of the product as well as the technical assistance provided.  I must admit I attempted to go it alone and that did not work.  I was not patient or computer savvy enough, however, once I contacted Foscam and arranged for someone to call me back at a convenient time for me they were able to get remote access and set up the camera's and my app for the phone.  The app was aprox $4, but I feel like that was a small price to pay especially with all of the assistance they provided.  Andrew was the last technician who assisted me and he was extremely helpful and finalized the process for me.  thanks!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Wireless Wonder
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Lane
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this wireless camera to keep an eye on the house while away for summer weekends. Quick Installation Guide took over an hour trying to understand. It didn't cover all the settings that need to be selected for the camera to work remotely, so I called tech support. I was caller number 7 and waited about 5 minutes. Andrew answered and remotely accessed my computer (instead of trying to walk me through) and could see exactly what needed to be done. He had the settings corrected in a few minutes and typed and saved a note on how to access the camera via my cell phone. Tried everything out as instructed and now works like a charm! Can access via web browser or phone app. Thanks Andrew for your help : )  I now have peace of mind....

Reviews.Title: fi8910w
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Camera shows a bright clear picture.  I am surprised how far the night vision shows up.  It is a bit tricky to set up but I called the service number and got excellent service.  I only had to wait less then 5 minutes on hold to get a LIVE human being named Leo.  Leo stuck with it until I was completely functional. Thanks

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS ITEM if you want wireless operation
Reviews.Author: Chris Jenkins "Chris J"
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this camera I noticed a number of reviewers mentioned how difficult it was to set up the camera wirelessly but I was prepared to risk a couple of hours figuring out a work around. I have spent the equivalent of days trying every possible option without success. I have read every discussion I could find online and they are full of complaints about this problem. I've found a few (very few) detailed suggestions on what to do but they involve playing around with router settings and other technically sophisticated steps. I've tried all that I felt comfortable with without success. It's also noticeable that the company itself is not participating in these threads, so what you see is request after request for help and no practical advice in response. I don't think I've ever encountered a product where so many people have the same problem and nobody seems to be able to fix it. What makes it so frustrating is that wired set-up is so easy and the camera woks as advertised. I can even see the camera being recognized by my router but when I disconnect the ethernet cable nothing happens. So my advice is to read the reviews that mention this problem and take them seriously.

Reviews.Title: Re great cam support sucks
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Archuleta
Reviews.Content: Support really didn't help the issue the staff with clearly made up names don't really care to help they put forth a front  they care not if your cam works I was told my galaxy s3 wasn't on three g/4g  had to argue with the guy  and had to ask another to quit talking over me  actually had to call back several,times  It was kinda crazy it worked when I was on the phone with them but when we hung up the dam thing stopped showing video on my phone  call back and it worked again hung up stopped working again idk call me crazy

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: review it
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and it works great! The only thing that could be better is the built in mic and speaker.

Reviews.Title: Broken lens on arrival
Reviews.Author: TheKC0de
Reviews.Content: Take it out of the package, hook it up, there is a hole in my video feed. Take a close look at the lens... it is broken (white hole inside the glass). What a headache, Great quality... not. I will make sure to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Does what its supposed to...but....
Reviews.Author: Rivers
Reviews.Content: Camera is great. Works like its supposed to and the setup is easy if you have moderate to high tech level experience. Some people who aren't that great with networking may have a problem setting up the wireless connection and setting it up to access the camera from the web. Picture quality is good, but not HD. Works in light and dark rooms VERY WELL. This product can also be controlled by many ip camera iPhone and Android Apps that are free.My only grip with this camera is the speaker on the camera that allows you to talk to whoever is in your residence through the webpage or mobile application. The speaker is pure GARBAGE and didn't work for me but only 2 min when I first setup the camera. Because of this, I have to buy a $10 small portable speaker to use to speak through.Overall, the camera is great. Another thing I need to mention is that the camera motor is SUPER QUIET. I can move the camera when people are in the house and it doesn't even make a noise.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera last night with no problems, using it wireless and the software is OK.  Got it up and running in about 10-minutes.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: jim schultz
Reviews.Content: the tech support at foscam is the best i have ever had. my technitian was christina she was great and very professional and helpful. she set up my camera perfectly. it is working great. good picture both day and night. i would reccomend it to anyone . thanks chriasina.

Reviews.Title: Installation of Camera
Reviews.Author: Lenny Farmer
Reviews.Content: Felix was my technician was very knowledgeable about the local and remote issue process. I was not able to access my Foscam camera from a remote location on a computer nor my iPhone 5.  Felix walked me through the process of setting up access, and even placed the instructions on an icon on my desktop. Very helpful, and I'm very satisfied even at his offer of being avaiable at any time through e-mail.

Reviews.Title: Some good features but possibly marginal wireless use
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (Black)After reading many many wireless IP camera reviews I ordered this one thinking it appeared to be the best for the money. I am connecting it wirelessly to an Asus N-66U router which is fairly new and at very close range it works well enough, but seems to have a very limited range before the FPS drops to around 2-3 frames per second.At first I just assumed the one I got was broken or defective and I exchanged it for another one of the same model. Unfortunately I see no difference in the replacement. Right now I can get around 25' from my router before the signals fails entirely and my various tests are in locations where I have perfectly solid connections on a laptop and my wifi enabled phone.I don't know whether they accidentally released a batch of them with marginal radios or if this is pretty well what I would expect from any maker of IP cameras since I have no other ones on hand to compare it to. I am still debating returning it for a refund because I bought it for wireless use but at the range it is useful I could easily just hard wire it.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM TECH SUPPORT comes through again!
Reviews.Author: Stephen G Sherman
Reviews.Content: Kate got me up and running in no time.
