I bought this camera with the idea in mind that I would be able to use it at remote conferences and I expect to have an opportunity to try it out shortly in that capacity.The camera itself is simple to use and install after the tech reps got it set the first time.The important factor was the audio-in jack. If the conference organizers will allow me to be plugged in, I should be able to save many times the camera's value in airfares.

Reviews.Title: 1 bad, 1 good
Reviews.Author: MooseMan
Reviews.Content: First one I ordered seemed to work fine at first then flaked out - dropping off both wired and wifi networks intermittently.  At least amazon made exchanging it easy.  The 2nd one I received is working fine.  Good camera for the money, if it lasts...

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Kathryn T. Battle
Reviews.Content: This camera worked well, and it even worked with a free app I found for my cell phone. Unfortunately, it seemed a little sporadic at times, and I couldn't always get it to work remotely. I would have kept it, but I sent it back since I felt like it was a bit silly for me to have a camera just so I could check in on my puppy, but if you need a decent security camera and don't want to pay a lot, this little guy will do the trick!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Eddie Tilley
Reviews.Content: Love the camera! Great asset for taking care of elderly parents!Picture quality is excellent as is the IR picI highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: customer phone help
Reviews.Author: David J. Rash
Reviews.Content: I just received the best help via phone in setting up my foscam camera from kate that I could have gotten. the camera is working great now thanks to her. I would recommend her for helping anyone-great service !!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and works great!
Reviews.Author: Joel Zucker
Reviews.Content: I'll start by saying if you are looking for hand holding and slick looking software interfaces then perhaps you should look elsewhere. But if you want an inexpensive solution that works, is easy to install if you have at least a little bit of tech saavy, and provides a fantastic web cam experience that offers TOP NOTCH infrared night viewing along with complete remote control of side to side and up and down panning, then this is the camera to get!The software that comes with the camera is no frills, granted, but it allows you to do what you need to do to get it setup. Setup was no more than connecting the camera to my router via an ethernet cable, running the software on my computer which found the camera immediately, configuring the camera as needed,  then disconnecting the camera from the router, and it ran wirelessly no problem. I could access it internally on my network via Web browser and via their FREE Android app. I eventually paid $4 for an app called "IP Cam" which works fantastic with this cam and allowed me to setup my tablets around the house as additional nanny cams. So lots of viewing options.You have to know a little bit about how to configure your router to enable viewing from outside of your network, but since FosCam doesn't TRY to make things idiot proof (like other cam solutions that fail miserably) there is no lame interface to fight through to get what you need done, done.  I was able to set up port forwarding on my router to my cams, and Viola!  Access from anywhere protected by non-standard port allocation (choose a port number, don't go with the default),  user name, and password.Now I'm viewing my cam from literally anywhere (even on my phone while driving I can have the cam on and hear everything that goes on).Their tech is quick to respond as well, and answered my questions to the point and accurately.Here is a list of reasons why I like this cam:1) The Night Vision is OUTSTANDING! Literally clear as day, in pitch black.2) FosCam had a free app for our phones allowing us to view the camera from as many monitors as needed.3) There is a paid app ($4) from a third party developer out there that give you all kinds of functionality not available in the free app that we purchased.4) We have the viewing app on Multiple Devices, allowing me, the wife, and the nanny to view the cam at the same time from different locales in the house. Have it on a tablet too, and can view from the computer.5) The app supports MANY cams so you can purchase as many as you need and view them all at the same time. We have two to monitor the play area and the sleep area.6) If you have a little networking know-how you can set up the cam to be viewable (safely and securely) from outside the home. Both me and the wife check in on our tots while we are at work.7) The paid app has a background monitoring feature so that you can continue to monitor the baby with Audio as you do other things on your phone, or just sleep with the phone near the bed and the screen off.8) The app alerts you with a sound of your choosing when your little one starts moving around, giving you a little advance notice of the pending AWAKENING!9) Two way audio.And most all of these features are also available via a web browser if needed.Setting the camera up on the local network is a breeze.  Setting it up for safe secure viewing outside of the home takes a little bit more know-how, but is obviously very doable.  And there are directions, and good support. You can also assign different passwords for different people so that you can always revoke access at anytime, for any specific viewer (such as if you need to fire a nanny).The BIGGEST advantage is that you can use any smartphone, tablet, or computer as your viewing device and they can ALL be used at the same time.Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Would be good if it worked properly
Reviews.Author: wRx7M "wRx7M"
Reviews.Content: Was replacing a Linksys WVC54GCA that since Firefox version 20.0, was no longer displaying video (fault of Firefox update and Java). Went through 2 of these. Returned for replacement and finally for refund. Both had the same problem. Would not allow connections to the web interface after a short period of time and had to be reset at least once per day. A complete waste of time. Also, the preset ptz positions never worked on either camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Product...But!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I've been using FOSCAM devices for about a year and a half.  They are great, easy to use and install I had 4 already installed at home.  But this one has a little issue… It have great image (a lot better than the other ones), but have an annoying “click” sound every time there’s a light change in the room that the previous model didn’t make.  That’s why  I don’t give the a 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: good camera, good price
Reviews.Author: Jody D Whetstone
Reviews.Content: bought the camera to test out and see how everything functions to my likingi know my way around my network, routers and firewall; so setting this up for external viewing was not hard at all. i did not look at the instructions but based on others, the instructions are not clear at all to get this up and going.pros:- great build quality. love the black finish- camera motor while panning and tilting is smooth and quiet- wifi strength is good. placed on the opposite side of house through 4 rooms and only had about a .5 second - 1 second lag- this supports wireless n although description says b/gcons:- the video quality kind of fuzzy/grainy at a distance further than 3 feet- foscam android app (use IP Cam Viewer from the play store, much much better)product is getting 4 stars- video quality. quality looks good when in front but backing away past 5-6 feet, the quality gets noisy and grainy. you can still make out what everything is, it just lacks in detail ...where it doesnt when you are up close to it.all in all, this is a good camera for the price. i didnt expect the quality to be the best since it was only $87 i would recommend this if you are looking to invest in a small, cost saving security camera for a small roomI am actually returning this product ONLY because the room it is in is very large and I would like to see clearly to the other side with more detail than this model allows. I am replacing this unit with the FI9821w

Reviews.Title: Nice enough
Reviews.Author: C. Zarzuela "Seelier"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for basic home security. I have it mounted inside an enclosed porch. At night you get glare. You can still see if someone approaches your steps, etc. but you have to play with the settings a bit to get it right. It is fairly easy to set up,but you do have to take time to figure out if you want pictures emailed to you, at what intervals, etc. the pictures are very clear, btw. Indoors, it is perfect. When facing it outdoors, between changes in lighting and weather, the picture quality can suffer... But not too much.However... It is inconsistent at capturing movement. The motion detection feature does occasionally miss me coming home. This disturbs me. It seems to matter which angle you approach from. For security reasons, this is a bit disconcerting. But since all I'm doing is monitoring the door, it is fine for my purposes, if you were getting this camera for a more serious security reason, I'd either go with a higher end model, or buy two or three of these and strategically locate them so you're not missing anything due to the occasional blips with the motion detector.The pan and tilt works great. But the next one I get will have zoom.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!  No zoom.
Reviews.Author: Jared Spinola "J-Red"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  Very easy setup.  Has it's own DDNS name which is the easiest way to make the camera accessible from the internet.  I would have given it 5 stars however it lacks zoom functionality.  Even a simple digital zoom in the software would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Great as baby monitor, difficult set up.
Reviews.Author: ara6cb
Reviews.Content: Using as a baby monitor, second to none compared to 'baby monitor' options, and FAR cheaper than those options. Great access via an app and via the Internet. Can move around, pan, tilt, which most baby monitors don't do. Great night vision to not wake up the baby with a light. Camera itself is 5 stars, bar none.Only concern is with the setting up. To get remote access, requires port mapping. (I wasn't sure what it was either.) I guess it helps with security, blah blah blah.Thankfully I have a nerdy friend who was able to get it set up for me. He gets 5 stars.  Directions for setting up we're sub-par I'd say, but if you understand that stuff or 'know a guy,' then this will work extremely well. I'm usually someone who can figure this stuff out, but this time I was stumped.I would definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Not so happy
Reviews.Author: Chris Kohnken
Reviews.Content: Looks like a great product but was never aware I needed to download a program off a cd which doesn't work with my iPad

Reviews.Title: difficult to get up and running
Reviews.Author: linda fuchs
Reviews.Content: very excited to purchase these two camera's, however, it took several days between myself and another person to get it running correctly.  then realized you also needed to purchase an app for your phone/pc/etc which was another cost (free one doesn't run the full version of IPCam) -plus directions weren't real helpful for setup.  If you are an IT guy/gal or very knowledgeable on the intricacies of electronics-go for it.It does do what it says and once working, works great but was a headache to start.  hoping it works as well while we travel so I don't have to worry about the homefront running smoothly

Reviews.Title: IP Cam Central is the best!
Reviews.Author: Scott Birdie
Reviews.Content: So I have to say, these cameras are basically impossible to set up on your own unless you are very dialed in to what needs to be done to set up your router.  I contacted IP Cam Central and David K is simply the best there is!!I called Foscam directly and they are the WORST!!!  The phone connection is awful and they take forever...not to mention you cant understand a word they say (myst be calling China)Pay the few dollars extra and call David at IP Cam Central.  It takes a very stressful setup and makes it a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: JUAN CIARDIELLO
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my home and the Foscam F19821W HD, but it seems to me that the image of this one looks better than the HD.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: jermie
Reviews.Content: Good Product. First camera I bought for home monitoring after reviewing many products. This works as needed viewing people at the front door.  THe pan and tilt work normal and the Wireless function works good along with viewing from a smartphone (once you figure out how to IP forward) No issues with the product.  Good camera for price.

Reviews.Title: Be careful, as someone mentioned, if you use outdoor, this one has wifi issue
Reviews.Author: Sudong Shu
Reviews.Content: The camera itself looks good and perform well when you put close to the wireless router. But when you put outdoor and if the wifi signal is not strong, the connection issue will come. I tried at the other camera but they are all working fine except this one.

Reviews.Title: Does all that it says it will do
Reviews.Author: William Morphis
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for basic home security.  Setup was quick and easy. Able to move it from area to area with the only requirement being an outlet to plug in to.i would and have recommended this camera to others.My only complaint is the detail of the image could be better.  it's still more than clear enough to tell whats going on but for long shots the image is abit muddled.

Reviews.Title: Great, we have two to keep track of our kids
Reviews.Author: V. Grewal
Reviews.Content: There's a reason we've bought two for ourselves and one for a friend. Easy to configure, tons of independent app support on Droid and iTunes. Excellent video quality, day or night.

Reviews.Title: Great product with excellent support for installation! Foscam is quick to answer the phone and provide superior support. I n
Reviews.Author: Dan Knuth
Reviews.Content: Great product with excellent support for installation! Foscam is quick to answer the phone and provide superior support. I now have 4 Foscam cameras.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I needed help setting up my camera to view over the internet and on my phone. Ralph Mendez was very helpful.  I have received excellent customer service.  The camera has excellent clarity.  I can see everything in day or night.  I am using this camera for when we are gone and have nanny's in the home.  I now (thanks to Ralph ) will have access to this while I am at work.  I highly recommend this

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Angela Thurman
Reviews.Content: Hayden at customer support did a great job helping me set up my camera.. The camera works as expected.  I Recomend it to anyone that is looking for a camera

Reviews.Title: Foscam has really good service!
Reviews.Author: Chunjen Wu
Reviews.Content: The custom service is really patient and helpful! This product is wonderful. I really recommend ppl to have this camera.

Reviews.Title: Decent but with its flaws...
Reviews.Author: zgrami
Reviews.Content: Decent camera, but the camera has many user interface problems -- it is difficult to set up recording and has little to no native access for a macintosh. I currently use it with i-spy and I find that the camera drops its signal relatively often.Please also note that having a strong router is important for this as it will drain your network mightily and heavily.

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: S. Zippay "smoothdog"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to test it out for my daughter to use as a baby cam.  I had a little trouble setting it up as an ip cam but it was my fault not the camera.  I am surprised at the quality of the picture considering the inexpensive price.  Very good pics.  I am using the wireless and moving it all over the house to test it and it works eveywhere I have put it, on the patio, upstairs, in the garage, outside, no problems, haven't needed to use the large antenna yet, I have a 2 story 1500 sq ft condo.  The 'ir' works good, but the audio doesnt seem to work as I expected it to.  The emailed alarms works well and I get them on my cell phone, which I also get a good streaming pic on the phone and both my tablets 'ipad and android'.  I have shared the 'ip' link with my brother and daughter and they say it works well.  I probably am going to buy a couple more cams for me.  Also I have not turned the cam off in over a month and it has not failed or rebooted.

Reviews.Title: It's probably NOT the camera's fault
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Mahlstedt
Reviews.Content: Well, I'm probably just not meant to have an IP camera...bummer. It's such a great thing to be able to monitor your home from a smart phone, iPad, etc. After spending 6 hours (yes, 6 hours on THIS camera....after about the same a few days ago with the Motorola Blink 1) I've reach my maximum stress level and given up. The "Support" people took over my laptop remotely and tried everything they could think of to make this work...but something must be wrong with my Hughes Net Satellite modem...even though Hughes Net support swears it's not their fault... bottom line...it's going back and I quit!

Reviews.Title: Support was amazing
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: i had issues here in costa rica and called the support, they were great, ask for calvin.all runs perfect.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: ACES
Reviews.Content: The camera is good for the price. Once programmed its easy to relocate to another area just plug and let it reboot. I use this camera to send me an email photo when  movement is detected during the time we are away from home.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Erik Zeronian
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these and absolutely love them. They do everything they're supposed to. The image is clear, the movement smooth. Being lousy at computers I had somedifficulties getting them to work on a Cellular network, however Customer support was outstanding! Very knowledgeable and efficient. If you are lucky you might get to speak to Ron Jacob from technical support, awasome guy!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: DAN FERDMAN
Reviews.Content: Great product, easy to setup and easy to use interface. Fast service.Setup instructions easy to understand and this product is expandable.

Reviews.Title: Fi8910w
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Great customer service. Great product. Very helpful technical support received from Leo. Reasonable price for security camera. We have some trouble setting the camera via IP camera tool but with the technical support line. the issue solved.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tech support
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: outstanding product and I love the remote access from iphone.  installation can be difficult on own but tech support was outstanding and walked me through the whole process.  I had Ryan from tech support and he walked me through the full installation from start to finish.

Reviews.Title: love this product!  Customer service was the best!
Reviews.Author: Deanna Clark
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as it was highly reviewed on Amazon.  I wanted a remote wireless camera for security purposes that I could view with my computer anywhere (while travelling).  This product fit the need.  I had some initial problems installing as my computer kept blocking due to some security.  I called Foscam customer service and they were fantastic.  I spoke with a Sandra Williams and she was very helpful and pleasant and fixed the problem quickly. The camera is now working perfectly.  Thanks Sandra!

Reviews.Title: Worked as expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel P Borras
Reviews.Content: This is the first Foscam that I have used and it worked great.  If was easy to install on local network, web access if a little more difficult, because of my security settings.  The only negative, and it’s not the product, if that all of the pictures of the product do not represent it true size; it would have been nice to have its dimensions.

Reviews.Title: This is pretty cool!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Jones "OkieJones"
Reviews.Content: This is a neat device.  I can set it up and watch my house online.  My teens think I am watching them  when I am at work and they are home.  This device may reduce arguments in the home***  LOL  It even moves rotates and views different areas of the room.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: b
Reviews.Content: It works great, would have been easy to set up but tried when I was tired and kept making errors on my end. The directions weren't bad , but if you cant understand you tube it, there is a guy named awkward hamster that will help you out.

Reviews.Title: Forscam 8910
Reviews.Author: Joey Ceballos
Reviews.Content: Purchased 3 cameras to monitor my home while away. Was have difficultly's setup the camera's wirelessly but contact Foscam IT for assistance and was able to get going first call. Very Happy with the camera's and the quick assistance with Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Straight forward Setup
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I had no issues getting two of these cameras hooked up wirelessly to my home network. While the set up process is not necessarily easy for folks not accustomed to adjusting network related settings, I had no trouble getting the cameras registered on the network and they have been working continuously for several weeks now.The web UI for the cameras is not the best but functional.

Reviews.Title: good camera, goo technical support
Reviews.Author: ll
Reviews.Content: I have this camera for 2 weeks using it for baby monitor. Jees helped me to solve the problems when I use wireless remote control on Windows Vista, and also my new nextbook tablet. Now I can use any my devices anywhere with internet to see my son , and windows 7, window xp, window vista, tablet, and window phone are all working.Very good technical support! Very helpful!! Thanks,

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Michael H Lazarski
Reviews.Content: Had a break-in problem with a $20,000 + heist across the street and 4 houses north which made me buy this a year ago. I have it installed in the front room under a curtain that NO ONE can see but me. Have it installed as wireless and monitors the front view of the house.Software that came with - totally worthless.I use the software called Blue Iris. 24 X 7 monitoring with this camera. Works PERFECTLY !http://blueirissoftware.comSpent the $49.00 for it [Blue Iris] - can handle 64 cameras - I have three [3].If you buy this camera every penny is worth it - but it is all about the software you use to operate it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Justin Suhre
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  I have several of them and they work great as nanny cams.  They are easy to set up and the best part it has free remote viewing.

Reviews.Title: Compact and works well
Reviews.Author: alberto
Reviews.Content: I like the email alert function. Only complaint is that it seems to be quite sensitive and may send alert email when there's no one triggering it (may be due to wind/temperature). I have reduced sensitive and still getting alerts.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: sinerge
Reviews.Content: Reasonably priced and easy to install and use.  We use them currently as monitors for our girls rooms but imaging we'll use them for security later.  Love being able to just peek in on my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Better than the old, but barely
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: The old Foscam was good, but not great, and this thing supports 802.11N so if you are on a true N like me then you will really notice the difference, but beyond the Web Interface, which I don't use I don't see any other difference

Reviews.Title: great pan tilt ip cam
Reviews.Author: gene
Reviews.Content: i have a dozen of these and love them.  a bit different to get started, but once you get them working, they are the most versatile.  DDNS enabled, email upon motion detect, etc.  very good.

Reviews.Title: When I try to view video it freezes and I need to refresh and log on again.
Reviews.Author: cafierro "cafierro"
Reviews.Content: When I tried to access the video using Safari or Firefox, It freezes and then the screen goes black.  i have to log on o the camera again.  If you try safari and firefox, you dont get all the options if you tired IE.  Also the software for mac suck!  There is no option to record video on a mac.  you need to purchase additional software or use open source software.  I give one start because I don't have anything lower than one start.

Reviews.Title: web interface is bad
Reviews.Author: N. Pomeroy
Reviews.Content: The camera seems to work fine, but all the non-Active-X web interface is right out of 1996.  I don't understand how they managed to make it SO BAD. On purpose even.So unless you use the ActiveX web front end, or the bundled software (which I don't) the experience setting up and using the camera is 1/2 star.  Once it's set up, it functions well enough, with only minor occasional hiccups.

Reviews.Title: good product and good service
Reviews.Author: basil
Reviews.Content: overall it's a good product,  easy to install, nice camera.  I have some issue forwarding my port,  called foscam for technical support. a guy called Calvin is really helpful, he spend about 2 hours with me and figured out the issue, he also called back later to follow up.I'd recomemd this to others.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Briant
Reviews.Content: Bought this because we already had an audio monitor and we wanted something we could check in on our baby to see if he was ready to get up or just talking to himself.  Also, my wife finds it nice to see him rather than hear him.  It was easy to set up.  The difficulty was finding the right app that I liked to view through.  You just can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and customer support!
Reviews.Author: John Gomez "JohnnyGP"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased over a dozen of these cameras and used them in some easy and also somewhat complicated scenarios such as direct to router, wireless to router, wireless to WAP on the same network.  Once you get the first one, the rest are easy.  I did have to call the first time and Foscam not only remoted into my PC, they showed me what I did wrong.  6 months later, I had some problems and Kate in customer service was excellent.  She not only fixed it, she also showed me what happened and then showed me how to use the ai1343.myfoscam.org address to avoid the problems of a dynamic IP address.  Next I plan to integrate the cameras into my Home Automation Insteon system.  I am very cirtical of customer service and I can say Foscam was better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Michigan20
Reviews.Content: Had to call support but Sandra Willaims was very fast and helpful. Get the camera working fast and I can now view it remotely. Camera has excellent image quality for the price. I will be adding more to my network soon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to setup and use
Reviews.Author: Randall C. Manaka
Reviews.Content: This is camera that is very easy to setup and use.  I have purchased several to help monitor my elderly parents, both who suffer from dementia.  They allow me to view all of the floors in their condo and if they don't answer the phone I can check to see if they have fallen (Medical alert systems don't work very well with memory impaired).The Amazon prime store is the best way to purchase...fast shipping; easy returns if necessary.

Reviews.Title: Great...
Reviews.Author: Mr. Andy Mittal
Reviews.Content: After wasting my money on many poorly designed product which required network expert to install this one was a good surprise.  Very easy setup and remote operation.  Only problem is that it works better with Internet explorer and controls are sluggish.  The free apps out there for iPad are not as good,  alarm and mail setting works great.  Excellent home monitor just for peace of mind.  The audible alarm is weak, won,t wakeup the neighbors.  Sometimes too sensitive, sends lots of emails without any movement.  I recommend setting sensitivity to 4o or less.  Do not set for sound detection.

Reviews.Title: Foscam nvision  wireless IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry L L'Roy
Reviews.Content: Assistance setting up the camera was excellent. Very patient, and I believe that everything is working the way I want it to. Looking forward to using it, and have intentions of buying more. Good help desk.Jerry L'Roy

Reviews.Title: Foscam support
Reviews.Author: jc "jc"
Reviews.Content: Support was excellent. Scott was good. Haven't gotten a chance to use the camera yet. Will update when I use the camera for a few days

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, works well inside or outside (under shelter)
Reviews.Author: M. Liu "MGL"
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to figure it out about the wifi setup.  All in all, a great camera with only power supply needed.  I use wifi with it and it works well, i can also control movement and record (I didn't use the recording function yet).  You can get it on sale for around $70, good deal.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I needed help with configuring the camera wirelessly . Ralph Mendez  rom tech support was awesome. Product is awesome and is our 2 nd one and they have top notch tech support.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Anthony M. Rufrano
Reviews.Content: I had trouble getting the camera to work wirelessly but Peter in customer service had everything up and running in 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Reboots constantly
Reviews.Author: beaker
Reviews.Content: This camera is unreliable. It reboots constantly, and for no good reason - one day it works perfectly, another day it works for 20 minutes at a time. There is a reason this camera is so cheap.If you'd like a camera for entertainment purposes only, then this might be fine. If you need it for safety or security reasons, look elsewhere. If you need a camera as a baby monitor and you typically suspend your baby from the ceiling, this camera would be perfect since that's where the camera points to when it reboots.

Reviews.Title: Junk is the word for this product
Reviews.Author: Chas
Reviews.Content: Had it 3 days and stopped working,  this is the third FOSCAM product I have purchase and none of them lasted over a month,  I would not ever recommend FOSCAM for nothing..

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Chad Connolly
Reviews.Content: Love the Foscam FI8910  Their Customer Service is great  easy set up.  Is a great deal.  Works great..  Will buy lots more ...

Reviews.Title: Very reliable
Reviews.Author: ggil
Reviews.Content: The infrared light is very useful in the darkness. The camera works very fine. I bought two of this model and the software doesn't  remember the preset positions

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Williams
Reviews.Content: I had a different camera that did not have these features. This is an excellent camera. I had to call tech support to get it to work on the internet, but that was resolved quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Eric J. Ambielli
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic!  We are currently using it to monitor the house, but it was purchased as a baby monitor.  It works fantastically as a baby monitor!  The sound and motion alerts in the software we use on the iPad are fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Krystle
Reviews.Content: Purchased to use as a baby monitor.  Initially had some troubles connecting to my wireless internet, but their customer service was wonderful.  They were able to get me connected to the wifi as well as help setup my ipad.

Reviews.Title: Simple to Setup and Use
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: Setup in about 30 minutes and that's with me adjusting every setting.  Really like having the motion sensing set to a schedule so that I can email pictures of alarms triggered at night.  Nice Camera for my purpose.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: William Landers
Reviews.Content: The camera has the features that I needed to monitor my home and the property for the times when we are away.

Reviews.Title: 9 Stars - My first camera system
Reviews.Author: David Higgins
Reviews.Content: I accidentally bought the wired Foscam first but put it to good use by having it setup in my home office.  I went ahead and bought this wireless version and placed it where I wanted it originally - in my living room.  I was expecting a lot of conflicts and issues, but to my surprise they both work together perfectly!  You may have a problem if you are not computer illiterate, but that is what their free online and phone support is for.  Luckily I have networking knowledge from back in the day when I setup videogame servers, so assigning ports and IPs was simple and I got these cameras up and running within 10 minutes.  I love all of the options and I never would have imagined night vision to work so great!  I thought only military type devices costing hundreds of thousands of dollars can produce such a great image in complete darkness!  I plan on getting some outdoor foscams now just because it is great to view everything around my house for a low price in high quality.  I won't even bother experimenting with other brands in the future, I will stick with Foscam from now on regarding my video surveillance needs.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: CAMERA was easy to setup and easy to use.  Need some basic network skills or just use the cd that came with it..happy with the camera so far

Reviews.Title: Best surveillance cam
Reviews.Author: Kartik
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews, I was confident that this camera is going to work for my needs with some compromise. However, after installing this camera (which takes approx 10 min) I really loved the video and voice quality. I use this as my baby monitor and instead of carrying monitoring devices I can view it on my iPhone or iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice to have!
Reviews.Author: Ashli Mendon
Reviews.Content: It is way nice to have in our toddlers room while they are playing and to be able to use an app on our iPhones to watch them.. the only downside, is there are times it doesnt connect and we have to reattach to our router to Reset it. I have recommended this to several friends!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera / Helpful Technical Service!
Reviews.Author: Sg
Reviews.Content: Purchased three Foscam cameras the other day. The setup is a bit tricky given some of the more advanced wireless routers may require tweaking in settings. Called Foscam Technical Support and spoke to Sandra, who was very helpful in going through setup to get all of the cams up and running. Would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: For those of you with connectivity issues....
Reviews.Author: D. Irvin "dirvin"
Reviews.Content: For those of you with connectivity issues, have you assigned a static IP address to the camera?  Every day I had to reset the camera, reboot by powering down and then back up. I assumed that it was because my signal was so weak where I installed the camera. So weak in fact that my ipad has trouble maintaining a connection.  Since I assigned a static IP address to the camera, my problem has been solved.You have to assign a static IP address within the CAMERA software. Then use that static address and open port forwarding in your ROUTER software.The camera shows a sharp, clear color image in the daytime. The IR nighttime image is black and white but is fantastic for a camera in this price range. You get a picture in absolute darkness. I've ordered 2 more of these. The latest software update to the foscam app is a good one. The camera pans quickly and accurately to the locations you preset.One feature I haven't used and cannot speak for is the automatic notification via email for motion sensing.You can't beat the price or the quality for this camera. Its all about price vs features. I'm sure there are other much more expensive cameras out there with more features, but for home use, this thing thing is great. I chose this model after looking through reviews. The hi def model doesn't seem as reliable. Check out youTube videos for setup and reviews.I haven't been able to get the audio in to work. I can hear sound out from the camera with no problem. I only use the camera on my iPad or my mac so I'm not sure if that has anything to do with it but i have no interest in this feature. The only other drawback is the network setup. It can be a bit frustrating but don't let that deter you. Any camera will require the same type of setup. I knew nothing about networking and figured it out. You can too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, definately a must have
Reviews.Author: David Manee "David J."
Reviews.Content: The color on this is a lot better than the 18918 for sure. Make sure you don't pay more than 70.00 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Works as promised, Nice picture quality and sound.
Reviews.Author: James Cioffi
Reviews.Content: I have 4 Astak Mole cameras and this one Foscam.  I access the Mole cameras via Yoics and the Foscam directly using both its remote IP address and port as well as the Foscam address provided through the domain service that is initially free.  It is a very fast connect remotely and both sound and video work fine.  I had difficulty on initial setup going from the assigned IP to fixed IP as I would keep losing the camera and as I had to leave my remote location, I left the camera on router assigned IP, no problem to date.  I changed the port to 8090 as suggested and works fine.  I have alarms set for sound and video and have received several false alarm photos with sensitivity on 4 or 5, not sure why.  Overall an excellent product, relatively easy setup, excellent price compared to the more pricey Astak Mole.

Reviews.Title: Awesome amera and tech suport
Reviews.Author: Dyno111
Reviews.Content: I have three of these cameras in my house and I have enjoyed them immensely.  I recently lost a modem and called in to support.  They were very good and extreamly helpful.  I spoke with Ralph Mendez and he immediately accessed my system and reset the whole configuration and got me back up and running.  I am the proud parent of a 16 month old and without these cameras life would a nightmare.  weather he is taking a nap mid day or sleeping through the night the cameras give a perfectly clear picture all the time without fail

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: d.brambrink
Reviews.Content: U-Verse user here, can't figure out how to get a port open to access teh camera from outside my home wireless, but I do like the viewing application that accompanies the camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera came DOA
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The wireless connection on my first FI8910 died after about 9 months of use.  It was frustrating, but I figured it was just bad luck (and I didn't really have time to research new options) - so I just ordered a replacement.  The second camera was dead on arrival.  I was able to connect to it without issue, but the video feed was solid pink and green (no picture at all).  I contacted Foscam for a solution, and their response was simply to return it to Amazon.This camera seems to have the best reviews of the wireless IP cameras on Amazon, so I'm honestly not sure what to try next.

Reviews.Title: Barely ok
Reviews.Author: Gemtag "G"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a specific reason, to record some backyard renovations. My experience has been a like/hate for the last 3 days.First, the camera is not exactly tiny, so discreet it does not do. But I knew that going in. The camera itself functions nicely. It does all the pan and tilt, but like other reviews say, it does not zoom. The IR also works well. So all in all the camera operates well except for one issue. Once a day it will reset itself and return to the 'center', what it considers its starting point. If you want it to always point to one place make sure it's the center.Now the real issue. The software is the worst piece of garbage ever created. I could go into detail but I would be writing a small book. Save yourself some aggravation. Toss it immediately. Find other software that works with the camera. I tried Vitamin D. It works ok, but had issues. First, it does not control pan/tilt. It would lose connection on a 10-15 minute basis. This would create many mp4 files. For some reason the software would create 8-10 processes that I would have to kill. I also had problems panning the camera with the Foscam software. The camera would pan or tilt so far, then freeze. If I hit center fast enough it would move and I could try to re-adjust. Otherwise it would go thru a reboot and go back to center a few minutes later.I then tried WabCamXP 5 which worked great. It does control pan and tilt. I had no issues with the camera freezing when moving. It never lost connect and I ended up with one large avi which is what I wanted. Only thing I missed from Vitamin D was the feature that detects movement so you can go right to that point in the video. Since I was recording constant motion it was not an issue.So in summary the camera works fine. Your mission will be to find the right software to use with it. If you are looking for an easy install and use this will leave you pulling your hair out.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Hahn Tae Sung
Reviews.Content: It has reasonable price, not bad resolution. panning and tilting is very useful. wireless connection is a little complicate. There're many application on variaty platform for this product.(PC, Android, iOS, HTML...)

Reviews.Title: Good Camera and good support
Reviews.Author: aaron alt
Reviews.Content: Wireless works well for the money. Remote access of the camera is a very nice option for when your away form the house, and to check on the nanny! Recommend to anyone beginner or experienced.

Reviews.Title: Foscam is everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: Paul J Rower "PJR"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Foscam F18910W about 6 months ago because I wanted to know what's going on in front of my house, near my front door and inside my living area when I leave my home for extended periods. This camera was an easy set up. I used Foscam's remote setup service to get me wireless from anywhere in the world on my 3G smart phone and wi-fi laptop. It has worked perfectly since day one. It sits in a front window, rotates, captures a crystal clear picture of the front of my house (daylight only) and inside the house with infrared night vision beautifully. Today I decided to change the password on my home's wireless router to something easier to remember than the original 25 character behemoth. Foscam telephone support walked me thru the password changing process on the camera in a couple of minutes. I am extremely happy with Foscam product and support.

Reviews.Title: Works exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: SenatorPerry
Reviews.Content: I use this camera to watch my dogs during the day.  Often I use the two-way audio to give them commands.  The original setup was not that difficult if you follow the instructions.  On my network it has a static IP and port mapping allows me to make it available over the Internet.The night vision works well, but does tend to see-through certain thin clothing.  This isn't a big issue, but it is worth noting that it may not be appropriate in some use cases.  During the day the color tends to falter leaving it a little washed out.My experience is that at 12 feet in darkness you can no longer distinguish between objects 1-2 inches in size.  To frame this, if you put a $1 bill on the floor next to a $20 bill you would struggle to identify which is which.  At 20 feet in darkness you will lose edge definition on items.  Anything beyond tends to reach the limit of the infrared range.In bright light you will add a couple of feet to each of the measures above.  The reason for mentioning this is that you may not want to locate the camera in a ceiling where it is inherently 10-12 feet away from any relevant objects.  Also, the camera as pictured with the product has the base pointed down.  To gain the most range of freedom you will want to mount the camera upside-down and flip the rotational axis.  This is supported in the software.The video recording features do not appear to work on my firmware.  The snapshot features require you to login before they work.  I had planned to have the stills grabbed every couple of minutes available to the public and the pan/tilt adjustments requiring a password.  To get around this I had to setup a PHP script to authenticate and store the images on a server.  Then people can access the images without logging in.The audio quality of the microphone is reasonable.  The speaker on the camera is poor and I highly recommend that when mounting the camera you add a set of powered speakers available on Amazon for cheap.The only downside is that there is an upper limit on concurrent viewers on the camera.  After five concurrent viewers the camera tends to become non-responsive to commands through the GUI.  The second camera of the same model with the newer firmware does not have this same issue.  Regardless, I highly recommend this camera and have recommended it to friends.When it finally goes up to 1080p or 720p my goal is to upgrade these units.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Saint77
Reviews.Content: An excellent full featured camera. Does everything a system will do except have its own hard drive for recording. I have two of them now, I will be picking more up. This would make a great baby monitor device as well.The only thing I dont like is I had to turn the sensitivity way down on the alarms. Anything higher then 2 would make my email account flood with alarm alerts. It seems to get triggered really easy when ambient lighting changes, and I do mean any change whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Video
Reviews.Author: J.R.
Reviews.Content: Hello Folks,The only thing I ever had to say, that was uncomplimentary about the earlier series of FosCams was the "false color" that was associated with the near IR capability.  Would I accept that weird color during the day to have visibility at night... absolutely!  That all changed with this model of the FosCam.  The video during the day is absolutely beautiful and the video at night is equally as good.  I could not be more satisfied.JRMore to the story -- The other day a new firmware set came out for my Foscam.  Since I was having a little trouble with it rebooting all the time I decided to upgrade.  The upgrade did not go well, but with a little help from Technical Support I was finally able to get the new firmware loaded.  THEN I discovered that I could no longer see the camera with my security software.  So I called Tech Support again asking where I could find older copies of the firmware to revert to.  The person on the phone had the audacity to tell me that the camera COULD NOT be reloaded with the old firmware.  He wanted to sell me a security software product that would replace my old software.  This is not TECH support!  I have purchased my last FOSCAM camera.  I have three in operation now.  Be AFRAID... Be VERY AFRAID.JR

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: BigggMo
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera from what I can see so far! Good picture, good sound & pan/tilt options work smoothly. All it's lacking is a zoom feature, but for the price I'm not complaining. I've only had it a couple of days, but so far it's great! Hayden from technical support was instrumental in helping me get the port forwarding setup in order to view when I'm away from home. I'm planning on ordering a few more of these. Very pleased so far!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waist your time with Foscam
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Picchi
Reviews.Content: Foscam has terrible customer service and their cameras are junk. Every time you call tech support you end up talking to someone in India who doesn't understand the issue.  I've spent hours upon hours on the phone with them and it turns out the camera was bad.  I had to pay return shipping and now they want me to pay for shipping for the replacement one. I will never purchase or recommend Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: I like the wireless part of the cameras that give me flexability to place cameras where it would be hard to wire in others. I also like the fact that I can view the cameras from my cell phone when I am on the road traveling to keep in touch with the areas that need to be monitered. The picture quality is very good, especially in total darkness. Better than the other cameras that are wired in.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: jojoboli
Reviews.Content: I got two of this. I can see and hear what's going on at home with my baby and nanny from office computer and iphone. There is a little delay but acceptable.

Reviews.Title: missing bulb
Reviews.Author: Thellie
Reviews.Content: I had to return it as it has a missing part that amazon would not send me a replacement. I will not buy this item since this is the second time I had this item.  I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: foscam technical support
Reviews.Author: mikeogden81
Reviews.Content: I could not figure out the email. the service was very professional and friendly.I just received the camera and I love the picture quality and the ability to move the camera is awesome. I would recommend this camera any day...

Reviews.Title: Excellent low cost ip cam
Reviews.Author: Laurie N
Reviews.Content: I was extremely hesitant to try these because of the negative feedback on this and the newer FI8921 units. I now have two 8910s at my place and have recently installed four others for a friend and a family member. All work perfectly.You do have to have some basic understanding of wireless networking (and its limitations) and dhcp to install them quickly and easily. The online Foscam Forum is full of questions and complaints from frustrated customers who are having problems because they lack basic wireless networking knowledge. If you wireless signal quality at the installation site is weak, you will have problems with this and every other ip camera. Use a fixed ethernet of POE connection instead.I am using them with Bensoftware Security Spy camera software on my Mac Mini. I installed them with Blue Iris software for my windows-based friend and family member. Both are easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Great Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: The remote access is superior and the video quality is very good.  The alarm settings are very nice and let you know who is in a room, at your door, etc.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, really quiet, can listen and talk through it...
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This thing was pretty easy to set up. Follow the instructions you see in the reviews - forget most of what you read in the actual instructions. Yes, you need to know a bit about how to set up WiFi networks and all that. But it's easy.Picture is pretty clear. I plan on also buying the HD version. Infrared is really good too.Totally worth the money.It's a bit of a WiFi hog though (I think). I plan on running several WiFi cameras, so I might set up a separate WiFi network for them.

Reviews.Title: Cam Restarts over and over for no reason
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: I have had this cam for about a week now. Some times it will go 24 hours with no restarts, then for no reason at all it may restart 3-4 times within an hour. Not happy about that.

Reviews.Title: Good product with a few short-comings
Reviews.Author: Shadow Berr "shadowberr"
Reviews.Content: Just bought my second FI8910 for home security and house monitoring while traveling.  The first one took a while to get working as there are a lot of parameters to set, but once working it's been very reliable.  I simply copied the parameters from my first install to the second camera, except for items that have to be unique like IP address, and it came up immediately.  I also updated the firmware on both cameras as there is a reported vulnerability to hacking your wi-fi network without the latest firmware.  The only issue I have is blurry photos during motion detect usage.  The camera detects motion OK but the captured photos are typically blurry, especially if the movement is across the field of view. Try to position the camera head-on to the route of movement to minimize this problem.  For the price though this is really a pretty good little camera with a lot of function.  I may buy a third one.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price
Reviews.Author: K. M. Zimmerer
Reviews.Content: I've just purchased my third camera (FI8910W), so I'm obviously happy with the product and it's performance.  After the initial half hour of swearing during setup, you have the recipe for success and it's a non event after that.  The price point, ease of setup (others are FAR more complicated), support and documentation, and flexibility make for a very positive customer experience, IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: GJC
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great price, works well no problems, the only thing is I wish they would make it with a zoom lens, that would be awesome.

Reviews.Title: Support via Telephone/remote access
Reviews.Author: Steve "Slumlord"
Reviews.Content: I struggled to enable Port forwarding for my Camera. Did not realize that my motorola modem also needed modification. Jim Moren at Foscam used the remote program Team Viewer to make the modifications, and all works. I'm quite pleased with Foscam support - and am happy to have a Pet Cam that I can access via my ipad and iphone. Good Job Jim.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras for the price
Reviews.Author: jknisley
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and have been happy overall so far. There are a few things that could be better, but these are also sub-$100 cameras, so it's hard to be too critical.Pros:- Relatively easy setup- Low price- Basic web interface works wellCons:- Relatively short range; at close range I can get around 15 fps over WiFi using iSpy Connect, but once I'm halfway across the house it drops to 2-5 fps. The antennas do detach, and I've already ordered some stronger antennas to hopefully extend the range and maintain 15 fps.- No "real" software included. There is software for configuring your camera and a web interface to allow you to view a live stream, but you'll have to use third-party software if you want to record the camera streams or view multiple cameras at once.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this camera if you plan to use wireless and need any kind of reliablity .
Reviews.Author: Darrell Wakley
Reviews.Content: Cameras will not hold a wireless connection. I have tried 2 different routers (D-link 685 and Asus N66U) and can set them up and get them running but they lose connection and the router will have to be reset for them to start working again. This happens multiple times a day. They work fine if they are wired in but that kind of defeats the point.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910w
Reviews.Author: McZoo33
Reviews.Content: Got two of the foscam 10w the color is much better then the 18w I have three of them, both models is very nice and work good...the only thing I wish is that you could label the presets with a name instead of numbers that is assigned

Reviews.Title: for your info
Reviews.Author: Cassman
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these from amazon, just so you know you cannot get any help from foscam without paying for it unless you purchase the cam directly from them on there site. pretty poor service id say.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: maurice gissendanner
Reviews.Content: I like the wireless feature and it can be view by my smart phone. Leo did a great job of helping me set the camera up in the wireless mode free of charge. I highly recommend you call the FOSCAM team if you have any technical questions. Great job Leo!!!!

Reviews.Title: Works well and reliably
Reviews.Author: Keith Benoit
Reviews.Content: This is my sixth Foscam purchase, and fourth model FI8910W camera.  All cameras were extremely easy to setup, and worked perfectly right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Gordon
Reviews.Content: This is my second Foscam F18910W. The first one worked so well that when then came up with a good deal I chose to buy another one,

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Aaron Madden
Reviews.Content: Works great and good quality for the money. My kids and I play with it and other wireless cameras for fun. We recommend this for the price. It really is a good quality product for the price.

Reviews.Title: tech support for set up
Reviews.Author: gracie
Reviews.Content: Contacted Foscam for setup and after a bit of holdtime I taked with Christina and she was great. She did the remote setup and explained certain functions as well as how to get her personally again if I needed further assistance.So far the camera seems to be just what I want. I will set it up with motion detection and email video of recordings from night time hours.I would recommend the camera to anyone looking for a home security system.

Reviews.Title: First Time User
Reviews.Author: W. Mckee
Reviews.Content: Received the camera approx. one week ago to install at our cottage.  Although a I consider myself a fairly savvy computer user, I needed assistance from a computer tech friend of mine to set up the camera.  Installed camera this past weekend.  Works very well and so far no problems.  Very happy and may need to get another one.  Will wait a few months to see how well this one works out.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Steven Hamblin
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of these cameras. They were a bit complicated to set up but once I got the tech support people on the phone to assist me they took care of everything quickly. I like the fact that I can set alerts to advise me if there is sound or movement detected when I am away from home. The picture is very good and the ability to pan and tilt works great. I do recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Impressive IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Julie H
Reviews.Content: Took a couple of tries to get configured for remote access, but it works like charm once set up.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Michael Kemper
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for mind boggling image resolution, you're not going to find it here.  I just wanted something decent for monitoring my new baby in his room and this camera is great for that purpose.  I use the infrared most often and it's great... I use it from about three feet from the bed.  I was expecting some kind of issues with the camera but haven't had any.  I use third party software to access via Android and iOS devices and it's compatible.  Web interface is okay.Overall I'm very happy I spent the money.  I would buy another one.  I'm hoping for an HD offering with the same reliability and built-in POE.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Emilio
Reviews.Content: Foscam Cameras always work they work well easy to install and simple software to install, Highly recommended! The quality is very well made for this product

Reviews.Title: OK, but can be frustrating
Reviews.Author: delerivm
Reviews.Content: I've had 3 of these cameras.  The first one worked great and was easy to set up,  until I accidentally dropped it and the power plug snapped.  I tried to repair that myself, but got frustrated and just bought a 2nd one.  That's when I *really* got frustrated, because the new camera wouldn't connect to my wifi.  I'm very technically savvy, and spent hours troubleshooting but could not get it to work.  I decided to return it and when the replacement camera came, I had the same issue again.  I don't think it's "user error"... it seems to me like the wifi radios are hit-and-miss with these cameras.  If you get a good one and can get it on your wifi, paired with good software, this camera can be pretty great.  I used "iSpy" for motion detection recording, and an IP Camera Viewer app on my phone to access it remotely.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Hagon
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the operation of this product. It has saved us countless trips to the barn over the last month or so to monitor the birth of lambs and kids. The picture is clear and the pan and tilt work well. Being IP based is also a plus as we can monitor it from any computer in the house and bring the laptop into the bedroom at night for those times when birthing seems imminent.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support / Product Review
Reviews.Author: Jalapeno
Reviews.Content: Needed help with accessing the cameras remotely to be view from my phone and computer away from home.Great: Versatile, standalone, fairly easy setup, great App for iPhone(Foscam Pro)Browser control You can set it down and, with some technical tweaking on the router, have it operational (some router and DNS understanding is helpful, but the installation book gives details). Have it email you when it detects motion, or have 2-way conversations from your iPad, iPhone, or PC. Excellent iPad app allows full control. Pan, tilt, but no zoom. Remote zoom and focus would make this perfect. Night vision works great. Keep an eye on your place when you're out of town. Get emails if there's motion when you don't expect there to be. Browser controls vary with the browser. IE will give you the most versatility, but FireFox and Chrome also work, with varying degrees of success. The iPad app is the best.  Intuitive controls and speakerphone.  This product has...great tech support I was a bit confused on the requirement for DDNS support and called the 800 number and the tech wanted to remote in and assist. I was unable at the time because I was away from home and computer. We setup an appointment for 5:30 pm central time and the tech (ralph.mendez@foscam.us) was on time. He answered all my questions and configured both my indoor cameras for the free remote control service provided by foscam. I am somewhat technology savvy and I would recommend this to my friends! Looking  forward to purchasing a couple of outdoor cameras to compliment my configuration.

Reviews.Title: Good usable camera
Reviews.Author: shopper
Reviews.Content: The camera works almost as advertised.  Connecting to the home wireless environment is simple and easy.  I really like it's pan and tilt feature which gives me the ability to control its viewing angle remotely.  The only part that needs improving is the control to the up/down and right/left pan and tilt.  When I wanted the camera to scan in the up direction the camera at times scans down then back up, same with scan right or left, the camera often scans in the direction that is opposite from my command then returns to the direction that I wanted the camera to go to.  Perhaps it has to complete its previous scan motion cycle first.  Don't really know. Foscam should look into updating the firmware to correct this problem.  Other than this issue it is a good device.

Reviews.Title: Very good, could be great
Reviews.Author: alan lockwood
Reviews.Content: Improvement in the 2 way sound and a zoom would make this a great camera. This is my third one and will probably buy more,

Reviews.Title: Excellent low end camera
Reviews.Author: R. Wunsche
Reviews.Content: I love having this mounted over our baby's crib.  I bought tinyCam Monitor Pro for 4 bucks and use that instead of the web interface.Camera setup was simple for home wifi, but a nightmare to get it working over remote so that I could see it on my phone from work.  I have lots of experience with port forwarding and such, but the AT&T; U-Verse router was a real challenge, and finally I wasn't able to get it truly solid until I followed the instructions on the company's website for setting up a free dns server (using no-ip.com).  Even then, if you don't want to pay $15/year for the DNS, you have to log in once every 30 days or they'll cancel your free account.AT&T; U-verse router hint: if you get to the point that the camera is remote viewable when plugged into the router, but doesn't work when in wifi mode, reboot your router!  A few hours were wasted figuring out that little bit...Update: after working great for 4 weeks, today I once again can't reach my camera.  I think it's a DNS issue again, but I hate the fact that this is such a tedious device.

Reviews.Title: Spy on the dogs!
Reviews.Author: Rich D.
Reviews.Content: I needed a way to keep an eye on my dogs while I was away to check on the dog walker to make sure they were treated right, which now I know they were.  Easy to setup and monitor with my IPhone or PC.

Reviews.Title: Camera & support
Reviews.Author: normanmk
Reviews.Content: The camera & product support from Foscam was very good.  Hold time was satisfactory. Derrick assisted me & he was very knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Fiscal FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Ftag
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Setup is hard for a novice, but lots of YouTube help.  Once you set it up, it works great.  It alerts me on my iPhone, and I can record video if needed.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Arthur Sprinczeles
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster was the customer rep that helped me set it up wireless it works great. Picture looks great big plus being ab;e to move it around

Reviews.Title: Incredibly smooth integration with iphone app
Reviews.Author: sb_22green
Reviews.Content: The Foscam app is $5.99, but this is what I got it for and it's quite worth it.  Smooth integration and very fast loading. Installation of everything with wireless network is very difficult and the included instructions don't help, but if you are willing to let their tech support use a screen control app, they will have you up and running in 10 minutes (this is what I had to do.)

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Wei Zhuang "Johnson ZHUANG"
Reviews.Content: Easy to installed and hook up to my router wireless. The pan and tilt is cool, and the two way audio works good for me. Up to now, I am satisfied. Hope it won't have issues in coming years.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: TMCLEN "tmclen"
Reviews.Content: This camera works great, I can access it from anywhere, has great night vision. Warning however, setup is not easy, if you are not computer savy, probably won't want this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Even Better Tech Support
Reviews.Author: lqdpoop
Reviews.Content: I had purchased 3 Foscam cameras a few months ago after doing research for a while.  I needed something that was cost effective, provided great video and would be easy enough for me to install on my own.  After reading reviews I decided on the Foscam 8910W and 2 of the outdoor 8905(?) cameras.  Hooking them up was easy to do to my wireless network, installing them was a bit of a challenge for me.  Not that it was Foscam's fault, just the ideal locations in my house required a lot of drilling, ladder time, etc.  Anyways after a couple of days of install (working and school full time) the cameras were up and running.  FYI, for the outdoor cameras, I upgraded to a bigger antenna.  Cheap fix and worth it in the long run. I recently upgraded my internet service and the cable company brought in a new dual modem/receiver.  From then on my cameras stopped working. I could access them on my network but not when I left it (ie on my iPhone). I spend countless days and hours trying to find the solution.  I called tech support and Tim came on the phone to help!  He was awesome! I told him about my issue and he  immediately knew what was wrong.  He logged on to my computer, and began working on the issue, checking my router settings, cam settings ,etc.  Without me telling (i forgot to mention it actually) ,he saw I had a router/modem (new one) attached to my other router (older one- which the cameras were on) was not allowing port forwarding.  He fixed the issue and BAM! All cameras pulled up on my iPhone! The whole call took no more than 5 minutes.  I am forever grateful.  Thank you Tim and Foscam for all your hard work and great products.  Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Easy set up, easy to remote control, great support
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Purchased a second camera recently to get a bit more coverage around the house.  I wanted to test the ability to use these cameras as a security feature around the home.  Out of the box, it was easy to set up, convert to wireless mode, and use semi-remotely as long as I was within my router's range.  The only difficulty came when I tried to configure for use via my iphone/ipad when away from the house.  Turns out I made a minor typo using my router (not one that was covered in their how-to pages) that the Foscam tech support found in about 10 seconds.  I RECOMMEND that if you have any issues to check out their website's help pages (these solve most issues) and then don't hesitate to call folks like Ryan that can find and solve your problem in a jiffy.  Cameras are up and running, sending me text messages to my Google account with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Suggest the remote setup - Very helpful
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Works great! Suggest the remote setup - Very helpful  Great customer service in setting up the cameras. Remote camera feature awesome on the iPhone. Clear Picture on both indoor and outdoor cameras.  I would recommend both of these cameras!

Reviews.Title: Tech suppot
Reviews.Author: Roger Bohan
Reviews.Content: Tech support, Christina was great support was very helpful and friendly. Camera works well and will do what I need it to do. Would recommend this product to family and friends

Reviews.Title: Techincal support Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Great customer support, Christina was very helpful, very easy to setup, love being able to see the camera even when im out of the office. Would definitely recommend to my friends and family. Best feature is the pan & tilt. Service was very easy as they used remote setup to set it up on your computer for you.  Nothing to improve.

Reviews.Title: Support from Foscam
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: Called to get assistance in setting up emailed video clips from camera.Problem solved. Very good service Thanks very much

Reviews.Title: Technical support awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe Richards
Reviews.Content: albert was very helpful with technical support--got my wireless connection up and running--also got my remote viewing up and running----very impressed---will buy more----this is my 3rd camera from foscam

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy, works as expected, it be nice to have some power saving options....works well through PC, iPhone is great for  viewing but could not get audio to work.I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Mike Wynne
Reviews.Content: I'm delighted with this camera.  I expected it to be difficult to set up but it was very painless. The instructions were clear and well written. I carefully followed the instructions and it took about an hour to set up (it could have been much quicker). Ideally the image resolution would be better but overall I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: Baby Foscam
Reviews.Author: Emma Leblanc
Reviews.Content: We use our foscam as a video monitor for our baby.  It's perfect and so much better than the overpriced ones in stores.  I have already recommended to few family and friends who have also gotten one for the same use.  My only complaint is that it can be a headache to set-up if you aren't computer savvy.  Also, the foscam url that they give you to access away from home sometimes just doesn't work and won't load.  I'll have to give it an hour or so and then it starts working again.  That's happened to me twice in the 3 months I've owned it.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: jack denis
Reviews.Content: Had a hard time setting it up. Great help from Tech Support, Jees know his stuff. Got it working in 5 minutes. Will Buy 2 more later.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup with customer support
Reviews.Author: hecksome
Reviews.Content: Hit a bit of a wall trying to set up port forwarding and a static IP address so called tech support to have it resolved.  Was on hold only for a moment.  The tech support guy, Peter, did a great job, and yes, they ask you to write a positive review on Amazon when you're done, which I was happy to do.  I installed a remote desktop application for them to log in to, which streamlined the process.  Within about 10 minutes everything was set up and good to go!  The quality of the camera looks great, excited to use it as a baby monitor.  My only criticism is there isn't an official iOS app, so there's a little trial and error to finding an app that works well and takes advantage of the features of the camera, but all in all, this is a great purchase.  For the app, ended up shelling out $6 for FoscamPro, which was head and shoulders better than the three other free apps I tried.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Review
Reviews.Author: Jamiern
Reviews.Content: Camera works fantastic! Tech support is awesome. Bought the remote setup and worked with Kate at Foscam who was very patient and taught me how to setup and was effecient and very nice to speak with.  Would recommend this camera to anyone wanting a simple setup and clear view of their home/office while away.

Reviews.Title: great camera for baby room.
Reviews.Author: healing_nectar
Reviews.Content: After deciding to transfer my baby to his own room my husband and i decided that we needed a video monitor just to be safe. After looking at a lot of baby monitors costing $300 my husband got the idea to get a foscam that way we can look at it anytime from our phones and computer. My husband can check up on us from work from time to time, and incase we get a babysitter we can be sure that everything is ok. Overall a great camera for the price, you can control the direction of the camera from the phone, great video quality during the day as well as during the night. Only thing is that it drains the phone battery pretty fast.

Reviews.Title: Fosscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: John Hrubovcak
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Amazon. Quick shipment, excellent packaging.Camera works perfectly. Picture is sharp, movement of the camera angle is smooth and quiet. Software is easy to install.Had a minor problem with the wireless connection. Foscam tech support answered my call within one minute and promptly made the proper adjustment.Truly, excellent tech support.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: It was easy to set up. I got stomped with Port Forwarding but it was my cable modem providers fault. However I called Foscam customer service and spoke with Kate and she knew exactly what to do and get through the Ubee modem issues. My Foscam is working great thanks to her. :) I would definitley recommend this camera to anyone interested. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Worked fine for a year and then stopped working
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Be Aware of the Quality Issue!I bought my Foscam webcam last May from amazon. It works fine until recently. Last week it fails to connect to the internet through wireless connection. I tried reset the camera and followed the instructions for wireless connection step-by-step several times. It still does not work. It's less than one year usage and it stopped working. For the price, I expect it to work for much longer time.

Reviews.Title: Great company and great support
Reviews.Author: Fon Zhang "With no tax and free shipping, Ama...
Reviews.Content: Spoke with Ryan at the tech support.  He got our webcam up within 10 min.  This Foscam is more than I enticpated.  Comes with its own dns so you dont have to spend money every month paying for the service (the free dns services only is a 1 month trial).  Anyways, great visibility, with IR I can see my baby from any where in the world.  Great company and great support.  Thank you for your help, Ryan

Reviews.Title: Fine Camera Lots Of Features
Reviews.Author: Joseph R.
Reviews.Content: Although there were a couple of glitches in setting it up, Ryan Michael at Foscam was very helpful in getting it going. Has many features including pant,tilt, infrared, can be accessed from mobile devices and at home

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tilt/Pan/Audio
Reviews.Author: vicki99
Reviews.Content: Product works great. Love the audio. Now if I get a motion detected alarm at the business I can listen & see if it is a person or a rodent tripping the alarm. Rodents visit from the restaurant next door. Support line/guy for camera was fast & knowledgeable (after waiting in queue which took a little while).

Reviews.Title: great camera tech support excellent
Reviews.Author: TJ "TJ n illini country"
Reviews.Content: i'm so happy with the cameras & tech support is great. you can't go wrong with a foscam.this is the ultimate camera for  home or business.

Reviews.Title: I love my foscam cameras!! FI8910
Reviews.Author: S. Hunter "sonebone"
Reviews.Content: I love my cameras!! I have 2 of them! If you have any problems setting it up just call the toll free number and they can access your computer and they do all the work!! They dont set up the email settings to get notified so let me help you with that if i can, it works for me....go to MAIL SETTING SERVICES on the ip camera tool on your computer....SENDER=  YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS@YAHOO.COMRECIEVER 1 (AGAIN PUT) YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS@YAHOO.COMSMTP SERVER= smtp.mail.yahoo.com  (type this as is) small capsSMPT PORT= 25, ( if that number 25 doesnt work, try 465 and 587 to see which one work)transport layer security  (none)need authentication (check box)SMTP USER = your email address @yahoo.comSMTP PASSWORD = your email password that you use for your email addresshit test, it should say SUCCEEDED , IT WORKS FOR MELet me tell you what apps i use for the ipad...foscampro when you add the camera, put your name, the remote camera address is your email ****  myfoscam.org can be found under the camera,(starting with 2 letters...( do not put in the http thingy just the email)  put in your port,(2or 4 digit number) your local camera address which is 192...., then put in port number again ( some have a 2 digit some have 4 digit port number) than USER NAME is admin no password and hit done at the top.. good luckFor ANDROID i use IP CAM REMOTE go to connection settings, your name, your camera email address( which is located under the ipcamera) ****myfoscam.org  or your ip address which is 192....try either one, put in your port number, user name is admin no password and hit ok, I hope i am explaining myself, lol Note it works for me, just giving you my input...Thanks

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM F18910W Camera Easy To Setup and Workss Great!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: No complaints with this camera.  I have 6 others and all are working great.  Also awsome price when offered at $30 below normal sellingprice.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Product and Outstanding Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ken"
