Reviews.Content: Had a problem with wireless setup. Felix was able to find and correct the problem in record time. I would recommend this cam and the tech support to any customer.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Fl8910W
Reviews.Author: CAROL
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Foscam Fl8910W from Home Depot due to their internet sale of the item to see if I liked the product prior to purchasing more camera's.  I received the item on Friday afternoon and I installed the item and was able to get it working wireless quickly from the internet at my home.  I did have some trouble getting it to work from my Iphone and trouble shoot the camera for most of the weekend. I called the Foscam tech support on Monday morning and worked with Ryan.  Ryan was very pleasent to work with and he remotely entered my computer and got the camera working in no time.  He also was able to walk me through the Iphone portion of the hookup and got that working also.  I believe for the cost of the camera and the support that I received from Foscam it has been a good investment.  I do think the camera responds rather slowly on the movement of the remote access but, for the most part it still will be worth the cost for what I'm wanting out of it's performance where I can monitor my home when I'm away on vacation or on the weekends when I'm out.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: Tad Espiritu
Reviews.Content: Tim of technical support was very helpfull and was able to help me solve the problem.I could not view my camera remotely for the past week.technical support of foscam pro app for my smartphone was not helpfull at all, which made me very dissapointed.good job on Tim!

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: willie
Reviews.Content: Best feature is the remote access which allows me to check the status of my apartment. Next was the customers service. A 1.

Reviews.Title: difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: nguyend
Reviews.Content: the cameras worked fine as long as they are connected directly to your modem, but difficult to set up to control wirelessly. the technical support is from 8-5 CST, M-F, so this is really good if you don't work, so basically there is no technical support.

Reviews.Title: I own 3 of these as well as the FI9821W
Reviews.Author: An old soldier
Reviews.Content: This camera relies on your PC/MAC to be the DVR for any VIDEO recording, so you'll have to leave the software on your pc (Internet Explorer/Firefox with associated plugin) running. If you're using IE be sure to read the manual concerning browser security and ActiveX security problems with this FOSCAM. If you use wireless MAC filtering, look on the back of the camera for the MAC address, it has BOTH the Ethernet and wireless addresses on it. For motion-detected video, it will mean the camera(s) will be streaming constantly over your network, so your bandwidth will be limited for any other use. If you're using Blue Iris software, in essence a pc application which functions as a DVR (better than the included software), the same applies-you're basically monitoring a non-stop stream of video for motion detection. All this streaming really loads up your home/business network.All the above references video. For picture taking, the 8910W will NOT save to an on-board sd card, but WILL email you or upload (ftp) to an internet server of your choice (not video.)My suggestion to you is to bite the bullet and get the FI9821W, which in essence, is a mini-DVR/pc/camera in one. It will monitor and record to an SD card on the camera(not included), and (once set up) can be operated completely independent of any pc (if you choose.)One last thing-the USERNAMES as well as the passwords are CASE SENSITIVE in Blue Iris (PC and mobile.)

Reviews.Title: Good for its price
Reviews.Author: Owolabi Charles
Reviews.Content: works well. This device it should have space for inbuilt battery that is rechargeable and replaceable. A tiny lithium. That way, i can rate it higher

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "Sammy"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. The Firmware is easy to use. Can view on Mac, Win, or iOS. Would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: short cord
Reviews.Author: John T. Rockwell "Toby Rockwell"
Reviews.Content: The camera works just fine the picture quality is pretty good. The only lame thing is a short power cord. Most people use the camera close to the ceiling, but the power cord is too short to do that.

Reviews.Title: FI8910 Foscam IP Camera & Service
Reviews.Author: Scott B
Reviews.Content: So I bought a couple of these cams to keep an eye on things around the house and being a novice at this I called for some tech service expecting it to be as I have experienced elsewhere but it was anything BUT typical. The technical support I got was freakin off the charts awesome! Got this guy named Ron Jacob and he took me through two of the cams set up and even did the remote setup for me. By the end of the second time through I was ready to try it on my own! Don't hesitate to buy this cam, it's a great picture with controls at ur fingertips and again like I said the customer/technical support was OUTSTANDING! Thanks FOSCAM

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I needed help with setting up the camera wirelessly and remotely to view from my phone. Ralph Mendez was great and everything works perfect. Great camera and would buy again. Great customer service. will recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and excellent service
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Camera works very well. It is handy and nice to be able to check on our house while we are away. We had a little trouble remotely accessing it. We called tech support and Ron Jacob got us all set up. Would highly reccomend this camera to anyone looking for a nice cost effective option.

Reviews.Title: Do not believe all the good reviews...worst product I have ever purchased...
Reviews.Author: AzRich
Reviews.Content: Do not believe all the good reviews.  This is the worst product I have ever ordered.  Not only did the box say "FI8910W" and I received an older "FR" model, but this FR model was defective as well.  After 3 plus hours this device does not see any WIFI networks.  Upgraded the firmware and did everything under the sun.  Wired worked fine, but the wireless did not work at all.  The saying "you get what you pay for" really rings true here.  I have worked with other cameras that are a little more money, but in the end it is worth to pay a little more to get something that works.  Again, buyer beware...do not buy this item.  Oh...and when asking for a replacement that option was not available.  Just for me to return and wait for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Service Review
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Camera works great. Easy to set-up and use. Works great for a baby monitor. Good technical support and customer service when needed.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support is great!
Reviews.Author: Richard Benz
Reviews.Content: The Foscam Model FI8910W Internet camera is proving to be a great purchase for me.  The camera is totally wireless (not the power cord, but WIFI wireless.)  It is also remotely controlled from both network and out of network computers.  It has pan, tilt, audio monitoring, IR lights for low light imaging, warning systems for motion and sound detections and even e-mails me when there is motion detected.  It is a full service security camera that I was able to set up in my home (with the support of the GREAT Foscam support personnel.  Ryan Michael was the support wizard that easily took me through the entire set-up procedure.  He was very helpful AND very patient with me.  The support given would make me purchase a Foscam camera.  When you add the superior camera and the great support, it is a win-win decision to purchase this camera.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: lee2
Reviews.Content: unable to access the camera from the internet.Felix helped me a lot to resolve this problem. i highly recommend the foscam camera.also love the resolution of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Really good for price paid!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Pretty much agree with everyone, this unit is great. I had it up and on my network and cell phone within 10mins literally....if you have decent networking experience that will help alot, if not call your favorite geek friend to help you. Only had to look @ manual for login/pw and configured from there. Very pleased, I was watching my dogs, could listen to them, ALSO TALK to them even though it sounded choppy, not sure but had no idea it had a built-in speaker of some sort to talk to them lol....they were trying to figure out where I was. Going to buy another but may opt for the HD one7/10/13 UPDATE: well, the unit quite working, had power, could login to it but no pic. RMA dept was very helpful and I sent back, went ahead and bought another, this time an HD one. Anxious to see how soon I get the one back fixed and how well the new HD one does

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service From Foscam Help Desk
Reviews.Author: M. Jaleel
Reviews.Content: Great camera and easy to use. I called the Foscam customer support for help and spoke to Kate and she did a excellent job.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: I could not figure out how to set up the camera. Called technical service and they took care of everything for me. Felix was very helpful and took care of the entire set up for me.I woudl recommend this camera and think the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Model: F18910W
Reviews.Author: Corey
Reviews.Content: So far I am very happy with this camera.I had a little problem with the setup getting linked to wifi but the support from the 1-800 number had it solved in minutes.I can't wait to get this camera using all it's options.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: W. Bradley
Reviews.Content: Works great, just like my other two Foscam cameras. A bit clearer picture than the previous model. Some fiddling with the Verizon Fios router software to get it going, which does take a bit of patience. Nevertheless, works through my Droid Maxx perfectly. Foscam says you need to disable broadcasting SSID to make the camera hack resistant. Unfortunately, then some other devices won't connect to the wifi automatically. Foscam needs to improve their software to provide the hack resistance without requiring disabling of SSID. Would have given five stars but for this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera...almost perfect and great interface
Reviews.Author: Brian Sorli
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Foscam FI8910W after having less then optimum results with the Agasio A502W IP camera.  The Agasio worked, but went to sleep after 30 to 60mins and required unpowering to reset and start again.So far the Foscam FI8910W does not suffer from these problems and I'm pretty happy with the results. I also like Foscam's excellent interfacing and pretty open architecture that the community has grabbed and enhanced over the last couple of years.  I can now connect and interface my Foscam via my PS3 web browser (Foscam Mobile IP camera interface works pretty well) and most anything with a standard web interface.Very pleased and will probably purchase the exterior versions of this unit soon to monitor outside.  Sorli...

Reviews.Title: Poor quality (you get what you pay for)
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I picked up a Foscam a couple of years ago and it worked great, so when I saw a sale on this newer model I snatched it up as a no-brainer. Unfortunately the quality of this unit was junk. After configuring the unit and having it run well for about an hour, it suddenly began to freeze and reboot constantly. To the point of being unusable. Another issue I have is with the horrible quality of the documentation. As others have noted, it's as if it was either written by a non-native English speaker, or translated poorly. I also hate the web interface and the fact that it doesn't offer an SSL login option so all your credentials are sent in clear text over the network. Foscam could easily add a self-signed SSL certificate which would close that security hole. I hope to pickup another camera in the future that actually was QC tested because you can't beat these for the price...when they work.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Aly
Reviews.Content: I use this camera as a baby monitor and I really like it! The set-up to the wireless network is complicated, but I was able to call the foscam customer service and they set it all up for me in a matter of 15 minutes.I works nights as a nurse and I love being able to check in on my babes via the iPhone app. I can pan/tilt and even listen-in. The only downfall I'd say is the sound quality. It kinda comes in and out and is not all that reliable. I use a cheap Graco sound only monitor to make up for what the foscam lacks for sound quality/reliability.Bottom line: I would definitely recommend this camera to friends/ family in need of a baby monitor. I appreciate the fair price, as many of the "video baby monitors" are so over priced and do exactly the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Laura Vogel
Reviews.Content: Pros:  This is a very inexpensive, high quality camera.  The night vision and auto-light adjustments are great.  It responds to controls well.  It's attractive, non-descript, and works the way it's supposed to work with no hiccups.  I followed the instructions (though they were rather complicated) and it worked on the first try.  While it took me over an hour to set up (and I am a very confident computer user) I didn't hit any frustrating points, nor did I feel compelled to call tech support--this is a HUGE plus for me.Cons:  The problem is that viewing away from home is a difficult set-up that, in most home environments, requires the use of a program on a computer that IS RUNNING the entire time you want to be able to view the camera.  So, if I want to leave home and be able to check in on the camera, I have to leave my computer AT HOME, ON, and RUNNING A THIRD PARTY PROGRAM.  This is frustrating.  Also, it's virtually impossible to get the sound to work unless you use additional equipment (i.e. speakers).  There is no iPhone or Android app, it's just a mobile website that loads slowly and works slowly.My Use:  I'm monitoring my dog's activity in her crate while I'm out of the house.  It works well for that, though I can't take advantage of the auditory features to hear if she's crying or to talk to her to calm her down.  I can see if she needs me home to change her food/water/wee wee pad or if she's freaking out.  The night vision works REALLY well - I can see her moving around even when I only have a lamp on in the house while I'm away.Conclusion:  If sound doesn't matter to you and you're looking for a high-quality video home monitoring system, this is the cheapest way to go that will still work well.  I would love to have a native app for the camera and I'd love for it to have an easier set-up.  (That said, the directions were thorough and relatively easy to follow if you have any sort of idea of what you're doing.)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Castro Hernandez
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because is the best product I have bough in the last two years.The video image is great, clear an you can see most of the elements with very nice detailNight vision is very clear and detailedtwo ways audio works as spectatedEasy to configure , and the documentation do its works

Reviews.Title: Wireless?
Reviews.Author: Mrs. O'Neil
Reviews.Content: I had trouble trying to get this on my wireless network. i called the company, i watched videos and i still couldnt load it wirelessly. Otherwise this product worked perfectly. i like the rotation and could see the entire room.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: That Guy "Joe"
Reviews.Content: I received mine yesterday.  It took about 2 hours to setup and figure out the wireless connection and port forwarding.  The iPhone app works well for checking up on your camera during the day, but I'm not impressed with the motion detection.  The motion detection pictures are usually pretty blurry, unless the person stands fairly still during the photo, but it'll at least notify you that something is going on.  You can set it up to email several addresses, so you can use "@txt.att.net" or "@vtext.com" if you want to receive text messages when somebody walks by your cam.  Video recording isn't as easy as getting pictures.  It appears to only work with Internet Explorer, and you have to allow all ActiveX activity to make it work correctly, which seems like it could cause a security issue.

Reviews.Title: What a piece of junk....
Reviews.Author: Stacy Rothwell
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of junk.  Received it today and it installed fine, just like my older FosCam, but this only has TWO working IR LED's.  I guess Foscam has absolutely no quality control at all.Anyone with a 2nd grade education could have tested this and only seen TWO red LED lights on the front.

Reviews.Title: Help from setting up FOSCAM
Reviews.Author: Chan M
Reviews.Content: I have problem in setting up the Port forwarding portion of this camera. By calling the Foscam support, Mr. Calvin Harris of FOSCAM provided great support and help me solved the problem, I just want to say thanks to Mr Harris for his excellant technical support.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: troutwild "Skip"
Reviews.Content: Bouht this camera for spying on my dogs and it works very well for that purpose. After having a little difficulty setting the camera up for remote viewing, I called customer Service and was walked through the process by a very knowledgeable customer service employee. I'm very pleased with Foscam and would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: mike smith
Reviews.Content: Ron jacob was very very helpful setting up my camera would highly recommend him for his expert to set camera up and connect to internet and showed me how to acess off site thank you

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: a.beth
Reviews.Content: Had problems setting up wireless, tech set up both cameras and they are working now.  He was very polite and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Fails after a while
Reviews.Author: Harvey from New York
Reviews.Content: I have two of these cameras and they both failed after a year.  One lost its wireless ability.  The other won't boot at all. It was nice while it worked.  The software was tolerable, but failure is not an option.

Reviews.Title: Camera and customer service
Reviews.Author: datle
Reviews.Content: the camera is awesome with night vision and motion sensor, the customer service was the best ever. I would recomend this to everyone i know.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: T. Anban
Reviews.Content: Foscam fi8910wNice cameraGood quality picturesService by foscam- Some waiting period.Anywhere from 15-60 minutes.But the customer service is outstanding.Ms.Sarah Johnson and Ms.Sandra Williams were outstanding.They were very patient and very professional.Other than the waiting period the camera and customer service are exceptional

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: darrell kassinger
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, but it is a little difficult to set up. The picture is great & pan & tilt works good. For an observation camera in the household is pretty good. Overall for the price it is pretty good.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: The Nurbler
Reviews.Content: My first IP camera was the EasyN FS-613A-M136, which I bought because it was cheap and I was just experimenting.  My research showed that the EasyN was either a clone or somewhat generic version of a Foscam device, so when the Foscam FI8910W went on sale I got one, thinking I was buying a better device -- after all, the SALE price for the Foscam is higher than the REGULAR price for the EasyN...The Foscam has the ability to turn the IR emitters on and off, both automatically, and/or on demand.  The EasyN is superior in EVERY OTHER WAY.Both cameras offer 640x480 images, but the Foscam image looks like something 1/4 that size that was digitally zoomed and makes the somewhat blurry EasyN image look like crystal clear HD in comparison.The Foscam's camera housing is only loosely connected to the base -- it will wobble relative to the base.  The EasyN is solidly constructed.Both are easy to use and their browser interfaces are almost identical, so nothing special there.All-in-all, I think I paid an extra $20 (an extra $35 at regular price) for the IR Cut Filter and a name.  The trade-off in image quality for the IR Cut is absolutely not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Don't Update the Firmware, It will Brick your Camera!
Reviews.Author: DeskFan
Reviews.Content: On the first day that I got the camera I updated the firmware and it became bricked. I am very careful about these things and have much experience programming and dealing with electronics. I carefully followed the provided instructions, made sure I had the correct firmware, and updated through the its Web UI. Now my camera cannot be found by the IP Camera tool through Ethernet or WiFi and it cannot even be detected by my router. I had plans of buying many Foscams, but now I will not do so anymore. I had such high hopes for my Foscam FI8910W. On the plus side, it was an easy return since I have Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: great product and equally excellent customer support service
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Marturet
Reviews.Content: This is the third Foscam I buy and the second needing help to get it to work properly.Calvin from their Customer Support was not only very helpful but also very patient to teach me what should I do to configure the next one correctly which has already been ordered from Amazon.All features on this camera work well but to me the most outstanding are the remote control for Pan & Tilt and the Two-Way Audio. I think I will be buying a fifth one soon!

Reviews.Title: Clear and good for night viewing over the cellular phone
Reviews.Author: D. Tea "MrT"
Reviews.Content: Easier to use and setup.  View at night is very good.  Using the cellular phone, image is good.  Move the camera and view at the phone with no blur.  Better than the HD foscam camera.  This one has clearer image at night and no blur when move the camera.Buy this camera if you want to view on the camera phone over 4G.

Reviews.Title: Reboot new fi8910 foscam
Reviews.Author: Gerald  J. Rauch
Reviews.Content: Worked with Ryan today 4/23/2013 setting up my new camera. Fairly simple even for inexperienced computer person like myself.  Ryan worked me thru the process in a very professional and easy to understand way.thanx Ryan,Gerald R.

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor.
Reviews.Author: Torie
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to use in our baby nursery.  It turned out to be a great alternative to expensive baby monitors.  It did take some time to configure and set up- but you don't need to be a tech wizard to figure it out.  This camera interfaces with a number of iPhone apps (I just searched "foscam free") which makes it very comparable to other baby monitors out there.  I like that I can stream video/2-way sound anywhere, without having to lug around a separate monitor solely designated JUST for the baby monitor. Couldn't be happier with it!

Reviews.Title: Actually - This IS used as a Nanny Cam!  (doe goat cam...)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Middle aged tech employee wi...
Reviews.Content: I got this when our Nigerian Dwarf doe was about to deliver her kids.  When I bought two goats last summer I had no idea that goats often need assistance with delivering kids.  I grew up with horses and cattle around- and both did fine without assistance!  I picked up this camera her at Amazon, and hooked programed it on the router after work, then had it in the barn and aimed into the goat pen that night.I'm a technically competent person, and I read directions - that being said this is very straight forward and I had no issues.  I downloaded the app for my Motorola Bionic and was upstairs and in bed, watching the goats on the camera in no time.  I have to confess that I was up almost all night because both goats kept staring at it - and I could TALK through it!  OMG sooo funny!  You could see them stare at the camera, then look at the barn door like "she must be just outside the door!"  They would get up and walk over to the camara location, stand up on the side of the pen and investigate.  Talk about "Men who stare at Goats" - I couldn't leave them alone!In the end it worked exactly as I needed.  I could see a clear image to tell that the doe was in labor, and when things looked intense I was able to step in and try to help.Pros:  EASY to install and set up  Crisp image  Easy to Pan and Zoom  Easy to connect the cell phone over WiFi  GREAT infrared image - very easy to see what was going onCons: It's difficult to set up the remote feature if you don't have access to the router that your Internet provider owns.I didn't have access to my AT&T; router, and I didn't have hours to sit through their customer help line.  I still gave this five stars because my AT&T; issue isn't the fault of the camera it's just the networking challenges.  Also my needs wouldn't have been helped if I could watch from work (an hour away).

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: amer k
Reviews.Content: I had multiple ipcams before and when I got to set them up,it was a nightmare,with this cam and after I called tech support ,Calvin helped me set it up in no time,he was excellent,I highly recommend this cam,clear picture,nightvision  and lots more,for less than $100,its unbeatable deal.Take it from me when you buy it,and if you are not that familiar,like me,with networking much,just call the help line and they will guide through each step,if you are lucky,Calvin will be on the other end.

Reviews.Title: No reply after starting RMA
Reviews.Author: Andrew "Andrew"
Reviews.Content: I thought this is a good product based on review ranking, until i work with their customer service.My outdoor camera stop working somehow, i figure out its wifi part not working. So i ask foscam whether the wifi part can be repaired. I got quick response from Thomas Lee at foscam. He told me to contact their seller where i bought my camera - Foscam Amazon Marketplace.Again i got response quickly from foscam amazon marketplace. They issue me RMA, and ask me to ship back my camera, and start RMA process. But after i ship back the camera, i just didn't get any response from them. Even i have sent 3 emails to ask, no reply at all.Now it has been 6 weeks passed, seems nothing happen. I couldn't guess what's going on. At least they should let me know whether they have received the camera, whether the camera is worth to repair etc.

Reviews.Title: Customer support
Reviews.Author: djkinvest "djkinvest"
Reviews.Content: Purchased several Foscam cameras and had issues setting up remote access. Technical support assisted with this issue and set up all the cameras remotely and was very helpful.So far, I like the cameras and they work well vs other wireless cameras I have tried.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jose M. G. Guilarte
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product I have some problem to set up it but I got it. It is exactly what I was looking for

Reviews.Title: Foscam Review
Reviews.Author: Harleyman
Reviews.Content: I received this product on time and had it set up in a short time, using the enclosed directions.  I use this camera to view secure areas from my Iphone.

Reviews.Title: Review of Foscam
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy. Tech support was very helpful to do the set up. We set up phone and home computer. I have the capability to view my monitors from any laptop anywhere! Wireless set up was make easy by Tim.

Reviews.Title: Defective camera
Reviews.Author: ThomasOfAustin
Reviews.Content: First off, I love the Foscam cameras, especially since they added the cut filter that compensates for the infra-red night vision.  The colors are great now, not washed out.  They are good, inexpensive Pan/Tilt ( no zoom ), night vision, with audio IP cameras.That said, this particular camera has issues.  I updated to the latest firmware and set it up.  At first I thought is was a power/power-supply issue.  The darn thing rebooted about a dozen times when first turned on.  Later I set it up and left it on.  Again, it rebooted over a dozen times in about an hour but then stabilized over night.  However, at dawn ( I think it is when it switched to day mode versus night vision ), it started rebooting again.  After a little over an hour, it stabilized.I have since ordered a replacement and am returning the defective unit.Thank you Amazon for your no hassle return policy, including paying for return shipping.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera is a very good value
Reviews.Author: Donald K. Landstrom "Portland2"
Reviews.Content: The item arrived ahead of projections and was very well packed and installed on my security system in a matter of minutes.  This item was exactly as advertised and exceeded my expectations.  Very good product for the money.  Highly recommended if you wish computer visual (and IR) pictures.

Reviews.Title: Super cool!
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: We actually got this camera because a friend of ours had one for his kids room. My husband thought it was cool so we bought one. It took awhile to set up the phones to work with 3G but now that it's done, it's awesome! I check on our dog all the time during the day.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: Camera works great!  Really good picture quality.  Pretty easy to set up, just make sure all of your firewall settings and router settings are correct to allow for it.

Reviews.Title: No complaints so far.
Reviews.Author: McBowflex
Reviews.Content: I just setup a second one of these Foscam cameras today for my other son's room.  They are simple to setup, if you know what you're doing.  I can't stress that enough.  If you aren't familiar with computers, networking, etc...  You aren't going to have much fun setting this camera up.  That being said, if you do know what you're doing, this camera can be up in running with at least just basic viewing within minutes.  I can't speak much to the features of the camera such as the FTP and email alerts and so on.  I have both of these cameras feeding into a server running Blue Iris software.  So have I haven't really explored any of the additional features.  So far they the original one has been up without issue for a few months now.  Both of mine are running over wifi and the video quality is just fine.  The pan and tilt functionality seems to work just fine.  I am pretty impressed with how well you can see in pitch black rooms with this camera.  Unfortunately, I don't know exactly what the effective distance of night time viewing is because the bedrooms I have these setup in are only about 12-15 feet at their longest but I have no issues seeing the entire room with them.For those who are under the impression that you get a free ddns account with one of these cameras, you technically do.  The DDNS service is bound to the actual device.  It's labeled right on the box that it's bound to the individual camera, and the DDNS URL is right on the bottom.  That doesn't mean that you can go to a 3rd party companies website and expect them to give you free DDNS service they otherwise charge for.Overall for the money I'm pretty happy with my purchase.  I wish they had zoom functionality, but I understand that would come with a higher price tag.  I do appreciate the fact that these are actually 802.11n, just wish they supported 5ghz.  2.4ghz can get awful crowded real quick, and in my experience 5ghz isn't very common.

Reviews.Title: Do not expect too much for this camera
Reviews.Author: Hiker Biker "JBHiker"
Reviews.Content: My biggest gripe is that it takes about 3 seconds before this camera can detect motion and start recording. In many cases, this is too slow for that warm and fuzzy secure feeling I want in a security camera. The control and image are OK. It is just a cheap little caamera after all. The furnished software barely works. And the sensitivity setting is not very good. DO n ot buy this if you are looking for a security solution for less. It is not going to work. People can sneak up on you.But if you are using it to observe, it works great.

Reviews.Title: Fos Cam Sopport
Reviews.Author: Michael Lopez
Reviews.Content: Your Tech by the name of Timmoraes was a great help and did a great job getting my camera up and running again.  He was very courteous and helpful.  I would give him 5 star for his help.  Thanks for your help

Reviews.Title: Trouble with installation
Reviews.Author: Breanne Benson
Reviews.Content: We worked on installing this camera for over a week!  Part of the problem was having an AT&T; modem/service. We had to have a friend who is in IT (tech genius) to help us set it up.  We use it as a baby monitor and now that it is set up it works fine, but if our friend hadn't have helped this camera would be useless.  After having trouble we searched the web for help and came across MANY forums where other people had trouble installing this camera as well.  Bottom line: if you or if someone you know is a computer genius then this camera will work for you, if not then look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Full featured IP Camera - Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I've used $500 cameras that don't hold a candle to this little guy. This camera is packed with features, and is really good quality for the money. Setup is easy (with IT knowledge). It pans and tilts almost silently. Night vision is surprisingly good, and the two-way audio is decent too. Overall, this camera is a great deal. I would definitely recommend this if you are looking for an easy, feature packed security system for the home or office (or even as a baby monitor).

Reviews.Title: foscam technical support
Reviews.Author: pgratl
Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up the camera wirelessly and to be accessed remotely over the internet. Technical support was fantastic.  Thanks again.Love the camera, love the functionality and accesibility.Would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Customer Support - Camera Connection
Reviews.Author: krusher7
Reviews.Content: Kate was very helpful assisting me with my Foscam connection.  She was very courteous and professional.  She was also very quick and she connected not one, but two of my cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great security camera and even better service support
Reviews.Author: Wwil
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item from Best Buy.  (Sorry Amazon but I had an $80 gift card).  Had some issues syncing with my Netgear router so I called Foscam support center.  Only had to wait on hold for 5 minutes.  Ten minutes later their technician, (Jees) solved all my problems and even synced up the wireless hookup for me.  I would recommend Foscam to a friend. Their support was better than most others I have tried.

Reviews.Title: setup
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Berman
Reviews.Content: Technician was most helpful. She was very patient with me. I have spent hours previously trying to get this setup. She made it very simple.

Reviews.Title: go for it
Reviews.Author: Joe. S
Reviews.Content: albert was awesome.  technical assistance was very quick and professional.  you cant go wrong here. portforwarding and wireless setup was a breeze with technical support.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME product for price
Reviews.Author: Christine Gaunt
Reviews.Content: price for the quality of product its a steal......tech is fab...watch house from work...just login..not the easiest to set up but well worth the price

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Pak
Reviews.Content: The camera came out a lot better than I expected.  There are free iPhone apps that allow you to watch the camera from anywhere.  You can't hear sound or record from the app, but for a monitoring perspective, it does the job.  Additionally, AwkwardHamster on YouTube has step-by-step on how to set up your camera to view from any computer, as well as goes into some free video recording software.I haven't mounted the camera yet, but the pan aspect lets me capture both my living room and sitting room.  I bought my camera from Warehouse Deals, so I don't know if it is supposed to look more yellow than normal, but I don't mind it.  The video comes out crystal clear on my iPhone 5 and I can now watch my LO wherever I go!  Great for the travelling man/woman.I will update once I get the video recording option set up.  I think it would be great for security, as well as a baby monitor!  I wish I would have bought this instead of my AngelCare, as we barely use that anymore.  I can imagine I will use this camera for the rest of my son's life.  Recommend based on functionality, wireless capability, and PRICE!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Oana Neniscu
Reviews.Content: Awesome movement, look, and very easy to install. I can watch my camera from my phone, tv, computer, tablet wherever I am.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: This IP camera for the price is great
Reviews.Author: Norm Parrish
Reviews.Content: Easy setup and operation. I use this camera in many different places. It can easily be moved from room to room without changes.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: John E Wiemann
Reviews.Content: the ipcamera.exe even works on windows 8. find the camera use the built in webserver. set the ip and the wireless and it works fine.. nice upgrade to the camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Michael chan
Reviews.Content: Great camera. the picture is superb and very easy to set up. The WPS didn't do so well. it could be my router more than the camera. Setup port forwarding with DYNDNS.org. I owned a previous version of this camera so coping the settings were easy. loaded the Foscam App on my iphone and enter the port forwarding info and it quickly connect over 4g. But unlike a baby monitor, which is what i am using this for, the iPhone and iTouch video needs to stay on. So just a little annoying at night in a dark room, you phone video stays on. If there is a way for the video to go to screen saver and only audio working that would be fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Use as a baby monitor- works great with the exception of some sound issues
Reviews.Author: mrssischo
Reviews.Content: We have used this product for the past year as a baby monitor. We can keep an eye on our child (and our house) by using an app on our phones, logging on to a site online, or by pulling up the camera on our computer at home over our network. We can give the log-in info to families so they can watch our little one fall asleep at night. We are very pleased with this camera and have two of them. The only issue we have run into is that sometimes the sound cuts in and out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Adam DeWitt
Reviews.Content: I have three of these cameras up and running now and have had no problems at all with any of them.  As long as you are comfortable with changing setting on your router getting these cameras setup with port forwarding was very easy and works very well.  The cameras have MUCH better low light non-IR ability than the two other cameras I have used (d-link and axis) and with the IR lights turned on the image is very good in my opinion.  While there may be better quality cameras available as far as the image is concerned, the price on those cameras is much higher and streaming that higher quality is difficult over the net for most home users.I really like the ability to move the camera around remotely.  While the built in microphone and speaker aren't the best they do work.  All-in-all I find that for the money this camera is hard to beat and I would buy another if needed.  I can also recommend using tinyCam Monitor Pro for viewing and controlling these cameras on your phone.  The program works great and can control all of the camera functions.

Reviews.Title: DIY Security
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo B Macalintal
Reviews.Content: If you need a reliable & somewhat easy to install online camera for your home, you should consider buying this product.- You can view your camera online using your iPhone, iPad or Laptop- You can set it on a motion detector mode and have it send an email to you with the picture

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jose Rafael
Reviews.Content: I hope I can be of help to others who are undecided on their purchase.I am 54 and I'm not an IT, I am a civil engineer, and before ordering the camera I read everything I could find on the internet and youtube.I have an old router D Link DI 624, with 9 dbi antenna to further strengthen the signal.Bought a Foscam FI8910W, used, on Amazon Warehousedeals, as always excellent service and a guarantee A, the camera arrived before the expected time, and extremely well protected. I recommend it.The experience of connecting the camera was not traumatic, just followed the steps in the manual.In about 15 minutes I had the camera running both my intranet, such as the internet and wireless throughout.The camera is very stable when it detects movement or sound is detected when the house alarm is triggered, proceeds to send the photos attached in the email.The image quality is not the best in the world, but for the price is quite acceptable.It is very important to test the camera location provisionally, as this greatly influences the quality of the image, at different times of day and night, and you also have to take into account the bulbs that may be in the viewing angle of the camera, and everything I read, only in a post referred to this. Once we are satisfied with the results, we can proceed to fix it.For mobile phone, mine is a Samsung, I recommend IP Cam Viewer application is excellent.Now I'm trying other recording software, such as the Blue Iris, and Vitamin D, then tell you that I prefer.

Reviews.Title: FoscamFI8910w
Reviews.Author: Bogsy24
Reviews.Content: Versatile and Smart Device. It was so very easy to set up and it meets up to my expectations. Movement capture is awesome, it sends pictures to your email right away and you can pan tilt / zoom the camera while your away.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Anthony Whiteman
Reviews.Content: There are numerous videos and tips on how to set up this camera at <[...]>.The android app name "foscam remote" works really well with this camera.  Two things to note with this camera:1. the range of the Wi-Fi with the included antenna is limited. Depending upon where it is installed there are several solutions. For example, you can get a pair of 9db antennas for the router and the camera to get a little more distance, but for longer distances you need to get more creative.  I put this camera in the basement to keep on eye on the kids. This is 2 stories down from the Verizon router, so  I am using a pair of network powerline plugs to get a good internet connection to the basement, then connected a second wireless router which is set up as an access point for the ip camera to connect.  Alternatively I could have run a Ethernet cable from the camera to the powerline plug in the basement, but with the wireless access point we can connect multiple devices.2. second complaint is I am still having an issue getting IE to connect to the camera via activex.  I read a lot of forums offering solutions, and adjusted the activex settings in IE as stated on the foscam support site, but am not having luck.  I don't want to spend more $$ on the Blue Iris software, so I will continue to look for a solution because the only way to get 2 way sound via a computer is using IE.  Other browsers do not offer sound.Tip: Tech savy people may know this, but for the rest of us: if you intend on accessing the camera from within the same network as the camera, then use the 192.168.x.x:xxxx address because it works a little faster. Only use the public static IP address you find using 'whatsmyip.com' if you are out side your home network.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: RpG
Reviews.Content: I didn't have many of the problems other users had setting up.  Had it up and running in about 30 minutes.  Can view from desktop, iPhone and iPad both locally and remotely.  Directions online and included did the job.

Reviews.Title: Good baby cam
Reviews.Author: Old Mac Man
Reviews.Content: Fun to watch the little one who I think should be asleep but is up there playing as I type this. A little tricky getting it wireless and still havent got the camera set up for me to check in from work and see image off internet. Audio isnt working but d/l the file and still not hearing anything. Video is fine on ipad but same thing, cant get audio.  Looking at some stand alone apps. Shouldnt have to pay more to someone else to get your hardware to work right.

Reviews.Title: Magnificent IP camera
Reviews.Author: Rene Izquierdo
Reviews.Content: Magnificent IP camera. Very good video quality, easy to install and use. Wide range of vision with excellent infrared night vision. Maybe a little big in design. It has good wireless reception and responds immediately to commands of movement.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W camera
Reviews.Author: Sanjuro
Reviews.Content: Camera worked better than my Foscam FI8919W.  Greens were green with nice bright video from the camera, but I had to get used to turning off the infrared LED off in the brower control panel because changes in lighting will repeatedly allow the camera LED to turn on and off.  The camera seems to need three controls....LED ON, LED Off, LED Neutral.

Reviews.Title: blurry picture
Reviews.Author: Fredm
Reviews.Content: if you like to see images without recognizing the face this is the camera for you. The images are not clear at all. Thanks to Amazons return policy I sent it back after two days,

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: James R Lane
Reviews.Content: I wanted to have a camera that I could check at anytime by internet access. These worked very well and were easy to set up and install.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Julia S. Jorge
Reviews.Content: Good image. Nice control. You can really see at night . Is very light and comes with a support good product

Reviews.Title: gigi
Reviews.Author: GiGi & Michael
Reviews.Content: purchase this do to having issue with theft and I would recommend this Foscam FI8910W TO ANYONE WHO NEEDS SECURITY FOR THERE HOME.Great Camera... Works Well.....Highly Recommend this Camera for your home. Glad I did get this and will get another one. Very please with this home security system....

Reviews.Title: Foscam PT Camera: Easy to use; Easy to access away from home!
Reviews.Author: DavidG-NYC "DavidG"
Reviews.Content: [Tech: Scott]Foscam has updated their pan-tilt [PT] camera [FI8910w] and instructions to make it MUCH easier to install and use.  They established a secure site to look at it from "off-site"...frankly it was awful before, but they obviously have worked-out the kinks in this version of hardware, software, and instructions, and it's great!!  I only needed tech support because of "port forwarding" issues with my modem/router.It has easy-to-use PT features and it's easy to pre-set multiple positions, and now is also easy to use when I am away from home.  It finally makes it easy for me to keep tabs on my elderly father and keep him safe!

Reviews.Title: Foscam techincal support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Had a problem configuring the camera for remote viewing and Felix @ Foscam was able to quickly resolve the issue.  I'm a very satisfied customer.  The camera quality and function is great!!

Reviews.Title: Great Cam!
Reviews.Author: Holly Nelson
Reviews.Content: Really great camera at a fair price. Worth every penny! Only suggestion is: If you're not fairly adept at computers you should be prepared to either have someone who is good at them help you or call tech support. Setup can be tricky especially if you need to view the camera from a remote location and need to do the port forwarding. I was ok and felt the instructions were very clear but I know a lot of people with basic computer skills who would struggle with it.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: LeRoy
Reviews.Content: I purchased two cameras.  I followed the instructions online to set them up and they worked for over a month before one disconnected.  The customer service hours are very limited, but once they were on the phone they fixed everything quickly.Instructions 3/10Customer Service 9/10Camera 8/10

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support - coaches reviews??
Reviews.Author: Shelly
Reviews.Content: I could not find my wireless Lan network and Felix did an awesome job finding and fixing the problem by upgrading my firmware. Thank you!!The picture looks great and so far I would recomend this to others.  Editted 4/31/13 : However I must add that these words were not entirely my own.  Yes the camera is good. Has good picture and Felix did help upgrade my camera to find it's ip address, but when we finished he directed me straight to this site and encouraged certain phrases.  Later my camera kept loosing it's wireless connection.  I called tech support again.  This time a lady helped me. She remote logged on my pc and proceeded to change things on my wireless router and ip camera settings.  I would have felt better if either one of them had told me exactly what they were doing, but they did not.  They jumped from screen to screen changing things and not imforming me of what or why.  At the end of our call she directed me to this site to leave a review again. I was not able to continue the call, so she was not giving the opportunity to coach me in my review.  So far the camera is OK. If it does not loose concetion again it will be great! Tech support did have a short wait time, but needs improving on communication to the customer on what is being done.  Also do not coach people on whato to say.  We like our own words, thoughts, opions to be expressed.  It makes me wonder how many over reviews were coached. How accurate is their star rating??  I removed two stars for this reason.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: lloyd
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to keep my home safe. the picture quality in the day is good but at night it needs improvement,one of the good things of this camera is that am able to recieve email alerts and i would recomend this camera to others

Reviews.Title: Resetting cameras
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: scott was very helpful. He was able to fix the problem quickly. I liked being able to view my cameras by remote access and I like that you are also able to hear what is going on as well. I like the night vision feature as well.  I would recoment this camera this others, It is inexpensive and works great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: P. Broussard "Kenzardo"
Reviews.Content: Great tech service. Good product would recommend to friends good  quality  picture great sound quality and excellent product for anyone

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: G. Castillo
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble with connecting to WIFI with this cam.  I was able to remote in to the cam and set it up connected to my modem.  Unfortunely telling my wifi abilities were not working.  SO I contacted Tech Support and had a gentlemen help me by connecting with teamviewer ( a program I was familiar with).  My setup is Win 7 Linksys e2000 router and DD-wrt custom firmware.  He came in and fixed my issue.  My issue was I had my setting like my router.  WPA2 tkip+aes and correct pw.  Only thing my computer picked it up as AES, he switched the mode to AES and boom it worked.  Also helped me with my remote settings even though I had it setup initially.  Overall great feedback and did'nt start from beginning like I didn't know a thing or two about computers and trusted what I did up until that point.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with Cam.
Reviews.Author: MD "deek139"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to monitor our remote vacation home. Unless you have some basic networking knowledge you may need some help with setting this up. There are many settings to configure in your router, camera, and possibly modem. This is not a simple plug and play. I have to say that the two times I called customer support I was promptly connected to a technical support person. They set up a remote link to your pc and they configure all of the settings and will get the camera up and running. The camera has a built in mic and speaker for remote monitoring and communication. The picture is good in daylight and at night. Don't expect a high def picture. Just a good quality which is all I need. I set up the motion detection which works very well. Setting up the unit to send e-mails was a little tricky because I could not find all of the settings for my Yahoo account. For reference the setting for yahoo and sbcglobal.net are smtp.mail.yahoo.com port # is 465 select TLS from drop down menu. Check the box under the TLS menu as well. There are also several you tube videos with detailed set up instructions. There is a good gmail one from the manufacturer. I also purchased the Foscam pro app from the App Store for my ipad and iphone. I highly recommend this app. It works great and was easy to set up. I tried some of the free apps but could not get it to work. The app lets you change some settings on the cam remotely. I would have given it 5 start but any product where you need to call support should not get 5 stars. I was really impressed with the customer support.

Reviews.Title: Great tech support on setting porting forward
Reviews.Author: wei cai
Reviews.Content: scott helped me to set remote access to my F18910W by setting the port forwarding on my in-house routers and he is knowledgeable and patient and highly recommended. Features most liked include wireless and remote access from internet and foscam's own ip address.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: itskirstin
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price.....Harry Foster the technical rep with Foscam walked me through the process of getting the camera setup and was very knowledgeable and helpful!!  Excellent technical support!!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Home user
Reviews.Content: Everything is fine.  Easy to set up.Took a few second to adjust to the lighting when you rotated the camera.Wish I can afford the HD version.

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera support
Reviews.Author: Kevin st john
Reviews.Content: scott was very helpful. help me to setup remote access and alarm. he did the work an i watched. great servicefeatures most liked: wireless and remote access

Reviews.Title: Foscam is best
Reviews.Author: Hitesh B.
Reviews.Content: Foscam is best ip camera system. its very easy to setup and very good technical support from RYAN. There is a motion detection. I loved it. very good apps for iphone and you can see live with AUDIO. thats good part of Foscam camera. and its very cheap price compare to other ip camera system. RYAN Give best technical support over the phone and login into my computer and did the setup.

Reviews.Title: 2nd times a charm
Reviews.Author: L. Huynh
Reviews.Content: 1st order of this camera had issues with the camera not being detected and being non-responsive.  Exchanged it through Amazon (relatively easy process) and the 2nd camera worked well.  Does everything my more expensive TrendNet IP422W can do, but less expensive.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera and Fabulous Tech Support
Reviews.Author: George-Scotland
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to view on my computer and iphone and without the help of HARRY FOSTER I would not have been able to do so. He generated an IP Address so that my camera can now be used remotely using WI-FI.I am very pleased with my camera especially on my Iphone which has a very clear picture. I am so pleased with my phone that I have bought an outside camera also which I am waiting to arrive and as soon as it arrives I will just contact HARRY again and I know he will guide me through the setup.I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam technical support
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up the cameras to be viewed from outside the home network and to set up the email alert settings on motion detection. Ralph Mendez did a superb job.  This camera is GREAT!  I would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: Works well, but does have some quirks
Reviews.Author: L. B. McKenzie "McKenzie"
Reviews.Content: The camera set-up was a tad tricky (directions seem to have been written by non-english speaker), and I had to play around with the settings. Also, we had another non-ip wireless monitor running which essentially jammed the signal from the Foscam. Once we turned that off, it worked well. We up the app tinyCam Monitor which works great with the Foscam (got the paid version after testing the free version). Overall, pretty satisfied.

Reviews.Title: HOME LAND
Reviews.Author: Demond cortez miller
Reviews.Content: the smart phone feature and email alert makes me feel safe at home or not. I don't live in the best neighborhood and(ADT) can get expense.. DIY...

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I had an excellent technical support from Foscam Company with Ron Jacob. Ron showed me step by step to set up all those wireless camera I bought from Foscam (Foscam FI8910W)

Reviews.Title: Superb Service
Reviews.Author: JES
Reviews.Content: Superb IT service - couldn't ask for anything more. Had some trouble installing the product on my own so I contacted customer service - They patiently helped me every step of the way.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Kevin Flynn
Reviews.Content: Needed help because it was not generating an IP Address and needed to set up the cameras wirelessly and remotely. I was able to speak with Ralph Mendez who was extremely helpful and was able to resolve the issue quickly. I am extremely satisfied with the product and picture quality and highly recommend the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera PLUS Fabulous Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Pamela L. Vunovich "Pamela D."
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these cameras and could not be happier with both the product itself and the technical service.  I've had my fair share of challenges getting each camera hooked up to my wireless network at home, and enabling the port-forwarding to view the cams remotely from my ipad and iphone, but Foscam's tech support has delivered fast, friendly and effective assistance each time.  The quality of the picture is impressive and the audio isn't bad either.  I first purchased one of these cams as a "nanny cam" in the family room, and then added another as I found it worked much much better than my baby monitor in the nursery.  Recently we had a power outage and I could no longer view these cams remotely -- I called Foscam today and Ryan from tech support immediately solved my problem, and enabled a few settings to prevent it from occurring in the future should we lose power again.  Customer service PLUS.  Thanks Foscam, we're huge fans!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: NC
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera to keep an eye on your baby, when you are not at home. It is very hard to set up but Scott at customer service was wonderful and super helpful. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 10 over 10
Reviews.Author: aihab akasha
Reviews.Content: scott was very helpfull,step by step remote assistance well done,the cameras was 2 fi8910 love the colors looks natural,yes buy them cameras you will love them

Reviews.Title: Service after the sale
Reviews.Author: Lee W. Mosher
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster helped me with installing two cameras with port forwarding on a Technicolor router than was giving me problems.  He was polite and extremely knowledgeable and was able to set up the motion detection and e-mail notification features.I have not had much experience with the remote monitoring, but a friend installed Foscam products to check up on his mother who lives far away and he recommended them.Although the instruction manuals and video were not as clear as they could have been regarding the many possible configurations, the technical support was excellent.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM ROCKS !
Reviews.Author: holly l soistman
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster!  is a great tech!What a great JOB!Foscam tech support is the best! I am so impressed. I will purchase more to Foscam products and tell everyone who askes what great support!Model: F18910W

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tech Support
Reviews.Author: blymor
Reviews.Content: I thought I was tech savy in setting up my new Foscam F18910W but alas I still needed some help.  I called Foscam technical support and spoke with Ryan who was extremely helpful in assisting me on getting my camera up and running in a minimal time.  I am very pleased on the ease of its use, etc.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: KMH "DobeLvr"
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for about 7 months now:I'm pretty tech savvy and it was easy to set up at first.... I did have a problem with the port forwarding having never done it before. After many google attempts to get it right I called Tech support and they walked me through it. Used the camera for many months, no problems and good quality images. I have this mounted inside on a window ledge and did have to put up a black sheet to prevent window glare back when the sun is shining directly at the window (which is only from about 2-4pm for me) I have a huge tree in the yard, so shade is my friend in this case.Remote viewing is great too, especially when you're not home. Love the features and easy to use.On 4-15-13 I had to get a new router which didn't recognize the camera. I did everything I thought I was supposed to such as adding the new router password codes, etc...the camera did work when plugged into the Ethernet, just not wirelessly, again contacted tech support and Ron Jacob fixed what was wrong. My IR went out after 3 months of use, wasn't a big deal to me since I have motion lights in the yard. I did mention it to Ron Jacob and he said to watch it for a few days since we had to reboot the camera itself and that should fix the IR problem. No clue why the IR went out in the first place, working fine one night, then not....I was told that if the IR didn't work a replacement would be sent out. Overall, very happy with the camera, great images, even the night ones (when the IR works) the price is great for what you get and the customer service can't be beat! Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Michael Hoffman "Mike"
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA, VERY QUICK RESPONSE, GREAT INTERFACE WITH MY ANDROID CAMERA.  GREAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT FROM LEO!!!!!  THE WIRELESS SETTING IS QUICK AND EASY

Reviews.Title: It works! and so does their tech support at an unbeatable price
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: All the features you get at this price, using these for a network of security cams is a "no-brainer". I was reluctant at first but now that I've used 2 of them with success, I would definitely purchase more.The cams were straight forward as far as setting them up locally (LAN). They were up and runnning in no time. To access them remotely requires some basic port forwarding. I kept running into an error when customizing my settings on the cam which prompted me to contact tech support to see what the deal might be (plus I was curious about how my experience would be with their support team).Fortunately, I got Harry Foster on the line after about a 15 min wait during business hours and he was knew the product well. He was quite knowledgable and got me through my issues. I had a surprisingly pleasant, good first experience with Foscam tech support (minus the hold time so I'd suggest to try shooting them an email).

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera - IT Support was very helpful
Reviews.Author: Maria Martinez
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to monitor my puppy who had a seizure.  I tried setting it up but was not successful so I called the Foscam IT support  and they were instrumental in setting it up.  Also, I got the FOSCAM pro iphone APP.  I wasn't successful in setting it up so I once again called the FOSCAM IT support and they set it up for me.  I am loving this camera and will be purchasing others.  I fully recommend this along with the FOSCAL pro APP.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup but only 1/2 of a security system
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: The camera was a breeze to setup if you follow the instructions included in the box.  Everything worked like it was supposed to and I didn't have any problems removing the CAT5 and making it Wi-Fi, just be sure you give it a few seconds.  The WebUI was fine and had the basic controls you'd expect: up/down, left/right, diagonal. It even had a flip/invert image in case you mount the camera upside-down.  In terms of a security system, this product is only half of what you need.  It would be fine if you are constantly looking at the camera and are there to point it in the right direction when needed, but the automation and recording features are not as accessible as the other features.  In fact, for full recording functionality additional software is recommended.  I understand that the software is not bundled because you might only need 1 copy of the software but 12 cameras - bundling would be redundant.  Lastly, I tried messing with the mic/sound on the camera but that was a bit frustrating as it required a VLC plugin and even then I never got the speaker option to work, however, that was not a feature I wanted so I'm not too worried about it.  The picture quality of the camera would not be featured in the Iron Man movie but features and clothing are identifiable.TL;DR: Great camera but you need additional software to record the video

Reviews.Title: Quality Camera
Reviews.Author: Some Guy
Reviews.Content: Setup is fairly painless and the camera performs well.  My only significant criticism is the lack of app support for tablets/phones by the manufacturer itself, though there are acceptable options available from third parties.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: EricB
Reviews.Content: Awesome product. Fast shipping and the products, I bought two, work great. Set it up to send email pictures in motion detection mode and keep and eye out on your lair.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: SgtAl
Reviews.Content: I was having problems accesing my camera while away from home.Felix was extremely helpful in solving my problem. I highly recommend Foscam to others.

Reviews.Title: A little difficult to set up, but AMAZING technical support
Reviews.Author: Nanhosen
Reviews.Content: I just installed the camera today, so I can't say too much about it's functionality so far. However, I can say that Foscam has amazing technical support. I made it about 3 steps into the instructions before I ran into problems. I called up Foscam, waited on hold for about 10 minutes, and then Ryan, a very helpful representative helped me setup the camera. They have a really cool software that allows them to control your computer, so he pretty much did everything for me. I'm really excited to use this camera!

Reviews.Title: conncect using cell phone
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: Sandra Williams was great, helped me set up my I phone using 4G.. Works great and it only took a few minutes. Just call customer service for help.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: These cameras are exactly what we needed to watch our 93 y/o dad remotely but the best thing is the technical support set it all up for me and they are extremely helpful, particularly Scott.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: Philip Sohn
Reviews.Content: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (Black)Harry Foster , Great Service. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Fantastic customer support
Reviews.Author: A. B. Patrick Miller
Reviews.Content: These cameras will be a great security addition to our home...and while the setup instructions were clear I'm not the most savvy IT guy in the world...Judy was a tremendous help setting three cameras for me...THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM Camera Customer Service
Reviews.Author: michesco
Reviews.Content: Super helpful, so excited to finally be able to use my camera to view my puppy! Quick and easy, thank yoU!

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Gregory M Sauls
Reviews.Content: After reviewing a few alternatives we decided to purchase this camera.  We recently had our garage broken into & an $ 1100.00 dirt bike stolen.  We have an alarm system inside the house but not in the garage.  After receiving the camera I was able to load the software and get the camera image via ethernet cable connection to my pc within 5 mins.  However, I was not able to get the wireless connection to work.  I seemed to be following all of the directions but the camera would not show up.  I then called FOSCAM tech support, the 800# in the manual that comes with the camera.  After pressing 2 for customer service I almost immediately was talking to someone.  The technician took control of my computer with team viewer and had the wireless working in less than a minute.  I was like, wow.  Then she moved on, at my request, to configure the camera to take pictures upon motion detection & email those to mine & my wife's Iphone.  Just what we wanted.  Great product & excellent customer service!

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: KUMIKO
Reviews.Content: I had a little trouble with the installation of the camera so I called in for tech support and I got excellent help from this lady.  She knows what she's doing.  I did not ask for her name but I guess you will be able to trace the lady who helped me set up my camera.  She was WONDERFUL!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Gabriele Beck
Reviews.Content: these cameras are a great product. there was a little problem setting up the cameras but the technical support at foscam.com was superior. the techs quickly understood my problems and help me fix. they were great.

Reviews.Title: not the same specs as previous foscam cam with the same model! bad colors
Reviews.Author: smarty_q8
Reviews.Content: not the same picture quality as a previous FI8910w that i bought 6 months ago. the lens downgraded from 3.6mm to 2.8 mm!!!! colors are very bad!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this a little skeptical of its quality but was happy to find out how easy it was to set up and how good the quality is! If you are looking for true HD quality u won't get it here but u will get really good quality. It's easy to access from and computer or phone and the iPhone app is awesome. The two way audio from the phone app is perfect. I have this in my sons room to monitor him when he's sleeping/waking up and also to just see him playing while I'm working. I have it running wirelessly one floor above my router and hasn't ever lost a connection. If you are looking for and ip camera with good quality this is it

Reviews.Title: relatively easy to set up for remote viewing
Reviews.Author: G. Fadel
Reviews.Content: I set the camera up realatively easily following the instructions.  I was able to view the cam from the web from oversees, which is what i wanted.  Then the electricity was cut, and my modem was reset with another ip address.  I had to wait to get back to the cam to set it back up.  I found out later i could have done it remotely if i had set up the link differently.  I am still trying to figure out how to get notifications when someone comes in front of the cam.  I can manage relatively well with computers, but i still do not have this feature set up. The instructions are poor....

Reviews.Title: Great baby camera
Reviews.Author: Jay "jason_j_a"
Reviews.Content: Like many folks, I had the wireless baby cameras with their lousy range and poor displays.  With the proliferation of tablets and phones around my home it made since to upgrade to something better.  For the price, these are great little cameras.  If they supported Power over Ethernet then they would be perfect.  I can view this camera on Windows Phone, Windows RT, Android, iPads, etc.  The Foscams are so popular that they work with whatever you want to use.

Reviews.Title: Great for a baby monitor
Reviews.Author: BH
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our baby monitor. It works very well, and the picture is very clear, even when you zoom. I also like that you can use the intercom to talk, sometimes if my husband is in my daughters room and I need something I will use the intercom and it works great. I love being able to be at work and peek in on my baby when she is home with the sitter.The reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because sometimes in the middle of the night the sound goes out on my phone, I do not know if it is the camera or the phone that makes the sound go away. Otherwise I would have given it 5 out of 5 stars if I knew for sure it was just my phone.Another thing: The application that lets you listen and talk on your smartphone is an extra 5$. No big deal but I wanted to let you know because I was surprised I had to pay more once I already bought the camera.This is a great product. I recommend it to all my friends with babies.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera... Not easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: timnew1111
Reviews.Content: I have yet to get this camera to work wirelessly. Not an easy install. Terrible install. When I did, finally after hours of research, get it to work hard wired... it couldn't be controlled by my iphone or ipad...just my laptop. I'm hoping when I have the time and support I'll learn how to get it to work properly. If so I'll give it a thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Mehgall
Reviews.Content: Really easy to set up and use.  I love that it works with our phones and iPads so we can use multiple devices to watch our little one!  The two way audio feature is great when you need to tell them to get back in bed!

Reviews.Title: Camera is ok but the tech support is awful
Reviews.Author: Irene Wells
Reviews.Content: These cameras work well and are easy enough to set up if you are familiar with electronics and computers.  For the average lay person it is a challenge.  The tech support is terrible.  Getting through to someone is a long drawn out process and the knowledge of the person you get is not great.  It took over 3 hours to get the two camera I purchased on line and functioning properly and the tech had to do it remotely.One of the cameras stopped working and I returned it for a replacement camera.  Amazon's replacement service was spot on.  The new camera arrived within two days.  Tech support, again, was less than helpful and I finally told them to forget it, I'd figure it out myself.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Edwin Elberson
Reviews.Content: Camera works just as advertised, had to have a little help setting up. We use it to watch the dogs when away from the house.

Reviews.Title: Buy It you can't beat it...
Reviews.Author: K. Long
Reviews.Content: Great deal, great camera, you do need to know what your ding to configure it but most today do... Awesome for the price I paid over $400 few years ago for one that is not as nice as this... Great Product...

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: pike513
Reviews.Content: Just got my camera, updated the firmware and called support to make sure I did it all correctly.  The agent logged onto my PC setup my camera and also setup my iphone app. Great service now I look forward to playing with the camera and I will report back.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Scott did an excellent job setting up my camera.  I can now view it from my iphone!!!The camera works great and I can view it from remote locations.thanks Scott!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Difficult setup
Reviews.Author: chad rhutasel
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product in January, 2013. Was very difficult to set up by myself. Had the foscam team help me set up remotely which was a lifesaver. Worked great until I had to get a new wireless router and the team had to help me again which was great. Having to sit on the phone for 1/2 hour waiting to talk to someone sucks but it beats pulling my hair out. On my third router now and you guessed it. This time the ip camera tool page wouldn't find the cameras so we had to reconnect and reinstall all the cameras. UGH. I love the cameras, great night vision with good clarity. Thanks to Ron Jacobs for his help on the latest round. I wish Foscam had a live chat support 24/7 where it was quick and easy for them to fix problems remotely. They do have a chat but it seems like it's rarely available, even during working hours?

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: Needed assistance with setting up the cameras remotely to access it over the internet. The tech support by Ralph Mendez is great. He is competent and patient. I am satisfied with the tech support.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: lilewis
Reviews.Content: For only $70, it's a pretty good IP cam - quality is good, image is good, and features are good with the exceptions of lacking zoom and some other small nits.Initial setup for viewing on the computer using the supplied cat5 cable is easy - following the instructions on the manual.However once you attempt to jump over to wireless, if you're limited to a WEP router this is as tricky as any other IP device. I ended up having to call Foscam and wait online for a full hour before a tech named Kalvin picked up but who efficiently finished the wireless setup for me.In any case, thanks to Kalvin it's working quite nicely.If Foscam had more tech support/less waiting time, this review would have been 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: FosCam Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I worked with Scott to set up remote access for my camera. I am not computer savvy, but Scott did a very good job of navigating through several different technical menus and helped me setup my camera correctly. Also, he was able to ensure that my camera worked just as it did before with my iPhone using the FOSCAM PRO application. I really appreciate the help and will be buying another camera and calling for assistance with its setup as well. Thank you.Th best feature of the camera is by far the quality of the video provided, as well as the ability to remotely manipulate the camera.-Jamie Glines

Reviews.Title: Technical support
Reviews.Author: PeterD
Reviews.Content: Setting up mail alerts and motion detection.  Felix was great in helping me get this service up and running.  As a novice he was very patient and supportive throughout.  This camera F18910W indoor pan/tilt wireless IP camera is a great addition to my home.  It provides great video and notiication services.

Reviews.Title: homer-1
Reviews.Author: homer
Reviews.Content: i love  the foscam  it has a nice clear picture  and the support is the  best  i would buy  again

Reviews.Title: foscam technical support
Reviews.Author: Anthony
