Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up the cameras remotely and set up motion detection .Ralph mendez very satisfied with the support received.the picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: foscam tech suppot
Reviews.Author: Orlando C
Reviews.Content: Scott with technical support was very helpful and knowledgeable in helping me set up internet access to my camera. The feature i like the most is being able to remote access from anywhere with ease.

Reviews.Title: Works great with Baby Monitor HD app for iPhone
Reviews.Author: N. Shepard "engineer"
Reviews.Content: My setup:Camera on ceiling (attached to wall using included bracket) above crib in baby's nursery, connected over wireless N to router 75ft (2 walls) away.DDNS configured for free for access outside the local networkiPhone app: Baby Monitor HD from GmbhPros:Good wireless speed: 6-10fps on 640x480, 12-21fps on 320x240, depending on network conditions (same frame rates observed on local wireless network or away from home over LTE, no difference - wireless N speed camera-to-router is my limiting factor)Easy to configure for DDNS (I thought).  Many people complain about this, but I wouldn't be able to set up most cameras to do it at all, and this one was relatively easy (budget 2 hours for this).It has not crashed, restarted, or otherwise required technical intervention since being installed 2 weeks ago (this is IMPORTANT for me)Audio from integrated mic is good, but sound when camera is moving or speaking is obnoxiousPan/Tilt is easy/intuitive/fastLow price ($80)Soeaking into room from my iPhone works great and is cool, but ultimately not something I will practically use very often/maybe neverDelivers what is promisesCons:No integrated temperature measurement (this would be a huge improvement for baby monitoring, I would have paid up to $60 more for this)No zoom (nice-to-have, especially in low-def resolution, I would have paid $20 more to have this)No HD resolution, although I probably wouldn't prefer the lower frame rate that HD would require (maybe $10 added value to have this)Using external mic causes noise (supposedly from interference with wireless antenna), I gave up after a 1 hour attempt to use an external micSummary:Great buy for baby monitor setup<$100 for camera + iPhone appAccess anywhere in the world, and multple account support if you want others to view alsoMore features, convenience, security, and flexibility than $300 in-store baby monitor systemsNo additional/obnoxious rechargeable screen to throw on the pile

Reviews.Title: Not my first Rodeo !
Reviews.Author: Gbitt.
Reviews.Content: This camera is one of several I have used in the past several years.  Foscam has a good product.  I am satisfied with this camera and the price range is good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor "Gadget monster"
Reviews.Content: Love this thing.  It works flawlessly, was easy to configure.  Many people complain about the configuration but I found if you just followed the instructions very closely it worked just fine.Pros:Adequate picture qualityPan feature via mobile devices and webEasy set-upCons:Audio quality fairIR illuminators are visible in the dark, would prefer that these not be seen as it draws attention to the deviceFor the price this is a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Foscam problems
Reviews.Author: Not sarisfied
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster is  best. He was able to tactfully help me through my problem and diagnose it and promptly fix the problem! Will buy again!

Reviews.Title: Great for elderly monitoring
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these, one black, one white, refurbished and although they are both a little glitchy, they have been performing 24/7 as monitors to check on my dad who needs constant attention because of age and health. One turns the night led off sometines and the other seems to hang every now and then and needs to be reset. To be fair I knew these were refurbished units, and other than that they are working like champs, lots of options, can be configured to record on movement and send pictures to your email. A bit of advice, these cameras are advertised as having two way audio, and they do. Its just that it seems it has not been properly implemented in most software. Tinycam monitor pro (android) is the only one I have found to work fairly well, and also remember you need decent bandwidth. Also remember to register with Foscam to get the latest firmware but be careful. My two cameras are exactly the same including model number, except for color, but use completely different firmware and you WILL brick your camera if you use the wrong one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Runt "Runt"
Reviews.Content: I have two of these now and will be adding more soon.  I use them to watch my babies at night.  I like they have P&T.;  I generally use them at night so the night vision is awesome.  I will be adding more to my front door and back door soon.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Great Support
Reviews.Author: James Rea
Reviews.Content: I have to say after struggling to get this camera to work, I called tech support (Foscam US) and the tech..Albert..logged into my  and computer and set it up perfectly and explained how it was set up and set me up with the Foscam Pro app for my Iphone ($5.99 and worth every penny.) The picture is great and it has night vision. I will be purchasing more and also, if you are looking for a great software to run these cameras, I highly recommend that you invest in Blue Iris software and the Blue Iris phone app as well. Both are fantastic. Kudos again to Albert at Foscam  US and Ken at Blue Iris !

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Israel
Reviews.Content: Foscam camera works well especially after telephone assisted set-up. Inexpensive security system. Am having trouble with emial notifications and alarm system. I have two of them now, and will consider getting another if I can resolve email and alarm issues.

Reviews.Title: external hard drive
Reviews.Author: jesse huffman
Reviews.Content: ron jacob was grt help fix all the problem i have with a pleasure attitude.i am enjoy the camera would like for it to show a clear picture but it is getting the job did.trying to save money to get another.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Joan J Carraro
Reviews.Content: Support at Foscam was very helpful.  I called and Simon helped me get my cameras up and running.  The cameras have great options like 2-way audio and pan & tilt.  I'm looking forward to using them to keep an eye on my two busy kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the F18910W camera. Had a little difficulty setting it up but tech support was quick and helpful. Spoke with Leo he was very good with directions and we got it set up perfectly.  This is my fourth Foscam and I am leaving a wired system to go with all Foscams because they work so well.

Reviews.Title: foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: scotti like the remote video.yes i will recommend the foscam to the many members of the world.scott did a great job.

Reviews.Title: 8910W Excellent product, online service and phone tech support!!
Reviews.Author: LtMac
Reviews.Content: First time using this camera/company and am very pleased with the camera, iphone/ipad app, company itself and tech support. The camera is simple enough for a first-timer to set up but if you need additional help, the phone tech support wait time is short, the agents speak clearly and are able to remotely connect to your computer to assist you for free.Will definitely be switching over to Foscam for our home security system and will be recommending this to our friends!

Reviews.Title: great cam
Reviews.Author: q
Reviews.Content: Had some problems setting up ports, but tech support was able to solve the problem.  Great help from the tech support.  Happy with the camera so far.  Like it well enough that a second one has been ordered.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, but requires a lot of setup
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: I purchased these so I can monitor my pets from work.  These cameras are fairly decently priced but require about 30 minutes of setup to be accessible externally away from home.  If you want any easy take me out of the box and install the software camera, this is probably not for you.With this camera, you should sign up for a free ddns service.  Each camera has a hardcoded one, but the address is pretty hard to remember.  By using the free ddns you can pretty much pick your remote address name.You will also need to know how to assign dhcp reservation for each camera's internal ip address and setup port forwarding on your router.  There is some decent documentation that can be retrieved from foscam's user forums on how to setup the remote access options with step by step instructions and screen shots.I prefer this camera over some of the other ones out there as many don't offer pan and tilt options.  Once seutp you can view your camera through any internet browser.  You can also view your camera from your mobile cell phone/tablet's browser.  There are also third party apps you can purchase that make viewing your camera a little easier through your device's app store.

Reviews.Title: Camera itself works fine, BUT
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Camera itself works great, BUT I have yet to get the darn thing to view on my phone or be able to sign and view from another location.  Maybe it's just me...I'm fairly computer literate, but I have given up.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Mic is Sensitive
Reviews.Author: M. Trang
Reviews.Content: Great IP camera, a little hard to setup but with some YouTub'ing I figured it out. The microphone on the camera is really sensitive and transmits some static when silent but otherwise, it's great. I'll probably be buying another one soon.

Reviews.Title: Great ip cam
Reviews.Author: cla3d2
Reviews.Content: Love these cameras. I now have 4. They are not difficult to setup if you follow the directions. I use a mac so the directions have you log right into the camera to set it up. I would recommend everyone use this method. It easier then the included software.Log into your router and look at attached devices then use its IP address to login. Once logged in I went into basic network settings and assigned a static IP address. Then into users to setup the username and password. Then the final step is wireless setup. Let it search for your wireless network. Put in your password and your done

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Rick Lawthers
Reviews.Content: I actually own two of these cameras.  They are perfect for keeping an eye on various areas.  You can adjust just how sensitive you want the motion detection capabilities to be and then when something has been detected, I have it send me an email along with up to 6 pictures so that I can see what is going on at home when I'm not there.  I also have the images FTP'd to my web server for backup.  You can also download standard IP Cam apps for your Droid phones and/or IPhones so that you can see live images from all of your cameras right on your cell phone.  This camera operates wirelessly so no need to run a cable from your router to the camera.  For the price, I don't think that you can beat this camera.  If I needed more than two of them, I'd have no hesitation in buying more of them.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Radiobill
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Very pleased with the way it works and picture is great!  Easy to use and set up.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera and Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Gregory Gamm
Reviews.Content: Sarah--Was my tech help when I was setting up this camera.  Her expertise and talent was unsurpassed.  The camera was easy to install with her help and works wonderfully.  We use it as security in our home when not present and to keep an eye on our cats when out running errands.

Reviews.Title: Kate
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: If I had Kate set up my system in the first place, I would be very happy, most techs are clueless.

Reviews.Title: SOOO useful
Reviews.Author: Janet Crenshaw "Janet14"
Reviews.Content: This has been a lot of fun to have.  We use it as a security camera at the front door, but didn't mount it permanently.  So, we can also use it as:- during remodeling, I aimed it inside the house so family could watch the work going on- during times I have my grandson, I gave a 'visitor' password to his mom so she could enjoy watching him.Just using it as a baby monitor is useful because of the great picture (we normally don't turn on the audio).  Then when I put it back as a security monitor, I also turn on the alarms again so it keeps pictures of who comes to our front door.It's not difficult to configure, and configuring it to get through a home firewall and using a dynamic dns service is easy if you've ever done it before.  This wasn't tricky.  And there are easy apps to use on iphone and ipad rather than use the web browser interface.

Reviews.Title: Its hard to believe but there still are some great companies
Reviews.Author: Tallahassee Rick
Reviews.Content: Throughout my many years I have dealt with several different companies and what they call support teams. I have had to wait from a reasonable 10 minutes up to an hour plus, only to get either forwarded to someone else or accidently get disconnected. Most of the time, I felt like I knew more than they did anyway. I am here to tell you that this is not the type of service you will receive when you call Foscom. From the moment I called and received the announcement that there would be a short wait and that is exactly what they meant. Within two minutes I was talking to a member of their support team. She was patient and knowledgeable as she took charge of my computer and explained everything she was doing and explained even more than I could understand. Without hesitation not only corrected my problem (which by the way was a combination of camera setup and incorrect settings on my wireless router) would not let me leave until we tried ever possible use of the cameras making sure they worked properly. Actually after all was running correctly I had to call back and got Simon (a completely different tech) who was just as nice as the first person who helped me and he helped correct another situation that I caused myself. Now a day with slipshod workmanship in building products and even worse support after you make your purchase. It was a pleasure to deal with a company such a Foscom. I was so happy with their product and support I ordered additional cameras right then and there even though I could have purchased the same product from their competitor for a few bucks less. Your company is a breath of fresh air in today's economy. Thank you again for your courtesy.Respectfully,Eric R.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Eric S.
Reviews.Content: I want to thank Judy for the wonderful support she gave me in setting FOSCAM camera for remote access....Judy took over my system remotely....and performed everything I needed...

Reviews.Title: Foscam IP camera FI 8918W install
Reviews.Author: piper dakota
Reviews.Content: On April 10,2013 I worked with a Foscam representive Ron Jacob to install my two camera's. Ron was an excellent representive and he quickly took control of my computer and setup the camer's. If you are an average computer person and never worked on the install of these IP camera's you will need help. The camera's have an excellent picture and the price is more then fair.I feel that it would be nice if a wizard type install was possible because it does take some good computer knowledge to progran the camera's to your liking.But as long as they keep the tech suport help available and take control from their end, no one should complain because they are Excellent at helping, so your happy with your purchase of a Foscam. They aim to get customer satisfaction to a ten. I have no complains based on my experience.Ralph

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera
Reviews.Author: Z. Bauer "CapGoesGrad"
Reviews.Content: Worked great, right out of the box! Easy to set up, haven't had any problems with it. Decent video quality.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, except for the wireless part
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: This was super easy to set up, until we were ready to go wireless.  We had to research that aspect, because the instructions alone didn't work.  We also continue to get IP conflicts occasionally.  But all in all it works great and we are able to monitor our home and pets when we aren't there.  GREAT deal for the price.  Also note that the audio capability is here, but the audio hardware is not - you must supply it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support was great
Reviews.Author: Jeff T Lexander
Reviews.Content: Scott was great in getting my camera up and running via wireless as I was having a problem.  BEst feature for me is that can have multiple cameras hooked up and viewable via smartphone!!!

Reviews.Title: Technical support help
Reviews.Author: D. Michel
Reviews.Content: The technician, Scott, did a great job in helping me set up viewing outside my network.  Great camera and I love the ability to have sound available too.

Reviews.Title: cam works well
Reviews.Author: leviboz
Reviews.Content: Harry Foster helped me connect the camera remotely.  I'm still working some kinks out of it (like a loud ringing noise), but the help to get it set up was fast and efficient.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, POOR warranty help
Reviews.Author: Wildcard
Reviews.Content: I have bought 11 of these cameras over the past 6 months, and will continue to use these.  The quality is very good, easy to use, definitely inexpensive for the quality.The only thing I am disappointed in, is that one of these cameras failed after 3 months so I emailed support about warranty work, and after a week have not received any response at all.  So when buying these cameras be aware that you probably do not have any warranty.  If something changes, I will edit this review.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I was having issues setting up my foscam wireless. I called tech support and Felix walked me through everything I needed to set it up. It works perfect now. I highly recommend foscam to everyone that is looking for a nice affordable wireless camera.

Reviews.Title: Camer and Camera Support from Foscam
Reviews.Author: sigmond
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to have more security in my home.PositiveIt has great pictures and motion sensor works well.Foscam Customer Support  Harry Foster was very helpful in getting my camera set up and I did not have to wait long on the phone for the representative.We tested the recording and it worked well.Harry was most helpful in providing me the information to allow my cellphone to receive the images from the camera.I will be checking on that soon.NegativeNot easy to install the wireless and create a file.The video instructions are very blurry and can't be easily seen.The video instructions tell you to go to a DYN.com and get the DSNN which may or may not be needed.  They DYN is something that needs to be paid for.  It's not free.RecommendationI would recommend this camera then call the Foscam Customer Support and get help right away, to avoid the stress of installation and set up.

Reviews.Title: Good all-around pan & tilt day/night camera
Reviews.Author: Johnny O
Reviews.Content: The Foscam FI8910W is a good camera.  The product seems well built, the instructions are clear, and the web-based software is pretty straightforward and easy to understand.  The camera worked right out of the box with the typical configuration required for a device of this type. It works well from an iPhone or iPad without special software.  The manual focus ring is hard to adjust because the IR LEDs are right where you want your fingers to go - you need to move the focus ring using the face of the ring.  If you intend to use the IR night vision capability looking out a window or through a window screen, be aware that the IR light will likely reflect off those items making it difficult to see beyond.

Reviews.Title: Works Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Kris Lauro
Reviews.Content: I had previously bought one of the FI8918's.  It took me awhile to get that one set up to view through my phone (using cellular data) and to send email alerts. (ended up using GMX mail.)  I bought this one for another room after I read that this model has better IR cut filtering and better audio.  It only took me 5 or 10 minutes to get this one all set up since I now knew what I was doing. And it is quite a bit better then my previous version.  Audio is a TON better and night IR filtering is better.  I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a great value IP camera.On a side note, I read some reviews of people claiming the camera sporadically "resets".  This hasn't happened to me at all.  Although, when the power goes out or the power "flickers", the cameras will reset.

Reviews.Title: Works well, good quality image
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous getting this product based on reviews,but I was able to get it set up fairly quickly, though I had to call tech support to help get it set up for remote access.  I was shocked to see that tech support was only open M-F during central time and the first time I called (on a Friday), I was on hold for almost an hour, only to be told that they had closed for the day.  But they took my name and phone number and said they would call Sat.  They did not call on Sat and when I tried calling them, that's when I discovered they are not open on the weekends.  So I was pleasantly surprised to get a call from them on Sun morning!  They connected to my computer remotely and set things up for me.  I haven't used the fancier features yet (e.g. motion sensing) but I will update this review once I do.

Reviews.Title: Took some expert advice but now it works well
Reviews.Author: Melissa Kagan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as it was inexpensive and seemed like it was easy to install.  I actually had some problems installing it and called technical service.  Although, it took a while to get through to technical service...once I was there they were able to take over my computer and hook up the camera for me.  Now it works great.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Range is Terrible
Reviews.Author: Mathew L McFarland
Reviews.Content: I replaced a FI8918W with the FI8910W in the exact same location.  The old camera connected fine with good signal strength.  The new one connects and then drops constantly.  Upgraded to the latest firmware with no improvement.  Contacted customer support and received no reply.  Wish I had returned the unit to Amazon but am past the deadline now.  What a joke.  Avoid, avoid, avoid.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W IP/Network Camera
Reviews.Author: BuzzCam
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera I have purchased from Foscam. Very easy to setup. I use them for security around my home. My cameras upload an image to an FTP Server every time they sense motion and alert me via e-mail. I can view both cameras on my cell phone at the same time. I very much recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, great video monitor for kids
Reviews.Author: Love Outdoors "Love WI"
Reviews.Content: I have three of these cameras now.  The camera itself is a breeze to install.  I haven't spent the time to work on port forwarding so I can see the cameras when I am away from my house.  But I imagine, it can't be that difficult.  The video quality to great and the camera is super quiet.  My kids have no idea what it is, and I can see when they are sleeping.I highly recommend Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Amazing device, easy to setup, and reliable.
Reviews.Author: eddy
Reviews.Content: The device was easy to set up, I have monitoring the front of my Apartment complex overlooking at all my vehicles.  At night the depth of view stands out about 10 meters, after that it appears a bit grainy and dark.  From time to time I lose signal, I have yet to distinguish the cause.  I believe the cause of this may be the internet connection losing continuity, possibly weather or heavy traffic due to all residence in my complex sharing the same hub.  I wish I could dedicate a storage just for the Foscam device, especially since the sensitivity alert monitor is delicate and always trigger by passing people and vehicles on the road.  Other than that I could have gave it 5 star if it weren't for the NV and dedicated storage features enhancement.

Reviews.Title: Well Made
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up on your WiFi network.Accessible anywhere on web.Both video and audio alarms.Your own home alarm system with no Monthly payments.Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great support
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Great tech support!  I had to first wait 58 minutes on hold, but the prompter kept you updated on where you are in line which was nice.  Once I got help, They took control of my computer, and I sat back as my cameras were put on line!!  I am very happy with these cameras!!!!  And the Foscam Iphone app works great!  I am having an issue with my remote address so I might have to call back to get it sorted out.  So far it has been a great experience.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: dni
Reviews.Content: No problems at all. Easy to set up, and connect to the internet. It is doing what suppose to do.

Reviews.Title: Tech support
Reviews.Author: Carrie Crowe
Reviews.Content: Problem adding a second camera.  Customer support was very good.  Felix was very helpful.  foscam is a great camera highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for price
Reviews.Author: VIRAL PATEL
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for beginer level hardware. Does job well. It takes time to switch from wire to wireless connection (more than 3 - 4 minutes for first time). I was about to give up and return, glad it worked. Manufacture software to set up camera is poorly built. Still couldnt get to work. Overall nice quality. I would have given 5 star if survillence software was free with camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera purchase
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: This is the third Foscam IP camera I have purchased throught Amazon and I had no trouble setting it up and adding it to my surveillance system. This is the second FI8910w camera I have purchased and I believe it is better than the original one I bought about 2 years ago. I am very pleased with these cameras and would recommend them to anyone who is starting out with a surveillance system as you can add them as you need to. They have worked flawlessly and continuously since the first day.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Kenneth "Ken"
Reviews.Content: Working well and after contacting cust support she set it up both my cams for remote access.Very friendly and good support.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: GZ
Reviews.Content: I was not able to connect via remote access but called the Customer Service Number for FOSCAM and they assisted in achieving my requirements in a timely manner. They were professional and very understanding of my requests. Top notch customer service. Will be ordering several more cameras for my house!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little IP camera
Reviews.Author: Vino B. Kannapiran "Vino"
Reviews.Content: Setup was a breeze. I was up an running within 5 minutes. The picture quality is good . Can be remotely controlled via fee iOS and android apps . Overall very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Gman
Reviews.Content: The Foscam Camera is an excellent value.  I was concerned about the overall quality of the product based on the price.  What an outstnading value, by far worth the investment.  Many reviews of other products all seemed to point to the Foscam brand.  I would highly recommend the product.  To top it off, I had some trouble accessing the internet after relocating the camera...but a call to Ralph Mendez in tech support took care of that.  He took over my computer and set up everything including adjusting the settings on our modem....outstanding job.  Buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: No issues...product as described
Reviews.Author: IS011
Reviews.Content: This wireless IP camera works straight out of the box. Setup is easy and all the features are great. Wireless feature & price were the top choices that made me purchase this model & brand. Rated as indoor camera, mine is installed outside on the porch tucked in under the door sill out of the heavy weather & wind. I wish that comes with wider lens.

Reviews.Title: Super Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Received my new Foscam camera and began the setup. After having some trouble setting up the port forwarding feature I called Foscams tech support. They where very professional and helpful. I would highly recommend this product to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Service
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Calvin helped me with getting my Foscam viewable from outside my network.  Service was excellent and he solved a problem in 10 minutes that I had worked on for 3 hours.

Reviews.Title: Foscam technician support
Reviews.Author: Ruben Ramos
Reviews.Content: Troubleshooting router set-up along with wireless.The support was excellent.Now i need to test at the office.Picture quality is good.I highly recommend the Foscam along with their tech support.

Reviews.Title: Great product - fantastic customer service
Reviews.Author: Matthew C. Altmin
Reviews.Content: I own a mac computer - and the setup to get everything working was quick and easy.The foscam customer support is great, quick, and will help you get the camera setup any where in your house, and talk you through it.great product, fantastic service, and quick shipping.  thank you

Reviews.Title: i love this product
Reviews.Author: zi an lin
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with foscam rep, he help me setting up remote-access to my ip cam inwith 15 minute. so far I am very happy with this product. it affordable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: The service was FABULOUS.
Reviews.Author: Gerald Rosen "tubbyfat"
Reviews.Content: I worked on these cameras for weeks, and I finally called Foscam Tech support, which I should have done first.Calvin, my IT guy set me up effortlessly with port forwarding, and now everything works great.

Reviews.Title: foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: leo
Reviews.Content: Kate from tech support did a fabulous job helping me with my camera install. i would recommend foscam to anyone

Reviews.Title: Excellent IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Brad F
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at these IP cameras for a while trying to decide if they were what I wanted and needed. I read up on how to install them and looked at the reviews for probably more than a year while using Linksys/Cisco cameras all along. There was this great deal and the price was so good that I had to give it a shot. I received two cameras and within 20 minutes of opening the boxes I had them both on my Droid Bionic and my iPad using an outside network. If you have any doubt that these are the way to go after using a stationary camera that is worthless at night, please do not hesitate to get these!! I can see more than 50ft away at night and pan and tilt will save you from buying extra cameras to hit all angles. I now have 5 of these and my neighbors saw how easy these are and are now using them in their houses. Go for it, you won't be sorry!!!

Reviews.Title: nice pan/tilt, poor reception
Reviews.Author: Brock
Reviews.Content: The camera loses connection occasionally and I have to cycle the power to get it to pick up an IP again. These really are only good for indoor use. IR is useless if you are pointing it out of a window due to the reflections. I wish I had spent a little extra for a real outdoor camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Rtrjr2
Reviews.Content: Camera was better than I expected. Image is sharp. Infrared is like looking in broad daylight. Free Internet hosting for 3 years was a nice surprise. Only improvement I would like is better responsiveness to movement commands, especially over 4G. But that may be a network issue, not a camera issue.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support Great ! Camera's....not so sure....
Reviews.Author: PJK1954 "marian3410"
Reviews.Content: Have 3 F19802 HD cameras's. When they work they're great ! But they consistently drop the wireless and today I couldn't get them to connect at all. Ryan was very helpful and got them running again.  This is probably the 3rd. time I've called for the same problem.  They just don't appear to be able to "hold" a wireless signal.  Also have a Panasonic PTZ outdoor camera (more expensive however at $500+) that rarely if ever fails.  I must "fool" with the Foscam cameras everyday to keep them running.  The wireless antenna is no more than 30 feet away through one wall. I've used a wifi analyzer and it shows the signal strength at 80% which should be adequate. I've even added boosters to the wireless network...If they improved the wireless capability (better antenna?), the cameras would be fine particularly for the price.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat out of date
Reviews.Author: H. Coffee "road warrior"
Reviews.Content: Most features  work well, but if you have a sophisticated wireless network, don't bother.  It could not cope with my Cisco/Linksys EA4500.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: C. Fortson
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an economy priced IP camera and hit the jackpot with this product. Look no further, seriously. Great price, acceptable image/color (its not HD so dont expect it to be), two-way audio is a nice bonus for a baby monitor but fairly impractical otherwise (I use it to mess with my dogs when I'm not home). While the software that comes with the Foscam is fairly straightforward and simple to navigate, the real benefit comes from the support of third party applications for the IOS and Android operation system. If you have a basic understanding of routers (seriously, you'll want to know a little bit about 196.168.1.1 setup, if you dont know what this is you'll probably need some assistance) than you'll be just fine. If you know nothing about ports or routers, I'd look at a self contained system like the dropcam.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: Miguel A. Melendez Jr.
Reviews.Content: GOT THIS CAMERA FOR MY BABY'S ROOM. IT WAS SO MUCH CHEAPER THAN THE BABY STORE CAMERAS AND WORKS SO MUCH BETTER. I CAN EVEN SEE MY BABY FROM MY IPHONE!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, reliable, great image (for a mjpeg camera)
Reviews.Author: Santos Dumont "14-Bis"
Reviews.Content: Some motion detection images are false alarms, but not that bad that I would not like to keep it. I lowered the sensitivity, but I could not find yet the optimum settings that would eliminate false alarms and capture an intruder.  It does everything is is supposed to do, even providing a free DDNS address to enable the user to access the camera from outside the local network. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great to keep eye on kids when they are playing, love the 2-way audio and night vision!  Will be buying a 2nd!
Reviews.Author: MathNinja
Reviews.Content: First off, many people on here complain about it being too hard to set up.  My only comment on that, "PEBCAK" use the google machine to figure that out.There are many youtube videos out there to help you set this up, I had it up and running within 20 mins.  I purchased a 3rd party app for iphone/ipad which made it even better.Pro:Pan & tilt, can access via internet and has 2-way audioCon:Sometimes the pan and tilt from a cell phone is a little slow, I think this is more of a network problem than the actual camera itself.  I wish it zoomed, but still a great working product.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM 10W
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I have 2 foscam ip cameras right now. Easy set, view them both from  iphone, night vision, good resolution.The best wireless ip camera you can find.Excellent customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: PCP
Reviews.Content: Paired with the Foscam Pro app on iphone, this camera is [erfect for monitoring a puppy while you need to step out or at work in between walks.

Reviews.Title: Good camera,  one potential security flaw
Reviews.Author: d. twineham 3 "dt"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera; as long as you follow the instructions closely setup wasn't that hard.  It works well remotely (I use it to check in on an elderly parent in another state). I would rate it a 5 except for the this problem.There is a security issue.  The camera has two modes; and ActiveX mode for viewing with Internet Explorer, and a Server Push mode for viewing with other browsers.  This security issue only affects the Server Push mode.  The problem is, often when I have logged in once, it stops asking for passwords on subsequent logins.  For example, this morning I logged in from home, and it asked me for the password.  Later in the day I logged in from work and it did not ask for a password.  I have the camera on a timer switch so that it powers down and restarts every morning, which clears the credentials.  This doesn't happen every time, so there may be some caching going on.This could be a problem if you log in as an administrator, then someone else stumbles across the URL and has full access to change passwords, etc.There is no logout button in the interface, so if this does happen to you, you need to reboot the camera, which is available through the interface (although that seems a little heavy handed).I have posted this concern to the Foscam forum as well.

Reviews.Title: Great surveillance camera, far exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Fabio H
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, although for a non-tech person I can see where it could get difficult, but it goes like this:- Connect camera to power outlet- Connect camera with provided ethernet cable to your internet router at home- Check your router to see what IP was assigned to the camera- Connect to the camera's web interface at the IP assigned by router- Connect camera to wireless network, set it so that it is a fixed IP, configure port to port 88- Disconnect camera from wired network, plug/unplug power cord so it reboots and attaches to network- Configure router port forwarding per your manual- Adjust camera settings, and prefixes.- Download FoscamPro app from iTunes store if you have an iPhone. Works EXCELLENT.The reason you might want to choose port 88, is that some internet service providers will block port 80 incoming to your account (to prevent web servers from running on a non-commercial account).It's a good idea to set a fixed IP on the camera, and reserve that IP on the router, so that whenever your camera reboots and your DHCP IP lease expires, you might end up getting a whole new different IP and you might end up with connectivity issues. I believe with uPnP you don't have this issue, but I'd rather do it the static IP address way, it'll be more reliable.Up and running in about 20 minutes. Indoor video is good enough quality, and I was impressed at how good quality the IR night vision is. Highly recommended and very satisfied. Pan and tilt speed are even adjustable! No zoom though, but it's fine. I love the motion detection that emails you snapshots when it detects movement.Was able to access the camera from the internet using the FoscamPro app on my iPad and iPhone. Great App. Couldn't be happier with the entire package as a whole.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Christopher Farley
Reviews.Content: I've had to use Tech Support a few times -- not the fault of camera but because of house internet issues. Each time I call, Tech Support is fanastic. And this time, my support guy Ralph was no exception. He was extremely patient and very helpful. Was on the phone with me for over 2 hours fixing an encryption issue for 3 CAMERAS. He got them all up and running again and solved some very complex technical issues with my internet set-up. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: bman
Reviews.Content: The tech support was excellent and very helpful.  The best feature about the product is its ease of use.  I highly reccomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support
Reviews.Author: CapnRusty
Reviews.Content: The girl that helped me with me with my problem did a very very good job and did it very fast. Excellent job!

Reviews.Title: Nice features but .....
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Hughes
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the price and a desire for a wireless IP camera. First I found it very difficult to set up, had to watch a youtube video several times to get my router settings correct. Still only works sporadically on my home LAN and I haven't gotten it to work at all from my android phone using the Foscam App except when connected to my home Wifi. Even then it will work for a few hours and then just take off and start moving through its axis and comes to a stop centered horizontally and looking at the ceiling. Sometimes it just won't connect through my browser, just times out. The only way I've found to get is back is to reboot my main computer. Also the youtube videos show setup on  3rd party free severs that may not be free anymore so I set mine up on the Foscam server that is free for a limited time. Not a big  deal as I can't get it to work on any of them. Most of these problems are probably due to my lack of networking knowledge and if I put in more effort could probably be resolved, but I prefer things to setup and work out of the box. On the positive side It has a very good picture, excellent night vision range and the motion or sound activated capture with email alerts works great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Maryann
Reviews.Content: I contacted Foscam Technical Support for installing Foscam. During the 30 minutes process, Ralph Mendez helped me from installing the camera, setting it up wirelessly, setting it up remotely and even helped with IPHONE remote connect. The camera works great! I can remotely monitor my house from my iphone and it will send me emails if motion is detected. Very happy with both the camera and the superior service!

Reviews.Title: hard to setup
Reviews.Author: hard to setup
Reviews.Content: Complicated to setup ..the only reason I bought this is bec they say it connect to 3g or 4g network but it doesnt work ...much better the lorex lnc 116 works in 3g or 4g ...the only thing I  like this is the pan and tilt

Reviews.Title: Reviewing the FI8910W
Reviews.Author: FI8910W
Reviews.Content: One of the best camera products i have ever had the privilege of owning. at $80 off the foscam site after a coupon, this product is a steal.Functions phenomenally both during the day as well as at night. Clear images, sound is crisp to the tee. I can hear my dog breathing at night, sitting across the world. It's an unbelievable camera. And i wish i was paid to say that lol.Highly recommended for home and even work use, setting these up is a breeze as well, as long as you can work your way around a router. Owned it for over a year now, no problems so far. I've had friends who've owned theirs for far long without any issues.I wont lie, the first FI8910W i received had some manufacturing issues with night vision, i had that replaced without a problem.

Reviews.Title: Quality Customer Service
Reviews.Author: RichardM
Reviews.Content: I contacted the customer service line for Foscam (1-800-930-0949) and the technician was able to quickly resolve my issue.  I provided them with remote access.  I watched as the technician adjusted my router settings for my Foscam and established the wireless connection through the browser.  I am satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Good camera. Panning features are very good.
Reviews.Author: Jose A. Sifuentes "JAS"
Reviews.Content: Gave it a 4 stars only because the voice feature sometimes does not work correctly. But overall very please with the cameras

Reviews.Title: the camera works great now and the tech support was 5 stars
Reviews.Author: camilla & ken my hubby
Reviews.Content: ryan was a great help in tech support, spent all the time needed to fix my foscam camera which is ALSO great.......i love the night vision on the cam, nice picture too..im happy !!!!!!!!!!!!!  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Ralph Mendez provided excellent support in solving my wireless IP camera problem. I was not able to record videos until I got the correct support from FOSCAM. The camera is great for monitoring your home during your absence. I recommend this camera for the ability to see color pictures as well as night pictures with the IR lighting system of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for the price
Reviews.Author: Tony Clemons
Reviews.Content: for a sub 100 dollar camera to monitor my animals in the birthing room ,this camera is perfect ,easy to set up ,Im looking to get more fore security purposes ...

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware - Foscam will not support / replace this is purchased from Amazon.  No warranty at all.
Reviews.Author: razenruin
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware.  Foscam will NOT support this product if purchased from Amazon.  The wireless portion of my camera died after 4 months -- Foscam will not support it.  Their argument is that Amazon is not an authorized distributor.  The camera is now useless to me as I needed it in a wireless location.  Contacting Amazon to see if they will assist.  I know what you're thinking.  You read the camera description and it reads, "2 year extended warranty, when bought from authorized retailers listed at foscam.us/where-to-buy.html"  When you visit that URL -- Amazon.com is one of the first vendors to show up.  I believed it was supported and warrantied -- would not have purchased it otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Routine setup
Reviews.Author: rblaw
Reviews.Content: This one star rating may well change after I send this product back and get a new one. That would not be the first time for this type of camera. It is my third of the type. I think my first was a Foscam knockoff. It's still in use at my vacation cottage and it outside under a protective overhang. It did not work well inside because the lights made seeing through a window at night impossible. The second was an earlier model Foscam. After 8 months of use, it ceased to by accessible from the Internet. But it still sends me email messages from the cottage when the motion detector spots something.A bit of previous experience made this product only mildly annoying in the setup. I already had the camera tool on the computer. So I didn't bother with whatever was on the CD. So I hooked it to the Ethernet cable and had it operating wirelessly in about 2 minutes. Then I changed the port to 425 and put that in the router upnp setup. No luck adding 425 to my IP address for getting Internet access. But after messing around with the device management settings, I found what I needed under "Upnp settings." I clicked on the box for "Using upnp to Map Port." And voila. I could access the camera from the Internet.The view is nice and sharp. But problems come up whenever I pan. I lose connections with the camera and have to connect again. Sometimes that is easy. Other times not. Not something I need to put up with and not something I will mention to the notorious Foscam customer support. Unless someone quickly tells me about a quick fix, the camera will go back to Amazon for an exchange.At my cottage, I have a couple Panasonic network cameras. They have all sorts of bells and whistles. Zoom, microphones and speakers. But when they crash, they can only be reset by sticking a pin the the little reset hole. I have access to the cottage network via Logmein and was able to reset the Foscam knockoff from afar. But not the Panasonic cameras. I could not get them going remotely following a crash caused by my ISP changing the IP address.This latest purchase is for keeping an eye on things at my principal residence. I could do that with this camera, but there is no reason to put up with the flaws. Back to Amazon for an exchange unless someone tells me about a miracle cure for the flaws.UPDATE: The camera went through a few hours of operating without crashes. But then it was back to crashes whenever I made it pan. So I have returned it. An exchange for a non defective model was not possible because the camera does not come directly from Amazon. But I have ordered a new one.FURTHER UPDATE: The replacement came fast and it worked fine. I now have three of these. So setup has become almost routine. But sometimes setting up for Internet access can take a bit of time. I sometimes go through several port setting in the camera and the router before getting a port that will work. Ports in the low 400s seem to work best. Why some don't work is a mystery to me.

Reviews.Title: Understand what it does and doesn't do
Reviews.Author: John Reitmeier "John Reitmeier"
Reviews.Content: We run a help desk,  this works great for my being able to watch other offices and who's sitting at their desk (and who isn't)  but we have had many clients thinking it was going to work like those cameras in vegas that zoom in on a hand of cards NOT, or that they can put it in their barn 300 feet away and watch the calves, NOT.  But if you know what it can do,  it's a great business asset!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Danny Ballard-Maung
Reviews.Content: I have never purchased the IP monitoring camera. Decided to take a chance with this one and I loved it. Configuring the device and its settings were super easy including connecting the WiFi. The process of upgrading the firmware versions for the Device and Web UI was super easy as long as you have the correct version downloaded from Foscam website. I definitely recommend this camera to anyone who wants a monitoring IP camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: FW
Reviews.Content: Saw my friends and had to have one. Setting up the camera was pretty easy. Getting it to work through my router to the internet takes some patience. No fault of the Foscam. Use it to watch our dogs during the day.

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech
Reviews.Author: droidhead
Reviews.Content: Foscam is great when it comes to tech support. They got me up and running again! Was at a loss tried everything but she pulled me thru.

Reviews.Title: kate is good
Reviews.Author: Ramon
Reviews.Content: foscam camera is good especially the technical support from india kate is good in helping the customer she is the asset in the company

Reviews.Title: Great Value; Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Robert R. "Slightly Cranky Critic"
Reviews.Content: Have had the camera about a week and I am quite impressed with the features, especially at this low price point.  Alarm feature works quite well and is adjustable.I have moderate computer skills.  Initial set-up was easy, but setting up the wireless part was hopelessly beyond me.  Thankfully, Peter in Customer Service was great.  Took control of my Mac remotely and set things up in 10 minutes, including access for my iPhone 4S.I highly recommend this camera for indoor usage.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera and good tech support!
Reviews.Author: J. Forster
Reviews.Content: The camera works great.  I also have very good experience with the technical support.  Best features would be the remote access and controls.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera setup
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Britting
Reviews.Content: Kate helped me set up my two new cameras with my smart phone. She did an unbelievable job in doing so and the setup was very fast and easy. I'm greatful that foscam has the employees they have because they've made helped me so much when I needed the help! Thank you kate again for all your help and support setting up my new cameras!Jenn and joe

Reviews.Title: Foscam makes Great IP Cameras
Reviews.Author: R. Levy
Reviews.Content: I have 2 Foscams and 1 Wansview.The Foscam has more advanced menus and configurations.Only con I found for the 8910W is that's missing a front LED lightto alert intruders that they are being recorded.I wish it had this feature for my home.Other than that, the camera is great and the remote access from myAndroid phone and tablets using IP Cam Viewer Lite is simple and works great,specially with location presets, so by pressing a  button on the phone/tablet itwill point the camera to the desired location around the house or driveway.My next IP Camera upgrade will probably be one with Zoom functionality.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: Very good service....well done got my camera going great...it was worth the wait as I could not have done setup by myself... this not for novice computer techs.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: F. Ravaschiere
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for the price and ease of use. It's a little tricky to set up, but Foscam provided good support. I'm sorry that I don't remember the tech's name. He was extremely helpful.

Reviews.Title: Good Puppy Cam
Reviews.Author: Sam "middle school teacher"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to watch my brand new puppies while I am at work and to watch my puppy nannie. I think this is a quality camera at a good price and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support Service
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: The service was very good. I was not able to get wireless with two cameras. The tech named Kate logged in to my desktop remotely using team viewer. The results were expected. She got the job done. Nothing else needed.I do wish there was more DIY in case the cams go down or lose wireless etc. The hold times to get to support were over half hour. If the cams go down I would need to wait again. That is the only flaw that I can see.Overall she repped the company well.

Reviews.Title: Great quality picture and even better customer service
Reviews.Author: S. Ginsberg
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the Foscam FI8910W to use for security monitoring in my home. I had no problem setting up the first one and found the picture and audio quality to be excellent. I did experience some trouble setting up the second one though. I call the customer service number and watched as they took control of my computer and skillfully set up both cameras for me. It was great to watch and took care of the problem for me in minutes. I would not hesitate to recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: good service - tech support
Reviews.Author: Denise Marie
Reviews.Content: Contacted tech support shortly (2 days) after receiving order, having trouble with set up. I did try, but the router and networking tech issues were beyond my purview. Felix at tech support was helpful and set up 2 cams so I could view in at home, remotely, and on my droid phone. Tech support ("Felix") was very helpful and got the 2 cams up and running. So far so good! Tech support uses TeamViewer to access your PC and install remotely - you watch everything in real time.Update Feb 2014: my wireless router (quite old) started malfunctioning and I bought a new one. This meant I had to reconfigure the cameras, which I had been dreading, since tech support really did the whole thing for me when I got the cameras. It took about 2 hours but I got the cameras working on the Win laptop, and configured the port forwarding so I could view from my smart phone and tablet. This time I did it all by myself! Unlike a smart TV, smart phone, or tablet, these cameras have to have a hard reset to switch over to a new wireless router. They also do a couple POST tests in the process. I had kept the setup pamphlet and also drew on what I remembered when Foscam did it (foscam had left me with a .txt file that had my remote IP addresses, etc, and that was indispensable). I still use the original management software that came with the cameras, which I find good enough. On the phone and tablet, I use a free app called IP Cam Lite. The remote IPs I use are Foscam IPs, unique to my cameras, and use is free for 3 years. After that, I'll pay them or maybe just get a cheaper one from No IP. Who knows where tech will be in two years?I believe that the new router, and its slicker web interface, were a huge help in setting up this time, too. I was really kinda dreading redoing the cameras, but it turned out OK. Both my cameras are indoors; the "night vision" works well; the sound is poor but this is not an essential function for me.

Reviews.Title: Works great after a bit of trouble with the setup
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one for the front door and one for the back door. We have a Mac and Airport Express so it was a little tricky to figure out where to change the port numbers and enter the dynamic IP address--this requires some patience and testing. But after some trial and error (and about 5 resets of our airport express) along with careful reading of the poorly written user manual AND some google searches, we got it running in about 1 hour. Audio isn't great but we don't need it. Night vision works well. Also bought the iPhone app Foscam Surveillance Pro and after some more trial and error are able to see the camera images on our iPhones. Also set up email alerts through gmail when motion is detected. I recommend googling for youtube videos and other support forums to see how to set email and alerts--no issues there.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: Goose
Reviews.Content: Katie was very help full. the only problem was waiting a tolal of 4 hrs yesterday and to day and some one last night said they would get back to me at 9:oo am this morning and that never happened. had to cancel a doctors app to wait for a phone call I never got. could not understand first person I talked to . Very bad comuication. you need to do something different.

Reviews.Title: It works but it's hard to set up
Reviews.Author: RONALD P NEWBERG
Reviews.Content: I've had this for almost a year and I haven't been able to get it to work properly yet it's my fault it's not the products

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: D. Rubens
Reviews.Content: So happy with this camera that I bought another. Very easy to get it running. Been using it for almost 4 months now with no issues. Can view and control the camera on my android smart phone. Chose an app called "IP Cam Viewer" for my smart phone after trying several.

Reviews.Title: Lots of little things wrong with these.
Reviews.Author: nineismine
Reviews.Content: Some things to know about this line of cameras. They are very easy to access and use because they are IP cameras, but the software they provide is 100% browser based and lacks in functionality... ESPECIALLY if you don't run it in Internet explorer. If you attempt to access the camera in Chrome you will not be able to record to a file on the local machine, and will not have several other options available to you. Also there is no standalone software which means if you want to record you will be paying for a third party software, writing your own, or trying to remember to keep IE on and logged into the cameras.The cameras I received were constantly rebooting so I had to send them back. I replaced them with 2 8910's from a another seller and while they work ok, they are not perfect...Another thing to note these may be wireless but YOU STILL MUST PLUG THE POWER IN. The real problem with this is the cable they supply is a "wall wart" and is about 4 or 5 feet long. Meaning wherever you want to install this better have an outlet. Because these cameras run on 5 watts and 2.5 amps you cannot power them on the stock adapters if you attempt to run a line to them through a ceiling unless you are willing to run a real power line and install an outlet. You are not getting more than about ten feet of extension via splicing.If I had this to do over again I'd have either paid for wired cameras (since I need to wire them anyway) or paid an extra 20-30$ for POE ready cameras.One nice thing to mention is there is some programmatic access to the controls via CGI so if you are a programmer you can have some fun with these.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: John C. Hoopingarner "Curt H."
Reviews.Content: While it is a bit hard to install, it is a good product and a lot of fun to have.  I bought it to put in my Mother-in-laws nursing home room but that didn't work out so I am using it for security at home.  Very cool.

Reviews.Title: Love my foscam!
Reviews.Author: janet gregory
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my foscam! We got this to keep an eye on our expecting dog & it works great. Had no difficulty setting it up on our wifi network however we did have a little difficulty setting it up to view from anywhere..with a little google searching we figured it out and loved it! So worth is cost! & would recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Works like a magic
Reviews.Author: MSPRbookseller
Reviews.Content: Yup, this is what I wanted to monitor house and dog.  Everything is working fine.  Used no-ip.com free account to set up remote monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Awesome customer service.  Easy and efficient
Reviews.Author: Fasteddy
Reviews.Content: I have used the customer service to help me set up my wireless cam.  they also helped with remote recording and all access issues.  They are fast and efficient.  Great job

Reviews.Title: Straight from Star Wars
Reviews.Author: Kara Walsh
Reviews.Content: We love this thing so far, it is remotely controlled from my wife's and my iPhones.  The tech support was EXCELLENT and got us set up in about 15mins.  I'd recommend just calling tech support, it's pretty complex to set up for the average joe...  I can now check in on my baby while working out of town:)

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Daniel Chisholm
Reviews.Content: Just need a bit higher resolution on the video stream.  Also, the 2-way audio only 1/2 works.  I can listen to what's happening in the room where the camera is, but have only once been able to speak through it.  (Minor feature though)

Reviews.Title: Great camera - difficult remote access
Reviews.Author: Brian L. Ceccon
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is everything I wanted in a camera. I have great WIFi access, but I have been unable to connect remotely using the iPhone App. - it is far too technical for a novice like me.

Reviews.Title: very excited about this!
Reviews.Author: laylasmille
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use instead of a baby monitor in my sons room with my iphone as the reciever. It was a great purchase. It was much less expensive and practical than a video baby monitor and has many more features. The picture is very good. Setup was a breeze once I called the support number the tech guys ghosted in my network and did it for me. Camera is compact and easy to use. Great value and I will tell everyone to get this instead of a baby monitor,I will be able to use it in the future too.

Reviews.Title: Its pretty good
Reviews.Author: Jason L. Addison "jasona22"
Reviews.Content: I suppose value is a good word.  It puts out an ok image at 640.  To me, at 640, it has a rather sluggish frame rate.  In the world of tech we live in, I would expect better.  This is likely why this camera isn't a HD item.  If they can't get 640 frame rates very high, then HD would be unusable.  I found some of the setup to be a bit tedious; however, that is because using IE would cause the camera software to hang up the entire computer.  Once setup, it works good.  User note: there is no need to use the hosting sites to see images on your portable devices (iphone, android phone, ipad, etc).  Just give the camera a static ip, use port forwarding on your router and then point your camera software to your external IP and voila; your done.In summary, I am happy enough with this, but had a bit higher expectations.  I would prefer better frame rates and higher resolution.  Smoother movement and better app that didn't lock up on 64 bit OS / IE.  This would be a better value at about 60% of the cost.I probably buy another and would still recommend.  But it could be a whole lot better.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: really better than expected..was like new..this is my second one ordered..very easy for home view..the foscam web page is trying to update issues with port forwarding for newbies like me.and I had that up and running.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Graham
Reviews.Content: I recommend this for parents of little kids. It's perfect for keeping an eye on our 2 and 4 year old boys as they go to bed and as they wake in the morning. I had help from my brother to set it up on our wireless network so I can't say how difficult that is but it works great with a free app that I got for both iPad and iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Decent image quality
Reviews.Author: BobS
Reviews.Content: Decent image qualityNot too bad to set up- it took me ~2 hours due to some broken english in the manualMinimal night vision rangeOverall impression....  It's <$100 so I'm buying a few more

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Larry Vennard
Reviews.Content: as a stand alone camera, it works great.  my wife uses it to watch the dogs from her work.  wish i had bought this sooner.active x module is kinda buggy, but there are multiple ways of connecting to the camera where you dont need that module.

Reviews.Title: WORKS WELL
Reviews.Author: kennyg
Reviews.Content: I don't write many reviews, however since I had many problems with my first purchase of a Trendnet TVIP951 camera I felt obligated to review this Foscam camera. The Foscam F1890w works well. Set-up with the help of a friend took about a day. I am able to see a clear picture of both inside and outside my home. I can view the camera on any computer and also from my phone. Amazon did a great job on delivery and refund on the first camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: JOSE CARRASCO MORENO "Computer advisor"
Reviews.Content: This camera is just awesome.  Not easy to setup but not so hard. Very good quality in night video. I bought 4 of this item.

Reviews.Title: Love this cameras USE them outside
Reviews.Author: Ahmo
Reviews.Content: I have set of this all working perfect i set them up outside on places where water cant get to them. For the money and features u get u cant go wrong pick ur color wisely for camouflage tho if you will do this. All works ass advertised and more.I'm very particular about quality and performance of things I buy so buy or don't buy with confidence on items I grade.Grade A+

Reviews.Title: the device is 10/10
Reviews.Author: Naif
Reviews.Content: 2 way audio. this option make my live easyconfigurable, (( emali , records , access from internet))product quality is exultant.Iphone application is available and free.

Reviews.Title: Worked great, but difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: Jess S.
Reviews.Content: The camera exceeded our expectations for video quality and was fine in all other areas, but setting it up was very difficult. Even for a somewhat tech savvy guy, it took a lot of patience to figure out how to connect it to our wireless network. The instruction guide, written in China and apparently never edited by a native English speaker, was almost useless. One tip: when connecting to your network, do the set-up manually.

Reviews.Title: Love this cam
Reviews.Author: David from Cali
Reviews.Content: Great product!  I can see how it might be difficult for someone technically challenged to setup, but for me it was easy and it works great.  I love the fact this it will automatically send you an email on motion or sound detection.  It also amazes me how well the infrared works at night.  Very impressive.

Reviews.Title: A good value.
Reviews.Author: ressless1
Reviews.Content: My family have set up 16 cameras between three houses, 13 are Foscam products. The Foscam cameras are very consistent in performance and we feel they are a very good value and have exceeded expectations.Setup can be challenging until you get the first one working, but after you understand the network setting, it gets almost routine.We use the $5 android app on Droid phones to keep and eye on each others houses, and keep up with an aging parent who still lives on his own.Night time operation is good for up to about 16-18 feet, but place a camera in a location with a outdoor motion sensing floodlight and they have been very impressive.We have some cameras send us emails with a picture on motion detection if we are away from home, and other cameras send pictures to a network hard drive 24 hours a day. I have a batch file set up to delete files older than two weeks so the drive does not file up.The only negative has been that the mechanics are fragile. we have dropped two of them, resulting in a loss of the pan and tilt function, but the cameras still work.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: K. McCall "kdogg24"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a two pack of these cameras with the brackets and 9db antennas from Amazon. Setup was actually quite easy, their manual has step by step instructions which are better than I expected. Other reviews on here complained about complex setup, but it's actually quite easy.The picture quality is better than average, and the night vision is fantastic inside the house. Clear as day! Easy to use controls, clear images, 2-way audio, and wireless (except for power cord) make these cameras winners in my book.  I came back to this page actually to order a 3rd one for my house.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!! Excellent
Reviews.Author: What a Rip
Reviews.Content: This camera is great I would recommend to anyone.Technical Support was unbelievable, made if very easy to get the camera setup and running.I really appreciate the help Felix.Very Good.

Reviews.Title: Definitely recommend a great product!
Reviews.Author: Samuel Oliveira
Reviews.Content: Although not very easy to install it provides  quality High-resolution images day and night, it features remote tilting technology for monitoring the surrounding area.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: OldSchool IT
Reviews.Content: Was easy to setup although at first it seemed somewhat hesitant about connecting to WIFI.  That was short lived and it was up and running.  Works great and the panning allows me to check out various areas around my property.The only minor issue I found so far is that I turned the motion alarm off and occasionally it turns back on by itself.

Reviews.Title: IR lights were quirky
Reviews.Author: Stuart Singer
Reviews.Content: I originally owned the fi8908(W) but the wireless functionality stopped working so I upgraded to the FI8910. The camera worked well but about 2 months in the IR lights would constantly flicker on and off regardless of the room lighting. This is where the disappointment begins. I thought no problem because Amazon is an authorized re-seller of the Foscam cameras.  It is now about 1 month since I sent my camera back to Foscam for replacement and I'm still waiting. Foscam required that I pay shipping both ways to get the replacement. I can understand paying to send it back but I was surprised when the billed me $7 to send a replacement. There's been no indication one has been shipped, no email confirmation, no nothing. I still like these cameras but I guess next time I have to get one directly from Foscam and maybe they will treat me better.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Fi8910W
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: Foscam Fi8910WGreat tech support from Leo at Foscam when my wifi went south.He fixed it a short time but you may be on hold for a while before getting a tech.

Reviews.Title: camera works great
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: I use these cameras for security for my home. Works great took about 30 mins to learn how to setup camera for uploading emails and wireless and learn how to make it work with iphone foscam app. 2nd camera took less than 5 mins. One camera is a little blurry, I tried to clean the lens with alcohol and qtips didn't work. I think it was blurry from one of my kids somehow. they other camera is pretty clear. Overall satisfied with product.

Reviews.Title: Setting and wireless help
Reviews.Author: Fozybe
Reviews.Content: This camera is outstanding, we use it at home and with our smart phones and a $5 app from the Apple appstore while using wifi at home and you can set it up to see from anywhere in the world!  Our settings in our computer changed and the camera wasn't working.  I called the help center and it took a about 30 minutes to speak to someone but it was well worth it.  Also the message tells you how long you will wait so you can do other things while you wait.  The rep from the India call center named Albert took remote control of my PC and set everything up including setting up wireless that I can see in my smart phone from any where in the world!!  Thanks Albert and Foscam!!  Best product I have seen (a bit technical but the call center is great for people that aren't that tech savy) and read about a ton of them...Apple just released one with similiar features but its $250!

Reviews.Title: Amazing technology
Reviews.Author: Dawn Mikkelson
Reviews.Content: It is incredible to be able to view my daughter's bedroom from anywhere in the world, as well as use it at home as a regular baby monitor. While it is a beast to set up, Foscam's tech support is remarkable. With a click of a few buttons, they logged into my computer remotely and set it up for me. I wish I had let them do it from the beginning, rather than wasting days trying to set it up myself (I ran into a few difficulties that they were able to resolve within minutes). So great! The video quality is excellent and I appreciate being able to pan the camera remotely.My only complaint is that the audio feature requires a separate software download. I was able to make it work on my home computer, so as far as using this camera as a regular in-home baby monitor, I have no problems. However I am not able to access audio on my iPad or cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Great technical support
Reviews.Author: robert j gaskill
Reviews.Content: Camera is fantastic and technical support is awesome. I will be buying another one of these cameras in the near future

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - GREAT SUPPORT!
Reviews.Author: Larrow
Reviews.Content: My Foscam camera works great, but I was having trouble with the remote settings.  Kate from Foscam Support was a big help in getting the camera to be set up the way I needed to have it.  She was polite, efficient and, most of all, effective in solving my problems.  I'm very impressed and so glad I chose Foscam.

Reviews.Title: excellent option for those of us unable to hard-wire cameras or establish multiple angles
Reviews.Author: quietconundrum
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these positioned throughout my home and have achieved what could be seen as just about the best possible scenario of coverage, apart of being able to actual wire in cameras where I want them. They function reliably and offer satisfactory video quality and have yet to fail me. I have remote viewing, DVR recording, motion e-mails and text messaging, IR management and scheduling all setup and am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great product for a great price
Reviews.Author: Robert Pfeifer
Reviews.Content: It may be a bit hard to get setup at first but after getting that part completed I am very satisfied with the product and it's capabilities overall

Reviews.Title: works ok, but constantly resets
Reviews.Author: Robert Story
Reviews.Content: For some reason, this camera frequently (like daily) do a reset, where is goes all the way to one side, then spins and rotates to the other extreme, before returning to it's original position. Other than that, it's ok I guess. I've never tried the audio functionality.  I just use it to view my living room. Works fine with an IP camera app on my Android phone, and with motion on Linux.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: S. Quigley
Reviews.Content: I am not a whiz in computer technology, but no beginner either.... When unable to complete an internet installation, i called Customer Service at Foscam. I have the Foscam FI8910W wireless camera, and had no trouble getting the local wireless to work, but no luck on the internet access. The camera, BTW is phenomenal in performace, and a steal at the going price. The technician , Simon, was friendly, and knew his technology. In my own defense, the text in the manual was confusing. Simon, on the other hand, ran thru the process in about five minutes successfully...as opposed to the two hours of my time to fail at the task. Thanks to him for saving what little is left of my mind.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W GET ONE
Reviews.Author: Randolph M. Gorski "gottadownsize"
Reviews.Content: I don't give reviews but LEO asked me. Leo was the support person I called to get the camera wireless. He was very helpful and kind to me even though I am not the best on a computer. He actually did all the work by taking control of my computer and made the setting to view the camera wireless, after answering a few questions. By the way be ready to log into your wireless router at lest I had to. I think you will be very pleased with this camera for the price at Amazon. Everything worked as described and the picture is very clear so get one.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Installation
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: I bought and installed the camera very easily. I had a little problem getting remote internet access working for it. I called Foscam, and after a five minute wait, Sandra Williams took control of my computer, made the necessary changes to my router, and now remote access is working well. Good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: S. Osburn
Reviews.Content: I love the pan and tilt feature.  So many other webcams are static.  It has lots of features I don't even use yet.  It was fairly easy to set up, just read the instructions carefully.  This is how I keep track of the dog during the day.

Reviews.Title: Perfect as a baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Cisco
Reviews.Content: I use this as a baby monitor since it costs a fraction of the price of regular baby monitors, and you can download free and/or reasonably priced apps for iPhone to make it do anything any baby monitor can do and more.  I especially like the 2-way audio functionality, which we didn't have on our previous baby monitor.  It was pretty easy to set up on my home network, although I haven't set it up yet to access the camera from outside the network.  The picture quality is great day or night, but there is an audio delay of a few seconds both ways (doesn't really bother me, but might bother some).  Overall, very pleased with this purchase, and will get another one for the new baby coming.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: H. Mininberg
Reviews.Content: The tech help is just wonderful. I worked with a woman name Judy. She couldn't be nicer. The camera is everything that I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Very helpful
Reviews.Author: D. Helm "DRH"
Reviews.Content: I have two F18910 cameras. I have struggled to get the port forwarding entered correctly. When i called Foscam Support they have been extremely helpful in getting me set up correctly.
