I'm probably a little above average when it comes to tech knowledge but the port forwarding so i can view my cameras when i'm away from home and office was a little daunting. I had one number off in the setup and it didn't work. After about 10 minutes of troubleshooting Foscam Support had me up and running. The cameras work great and now I can keep an eye on things on iPhone and iPad.

Reviews.Title: Good product good support
Reviews.Author: weaverl
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Excellent phone support from Foscam. Needed help with port forwarding which is problematic. Phone support got me through.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Alyssa Ashton
Reviews.Content: I think this is a very good camera for the price.  Easy to install, I followed the directions in the manual.  I didn't have a firewall or anti-virus, and disabled MAC filtering before installing.  First set-up was a succes, until I turned MAC filtering back on and lost the camera and my router crashed.  After getting everything back up, tried again.  This time I left on MAC filtering on and entered the two MAC addresses on the stickers on the bottom of the camera.  Everything worked out good.  Camera works and I can view from an app on my android phone.  But, I haven't activated port forwarding yet and viewed from a web browser.  A couple of things about the camera:  The video is a little choppy.  The movements are a little delayed and not that smooth.  The camera also makes this constant clicking sound and is noisy when it pans.  Not sure if this is normal, going to email Foscam tech support and find out.  Also, I am having a couple other problems, but am not sure if it's the fault of the camera or the app.  I first installed the tinyCam app and the pan/tilt arrows did not work so I installed the IP Cam Viewer Pro.  IP Cam Viewer Pro works, however there is a delay when using the arrows for panning and tilting.  You hit the arrow and have to wait a few seconds before it actually moves.  Annoying.  And I've been able to Listen using the camera, but the talk function isn't working.  I don't know if it's the app or the camera.  I am going to give it a few days then I'll update this review.UPDATE 03/19 -- Realized the video is choppy and delayed because of my poor Sprint 3G wireless connection. If you use the android app over wi-fi the video is much smoother. The responsiveness of the pan/tilt is also dependent on how well your wireless connection is. Also, when exploring the setting in the IP Cam Viewer Pro app on my phone I realized you have to enable two-way audio, so I can now use the Talk function. However, it doesn't work all the time and when it does, the volume on this is very low...I have to figure out if I can turn this up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera
Reviews.Author: dissatisfied
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Foscam F18910W 2pack. After installing both cameras, which was super easy following the directions, I had them up and running thru a wireless connection. It does take some time to set up all the bells and whistles, but worth it.I download an app on my cell to view remotely which is priceless. I made some mistakes and had to call customer service to fix it.Kate was very nice and professional, and sorted out my problem.  Thanks Kate!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money and effort setting up
Reviews.Author: L&B
Reviews.Content: We bought the Foscam to be used as a video baby monitor and couldn't be happier.  We have no complaints with the quality of the product and clarity of the picture, although it initially took some time to set up but that was more due to my failure to read the directions properly.  Also, don't intend to use this as a sound monitor though as you will be disappointed.While the instructions in the product booklet do provide excellent step-by-step instructions for the basic setup on your PC or Mac, the instructions are not very detailed in regards to setting up port forwarding so that the feed can be viewed remotely.  After a quick search on YouTube though, I found videos for the basic setup, setting up a free IP address, as well as setting up your router for port forwarding.  Just search for username "Awkward Hamster" and you will have everything you need to set this up.  This guy's tutorial is simply amazing!

Reviews.Title: Good, But The New Foscam is Better - Kicks Logitech's Arse
Reviews.Author: Kaio
Reviews.Content: I'm a longtime Wilife user, and they're ok, but have some serious quirks and limitations. I've been wanting to upgrade to a more modern and reliable system for a while. The other day we were in Target and happened to come across this Foscam FI8910W on clearance for half off. Yup, I was shocked too. It was a store return, but we couldn't pass up the deal. Maybe someone got it for Xmas and didn't know what to do with it cuz nothing looked like it had even been removed from the box. This great bargain got us thinking about getting another one, and that's when we ran across this newly upgraded model, the Foscam FI8916W with a Better Housing and the Newest ModelThe biggest difference between the 2 is the new housing; it's sleeker and has a ball and socket lens atop a swooped arm.  Other than that, the basic footprint is the same to this model.  The entire swooped arm rotates during pan, and just the ball on top tilts.  It's actually pretty cool.  Other than that, it seems to be exactly the same as this older tried and true model.Paint it Yellow and You Got a MinionThis Foscam FI8910W looks like a one-eyed minion from the movie Despicable Me -- Deluxe Plush Minion.  It's cute and I like the shape and look of it. It's cool, but the new model is cooler.Velvety FeelReally like the matte finish, and nice rubberized kinda texture feels really great to the touch. Makes the cam look and feel like a top notch, quality product.Easy SetupI've read some of the problems others have had setting this up, but all went smooth as silk for me.  I used the included setup disk and just went step by step, barely glancing at the instructions.  If you have any experience setting up WiFi devices, then you'll have no problem with this. If you've never done anything like this before, then it's a good time to learn. It's basically just an SSID and password, and a user interface accessed via an IP address and your favorite web browser. I was up and running and viewing my cam within 10 minutes on my Win 7 laptops.Compatible BrowsersI don't use iE for anything, so no words of wisdom there. But for me, the included software seems to play nicer with Firefox than Chrome. But overall, both worked fine for me. I'm considering the Foscam Blue Iris Pro. Seems like it might be worthwhile. I downloaded the 15 day trial and am still playing with it.Mounting BracketNice touch! Just mount with a couple screws, and a hand-twist camera mount screw. Screws and anchors are included, but I used my own self-drilling screws; much easier to work with and more secure.Port ForwardingI have a pretty tight firewall, so I had to setup some custom ports and forwarding rules. Again, if you have experience with it, no biggie; if not, it's only a couple paragraphs of reading and you'll be up to speed.Wireless SimplicityOnce the initial setup is done via a wired connection, just enter the setup menu and input your SSID and password, and you're set for wireless. This is where this cam excels over Logitech Wilife. No electrical wiring network communication = no time delays or surge protector interference. Definitely getting more of these Foscam's over time and fazing out this old Wilife crap!Pan & TiltLike budduh! No more blind spots! Sure, I have my fave happy place for the angles, but love the option of pan & tilt. Especially handy to get that perfect viewing angle, but also very nice to have the mobility if I want it. Commands from the software to camera are very snappy and on the dot. Precise, responsive and a huge convenience and security enhancement.Auto PanSetup a motion path for the lens to follow. Very nice way to expand and automate the viewable coverage area.Easy-Peasy Smartphone IntegrationWatch your cams on your cell phone and tablet. I actually prefer connecting via a remote viewing app, like Splashtop or TeamViewer. It's just easier, but you do need to have an accessible computer on site. Otherwise, just connect to these cams directly via the Foscam app. Worked well on my Android tab.Bottom Line -- this is a really nice security cam setup. I think I'll upgrade our whole system and just add more of these cams over time. Easy to use. Nice image quality. Pan and tilt. Decent price. I'm partial to the newer model's design, but still like this one and glad to have gotten such a great half-off deal on it at Target.  Happy! ;oD

Reviews.Title: great product and service
Reviews.Author: Andrew Stanger
Reviews.Content: great product - was easy to set up. and i had one issue and their customer service was great. Might be a little bigger than you would think. about 5 inches tall or so.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera with Great Support/Service
Reviews.Author: Desmond B. Raymond
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera for the money and their is great online support.  Online support helped me with router/dsl problems and this kind of service is hard to find.  You can't go wrong with this camera becuase of great support.

Reviews.Title: Foscam customer service was excellent
Reviews.Author: Michhub
Reviews.Content: This is a great affordable wireless camera. I received a Groupon and the unit shipped quickly. At first I had troubles settings up the wireless portion but I called their support line and they took control of my PC and got it sorted in no time, Thanks! The image is very clear and the controls respond quickly. I think I may buy a couple more of these for around the house.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: foscam purchaser
Reviews.Content: Albert helped me today.  He was a pleasure to work with.  I called in and he did everything.  Saved me hours.  The camera is great.  The apps are downloadable and can be used from my phone, ipad, etc.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Quality Camera for a Great Price - And Good Service to Boot!
Reviews.Author: Nick Hulsing "NickH"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras recently.  The price was very good but after doing the Foscam online demo (where you actually get to move their cameras), I felt that this would fit my needs.  I wanted them for monitoring my workplace afterhours and also for a vacation home that we only get to on weekends.  I followed the setup directions which were very clear but was having difficulty accessing the camera from the internet (outside my office).  A phone call to Foscam Technical Service and it was fixed!  The Technician, Albert,  asked for remote access to my computer, did all the configurations in about 5 minutes, and was very pleasant.  He also showed & described to me how to add more cameras via Port Forwarding so that I can do it myself in the future.  Overall a great experience!  These cameras are cool - you can move them side to side, up and down, and they have night-vision.  There is also 2 way audio built in but I don't have a need for that function at this time.  Now I'm ready to configure the settings to record to my office server when motion is detected after hours.  A very simple, easy to use security device.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: John D. Barnes
Reviews.Content: This cam works as advertised.  It has video, audio, and can be remotely accessed.  It can send you its IP in an email and be setup to record on motion detection.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for your camera buying dollar
Reviews.Author: Bill Anderson
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks -- my friend has a home security system so I bought this camera - this camera smokes all of theirs and they even bought two because of the clarity - dont buy junk your not saving any money but this one..

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night
Reviews.Author: shane hebert
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about two months ago and must admit that I had help setting it up. For most younger guys it probaply would not have been a problem, but I'm not the most computer literate. I mounted it myself on my back deck and it works great. I could not figure out how to get it to record to my PC, so I reached out to foscam and they where very helpful,so much so that I'm writing this and I intend get get at least one more camera.

Reviews.Title: Great cam!
Reviews.Author: Carl Franzene
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it. Easy to set up, great picture, great at night. Works extremely well as a baby cam also.

Reviews.Title: camera worked great until it stopped working
Reviews.Author: Deborah J Schwab
Reviews.Content: Camera was easy to set up and worked great for about 30 days, then stopped working altogether. Support was fantastic and determined the camera was defective and recommends returning. We have contacted the seller 3 weeks ago and await a response.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, perfect for our needs!
Reviews.Author: T. Sabo "Damgaard"
Reviews.Content: Setup was a snap using the supplied instructions...actually much easier than I thought it would be. The "two way audio" is pretty sketchy or it would be five stars...probably just a bandwidth issue. The unit is perfectly silent and picture quality is very good for the price. It's not HD, but it's not HD price either. Overall a fantastic product I will likely buy more of to add to different areas of the house.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: DHB
Reviews.Content: Nice camera.  Met expectations.  Wish the resolution were higher and wish a model that could zoom we're available.  Overall very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Wireless is flakey and crashes every 24 hours
Reviews.Author: Andrew Stone "Andrew Stone"
Reviews.Content: I use this to monitor my chicken coop and I have it automatically ftp photos to my web page.  People like looking at the chickens and my wife likes to see how many eggs there are.If paired with NETGEAR WNCE2001 this unit is rock solid.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cameras
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: The product FI8910W on the whole is ok to use although it cannot zoom-in or zoom-out as other cameras do and I don't know its durability. The installation actually is not complicated.I have 4 cameras from Amazon. When I had problem viewing my cameras through one of my PCs, the Foscam support-service helped me to get that through. The support-service from Foscam is good despite they failed to call me back as scheduled a few times. This time they finally called back and fixed the viewing problem for me. The service Foscam offered is patient, polite and professional, in particular Albert of the support team.I will recommend the product to others.

Reviews.Title: WIFI camera that works right out of the box
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: Setup was pretty straight forward except for the WIFI part.  seems the unit has two MAC addresses so beware when configuring the unit for LAN and WIFI.  not covered in the manual.the infra-red and motor drive are a big improvement over an older Linksys camera.

Reviews.Title: Quality issues....
Reviews.Author: R. Shell "Dick"
Reviews.Content: I must admit that I loved this camera for the first six months.  It was then that the first problem appeared - the nightime IR filter became non-operational.  So, okay, I could live without that.  Then, six months later the unit would no longer connect to my network and the self-check function would not operate. Appears that the plastic gears inside had broken.  Hey.. they were plastic!  I finally gave up on the unit and pitched it in the trash.  If Foscam can come up with a model that might last longer than a year, I'll be back for one.  Until then, I will simply alert everyone that this is not a real long-term solution for you.

Reviews.Title: Great functionality for the price
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: This is a well made piece of equipment that delivers all that it promises at a price point that is very reasonable. The key thing to remember is price here. You get what you pay for, but I felt this camera does more for the price. I have used it for 3 months and no issues so far. The video quality is obviously not the best out there, but purely as a cheap monitoring device it delivers. The pan and tilt works well, and with the installed camera pro app on android, you can control it remotely. The night vision capabilities are average. From what I have read somewhere, security of this camera is a cause of concern. Apparently, the camera can be easily hacked into. Dont have any hard evidence, but if you would like to use it as a supporting system that you turn on and off, it shouldnt be a huge concern.Very few cons I can think of1. Security of this camera is average2. The video feed can be stuttering or not fluid. Must be a problem of the camera or the wifi speeds causing it. But frame rate is not the best out there.3. Video quality is not the best, but for this price hard to expect more.

Reviews.Title: Read this BEFORE buying!!!  NO AUDIO!
Reviews.Author: VegiDelite
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for basic monitoring of my home.  It was easy to setup, so even the most novice of computer users could do it.  The hardest part was reading the poorly translated English directions in the manual.  I downloaded the free IP Cam Lite app on my smart phone and was able to access the camera anywhere.  I was so impressed with this camera, I purchased another one.  While I waited for the second camera to arrive, I downloaded the $3.99 IP Cam Pro app on my smart phone, since the free Lite app version didn't include audio.  I tested the audio and right away I knew there was an issue.  I was able to listen, but I could not use the microphone.  The speaker on the cam is so distorted and at a low level, that I thought I must have a defected camera!  That is when I did some research, and discovered this camera is known for audio issues and Foscam is aware of the problem.  Their solution?  They will ship you a repair kit and instructions, in which you must open up the camera, switch the wires and then solder them together!!  But don't worry, Foscam support is only a phone call away....are you kidding me??!!  They are selling a defective camera and falsely advertising the audio features this camera obviously is incapable of producing. They need to stop selling this as a "two way audio" camera.  I will be shipping both cameras back.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: M. Comerchero "Frosty Board"
Reviews.Content: HArd to set up but customer service was very helpful.  Camera only manually records so if you want it to automatically record you need the blue iris software.  So far I just got the camera in and it works well.  Very good for the price.

Reviews.Title: FI18910W
Reviews.Author: vic
Reviews.Content: the camera works great.  i love the night time feature and the fact that i can see all the action from my iphone.  the support (Leo) was informative and resolved my issues.

Reviews.Title: Fi 8910 has problems
Reviews.Author: rock
Reviews.Content: Setup guide was rough, it is not written by an english speaking person so you must read between the lines to get certain details regarding the setup. Finally got it working after a few hours. Then the next day I bought a new router. Figured the setup would be easy since I new how to do it - wrong. It will not work wirelessly to certain PC's and ipads on my network. Others it works fine - sometimes. I just now tried to connect using a laptop that was working yesterday, but today it will not connect. When it does connect, I try to record video and it does not record using their GUI. It prompts for a filename, but will not save to file. I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Michaels_baby
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be an easy installation for me, but I had to call Foscam for support. Of course, I had to hold for a while and the receptionist stated someone from tech support would call within an hour. The call did come from Simon, who was extremely patient with me and very helpful. It was great getting this device to work. Love it so far!!!

Reviews.Title: Foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: nic l
Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up the foscam cameras to be viewed remotely. Ralph Mendez Very Helpfull. I am satisfied with the service and the picture quality is good. I would definitely recommend FOSCAM to all.

Reviews.Title: Installation, tech support a nightmare, cameras not durable.
Reviews.Author: T. Steele "Marimbri"
Reviews.Content: After days attempting to do install myself, and hours upon hours of being on hold waiting for returned phone calls after getting an answering service repeatedly (after being on hold for hours) the cameras were installed, worked great for 3 days, then ceased to work, first one, then the other.  Repeat days of phone tag with tech support (they call back HOURS or the next day after you wait at least a half an hour to get to their answering service that speaks very poor english) only to be told the camera is faulty, and to return them.ALSO.. most of these raving reviews you're seeing?  Foscam tech support takes control of your computer to fix the cameras.  Then when they have fixed them, they bring you here, and WILL NOT let you off the phone until you write a review, WITH THEM STILL IN CONTROL OF YOUR COMPUTER.  It is almost like having someone hold a gun to your head and tell you to write a review.  It is borderline cyber bullying in my humble opinion.  I mean hey, if you're not tech savvy and need help installing these cameras, and you have someone who IS tech savvy in full control of your computer, how likely are you going to be to write a bad review with them watching?  I, personally, wondered what they would do while in control of my computer at that point, so i terminated the team viewer and hung up on the tech person rather than be forced to write a raving review I DID NOT MEAN.Bottom line:  If you're not an expert in port forwarding and networking, steer clear.  If you plan on putting these cameras up somewhere that it is difficult to get to them to fix them, remove them, replace them, etc.  STEER CLEAR.  The features of the camera are awesome.. IF THEY WILL WORK  and IF YOU ARE AN EXPERT AND CAN ACTUALLY FIGURE IT OUT WITHOUT NEEDING A MANUAL.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: This is the first camera like this I have purchased and it works VERY well!  The price is right and it was very easy to set up.  The picture quality is great and the the controls are very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased with Foscam Technical Support, whether on-line chat or return call.  Ordered 2 cameras, both install CDs damaged.
Reviews.Author: L. BISHOP
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 cameras, one worked, the other did not fully function (could not get Wifi to list available Wifi networks).  I give Foscam a "F" for Technical Support assistance!  I give Amazon an "A+" for expeditious Customer Service and return authorization - thank you Amazon Customer Service!

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: Leilani Myers
Reviews.Content: This is my first attempt at using a wireless camera system for home monitoring and the foscam is perfect for that. The software couldbe a little more user friendly but over all it  was a good buy and has an excellent picture

Reviews.Title: Great product - backed by extraordinary tech support
Reviews.Author: Jerry Saperstein
Reviews.Content: This product represents an increasingly rare combination: excellence in design and operation - and phenomenal tech support. I am, frankly, in awe of how much time Foscam dedicates to helping its customers. Installation is simple - and complex. Setting  up the camera to be recognized on your internal LAN is pretty much within anyone's capability, if they will read the short manual. Making the camera accessible from the internet can be a lot more difficult. You have to create a "pinhole" or forward a port so the camera will be reachable from the internet. Depending on your router, this can be relatively simple since Foscam provides instructions on its very well-done support website for a number of popular routers. Take it slow, read the directions over and over until you feel comfortable and it should be easy. I use AT&T; and it has been so long since I had to create a pinhole that I forgot how to do. AT&T; doesn't provide manuals or documentation. And telephone AT&T; tech support doesn't know anything except how to refer you to a for-fee AT&T; service. If Comcast weren't even worse than AT&T;, I'd go back to them. Anyway, I got the pinhole set up and delighted in the pretty sharp 640x480 video the Foscam FI8910W produces. The software provided by Foscam does a good job. You can pan and tilt. The IR illuminators do a good job when the room is dark, but don't expect a lot of detail. Foscam provides a unique DDNS service so you can access your camera from any internet connected device. So far, so good. And then I wanted to set the Foscam up so it would send me an email whenever motion was detected in the coverage area. I was flummoxed. Despite following the instructions on the Foscam web page, I couldn't get it to work. So after checking the forums, I called Foscam tech support expecting less than stellar performance. How wrong I was. I dealt with Leo, who is simply superb. We walked through the process using a Teamviewer remote connection, engaged in some surprisingly rigorous troubleshooting and got the problem resolved, I was pleased with the product to begin with, but with the kind of tech support Leo provided, I will now freely admit to being a Foscam fanboy. Top-notch product backed by truly excellent tech support. Unbeatable.Jerry

Reviews.Title: works great, does the job
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: *** READ why 4 Stars ***after a good deal of consideration, I purchased this to use as a baby monitor and to keep an check in on the baby when we are out at work. The camera was very easy to set up. I have not used the provided software, but did it manually.The picture quality is good, 2-way audio works well.DDNS works very well. Remember, you will still need to configure your home network to allow connections from outside, if it is desired.It allows for you to add 10 users and control their access. Nice!Here are the reasons why I gave only 4 stars:1) 2-way audio uses the VLC plugin on non-internet explorer (IE) browsers. I could not get it to work on Mac, Linux, Windows using Firefox or Chrome. It ****works awesome**** using activex on IE. The other option is to use VLC and you can hear the audio but obviously you cannot talk back. They should have used some other plugin to provide two way audio.2) The manufacturer has some control issues I think. To even download firmware updates, we have to provide them with email address, validate the email address and then they will send firmware download links by email. The email did not contain links to the latest firmware, actually the page had older version than the firmware that came with the camera. I had to search on Google and found a page that had newer firmware.

Reviews.Title: Great product! Great Tech Support.
Reviews.Author: Highlife22984
Reviews.Content: I thought I had this thing all figured out. but I ran into a wall when it came to remote viewing when not on my home wireless network. After an hour of trying to figure it out my self and watching youtube videos I finally gave up and called tech support. The Guy who helped me was Tim and he took control of my computer witch some fancy program and fixed my problems and explained what he was doing along the way. Point is that if you're a bit intimidated by the connectivity and tech side of this product NEVER FEAR! just call up and they will do it for you!I am a Mac user btw and am viewing on an old mac mini and a macbook pro. Along with 2 iphones and 2 iPads.working great!

Reviews.Title: Groovy! Makes a great cat cam.
Reviews.Author: Alison Hayward "emergentologist"
Reviews.Content: We got this to conduct super secret surveillance of our two cats as part of a strategy to figure out why one cat was always wailing and hungry. Mission accomplished. Camera is fun to use, was not difficult to install. I love being able to move it around remotely from the Foscam app on my phone (Android OS). I have a MacBook and am able to pull it up as a webpage using a little program as well. It's slightly buggy (the interface of these programs) but works fine, lets you take still photos, lets you pretend to be the voice of God through the camera to your cats, etc.

Reviews.Title: good quality & price
Reviews.Author: Mert Aytug
Reviews.Content: All features were as advertised, camera is moving quietly which is great for using as baby cam. Very good deal for this price.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I travel for a living and require a camera for safeguard of my house.  The Foscam I installed exceeds my expectations.  I am truely impressed with it's abilities.Recently I returned from travel and it stopped working as usual.  I called customer service and am extremely appreciative of their prompt and professional help in "accessing it's abilities".  Additional gratitude to Leo who helped me with extreme patience.Thank you,Dennis RichardsonInstalled an additional camera outside, but couldn't make the motion detector feature work.  I called Foscam and spoke with Ron Jacob who repaired the problem very quickly.Thanks again,Dennis

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: B. Pedersen "Eclectic music collector"
Reviews.Content: Unbeatable value. These little cameras are a life saver. We have a very sensitive alarm at the office. I can check the warehouse from bed when the alarm goes off in the middle of the night, saving me from running down there for the umpteenth false alarm. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding support (!) but inadequate documentation
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: The FI8910W camera works well, optically and mechanically. Hard wire worked fine the first time, but I was unable to set up a wireless connection. The printed documentation was not adequate, but the personal support I received by phone from Calvin was absolutely outstanding. He set up my wireless connection and port sharing in just a few minutes. He was knowledgeable, efficient, patient and very personable. Based on the support I received and the quality of the camera, I am pleased with this product and would not hesitate to buy additional units or recommend it to others.  I just hope Calvin stays around to help with the setup.  He should rewrite the documentation.

Reviews.Title: Great little device with Great Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Camera functions in all respects as well or better than some higher end devices.  Setup is tricky, but the support from Foscam is tremendous.  I talked to three of their service people and all were knowledgeable and very helpful.  I will buy more from them.

Reviews.Title: setup was kinda tricky but,
Reviews.Author: diamondmen
Reviews.Content: Once done, the camera moved great, the audio is a joke, you can hear some, but there is no way anyone can understand you if your are trying to connect from a smart phone.for the price i paid, its a great gadget.

Reviews.Title: works with ubuntu linux and zoneminder
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: works with ubuntu linux and zoneminder.I used chrome to web into the FI8910W to configure it.followed the setup suggested by others here on the reviews: - lan/wired/ ethernet to get intial ip address. - web into the FI8910W to set all parms like ip address/passwords/etc.  turned on wifi on FI8910W. - unplug power on FI8910W. - unplug wired ethernet. - plug power back in. - confirm web browser can still get to FI8910W.to use FI8910W with zoneminder, zoneminder has config info on their website for the FI8910W.I did not do the section for zoneminder controlling camera movement.I just use the FI8910W's web interface if I want to move it, flip it, etc.zoneminder display's the FI8910W just like a wired bnc camera.zoneminder captures alarms as normal for the FI8910W.range: I have the FI8910W outside, but protected from the elements, not in an enclosure, it's about 125feet from the wifi router in the house. Signal strength is -67dbm from the FI8910W at that distance. The wifi router shows an up/down speed of 24M/24Mbps at that signal level.The FI8910W seems to take very little bandwidth ... 10's of kbs from I can see.I'm getting 10fps through zoneminder which is about top end for my zoneminder capture card.so far I think this is a great value as others have said.

Reviews.Title: technical Support
Reviews.Author: chris jones
Reviews.Content: I had problems with the connection of the camera. Then I contacted Foscam technical support and they quickly fixed all of my problems and got me up and running. I am very satisfied with the support received from this company.

Reviews.Title: Works Great expect one area
Reviews.Author: Datarock
Reviews.Content: The camera works great.  I got a third party app on my phone to see the images/record video.  Easy setup and you get a direct link to the camera for 3 years (Which you use for that app I mentioned)The only area I could see some improvement on would be the two way voice.  I can hear with the built in microphone great.  But when I talk it sounds like whispering air on the camera.  Not a huge deal as I don't use that feature but if I ever did I would be sad to not see it working :(

Reviews.Title: They will call back if Busy.
Reviews.Author: Pque
Reviews.Content: If you have wireless anything in your setup I think you will have a problem if you go wireless. In most cases as in my case I could not connect via wireless, they needed to change my ip address. Instruction dose not mention this so i needed to call for support. I waited about 30mins on hold they told me someone would call back within an hour and they did. Working now as i expected it would! Great product so far.

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Leo was a great help in getting my camera up and running. Overall i am very pleased with the camera. You cant beat the wireless connection. I prefer this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Nathan Beach
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great value and I will probably buy another one eventually.  I played with it for a few days before installing it outside under a covered roof area.  I spliced the power cable with about 25' of 16 AWG lamp wire to extend the power with no voltage drop problems.  If you do this, note that the power supply has polarity, so you have a 50% chance of wiring it incorrectly the first time.  If it doesn't work, just swap the wires and try again.The built in management software looks like it was made in 1999 and never updated, but it works well despite the poor aesthetics.  If you are on IOS, the "IP Cam Viewer" app is well worth the $3.99 price tag from the App Store.  The documentation that comes with the camera is kind of hilarious.  As grateful as I am for everyone else on earth learning English, I don't understand why Foscam couldn't pass it by a native English speaker before printing.  The only reason I give it 4/5 stars is because of the blatant laziness with regards to documentation and UI design on the part of Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive camera.  Hard for me to set up
Reviews.Author: Kippington
Reviews.Content: I am a tenacious booger.  Setting up to watch within my network was fairly easy, 45 minutes or so.  Learning DYN stuff was totally new to me and I was lost.  So I just kept watching youtube installation videos until some of it sank in.  3 days later and at least 20 hours later I got it.  It's very cool to watch on my iPad or iPhone when I am at work I in my car.

Reviews.Title: Very decent camera with mildly painful setup
Reviews.Author: G. Grosse
Reviews.Content: Bottom line, there is some detailed setup involved if you want a remote, web-based access wirelessly to this camera.Once setup, it gives a decent picture and coverage area. Night vision is a cool feature as well.Watch the videos on the manufacturers website to get up to speed quickly!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but great way to keep watch of your home
Reviews.Author: Long
Reviews.Content: This gives me peace of mind when I am away from my apartment. There has been a lot of break-ins in the area lately and I rarely spend anytime at home having to go to work and gym everyday and this allows me to keep an eye on my stuff when I am away. It is easy to set up and whenever motion or sound is detected it snaps 5-6 photos and sends it to my email.It makes me extremely happy that I am to be able to keep an eye out on my apartment even when I am hundreds of miles away.

Reviews.Title: Nice addition to security cameras already in place.
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hunt
Reviews.Content: I have this same camera at my home so choosing which one for the store was no problem. I had purchased two cameras and tried to install them but came into problems and had to return them. I was refunded the product costs and shipping. So I ordered two more for replacement. This time around, I did not have to call tech support and installed the cameras in no time. We are very happy with the results thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great Easy to Setup IP Cam Fully Mac Compatible
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: My wife and I purchased this camera to use as a baby monitor. We decided to buy this one after initially purchasing a Wansview, lured by the slightly lower price, after using it for an hour on our network I returned it given its sluggishness on our network and very cheap feel. Before changing course, and purchasing a traditional video baby monitor system we decided to give one more IP camera a chance. I am glad we did!  Immediately upon opening the box I could tell the Foscam was a quality product. Thankfully the install confirmed my initial impression as it was easy to install and up and running within 10 minutes. Picture is crisp and clear, audio is near real time with slight delay, wireless antenna allows for strong reception. Now whether on my iPhone, iPad, or MacBook I can monitor our little guy without having to have an extra device to tote around. If you are looking for an IP camera stop right here and buy this one!

Reviews.Title: These are great Little cameras for the money!
Reviews.Author: Panorama
Reviews.Content: The Foscam 18910W is a great little camera for the money. Setting a single camera up is pretty easy. If you are like me and hate reading manuals, Foscam has created some videos in the support section of their website. This is what I used for setup, Port forwarding and recording. The cameras network well with a G router but I will probably go to an N as I add more than three or four cameras and have several computers on the same router. I have tested the recording on, Quicktime, Windows Media Player and ATI's recording app. I think I like Windows Media player the best since you can fast scan the recordings when you get home if needed. When recording you can adjust the frame rate. This is a great option since you have some control on how much hard drive space is used and also helpful if you are using an older computer with a smaller hard drive than in more current computers. It can also be helpful if you have multiple cameras recording. I tested this and recorded at the 2 frames per second speed and only used 800 meg for about 9 hours of recording for one camera. It will go down to as low as 1/5 frames per second. There are many frame rate speeds going as high as 20 frames per second and there is max but I'm not sure what that number is but the video is smooth. You can also adjust the camera resolution as well to help manage hard drive usage. You can choose between 320 x 240 or 640 x 480. You can connect to your camera remotely using various browsers. I have used both Google and IE explorer and they both work fine however I found that the pan tilt is faster and smoother with IE Explorer. Hooking up additional cameras is easy but setting the second one up for remote access using one browser was a little tricky for me. Foscam tech support helped me with this so once you know how to do that you can keep adding cameras with no problem. I have my cameras mounted on my window sill so I can point them outside to check on things then swing them inside to check on the inside of the house. Please note Foscam has a line of outdoor cameras. The cameras have infrared lights so you can see things at night. They of course will not go threw the glass to light up outside but you can open up the camera lens and you can see pretty well outside at night. The infrared lights seem to light up a distance a little more than Foscam claims which is a good thing. I can see pretty far into my house with no light. The 18910 has pretty good accurate color. Foscam offers a line accessories to help mount the cameras however if none of them work for you you can easily customize a mounting bracket for about $4 at you local hardware store. As I am writing this review I am sitting at my folks house and looking at the corner of my screen watching what going on outside and the inside of  my house 12 miles away. I like that and it make me feel secure. If you need help with more information Foscam has an online demo of their cameras so you can test them out. You can also call Foscam and ask for Sandra or any of the other folks and they will help you pick the right camera for you. I plan to purchase several more soon. As an added note in order to get free tech support and 2 year warranty you will need to go to the Foscam website and click "where to buy". There is a list of approved suppliers which includes Foscam Direct, Amazon, Best Buy, Target, Home Depot, Radio Shack and others. I purchased my first camera from Foscam DIrect and the Second from Amazon. Hope this was helpful.Carrboro NC

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Orlando
Reviews.Content: This camera does what they say it does.  It is not difficult to set up, and reliable.  I definetly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam not too shabby
Reviews.Author: D.Snake "Snake"
Reviews.Content: Pro: Price $69.99 amazon price reduction yeye(keep your eyes alert), no monthly fees, night vision, pan/tilt, email alerts & more.Cons: No zoom, requires knowledge of wireless LAN set-up, DNS, port forwarding.Alright ppL, this is a great camera!! Initially, I was researching the Logitech Security Camera system due to their easy setup & convenience. However, Logitech cameras cost a lot more, and the homeplug feature seemed too bulky. As I did further research via amazon reviews, there were customer reports that Logitech cameras failed within 2 years of usage and there were also hidden fees for remote access! Logitech also prevents backwards compatibility, so newer models can result in new software rendering your existing Logitech security system obsolete. The Logitech was both pricey & not reliable, so I continued the search for something more affordable which led to the Foscam. Most of the negative reviews regarding the Foscam are due to the wireless LAN setup, it took me about 3 days to understand and setup the camera because I had no prior experience regarding port routing, DNS, etc.I would definitely look up on youtube and search "awkward hamster foscam" view the tutorials 1) basic setup 2)how to access camera via android,web, etc. After viewing this tutorial, you will figure out whether or not you are ready to meet this challenge. Also, since we are buying from amazon.com some reviews noted we will not get technical support from Foscam. I didn't try that.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Anu
Reviews.Content: I had a problem setting up the foscam camera. Ralph Mendez from tech support helped me do the remote wireless setting and iphone setting of the camera.The service was excellent.I am very happy with the foscam camera purchase.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Kimberly McLawhorn
Reviews.Content: I love this camera - I have used it for almost a year now.  I love that I can easily monitor my baby while he is at home with the nanny and I am at work.  It gives me a great piece of mind.  It works so easily with the app for the iphone.  I had to get technical support to set it up again after my router needed to be replaced.  Felix made the setup super easy and did all of the work in no time!  I wish I had called him sooner to do this, I had no idea it would be this fast and easy!

Reviews.Title: Foscam remote set up
Reviews.Author: sebastian
Reviews.Content: Great customer support and service. Calvin was great, he helped me set up my camera very quickly and also set up remote access with my iphone...I highly recommend this product. The company is very supportive and will help you with set up.

Reviews.Title: Could not - NOT - get this to work.
Reviews.Author: J.M
Reviews.Content: I'm no slouch when it comes to IT, routers, NAT, etc. This camera is SO not user friendly that I had to turn to the internet to find ways to make it work. The directions that come with it are HORRIBLE. I'm not sure they are even written grammatically correct and I recall some spelling errors as well. Though I COULD get the camera working when just on my internal network, I wanted to be able to see it remotely, even bought and app for it and for the life of me, could not get it to work.If you just want a simple in-home networked camera, awesome.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely useless
Reviews.Author: Brandine
Reviews.Content: I invested significant in these cameras for my business. I have tried endlessly to email the company & sit on hold for hours (no oned answers ever!) to resolve these issues we have. Nobody at Foscam cares to respond or answer any technical questions.1. Not wireless. If you have 3 cameras, you better have 3 modems that you can plug in within 10 feet of where you place the camera.2. No ability to see all camera screens without logging in to 3 separate admins.3. No record of camera history. no ability to rewind and review.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Great Service
Reviews.Author: C. Obrien
Reviews.Content: The Camera works great.Ability to see everything from my Iphone is very importantGreat Customer Service helped me remote setup. Had Calvin help me in just a few minutes.THanks

Reviews.Title: DIY Home Security
Reviews.Author: Jim Owen
Reviews.Content: These cameras work great! Easy to install and setup. Lot's of great features and a reasonable price. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Jeff Simone
Reviews.Content: Ralph Mendez was very helpful in getting my Foscam FI8910W up and running remotely.  Now we can monitor it even when we are outside of our home.

Reviews.Title: The worst customer service
Reviews.Author: Michael Wall
Reviews.Content: If your cameras don't work or have issues (I purchased mine through their website, not on amazon), prepare for some painful customer service.  You will call many times and wait 30 min minimum per call just to speak with someone.  It is truly painful, and after many many problems I finally decided to write this review for those of you out there.  They are far from simple to set-up and linking the new foscam to your phone is no simple task I can promise you this.  And getting through to the technicians is truly a painful experience...  Good luck, you'll need it

Reviews.Title: Super Service
Reviews.Author: mckc
Reviews.Content: Bought the cam couple of months ago. Had difficulties getting it to connect.  contacted customer service. got connected with Sandra Williams who remotely solved the issue and got everything fixed.  Great services!!

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to monitor my dogs. Works good and motion detection works fine too. The camera automatically sends 5 pictures to my e-mail address whenever it detects a movement.Cons:Noise when IR light turns on and off.Microphone/speaker on the camera is not that great.Login/Password is not encrypted so don't use iphone / android app when you are connected to open public wifi network.

Reviews.Title: the dog sitter
Reviews.Author: Tania
Reviews.Content: The camera was simple to set up. And now I can watch what my dog is doing when we are away....

Reviews.Title: Noisy
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Audio has intermitten noise in it and moving the camera makes noise.Video is good. Overall operation is equal to similar priced cameras!

Reviews.Title: Good network camera.
Reviews.Author: E.E.
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and works great at night. The biggest plus, it's less than $90, so a great bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Installation CD that came with the camera is broken
Reviews.Author: MJ "Working mom"
Reviews.Content: We ordered this camera in December in preparation of the arrival of our baby, we just now tried to install it but the CD is broken therefore the installation is a nightmare, we don't want to return the camera but need a CD or an email with the exact instructions of how to install it without it.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Foscam camera setup.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Bridges
Reviews.Content: Calvin gave me superior service. He patiently set up my camera remotely for over 1/2 hour, and it works flawlessly. Highest review. Thanks!I like that Foscam is wireless, accessible from anywhere, and it has great audio/video quality.

Reviews.Title: Great support
Reviews.Author: RJ Diaz "RJ"
Reviews.Content: Calvin was able to setup my Foscam and was very helpful.  I like the remote access feature.  Excellent product!  I recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Foscam Review
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the Foscam web cam and its great.  I had a little trouble setting it up but when I called support, I spoke to Calvin who was very knowledgeable and took me through it step by step and now it is working perfectly! I love it thank you very much! Excellent product and support!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Forsaken_one
Reviews.Content: I just set this camera up lastnight and I like it so far. However, there are a couple of things that could use improvement.pros:Easy to set up!Easy to upgrade the firmwareConnected to my modded out linksys e3000 with no problems at allcons:lag time in the audiocheap plastic mounting bracketFor the price this is a great little camera for monitoring things around the house!  I will be getting another soon.

Reviews.Title: The camera itself works.
Reviews.Author: EskuchenJia
Reviews.Content: Camera works great, but support could use some improvements.First off, the included software looks like an antique that's been passed down for generations, and the method of updating the software is even more antiquated than the software itself. There is no automation to the update process, and there are plenty of opportunities for error (good luck finding the right model number).But in the end, it works.Took me a while to figure everything out when I first set it up, but it works fine now. A quick Google search revealed some very helpful videos to set up the wifi and adjust port and firewall settings.The only additional feature I wish the camera had is a zoom, but other than that, no real problems with the camera. Sometimes the night vision will flash in and out in low light situations (like sunset); dim enough that it needs the night vision, but bright enough to wash out the image and turn it back to regular mode.

Reviews.Title: My dog cam
Reviews.Author: MarkyVicki
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install Just follow the instructions. Been using this foscam f18910w for a couple of weeks now and never encountered a problem.

Reviews.Title: IP camera
Reviews.Author: mrthekid "scotts"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, pretty clear imageworks good in light, and in dark, but issues when trying to capture in dark with bright light in capture area,really only one thing lacking with this camera, no Zoombut thats okcamera works just as advertised, able to set it up and access it over the internetwhen accessing it on smart phone, unless your phone is connected through WiFi, controlling the camera will be unresponsive, I guess G3 is not enough bandwidth.

Reviews.Title: awesome as a baby monitor
Reviews.Author: DMP
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a video monitor for my toddler who is now out of his crib.  I needed pan/ tilt, and night vision.  However, I didn't want to spend over $200 since he is my third (and i think last!) child!  This was recommended to me.  It's more of a legit security camera.  The monitor is your computer, or any mobile device.  I can monitor from my desktop, ipad, android or iphone (some apps are better than others but all function the same).  The set up is a little tricky if you are not a techie (we are not!)  We were able to do the basic set up (we thought) but it wasn't working properly and the helpful tech support was able to log into my computer remotely and set it up FOR me in about 10 minutes... that was soooo helpful.  Works like a charm.  I can monitor from anywhere in my house using my wifi, or anywhere in the world using a domain name (haven't tried this yet though).  There is a speaker to talk from your device into the room (helpful when you see little one getting into something bad!)  The installation bracket works well to adjust to your needs and the best angle/ view.  And of course, you can remotely move the camera around and it seems to be quiet as it moves.  The picture is perfectly clear.  Color in light and gray shades for night vision.  For the price, this is the best buy you are going to get as a baby monitor.  The ones marketed to parents are marked up like crazy!  So happy I found this.  I think you  can also add more cameras to monitor other areas and see them all on the screen and this can be re-purposed when baby gets older.  Don't hesitate.  Just buy and plan to set up on a weekday when you can call customer support (only during regular business hours...)

Reviews.Title: Great Product & Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Neeraj Mogla
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and configure. With in minutes I was able to set it up over the phone and see my house & family.The booklet nicely describes the setup process.

Reviews.Title: Another chinese piece of cr*p!
Reviews.Author: Howard Brantly "howie"
Reviews.Content: OK the good news is it sorta works. But the static ip address goes through a relay in China and it only works when it feels like it. I've also notice what I suspect is suspicious activity of the pan activity occasionally. Like I'm not panning the camera so who's watching? I'm trying to find another static ip provider here in the US but it's a bit pricey and a little complicated to configure. I would not recommend this product because of the static ip issues.

Reviews.Title: Good All Around Camera.
Reviews.Author: J. Somers "Somersfun"
Reviews.Content: Low cost and easy to use.  It does what it says.  Good for home use.  The night vision is a plus.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: M. Felts
Reviews.Content: showed up on time and works great,, easy set up..would recommend to everyone. Peace of mind when away from home to check on the house.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: I. T. Hassan "Itarek"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product the only problem is the night vision not so clear image and sometimes the camera reset and the color became over saturated you need to power the camera off to clear the problem i have more than 10 of this model only two of them have this problem

Reviews.Title: Love these!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: These are great cameras and easy to operate and set up.  If you have medium computer skills you can get it done.  If not, someone you know surely can help.

Reviews.Title: Takes a bit of tweaking to get it right
Reviews.Author: M. Goldwater
Reviews.Content: The product is decent. Problem is, product is supplied by 3rd party and Foscam will not support it with setup issues. Works well on my LAN. Works well remotely on my IPAD, but audio will cut off. So far have not been able to connect remotely on my Iphone, even though setup is theoretically identical to the IPAD. Would rate it better, if it didn't take so much tweaking to get it to work remotely.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Susan M. Gantner
Reviews.Content: The camera itself works great. We bought it to watch our lake house for us while we're away. We're planning to set up a second one facing outside a window so that we can enjoy our lake view when we're not there.The manual needs help. Fortunately the web site does have somewhat more helpful information.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Wilko
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very good and so is the wi-fi reception. I'm still trying to figure out how to upload a snapshot to my hard drive on the motion detect. The manual is not much help.

Reviews.Title: Decent value for wireless video camera
Reviews.Author: David S "nickname"
Reviews.Content: Provides remote video viewing at a good price ($69.99 shipping included).The manufacturer provides live demo feeds so that you can see if the resolution works for you.Apparently the wireless option has a MAC different from the wired option (not clear in the manual).My only wish is that the mobile phone login provided the capability to select a predefined view like the other two login methods (Active X Mode and Server Push Mode).

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Hlavacek
Reviews.Content: I can now keep an eye on my house using my android phone...I love it! I does require a little work to set up and a reliable computer connection

Reviews.Title: Best Pan/Tilt IP Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Matt M.
Reviews.Content: Hands down the best IP camera available for the money. We use it as a baby monitor and it works great for that. It's way better than any baby video monitoring product available today.Do yourself a favor and call Foscam if you are trying to set up for viewing remotely via Foscam Pro for ipad or iPhone. I spent two days trying to figure it out. Foscam technical support was able to get me setup in 15 minutes by safely taking control of my computer.This thing works great on wifi and 3G! Once setup you will find yourself buying another! I have two and want more! Foscam pro is a great app that compliments the Foscam IP Cameras.

Reviews.Title: Work Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Setup is easy if you follow the U-tube video on the factory website. I downloaded the Foscam app from the Google Playstore and it work very good as well.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after hearing the experience of a co-worker who bought one as a baby monitor, and loved it.  He even gave me a demo of the remote control from his iPhone.  Being a 'techie', i though this was a no-brainer.  After spending several hours over a few days, i've given up for now.  I'm trying to use this to capture pet activity in our basement.  I've gotten it to work for a few hours at a time, capturing and saving images locally to my PC, but then it stops, and requires a powercycle.  Will revisit in the future when my frustration level goes down.

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry D. Martin
Reviews.Content: Works really great, wish it had a little bit of optical zoom. O well what do you expect for under $100

Reviews.Title: foscam setup
Reviews.Author: Lewis Olson
Reviews.Content: Just barely set it up so it is too soon to explore.  Sandra at foscam was great helping me connect via my wifi, I had trouble with that. The teamviewer was a great tool to remote in for the tech help.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera at an Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Bert S.
Reviews.Content: Great webcam at a great price.  Easy to set up and loaded with easy to use features.  Could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Good cam
Reviews.Author: GP
Reviews.Content: This is my second 8910W.  Like the first one so I thought I'd get another.  Had same set up difficulties as first time but Foscam tech support promptly resolved situation.  Both cams up and running.  Can't beat the deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: T. Abdullah
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the setup support that I had received with this camera.. Very thorough and the technician was very knowledgable about the camera and the set up.. I didn't even have to do too much on my end,.. she pretty much did it all.  If it wasn't for the tech support, I would have a difficult time indeed setting it up.. For the support feature alone, I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Sullivan "Mary"
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 cameras thourgh Amazon. It was difficult to set them up especially using on Wifi. Called Foscam customer service (phone number is in their manual), they walked me through the set-up and everything works ok for now. However keep in mind that Wifi will work for a couple of years only because it is set-up on their server, after 2 years no one knows what happens and the cameras may be obsolete unless we find another server (fees?), and a new set-up will be required (probably without the help of Foscam)..

Reviews.Title: Amazing product, tough setup
Reviews.Author: J. Davis
Reviews.Content: This camera works great and works really well on tablets and mobile devices.  However, be warned that the setup for this requires quite a bit if networking knowledge.  I am fairly knowledgeable with networking, but had to call in a professional (really just a friend who does networking full time) in order to make this viewable from outside of the local network.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Chris Bavaro
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy and camera works awesome. Amazing picture and sound. Had a issue viewing the camera remotely. Called tech support they logged into the system and had everything fixed in less than 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Trash
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would be giving something a one star review, well here I am.It worked for the first couple weeks and I was fairly happy with it although I did purchases a 3rd party application to use against it as in my opinion their software is trash.Now more then half the time it is a paper weight. If you plan on having it hard wired then maybe it will work well, however I bought it for it's wireless capability which now drops and makes it unusable day in and day out. Before someone points me to this or that, I am very technical. I have searched the internet and the forums and tried everything. So many hours wasted trying to get this thing working from switching channels on the wireless, verifying the firmware, etc... I have tried it all.Do your research, there are many people having the same issues... look elsewhere for a camera, there is a reason this thing is cheap. Live and learn I guess.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, pleased with purchase!
Reviews.Author: codyclark02
Reviews.Content: Great camera, indoors or outdoors!Will be buying more.For help with setup go to youtube, there are great step by step videos

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W Wireless IP Camera Black for $69.99
Reviews.Author: S. Bains "singh"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to watch my living room and my other security camera monitor which is not connected to the internet.Setup was easy, do not use the CD that accompanies it, just simply connect the wireless antenna, connect the power cord and RJ45 network cable to your router. Type the IP address of your wireless router to login e.g. [...]  then look for ipcam and write down the corresponding IP address. Then paste that IP address into your browser and login (default is admin as username no password, ensure you change that in future). Go under Wireless LAN settings and enter your router SSID, security type, password, you need to ensure your router is visible under scan, then the camera will reboot. Then go ahead and change system date/ time, adjust camera position, color, brightness, etc. The network lamp is the light on the back of the camera. Disconnect the RJ45 cable and then test by logging into your camera via your phone, tablet or PC using its IP address. If you search google for whats my ip address that will be your external address outside your home, don't forget to add the port number. No zoom feature, 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Easy set-up; great for price offered
Reviews.Author: Phat Viking
Reviews.Content: We were looking for something to put outdoors, so we returned it. Aside from that. the extra software involved for the extra features was too much money anyway. Easy to set up - no issues there. Pictures were clear...just not what we were exactly looking for.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera and Support Were AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Chipperoo
Reviews.Content: Had issues with remote access. Albert from Tech Support fixed my issue very quickly. (Issue with Vonage System on my network). This is an EXCELLENT product with EXCELLENT support. Albert is a true professional. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY AND PRODUCT\

Reviews.Title: Great webcam
Reviews.Author: Bob L
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and the picture is excellent.  I can view it on my desktop and laptop computers using Explorer, Firefox, or Chrome.  And I can view it on my Android tablet or my wife's iPhone using IP Cam.  The camera reliablity responds to pan and/or tilt commands and the connection to my Linksys E1000 router is extremely reliable.  The infared feature doesn't work well at night but I suspect that's because there is too much light behind and in front of the camera.Setting it up was not difficult as I'm familar with configuring webcams and routers.  But, if you've never set up a webcam and don't understand routers, any webcam could be difficult to install.I happen to have a north-facing green house window where I've placed the camera so I don't have to worry about direct sunlight but it's not clear from the instructions if direct sunlight will damage the camera.Overall for about $100, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Unit.
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Good unit - better quality pictures than the older models. Worked fine out of the box - may purchase more.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it. Set this  up in less than 10 minutes.
Reviews.Author: mikelamar
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup. Worked right out of the box. Insert the CD and follow the instructions in the guide. Picture is crystal clear. Also, comes with a mount, although not sure how stable it will be. I plan on just setting it on a mantle/stand and logging in from work to watch my kid play. I also checked it from the mobile device (just accessing the camera URL) and it works. The mobile functionality of scrolling/panning is a bit sloppy, but it works for what I want. I'll probably order another one. Night vision works great also!

Reviews.Title: Works great, easy to setup
Reviews.Author: Li "Amazon-Aholic"
Reviews.Content: Instructions are really easy to follow, go to their website for video tutorials. As long as you have just a little bit of network configuration skills.necessary knowledge to properly setup the webcam:access router configuration pagefind your wireless settingsfind your own ip addresssetup port fowardingsetup email (smtp)Video quality is decent.  No autofocus though, you have to manually set focus, but if mounted high on the wall, you'll likely to just set the focus to infinity anyway.Can access live feed on internet, however on 3G phones the speed may be quite slow to a point it is useless.The newer models seems to ship with a newly designed motion/light detection sensor with a protective glass in front, while the older models does not have the multi-coated protective glass in front of the motion/light sensor.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera. Has API
Reviews.Author: Fred Posner "qxork"
Reviews.Content: These are very good cameras, but the impressive thing is there is also an API allowing you to do some fun hacks with very little programming skill. We run about 8 of these as a security system. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Decent for price
Reviews.Author: J. Maehl
Reviews.Content: Go figure I buy this model just two months before the new model came out.  When this unit switched to night vision it makes a lot of loud clicking for about 8 seconds while its adjusting. You can do a listen in mode and can hear stuff, but not good quality audio. If you switch it to the mode where you are supposed to be able to talk to it the whole unit freaks out and it's a non-stop loud clicking disturbed audio sound. Apparently that feature was never fully ready for release. The first time using it it was somewhat painless to get it working on an asus router with a dd-wrt firmware on it. Since then I reloaded the native asus firmware on the router and have never been able to get the foscam working again. I wish foscam would put a walk-through guide on how to get it to work on an Asus RT-N16 router on their support website.

Reviews.Title: Perfect First Camera
Reviews.Author: Commancer
Reviews.Content: This camera does amazing things for a low price!  I use it to watch my Doberman when I am at work and have no complaints.  It delivers a good color picture so you can spy on whatever's going on at home (kids, babysitter, pets....spouse?).  It creates a private web address that you access to see the live images.  It also has amazing night vision I didn't even know about when I bought it; with all the lights off in a room I can still see my dog ok.  It does NOT need to hook into a PC, it sends the images out onto the www by itself.  You can cause the camera to rotate left/right and up/down remotely from anywhere to follow any movement you see.  Everyone at work thinks I am a techno-genius and wants one of their own.  If you have set up a router or home wireless network before you can set up this camera easily, if not it may take you a half hour of reading instructions and calling their 800 number.....just remember your cable company usually leaves the wireless router set to its default password which you can find online by typing the manufacturer name into a search...UPDATE: 10AUGUST2013.  I had a small problem and Irish from Foscam support was very friendly and helpful.  He solved my problem quickly and efficiently.  Thank You, Irish.A great great camera for my dog-watching purposes, I can't imagine why someone would want to spend more.

Reviews.Title: Works great, inexpensive, good tech support.
Reviews.Author: Kim Kinn
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the previous model of this camera about a year ago (Christmas 2011) and ended up returning it because we could not get it to work. (and it was driving my husband bonkers)  My husband still wanted a webcam so he could see what he's missing when he goes on business trips. It was with great trepidation that I purchased this for him for Valentines Day 2013.  The first day he tried to set it up on his own and it was a no-go. On day two, I convinced him to call Foscam tech support and they were able to help him. He was just a few small settings off of making it work on his own but, as you know, a few small settings can kill a tech project in no time. Foscam support was of no help to us in 2011 but it was totally different this time around.  We are not dummies when it comes to computers, we set up our own home network and have wireless printers, etc.  It is just the nit picky settings that will get you.  I would recommend this camera. If it doesn't work for you right away, call Foscam tech and they will help you in no time.

Reviews.Title: camera set up
Reviews.Author: Seematty
Reviews.Content: knowledgable service in setting up wireless camera and cell phone also.  Never seen such a good service. Camera is very simple give lot of options.

Reviews.Title: Steve Foscam Review of tech support
Reviews.Author: STEVE13
Reviews.Content: Great service,very helpful. The remote setup helped me to get into the cameras. I was unable to do it without their help. Overall great tech support.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: The German
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for surveillance of my house. This one is for indoors and it surely works great! It recognizes motion and start recording and tossing e-mails. The remote PTZ works nicely with my iPhone and iPad. So I'm ordering three more for outdoors with a dome casing!

Reviews.Title: doggy cam
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Hoo
Reviews.Content: I got this camera just to keep and eye on things to make sure things are ok at home. I'm a little paranoid about the crime in my area, so this gives me great peace of mind knowing it has the alarm function. It works exactly as it should and was very easy to set up. I just purchased anther one to get a second perspective of my home, as well as to spy on the dog to see what he does while im at work. Makes my work day better to see him lounging around on the couch or running to the door when I get home.

Reviews.Title: Works but useless.
Reviews.Author: K. Good "Kyle"
Reviews.Content: Look the item works but if you're purchasing it to remotely view your house/dog/cheating wife/whatever from work or a remote location, don't.  The software is very very very basic.  They don't even make the Iphone/Android software... independent software manufacturers do.

Reviews.Title: Foscam cameras
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Kate with tech support was just awsome.  She took control of setting up my 6 camera's and she made it so simple.  She was also pleasant, patient and answered all my questions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: wlg
Reviews.Content: Not so easy to set up  using the instruction manual...it's obvious the writers aren't native speakers of the English language. I had to go to the Foscam web site for technical support. I was on hold for almost a half hour and then they took my name and had a tech call me back an hour later. However, once I finally got ahold of tech support had me up and running in only a few minutes (thanks Albert!) My rating?Camera: five stars all the way.Albert: five stars for his fast and knowledgeable helpFoscam technical support line: three stars (which is why my review has four stars instead of five.)

Reviews.Title: FI8910W
Reviews.Author: M. D. Horn
Reviews.Content: The camera is great.  The picture is superb.  The controls are easy to use.  The technical support, which I needed, fop remote access was terrific.  It took no time at all for the technician to correct what I had missed.  I have a DLink camera too, and it does not compare in picture quality or internet reliability.  Would definitely recommend.  Good value. Great price.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding IP Camera
Reviews.Author: TjB
Reviews.Content: Even if you don't purchase the Blue Iris software to accompany this product it still allows you to track motion detection and upload images to a dedicated FTP or via an email account.  Very robust interface.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Carin
Reviews.Content: Camera's were easy to set up but i came across an issue that customer service was able to resolve in minutes. Very Pleased. Calvin was wonderful! Camera seems great so far.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: W. Bender
Reviews.Content: Although a little bit quirky, these give you a lot for the money. If you have never messed with wireless cameras and such before, it takes a little effort to get started. Foscam has a pretty decent website with videos to help walk you through it. My opinion is  that they have gotten better and more helpful over time. They also put out firmware updates and appear to address issues that users have had.The user interface isn't great, but it isn't bad either. It will work with Android although it behaves and functions a bit differently. I have experienced the occassional difficulty connecting to a camera, that usually sorts itself out after repeated attempts. But I will also say that I've seen that kind of thing with a Linksys at more than 3 times the price and I think the video is better with the Foscam.I know some people have had some issues, but I'll just add that there are a number of things you can do wrong. It pays to watch their videos before trying to set one up. The oldest one I have, I've had for quite awhile, and it still works fine. I have since bought more.These are pretty nice cameras for the money and they have some nice features. If you are a novice with this sort of thing, take your time and follow the directions and I'd recommend watching their videos first. There is a lot going on to make wireless PC cameras work and as far as I know, no one offers one that is quite "plug and play".  You can spend a lot more money to get less.

Reviews.Title: Not good out of the box
Reviews.Author: Kevin Fraser
Reviews.Content: Camera was sold Previously Used Like New.  Nope.  Was turned around 180 degrees the wrong way, and couldn't be corrected.  Extremely difficult to install electronically (router).  Didn't come with antenna.  Image was fine but the unit was useless to me.

Reviews.Title: Fi8910W
Reviews.Author: Sean Thompson
Reviews.Content: I had trouble seeing the camera over the Internet so I called the Foscam technical support.  The Foscam Technical Support person "LEO"  was able to log into my computer and set it up for me.  The problem ended up being that I had two routers connected in series.  He got the camera set up in no time.  I am quite happy with this camera and the support.Note: they were busy when I called them, but they called me back the next day.

Reviews.Title: Works well , easy to setup..
Reviews.Author: jhpk13
Reviews.Content: Bought this to be able to check in on the kids during the day and check in on the house when we are away.  This will meet both my needs.  Follow the instructions, easy to setup and connect via the internet using your computer or smartphone (android in my case). Only catch is, you'll have to wait for the camera to restart depending on what your changing on the camera.  Have it mounted on the mantel and it views the whole room with color and clarity.  The camera moves smoothly and you can hear the audio from the room.  As long as you have a good data connection on your smartphone, all the features work well.  The image and audio lag are minimal.  The infrared for night vision works really good compared to the Motorola MBP33. About 100x better. If I knew this, I would have setup this foscam as my baby video monitor instead of the Motorola MBP33.

Reviews.Title: Foscam - Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Binajr "binajr"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price (I paid $75). As other users have said setup can be challenging. It took me a week to figure out, but now it is working smoothly. I have set up motion detect alarm, e-mail setup, dns set up (really not needed, but I will explain later), port forwarding and iphone app set up. I was disappointed initally because the set up cd came broken. However, I was able to download the application from foscam website.
