Reviews.Title: excellent camera and technical support
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: camera is great.  smooth panning, very easy to use controls.  clear picture.  compact size is very convenient to mount. excellent tech support by calvin.  highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Very good product, but you need a ph.d to install it
Reviews.Author: dustinhunt78 "Dustin D. Hunt"
Reviews.Content: This is a well constructed, feature rich camera that is priced at a more than reasonable cost.  BUT....be ready to endure a very difficult "setting up" process.  I bought this camera to use with my Vera 3 home controller, which I know to be compatible with this camera (I've read a slew of forums concerning the compatibility of the camera with my Vera 3).  Even still, I'm having trouble with setting it up.  I have got the camera up and running, but I can't seem to get all the features to work with my Vera.  If you are going to be setting up this camera independently of a home controller, you REALLY need to know this next statement.  The process of setting the camera up and being able to remotely view it CANNOT BE DONE FREE OF CHARGE.  Dyndns (the website that you will be directed to go through) no longer lets you set up a free account.  You have to pay an annual fee to set up ANY account.  Even if you do decide that it's worth the annual fee, know that the process is not for someone who is not VERY knowledgeable in this area.  I've set up an entire z-wave network and have never found it difficult to add an item to my system.  This endeavor has ended that streak of success.  When I have a day off from work, I'll be spending some time with tech support on the line.Bottom line is that the camera itself IS a very good buy.  The ONLY thing that keeps me from giving this item a 5 star + rating is the difficulty of the set up.  The picture is awesome and the night vision works like a charm.  Just be prepared to spend some time on the set up if you want to have all the features enabled.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, mid-range features
Reviews.Author: C. Humphreys "Business Road Warrior"
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  Setup is easy, although not so if you follow the documentation.Do *not* rely on the "test setup" for email.  It never works, although the email notifications do workif your settings are correct.  Just enter settings and try it out.Video and photo quality are very good.Motion detection is ONLY for photos, one at the moment of detection and then 2-4 every second or so.You have to buy add-on software to do video motion detection and recording.  (e.g. blueiris, xprotect, etc...)Wireless setup is a snap.  Just remember to plug it in to a DHCP-enabled network *first* via a physical cable, get the IP, then reconfigure as desired from the web console.Have not gotten audio to work, as I'm not a Windoze user, and that seems to be required.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I needed to setup two F18910W cameras, on MAC os and soon realized I would need help. I called Foscam support and was not disappointed. Both were quickly running. The image quality and functionality is what I was looking for. I would recommend this camera to others. Thanks, JD

Reviews.Title: Really  nice camera, impossibly hard to set up.
Reviews.Author: raquis
Reviews.Content: I am an IT pro and I had so much trouble setting up this camera to be able to access it from outside the house. It took me about 2.5 hours to finally figure out how to open a dedicated port for it on my Apple router. (yes apple routers are a pain in the ass). But once I got it to work it has been great. We downloaded a free app from the app store for our iphones and kept track of our cat day and night while we were gone. I am considering to purchase more to see the whole house.However, be aware that the set up is not user friendly. The instructions only cover a few routers and you will have to dig through the internet in forums and see how to set it up for outside the house. I never contacted Foscam but I did get frustrated with it and got it done after I left it sit and came back with a fresh mind.

Reviews.Title: Great Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Robert L Kraft
Reviews.Content: The FOSCAM supplied Ethernet cable was defective, but I got excellent telephone technical support from Leo at the Fosam support line. I had a spare Ehernet cable and when we hooked it up, Leo was able to quickly set up my camera and got it working properly both in house and remotely. So far I am quite happy with this camera and I look forward to using it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: T. Joseph "TJ"
Reviews.Content: Received the camera in 2 days.  I had purchased 1 camera to watch my dog, and now that I allow him to roam around the house, I decided to buy 2 more.  Loved the first camera, and so when I got the second I had issues setting up, but called Foscam Tech support and they where able to guide me and setup my camera in no time.  Very happy with my purchase and even more happy with the tech support.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: camera works great with excellent clarity. It was easy to do initial set-up. A suggestion would be a more defined instruction booklet.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua O. Isaiah "Josh"
Reviews.Content: Had some problems trying to set it up myself. Called Foscam Tech Support, and Boom, it was AWESOME...Nice, now i can see my precious twin from any where in the world... :)

Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Polarbear
Reviews.Content: the customer service department was a tremendous help in setting up the iphone app. The technician was most polite and knowledgeable and now everything is working wonderfully

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Craig L Nelson
Reviews.Content: They are a little difficult to set up if one is not a computer wiz but once set up they work great.  Help is available from Foscam if you buy from them directly.

Reviews.Title: i gave up on setting this up
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Rios
Reviews.Content: i tried tired tried and couldnt set it up on wifi so i can check on my iphone 5 ANYWHEREso i gave upnow is just collecting dust until i sell it to one of my savy tech friends

Reviews.Title: Horrible low quality camera.  Avoid at all costs!
Reviews.Author: somyougago
Reviews.Content: Horrible low quality camera.  Avoid at all costs!  Cheaply made and low quality.  I've had 2 units replaced already, and I don't think there is any quality control on these units.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: Adam Wilson
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up and it has lots of great features for the price.  I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great product and service
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I just bought this product and am very pleased.  Simon was great for service and I'm very happy with the product. I'd definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Patman412
Reviews.Content: This camera works GREAT and gives an excellent picture image for the cost. I had trouble with my verizon router which verizon could not help me with. The tech support folks at Foscam were able to solve the problem in minutes, making me a very happy and satisfied customer. I would highly recommend this product to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this camera. I have 4 and they are easy to install and can be accessed remotely. The night vision is very clear and I rotate my view which I also like.

Reviews.Title: works better with noip
Reviews.Author: a jones
Reviews.Content: this one works better than the newer foscam, i thought the setup was going to be hard but it was not.

Reviews.Title: I am not a Foscam representative
Reviews.Author: Negative459
Reviews.Content: I picked up a pair of these outside of Amazon and I am very pleased. Granted, I am tech savvy and have a fair amount of experience with networking but I found them very simple to set up. The instructions were, for the most part, well written on a technical level. As long as you pay attention to the details like only using IE for setup you should be fine. I had both of them up and running in about 45 minutes, despite some issues with my own router. As a heads-up, when setting up multiple cameras on a dynamic IP network, you need to assign each one it's own port (like :80, :81, :82) or it won't let you configure the port forwarding in the router.Anyhow, they work like a charm with my Windows 8 phone. Feed is very smooth at full size (640x480) and full frame rate on my LTE connection. On my wife's iPhone 4 on 3G it's a little choppy but also works fine. I haven't tried turning down the resolution/frame rate on hers to see if it makes a difference but I'm guessing it will help.The picture is great overall and I'm very impressed with the night vision quality. The picture is very clear and still shows color if there's some natural light spill in the room. When you are in the room, the night vision LEDs glow a very faint red so the camera's not totally invisible but it's very inconspicuous. The pan/tilt motors are also almost totally silent so when you move the camera you can't hear it unless you're right next to it. If you have these stashed somewhere, they would be very hard to notice by visual or sound cues, especially in the dark. They are a little bit larger than I was expecting and the wall mounts are pretty bulky. They're not going to be easy to hide in plain sight like some smaller cameras but for the features they offer, it's worth it.My only small complaint is that I wish you could tap and hold on an arrow to constantly pan or tilt, rather than have it move in small increments with each tap. It's very accurate but if you need to sweep the room, it takes some time. You can turn on the auto pan and it'll sweep but you don't have control over which way it goes first so it could be faster or not. It's not enough to knock off a star, though.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised!  (used as a baby monitor)
Reviews.Author: Mimir
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera as a baby monitor to keep an eye on my child when they are sleeping (and for later one when playing in the room alone).  I do not use the audio monitoring as I already have an audio monitor in place with a handset.  The night time vision range and the wireless range of the camera is far beyond what I had expected at this price.  It really can see all the way across my nursery in pitch black without even straining.  The ability to monitor my child from my laptop or my iphone has been wonderful.  The ability to control the camera to scan the room or adjust the angle will be indispensable once we hit the toddler phase.  You can even view your child via this webcam when you are not even in state.  We've been able to give family members a link and password to peek in on the little one.  I really couldn't be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and service
Reviews.Author: J. Kerr
Reviews.Content: I just purchased and setup the camera.  The picture quality is great, including in the dark.  I had is setup in another room and actually went to see if there was a light on the camera because of how well it could see.  I encountered an issue with getting the wireless to work, where it gave an error message of "Error: illegal params".  After looking through forums on line I called tech support and they remote controlled my PC and corrected the issue.  they reset to factory default, set the port address to 8089, scanned for the network, entered the key, and it worked fine.  Sandra, from tech support, was also kind enough to setup the motion alarm and storing to a PC hard drive.I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: KG
Reviews.Content: Foscam FI8910W is a fine camera. Easy to use and understand interface, provides great visuals, and basically lives up to expectations.Installation required assistance. Had trouble with recorded files and tech support set it up remotely. Problem is it's not explained clearly what they are doing at that point so you continue on still not understanding what was wrong to begin with. But if you are in a hurry, it's a done deal and all systems are go.Overall this piece of equipment is worth purchasing and using as it provides fully to its purpose - giving peace of mind. I would certainly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: One of the best IP cams out there
Reviews.Author: R. Singhania "TooMuchOfTooLittle"
Reviews.Content: I have never used an IP camera before, and was looking for an expensive one to get me started. I researched about multiple options out there, and finally settled for this one on Amazon (the deal price of $68 helped!). Must say, I have not been disappointed.The camera is great, though it took some time to figure out how to get the external name to work. It does come with 2 years of free DDNS service (you will need this if you do not have a fixed IP address) though you can equally use the 'publish my IP address by email' option. I prefer the DDNS service, and it works well.Great pan and tilt, great night-vision. The app to use this on an android phone is not that great, but there are other apps that work equally well on this camera. Accessing from Internet Explorer is not a problem, though cannot get sound with Chrome.If you have not used an IP camera before, I would recommend this one. I'll go a step further - if you need help setting it up, write me a note and I can help.

Reviews.Title: It is a really great camera
Reviews.Author: Corrine "on the beach"
Reviews.Content: It is really a great little camera, when it first connected to my wireless. I focused it on the view of the Ocean from my window. It was a lot of fun to watch. But about 15 minutes after connected the picture froze and It was gone from my wireless network. I connected it again, but the same thing happened again. I have 2 other cameras F1818w they don't drop off the network. The sad part, this is my favorite camera, It can rotate 360, the picture is great. I am asking for a replacement and I really hope the problem stops.

Reviews.Title: Ordered two of these, 1 worked great the other had faulty IR
Reviews.Author: Carl Tyler
Reviews.Content: Ordered two of these when they were on sale.  One worked perfectly, the other worked great, but the IR only had a range of about 1 ft.  Fortunately Amazons quick returns process had me with a working replacement 1 day later.Image quality is great.  The firmware upgrade is a little cumbersome, but for the price I paid these were great value.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: jrome
Reviews.Content: Would have gave 5 stars if it were  less confusing to install. Great picture and easy to use colors are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Some care needed to set up but seems to work
Reviews.Author: neil
Reviews.Content: First - the camera seems well put together and not bad quality. It is not HD but the pic quality is ok and the IR does work well.Second - I have a 64 bit W7 machine and this is not what you need to setup this camera. The IP camera Tool shows nothing under 64 bit systems and also if you goto 'basic setup' and try to enter your IP addresses manually it will say 'Illegal params' when you submit. I believe this is because the camera does not understand 64 bit packets etc. Eventually I did cotton onto this (after trying dozens of other measures such as no security on the wifi hub) and tried an XP 32 netbook I have. The IP camera tool found the camera and it took 5 mins to get the camera working. You do need to let it reboot when submitting changes and then unplug it so it reboots again but then it does work. I have remote access working (I think) but yet to do the email notifications which is what I really want working.I have also to say that my wifi Hub (BT Home hub 2.0) didn't really help - port forwarding is not very easy to fathom.I will update this review when I have done more - just to say that all indications are that it does not work with 64 bit windows.

Reviews.Title: Understanding the value of this wireless webcam
Reviews.Author: Donald R. Bond
Reviews.Content: You will not go wrong with this camera. It will however require some common knowledge about your wireless network and or how to hard line it in via usb. Mine has been up for a couple of months now and has a great picture. Workds on home wireless , remotely via web sie and even with free down load of phone app.

Reviews.Title: So Far... So Good!
Reviews.Author: Tim T. (Ramona, CA)
Reviews.Content: We raise animals, and wanted to be able to keep an eye on them when they were getting ready to give birth.  Decided to give this camera (2 of them actually) a try.  They arrived a day earlier than expected (another good job by Amazon!).  The items came with everything you need to get started.  The "Quick Installation Guide" was simple and easy to understand.  Start with the unit "wired", make the connection with the router, then install the software, and make the connection wirelessly.  I  use MAC filtering for security on my network.  Both the wired and wi-fi MAC addresses are printed on the base of the unit, so... no problem.Wired... They are outstanding.  Image is clear, color is very good, 2 way sound is good as well.  Wireless...  The farther they are from your router, the harder it is for the router to "detect" the camera and the less responsive they are to commands (pan, tilt etc), and movement becomes choppy.  (Which is to be expected)  The location of my cameras are in covered animal shelters which are well beyond the far end of our (3000sf) house (opposite side of the house from the router's location).  I was bummed at the choppy performance at that distance.  So before I returned them as not suitable for my application, I thought I'd give something a try.  I purchased a Belkin Dual-Band Range Extender and added it to my home network.  I placed it at the opposite end of my house (closer to the camera's location) and ta-da... they work perfectly!These cameras are wireless b/g/n compatable, and the software allows for the monitoring of up to 9 cameras at a time.  I like that we can access the cameras from our computers and/or smartphones.  The only thing that I don't really like about the software is that it makes you "Log in" each time you want to view the cameras.  I want to be able to click an icon on my desktop and view my cameras.  Their configuration has you click their icon, double-click the IP address, click a log-on "Submit" button, and one other button before you get to the image itself.  (A bit of an inconvenience)  I guess I could solve this problem by assigning the camera a static IP address that is outside my router's DHCP assignment range, and place a shortcut to that IP on my desktop.Overall, we're pretty happy with the purchase.  They do what they're supposed to do, and that's all we were looking for when we purchased them.  The price was reasonable, and they really help us out.  Like I said at the beginning "So Far... So Good!"

Reviews.Title: Great product & support
Reviews.Author: gj
Reviews.Content: This is a great product to add to your network.  I was also very impressed with the support I received from Sandra.  Very patient even when you did something stupid!

Reviews.Title: foscam  tech support
Reviews.Author: tomasz
Reviews.Content: good customer support great product and Simon was really helpful in helping me do the port forwarding on my router . Now i'll be able to view my camera away from different newtworks. Thanks to foscam tech support.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: arnzinc
Reviews.Content: on my tablet and phone, pan/tilt, IR off/on, and sound for under a hundred bucks!!  setup was cinch and I find myself just taking a look at my home anytime and on occasion spooking my kids with the audio feature.  All of my friends are impressed, I even use it when I'm home to call the kids up to bed.  Plan to buy a whole set of them for each of my floors.

Reviews.Title: foscam.us
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: hi i was unable to make the camera work wireless . spoke witht the tech name Harry Foster he was able to remotely access my computer and was able to make it work wireless as well as provide me with the remote access to my cams so i can view them remotely

Reviews.Title: foscam tech support
Reviews.Author: Cheryl
Reviews.Content: Simon was extremely helpful in reconnecting my remote viewing ability of the foscam camera I have set up at my mother's house.  He was patient and efficient and I am very pleased with his service.  I now have the camera back and will be able to check on my 88 yr old mother daily as needed.  The foscam camera is ideal for this purpose and has preformed as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Foscam
Reviews.Author: jeanne beck
Reviews.Content: Set up went great with phone help.  Can't wait to use it. I plan to have 6 cameras total when done.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Nathan Amondson
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Had an issue connecting to WIFI - iphones, iPads etc. but the technical support team fixed the issue quickly.  Very satisfied with the product and support.

Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: Dan Gros "Mr D"
Reviews.Content: I Love it. They only thing that is lacking is the speaker. When my wife tries to freak me out and tell me to get my lazy bum to bed, it's difficult to understand what she's saying.  That may result in a severe beating for not obeying her.  Other than that, every function works as advertised and the installation is pretty simple.  I'm very computer savvy so the wireless installation may be easier for me than others so that is my full disclosure.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service and support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The order was received in 1 day.  That was a surprise.. The technical support was above par and completely unexpected.  I was having issues getting the internet connectivity to work and once I called technical support, the technician took the ball and started running.  All 3 of my camera's where setup and accessible from the internet in just over an hour (i had technical difficulties with the cable they provided so If you have a known good cable to connect to your router, i would suggest that).. If I decide to add a fourth, i would not hesitate for an instant on doing so. One last comment, the technician I worked with was professional, understanding, and very patient.  I'm so glad I went with foscam vs one of the "apparent knock-offs"  it's worth the extra 20 bucks a camera.  I'm about to download the apps for android and phone.  I'll follow up once I do that.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Julie A.. Ward
Reviews.Content: I worked on setting up this camera for 5 hours myself but finally contacted customer support who had it set up and resolved in less than 1 hour.  They were patient and knowledgable.  Felix was my technician.  He was great.  So far I like the camera, time will tell if it functions as I need.  At this point, I would recommend it. I'm using it to monitor dogs while I'm away.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: dgm
Reviews.Content: Bought this so I can monitor activity at our lake cottage while we are not there. So far so good.Fairly easy to setup, you need to understand port forwarding to see this from a remote location.Cons: many "false" triggers when alarm setup is activated.I will preface by saying for the cost, it has been a good purchase.Looking forward to next gen Foscam.

Reviews.Title: works great--but not for the faint of heart
Reviews.Author: TedR
Reviews.Content: This ip camera works as advertised.  I have it communicating wirelessly and am able to access it remotely.  (I have not tested the audio.)  That said, it is not for the faint of heart.  Despite decent instructions,it would be fair to say that someone with absolutely no knowledge of networking, or even rudimentary knowledge,  will have a very difficult time.  This is not the fault of the product; it is the nature to the complexity of network architectures.If hooking up a network printer at home is a daunting challenge, you will need help from someone knowledgeable to exploit the full capabilities of this camera.I am not a software engineer or network administrator and have no formal education/training.  I learn what I need to know as I encounter new technical challenges.  It took me several hours to get everything working properly, but in the end I succeeded.  The purpose of this review is just to alert the buyer that this is far from a "plug-and-play" device, BUT a patient, somewhat knowledgeable amateur can succeed.

Reviews.Title: Works for me...
Reviews.Author: D. Iacovelli
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera, easy setup, great price. I have not yet tired the auto. I had no problem connecting it to my Linksys wireless router. BTW I don;t work for Foscam :-).

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: M. Shinn
Reviews.Content: It's easy to setup, has great night vision, and is easy enough to control.  I really don't have anything bad to say about it, it's a nice affordable camera.  Just remember its an indoor camera, this would not last long in the rain.

Reviews.Title: Works nice as a baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Bill Clark
Reviews.Content: Bought this to monitor the grandkids taking naps and hoped it would also provide some utility elsewhere.  It works nicely but it should be said up-front that you won't get audio from the web interface.  You can use VLC if you are on Linux like me.The web interface is not completely intuitive, but most should be able to use it.  I wouldn't mount this outside unprotected--you'd probably need an extension cord if you did because the power cord isn't very long.  I also wouldn't use this where you needed high resolution for long distances.  that said, this does what it says and does so nicely.

Reviews.Title: Great cam ... Great price
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Working very well I can look in my office, my show room my properties. And can talk to the employees

Reviews.Title: Difficult setup and tech support
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: This works great now, but was a pain to get setup properly.  Tech support for Foscam was difficult to work with and hard to understand due to language issues.  Overall would buy again because it is a great product, but poor tech support.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Foscam technical support called me back the same day and installed all steps for the camera to work.  Simon was very helpful and patient.  Their tech support is very busy so you might have to leave your contact info but they did get back to me in an hour and my camera works on my home network.  Simon also gave me information to install an app so i can view the camera from my iPhone.  Very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Foscam setup
Reviews.Author: Sachin
Reviews.Content: Pleased with the foscam customer service. The customer service representative , Judy , was very knowledgeable and helped me to resolve the set up issues very quickly. We love the remote access and we are eagerly looking to use it. We recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: tec support
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: tech support was good once i got a hold of them. the rep did a good job showing me how to use the camera and set it up

Reviews.Title: Makes a great baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: Salacious Crumb
Reviews.Content: First off, setting this up may be a challenge for some folks (myself included).  There are a number of excellent tutorials on YouTube, check them out if you're having problems.Once I had my FI8910W set up for use on my iOS devices (using a separate App, FoscamPro, not made by Foscam), I was very pleased.  The video and audio quality are more than adequate for a baby monitor and the convenience of viewing the feed via your iPod/iPhone/iPad in the home or while away is just so darn cool.I find it odd that my iOS app far out-performs the feed you get when viewing over my web browser on my PC.  I wish I had a version of Foscam Pro for my PC!In the near future, I'll probably pick up a few more of these and set them up around the house.  Why not!

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive camera, from a reliable vendor
Reviews.Author: BOYD CLAYTON
Reviews.Content: I'm using this camera to send timed pictures from an unheated cabin in a remote location over satellite Internet.  It's been very cold but the camera has worked flawlessly.  I initially struggled to get the wireless feature to work and I had purchased a "like new" used camera so I concluded I got what I paid for but I was wrong it was user error and the wireless works great.  I love the fact I can access the camera real time with my phone or iPad without any additional software.  Great little camera with lots of features at a very low price (even lower price if you buy one that has been returned like I did).

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910w Installation  and MAC compatibility
Reviews.Author: Dick Vogel
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied and happy with the Foscam technical support from Sandra, however i am disappointed that the camera audio is not available on the Imac and also that ability to record live video and audio also is not available on the iMAC. One other problem frustrated me, that is the wait time to get to a person using the 800 number.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: Needed help setting camera up, wirelessly and remotely. Excellent support. Thanks Ralph Mendez~Very Satisfied with support and product~I was recommended this camera, Thanks for the referral Ian Grant~

Reviews.Title: Mom keeps tabs on her dog with it
Reviews.Author: Tom W
Reviews.Content: Love the controls and the GUI almost works well. My older mom uses an iPhone apt to keep tabs on her dog with it. She also checks the cam before coming home to make sure nothing is out of place. I preprogrammed two preset positions so she can always restore her view. It gives her a piece of mind. The Wifi drops off unless you set up an FTP ping to keep the Wifi alive (I know this is a Wifi issue not so much with the unit but still a software update would cure this). The field of view is a bit narrow and the image quality doesn’t allow for face recognition unless the subject is very close but for a living room sized space this isn't a problem. Night mode ROCKS for the most part very bright.

Reviews.Title: foscam customer support
Reviews.Author: carey clause
Reviews.Content: had issue to make the port forwarding work . spoke with Harry Foster he was able to remotely access my computer and was able to help to make the camera work for me remotely with a remote ip address. responed timely and the tech understanding was good and very pleased with sertvice and look more for foscam cameras

Reviews.Title: The jury is still out on this one...
Reviews.Author: Nick79
Reviews.Content: The first thing I noticed and liked about this camera was that it's wireless (sans the power cord - no camera can be good and 100% wireless unless it runs on a battery) and that it has audio.PROS:Set up is easy if you're checking the cameras from home; a simple process that doesn't take much time.Decent price, although it keeps fluctuating on Amazon.Viewing feed is good; although I had to remove it from a window box because at night time the glare from the glass made the whole thing pointless.Night vision is better then I expected.CONS:Remote checking and smart phone use is another story; you have to configure settings to check it remotely; to date I am still having trouble configuring and there's no customer service to call and get help with just on-line forums.  If someone can share a quick and easy way to configure this, I am all ears & eyes.I purchased (and returned) outdoor wireless Foscam's - the set up was to frustrating and I couldn't merge viewing options with this camera.The audio is terrible once you get it set up.  It's advertised as two-way audio but you have to download a plugin that does not support this camera anymore.  I found a few sites that had tips on how to get around this but once I did, I couldn't send audio to the camera (to the room) and the built-in microphone picks up rotation of the camera as well as EVERY sound so it's kind of half-way-there on the perfection level.Again, the jury is still out on keeping this as it's not doing what I thought it would.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for a person that already has several of these cameras. It was delivered on time and at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price if you can get it to work...
Reviews.Author: BK "Osceola"
Reviews.Content: The unit works great but the directions are horrible and a pain to make stream over the internet.  The picture quality is good.

Reviews.Title: The overall feature is good but it is little difficult to install
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I just bought it for 2 weeks so I cannot review the quality.  I just review the installation part.I checked the customer review before I bought it. I have heard it is difficult to set up but I like the feature that it can be viewed from smart phone and outside computer. I want to use it as a nanny monitor when i go back to work.  My husband is a IT guy, he took 3 hr to set up the internal wireless connection and external connection.Pros:  1. after setup the internal and external IP address, you can use most of the web browser to access the monitor and view the video through the smart phone and any computer.  2. the image include the night vision is clear. You can control the monitor move up and down, zoom in and out through the web browser.cons:  1. The sounds only support by windows IE browser. I uses MAC. It took me a long time to figure out the controller panel in Firefox/chrome/safari is different with in IE. Only in IE,  you can see the turn/off the audio button. In other  browsers, so far we have not found a way to hear the sound even we did a lot of research and installed the plug in software that some ppl suggest. My computer has MAC and Windows parallel system, so I can use IE. but my iphone and android cannot hear the sound at all. I want to use this web cam as a baby monitor. without sound, it is a big problem.  Hope they can support mac user better.  2. The video delays 2-3 seconds when you watch the monitor from phone( even in home)  and remote computers. The moving action video are not smooth.If I can find a way for solve the sound problem I will give 4 start. If the remote video is smooth, I will give 5 start. Hope they come up a upgrade software soon.

Reviews.Title: Hardware is great/Software is challenging
Reviews.Author: Andrew Strahl
Reviews.Content: I wanted cameras that I could monitor with my iPhone.  These work well in that regard, but the interface for setting them up is really very unpolished and not intuitive to use.  I didn't like that you can't set them to record continuously to a hard drive (like normal surveillance cameras) without manually clicking the record and stop buttons.  If you want to pay another $45, however, you can buy their Blue Iris software that will do this and many other features that are not available otherwise.  I use the FoscamPro IPhone App and it works very well.

Reviews.Title: Be prepared to have support to install this device
Reviews.Author: Michael J Spedick
Reviews.Content: I was interested in having the ability to check on my dog and kitchen while away so when this came at a nice price I bought it. I was unable to install it using the software provided. I have a man who does IT work at my office. He spent 2 1/2 hours getting it to work properly. The device hijacks my wireless routers Internet address by taking port 80 (I was told this by my IT man, I'm not that knowledgeable about this level of computers). He had to reprogram the device to take another port and it worked. I also had to install Google Chrome as Internet Explorer didn't work well with the device. He gave me a break on his charges to get it to work, but I was disappointed it didn't work "out of the box" and I would not have been able to get it to work on my own. I didn't try Foscam tech support as I have been frustrated with phone support in the past. It had the latest firmware update so that may need to be improved in another release. The picture quality is good.

Reviews.Title: good value/price ratio
Reviews.Author: Alex K
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to automatically monitor my apartment while I am away, so it could alert me if motion or sound are detected in my place while nobody is supposed to be there. The camera has a lot of potentially useful features, like autonomously sending emails with images when an alert is triggered. Unfortunately, the implementation of many features is lacking.  Other reviewers already noted the lack of security, transmission of passwords in plain text.  The quality of motion detector is also disappointing. It is more sensitive to ambient lighting changes than to actual motion: clouds outside are more likely to trigger an alarm than people walking through the door. This is not fixable with sensitivity adjustment.  This motion detector is good to monitor a room with no windows, but not so good to monitor something exposed to outside light that is changing. The main advantage of this camera is that it is inexpensive. A technically inclined person can find ways to overcome its limitations. Overall, I don't regret buying it.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Stephen W. Cox "West"
Reviews.Content: Technical support personell helped me connect the camera wirelessly. Support was very good.  The camera works flawlessly. I recommend this camera to others.Felix was my support contact and he did an excellent job.

Reviews.Title: Read all the bad reviews! They are accurate!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Thompson
Reviews.Content: While the reviews for this product are overwhelmingly high, I found the lower ones to be very accurate.  After many hours online with Foscam support, and my ISP and router support realized to get wireless connection using port forwarding was just not possible.Returning to Amazon

Reviews.Title: always find more ways to use it.
Reviews.Author: mom2serena
Reviews.Content: This item popped up on the Deal of the Day. My 7 year old had been complaining of not getting any sleep at night for a few weeks.  I just assumed that if my child wasn't sleeping then she would be in my room waking me up.  But with her increased crabbiness and other behaviors it got me to wondering if she really was having trouble sleeping.  We set it up in her room and sure enough, she tosses and turns ALL NIGHT LONG !!!  We are getting her checked out by the doctors and were just amazed when we looked at the pictures.Since then, we have set it up when we go out of town to check on the person who comes to care for our pets.  I'm thinking of hooking it up to the bird feeder in the spring.

Reviews.Title: Review for Camera, Setup, and Support
Reviews.Author: Erica Nowicki
Reviews.Content: Context:- Purchased two of the FOSCAM FI8910W cameras- I have AT&T; U-verse- I set up the cameras on a Mac- I consider myself a fluent user of technologyPros:- Really easy to setup for same network wireless monitoring- Great camera pan controls, night viewing, motion detection (with scheduling and email alerts)- No batteries- Knowledgeable tech support staff (Ralph Mendez from FOSCAM helped me finish remote setup - thanks Ralph!)Cons:- Difficult to set up remote monitoring from an external network (I almost had it before having to contact support)- Short power cords (you might want to upgrade to the longer ones)- Understaffed/long response time tech supportOverall, I would make the purchase again and will likely buy more in the future. Though, if you are not really tech savvy you may have some difficulty with setup and have to rely on the somewhat slow to respond, but, helpful tech support.

Reviews.Title: Works as Described-Camera still Pics just SO SO
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera has worked good for me, just be a little patient during set up for on line viewing, be sure a try a few differant port settings to get it to work when setting up port forwarding. If you have a current router, range will be no problem. Have tried it all over the house with no issues with range. Camera still pics could be better, but maybe its where i have it place and how far im trying to take pics.

Reviews.Title: Bad GUI design
Reviews.Author: James Sim
Reviews.Content: The hardware it self is fine, however the configuration GUI is terrible. Not much though was given to the the layout or field descriptions. Documentation is poor at best.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is a great way to have a video baby monitor without the expense. We love it. The only issue is slight delay in audio compared to the video feed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera abilities
Reviews.Author: Bryce Miller
Reviews.Content: A very positive purchase.  The remote control works great and has precise movement and panning.  The audio from the remote site is a bit poor, but this was selected for the camera.  Audio from the camera is very good.  The infra-red work amazingly well in low to no-light situations.

Reviews.Title: Very good security camera
Reviews.Author: Mini Ron
Reviews.Content: For the price and features this is a very good wireless camera.  My package came with a broken/cracked CD software so I could not immediately install.  Found the manufacturers site to download the install software. It was a bit difficult to configure, even though I carefullly follow the direction. Managed to install using the WPS, setting my wireless router to that feature.  Having night vision and two-way audio are really nice features.  I wish it have close up focusing feature, this would have been even more perfect.  Highly recommended for it's price.

Reviews.Title: Still working after a year
Reviews.Author: rariti
Reviews.Content: I use this with iSpy. Works great. Still going strong. I am able to control it from old and new computers running iSpy. I am planning on buying again to extend my system.

Reviews.Title: Perfect home monitoring system
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I set this up to email me when there is motion detected. I was 500 miles away from my home and when my parents came over to get some things while I was out. I had about 10 emails all with with 5 pictures attached showing their arrival. This is a cheap home security system. Paired with the Android app - Tiny Cam Monitor Pro you can't go wrong.Note: I had an older model but this one is much better with faster pan/tilt, better resolution, clearer IR shots in the dark. Better email functionality (it works with Gmail now that they require security).Although if you have no experience with networking you might want to hire a nerd to help you. Once it's plugged into your Ethernet network and you tell it your wireless connection info you can unplug it and move it anywhere there is a wireless signal.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Denise A. Rynkiewicz "GamePlayer"
Reviews.Content: called support. 1st camera doa.. 2nd they wer able to get working on my wifi with no problems. great support!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Faye
Reviews.Content: Awesome customer service & great products.  Setup was made effortless by Foscam's rep remotely accessing my computer and setting it up on their end - made for a much less frustrating experience.  The cameras have great features and clarity.  Very highly recommended product and support!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, recommended!! buy it, great customer service
Reviews.Author: A. RAMIREZ
Reviews.Content: just call customer service, they'll help you set up the camera with out you having to deal with it, they are really helpful.

Reviews.Title: Works well, great buy for the price
Reviews.Author: newlinux
Reviews.Content: I have many IP cams, including a couple of FOSCAM clones. This one works well. I although not rated for outdoors, I actually have tis mounted outdoors near my front door as an entry cam. It's protected by an overhang. It's been up for a month and no problems, no dropped connection with my wireless. I use it with the IP cam viewer app (great app!) and with zoneminder. Image can be flipped and mirrored so hanging upside down is not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Decent After a Firmware Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: I did my research and settled on this unit to keep an eye on my home while I was away overseas. It did a great job and I was very pleased with the results. The motion detect was great and the emailed photos I received let me know when my pet sitter came and went. I did not use any audio features, so cannot comment on that.Many reviews here comment on the great features, so I won't repeat them here. I'll restrict my review to some issues I had and general comments about the product.1. I work in IT so setting this unit up on my wireless network was no biggie. However, I can see how someone who doesn't understand (wireless) networking might get confused and frustrated. That said, many reviews comment on how good Foscam's customer/tech support is, so that's good. I didn't need to use it. For a great step-by-step method to setting up, see the review by R.Tickle from March 29, 2012.2. I bought my first unit towards the end of October '12. After 8 or 9 days it dropped off my wireless network. The only way I could get it to re-connect was to reboot the camera AND reboot my wireless router. It would be OK for a day or so, then do it again. Rebooting my wireless router was getting old, so I returned the camera for a replacement. It has worked flawlessly ever since.3. The replacement unit shipped with updated firmware and Foscam had made some changes. One was not for the better. Before, when I clicked IR mode, the camera went into IR mode irrespective of the amount of light. On the replacement unit, it did not. The camera decided for itself whether or not it thought there was enough light to justify IR mode. I find that annoying. To compensate, Foscam increased the range for the brightness setting. For example, at night a distant (20+ feet away) lamp in my living room provided sufficient light to prevent IR mode, even though the majority of that room was dark or in deep shadow. I had to jack up the brightness setting to be able to see the room. The original camera from October switched into IR mode when I told it to irrespective. I preferred that mode of operation.4. Setting up email so you can receive emails when motion is detected is a pain. Foscam are upfront about the fact Hotmail won't work, so I setup a Gmail account specifically for this camera. After a few dozen emails (forwarded to my Hotmail account), everything stopped. No emails! Long story short, Google had decided that the email traffic via the gmail account I'd setup was spam and had suspended the account. Idiots! I setup an Outlook.com email account instead and after fiddling around with the settings, it has worked well ever since. Just be aware that the camera software doesn't tell you if there's an email problem per se. The Test button in the UI only tells you something failed and is invalid if the email account setup is wrong. It doesn't tell you what is wrong, why it is wrong or how to fix it. So expect to spend some time fiddling with this function. That said, there is some good reference material on the Foscam website and on Youtube as well.5. Overall, for the price this is a great IP camera. I'd like to see HTTPS support and a zoom function, but apart from that it's a very good piece of kit.Happy voyeuring!

Reviews.Title: very good and great value
Reviews.Author: Mr M Abery
Reviews.Content: read other reviews here for setting up instructions! (I dont need to write it again since others have done a great job already) however I have this and the previous model and both are great.  I feel the camer on this is a bit better however I use both for child cams and they work perfectly and I can check my boys from anywhere in the world :)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Happy Buyer
Reviews.Content: Once set up it does everything that i expected.  i highly reccomend the video set-up demo in the Foscam web site.  Follow the instructions carefully and you will not have any problems.  Works with my ipad (through a $5.99 app) and through my Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: Wireless is more trouble than it's worth
Reviews.Author: dan sumner
Reviews.Content: Wired by ethernet works great, wifi is not so hot. I spent a few hours trying to get it t communicate with my network and failed. The product's interface is poor, but you can pay extra to have support help you set it up. No thanks, last Foscam purchase I will be making.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Tyler G
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying three of these cameras in a fire sale for about $62 apiece. Although there were negative reviews, I still bought them because of the features they offered (IR Full Night Vision, Pan/Tilt, 2 Way Audio) and because they were wireless. I use two of them at my vacation home and one at my regular house for surveillance, and though the first set up was confusing, the second and third only took about 15 minutes each. Word of advice, don't use YouTube or customer instructions, I used the pamphlet included and it made it so much easier to set up. (I tried with a YouTube video first and ended up having the factory restart the camera) The image quality is what I would have expected for a camera under $100, not amazing, but clear. I can see up to 20 feet and recognize faces fairly easily. The Pan/Tilt is amazing as it gives you so much more viewing power over what you're looking at (i.e Camera is pointed at front door but can still turn around and see rest of house). Audio is 7/10 with a good amount of clarity, but still some buzzing, however there is a port if you want to add your own microphone. (Only on Internet Explorer Windows Computers with "Acitive X" can you listen to audio, unless you use an iPhone App). The speaker in the camera, used to talk to the thing you're looking at it useful but overall just an added feature. You couldn't hear it if you were more than 6 or 7 ft. away. I use my cameras wirelessly, but I would bet that if you used a direct ethernet connection, the speed would be better (there is a 1-2 second lag if you go wirelessly, but not something that should deter you) If your computer is on the same network as the camera, you can use the Application that came on the CD to view your camera (Multiple Camera Viewing on 1 page is only available on Windows Internet Explorer), but once you leave the house, you have to set up Port Forwarding through your router. This is probably the most confusing part of the setup, but I thought the guide explained it well. With port forwarding, and the included web address attached to the bottom of your camera (three years free included), you can view your feed from anywhere in the world and through your smartphone. Do not use No-IP or DynDns, just use the included web address and save yourself the trouble. I personally shelled out the $6 and bought FosCam Pro on the iPhone App store and it was worth it. Not only do you get the audio (I'm a Mac user), but the app also included digital zoom features (not included on the Mac internet applications only PC Internet Explorer). All in all, I am thoroughly impressed with this product, and glad that I caught it at such a bargain. Shipping was quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: Great Tech Support
Reviews.Author: D. J. Benson
Reviews.Content: I called Foscam Tech support and Felix helped me set up my camera. He was helpful, knowledgable, friendly and quick. My camera is now working beautifully. I highly recommend this camera as well as calling customer support if you have any trouble setting it up.

Reviews.Title: Great reasonably priced IP camera
Reviews.Author: Normand Lapierre
Reviews.Content: Got my Foscam yesterday afternoon and in less than 2 hours had it up and running. Yes, it helps if you have some basic understanding about networks and routers. Even if you don't, the learning curve is very short with all the information available on the net.I set it up myself without the need of tech support or excessive cursing. Actually, didn't curse at all, so I guess it was pretty straight forward.The instructions are well written. Suggest you read them twice. Used a Windows Vista machine to set up the cam, then installed the software on my MacBook.My only peeve is that the audio doesn't work on a Mac as it was designed to use ActiveX which is Windows based. However, it (audio) works great on my iPhone 4 with a program called LiveCams Pro. Audio also works with Windows Explorer of course.Yes the cam does have its limitations, but it was after all only $100. I feel I got my moneys worth. Those who give poor reviews are pretty much computer illiterate, this is not after all rocket science by any means. For myself, the included documentation was enough to get me up and running. Can't comment on their customer service as I haven't had need for it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic baby monitor, great device support
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rischar
Reviews.Content: We're using this camera as a video baby monitor for our nursery (triplets due in June).  I wanted something with more functionality than the video monitors we found at baby stores. These would often only support their specific devices, and we wanted to view the camera from our phones, PCs, and tablets.  Remotely, and locally.  The Foscam does this really well.Setup was a breeze, I quickly realized that you'll really want a static IP address for the camera.  The camera supports it onboard, but I opted to leave it DHCP and have my router simply assign a specific IP based on the MAC address (I do the same for a couple other devices on my network).  I also set up port forwarding to a public address, so that I can access the camera when away from home (using appropriate security of course).Device support for this camera is amazing.  The protocol is open enough, that even on a new platform like Windows Phone and Windows8, there are multiple apps to choose from for the best viewing experience.  We can view the feed from any of our devices (Windows7 PC, Windows8 PC, Surface tablet, iPad, Windows Phone 8).We haven't had much reason to use it yet (until the babies come), but so far I've been very happy, and it has exceeded all of my expectations.  My only complaint is that there should be a camera setting to invert the pan and tilt controls for ceiling mounting (there may be a setting, I just haven't found it).

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: We bought several of these and a couple of the 7" waterproof domes listed on Amazon for our office.  Even though they are 640x480 resolution they are very usable for general purpose monitoring of our property.  The low-light performance is very good, even in their normal daytime mode without the IR turned on.As reported by others, the IR cannot be used inside the weather domes, the reflection of the IR emitters blinds the camera.  With our outdoor building lighting and a nearby streetlight the video is very usable at night.  They have been totally reliable so far, zero downtime, no video glitches, no issues.  We have used them wired and wireless and both are flawless.  The pan/tilt speed is adjustable and smooth.  The internal mic audio is very good and it's quite sensitive.  The internal speaker is not loud enough to be useful.The internal web servers work fine for basic access and configuration.  They are popular and are supported by several software packages.  I'm not fond of the apps on the included CD, the are a bit clunky IMO.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Rachel Wolfe "RWolfe"
Reviews.Content: I read alot of reviews that said it was difficult to set up, I did not have that problem, it was really plug and play. I can't make the two way audio work and that is SUPER frustrating. Still trying. Nice clear picture though. Does not like Internet Explorer

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Duke
Reviews.Content: Was facing problem in having remote access to my camera so contacted Foscam Technical Support spoke to Felix, he took remote access of my computer fixed up the issue for me quickly. I like this camera and do  recommemd the camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Works for a while
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: I got this 6 months ago and it stopped working a month ago.  Now it's an expensive paperweight.Looking for something better that will last longer.  Wasn't that good to begin with.VERY disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Gavin
Reviews.Content: I plan on setting these up in my home I'm currently building.  I purchased 1 just to play with it and make sure it was what I wanted.  I have setup 8 wireless Netgear Camera's for a friend that owns an apartment complex.  I would pick the Foscam for features, picture quality, and price.  It does take a little networking knowledge to set these up, especially if you want to view the camera's remotely.  There are some great video tutorials online if you need some help.

Reviews.Title: Met my expectations! Easy to install on local wifi!
Reviews.Author: Parkavenue
Reviews.Content: Excellent product that met all of my expectations for in-home monitoring. I purchased to monitor my home heating system to ensure my heat setting is being maintained during my absence and this camera is perfect for my needs. The camera installation went flawlessly for viewing on my local wireless router.Installation to view remotely on the internet was a five day frustrating ordeal. The youtube videos available were a great resource but did not resolve my problem. I continuously connected with a Pannaway router site that required a login - this was very confusing.PANNAWAY ROUTER issues were finally tracked to my local telephone company/ISP provider. A telephone company field tech changed one wire and my port forwarding and camera connection worked perfectly. I probably wasted 6 hours on this issue. This router is typically located at the local phone/DSL incoming service on the exterior of your home. Perhaps if I had called my telephone company FIRST and informed them of my intent, the service rep could have provided this solution during the early days of my installation.I did NOT contact Foscam telephone support. I attempted a couple of times but experienced long hold times during the holiday season. HOWEVER, I did look at the Foscam videos in the SUPPORT section of their website. The videos were also very helpful.I am planning on installing a few more of the Foscam cameras - they become a little addictive to play with...

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: J. Wright "HighonSanDiego"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a a replacement for the Loftek camera (which was disappointing because the camera provided only a grainy image and black and white), but could not make it work.  I contacted the company and have yet to hear anything back.  So I returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: It's a good camera - except the audio
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Initial Review: January 1, 2013 (Default factory setting and software - no mods)Quick Run Down for those skimming.Pros:Great picture qualityWirelessGreat range of motionCons:Built-in microphone is very lowBuilt-in speakers are very lowMicrophone input jack emits humming sounds while being wireless and thus deemed unusable unless you can deal with that loud humming sound(Have not tested the speaker jack for this unit)Now, honestly I haven't sat down to tinker with it much with the holidays, but from the short experience I've had with it and if you use the stuff right out of the box, you will have a very nice picture with the exception of audio. Wireless audio lags the entire system by about 2-3 seconds.Wireless video is delayed about 1/2 of a second and is barely noticeable. Wired seems to have very little lag and is practically unnoticeable.Back to the audio. Even cranked up the audio will be VERY low with the built in microphone if you plan to use it as a baby monitor it might not matter too much, but in that aspect it could be improved.Using a separate microphone and going wireless? I cannot say I can recommend this AT ALL as it gives a constant humming sound. I even went as far as removing the antenna and also tilting the antenna to be right above the power-supply cord - it had minimal affect on the noise and therefore cannot recommend this method right out of the box. There are supposedly mods that replace a resistor on it, but as stated before I've not had the time to tinker with it - I just messed with the default settings because of the lack of time.One last thing, the night vision on this camera is really good, however, the red LEDs might be a problem if mounted within sight of a child at night as they are pretty bright and noticeable. Keep that in mind if you plan on using it as a baby monitor.Once I figure it out and what's the best things to use with it I'll update this post (probably sometime within the month - time permitting). So as of right now, with JUST the out of box features and no modifications I can only give it a 4/5. Had the audio worked better it would be a 5/5 without a shadow of a doubt. I am a tinkerer so this review will probably go to 5/5 but with a warning indicating that this was indeed after modding and will include a guide on what I did to fix the audio problem as well as the apps used for mobile devices (I have both an Android Icecream OS and iOS) So I'll post those as well. Look for this between Jan 2, 2013 - Jan 8, 2013.

Reviews.Title: Very Complicated Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Volante
Reviews.Content: I have a D-Link camera and bought this for price and the fact i could pan this remotely.  The camera is extremely difficult to set up.  Just as a data point, it took me 5 mins to set up the D-Link camera.  An hour later and i was still not done with the Foscam camera.  You need a minor computer engineering degree to make it work.  Also, there is no obvious Apple Apps to go with it.  Returning it and will look to (unfortunately) spend more money on a D-Link equivalent.

Reviews.Title: Needs Daily Reset - WiFi No Longer Works
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I wanted to love this little camera, and it does have some redeeming features. The servo control of the camera head is quiet and responsive. The IR night vision is amazing.However, my unit stopped responding via WiFi after a month or so of use. I might have got it working again, but as I had a wired LAN connection nearby I decided to use that instead. Much worse, though, is the camera's tendency to lock up after 20-24 hours. To get around this problem I had to connect the camera's A/C adapter to a timer which resets it once a day.Compared to some other I/P camera's I've tried, the provided Web interface is primitive at best. For example, there is no way to cause the camera to take a image at a specific time (or times) each day. The Web interface is so crude that has two different logins depending on what browser you are using.I think Foscam has something with potential here, but they need to work on the camera's reliability before I'll purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM work well
Reviews.Author: the jerk
Reviews.Content: I got this little camera up and running quickly.  I was able to get it going internally (local network) in about 10 minutes.  However, the external part was a little tricky.  It seems my biggest issue was the port number.  Apparently the needed port is 8090.  I did a lot of digging between yutube and the foscam website and didn't see/read anything about the port number having to be specific.  Just FYI for folks who are on the fence and others that have had issues getting this setup.  Had I used this port initally I would have saved a few hours of frustration.  Anywho, camera is light, easy to use/adjust via the web interface and the foscam support from Sandra Williams was quick and cut right to the heart of my problem.  I'm very please with this purchase and I've even set up a FREE no-ip address.  I've seen other reviews stating this services costs money, THERE IS a free option.  Anyway, I would recommend and am considering adding more cams.  Happy buying!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mama-Razzi
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a christmas gift from my kids.  The main purpose was so that I could view my garage doors from my iPhone and confirm that I remembered to close them without having to go back home and check.  It works perfectly.  Setup to my wifi network was easy, setup to be viewed on my iPhone away from home was little more tricky, but we worked it out.  I am now thinking of adding more cameras around the outside of the home.  I am happier with this camera than I would have thought possible.  The picture is excellent.  I also like the "Alarm" feature that emails me whenever motion is detected on my driveway.  I can't wait to try this while on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Great security camera for the money, widely supported by software.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "fishbone"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera after owning the older version,  great value buy for a security panning web camera.  Works well, works with tinycam pro and other popular webcam software.

Reviews.Title: Foscam 18910W
Reviews.Author: SAO
Reviews.Content: works great wirelessly.....having a problem to operate via internet ...will try contacting tech services again( gave up on hold waiting for a tech) therefore currently unable to use as wished

Reviews.Title: set up with mac have to be easier
Reviews.Author: mario chacon
Reviews.Content: set up little difficult because I,m using mac please bake it easier for mac user or the manual video set up by mac as well.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: DVAB "dvab"
Reviews.Content: It's a bit tricky to set up but fortunately Foscam has step by step videos that take you through it. You just need to be comfortable going into your router setup but even then, they show exactly what to do for the most common brands of routers. Keep in mind that you need to use Explorer (it supports Active X) if you also want to take advantage of two way sound as well.

Reviews.Title: Once set up I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Andy PDX
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy until remote access. Mac users (and PC users for that matter) ensure you locate IP address from the tool ip camera launch screen when setting up port forwarding. To access while on your wireless network use the LAN IP address and when away from home use your web / router IP address, both followed by your port number. I love that from my cell phone or tablet I can view my house, control the camera and the night vision works amazingly well. For those with port forwarding (aka server access) issues they actually have a nice support video on their website (follow the male voice one on port forwarding). At least I can say I learned a lot about my routers, port forwarding and ip set up by installing this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for going on vacation and monitoring pets
Reviews.Author: Rick C
Reviews.Content: Like most shopping for an IP Camera, I did a lot of shopping and review searching before purchasing the FOSCAM.  The FOSCAM was great and the IR feature is really nice for seeing at night - almost like it was day.  Previously had a Cisco and was good.  One thing the CISCO did was take images and send.  This is the only thing that the FOSCAM lacks that I liked better about the CISCO, but was not a deal breaker.Very great camera and the pan / tilt is a much better feature set vs. the image capture on the CISCO.  If there was 4.5 stars I would have given it that, but hey its the holiday season and 5 seemed better than a 4 ;-)Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: A bit intimidating if its your first IP cam set up - but once you succeed - others will be easy
Reviews.Author: Frank G. Risalvato
Reviews.Content: Excellent~! I was on vacation and able to check on my house during the week away. I'm now going to buy others for outdoors

Reviews.Title: Not perfect but pretty darn good.
Reviews.Author: Darkwave Fan
Reviews.Content: I would like just a few more options for the alerts, but on the whole it's a nice video camera.  I've had some trouble controlling it from my iPhone, but the trouble could be with the iPhone, or the network connection.  The picture is good.  The sound pickup is good.  It is unobtrusive. The manual and video that came with the camera are  not completely helpful. Google how to set up the camera, so you can get tips from other owners, especially regarding the email settings. I bought two more of these cameras today.

Reviews.Title: foscam ip camera
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: Had problems setting up camera to view from  Iphone outside home. Contacted customer support online and talked to Sandra who was extremely helpful and got everything working properly.

Reviews.Title: Great value and quality.
Reviews.Author: sparky
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase, I have used this to keep an eye on my house when on vacation or away, check on pets, you name it. You are able to remotely move the camera almost 360 degrees and up/down allowing great coverage from one location. Also, with the wireless feature it is easy to move it (I mainly have mine wired).Likes: Easy to set up and use. Nice features for the price. IR night/low light mode is fantastic and has great range. Easy to use with a phone or tablet. For the price, I couldn't find another camera with the same range, 2-way audio, viewing range.Dislikes: Audio isn't the best, when using the two way mode the camera will click and it is hard to hear voice (I.E. if I am checking on the kids after school and want to tell them to clean their rooms, my voice is muffled and the speaker crackles.) Hard to find a tablet or phone app that will work 100% of the camera features. I use "IP Cam Viewer Pro" on both a tablet and Android phone and it does what I need except I can't use the "preset camera angles and the left and right panning modes are reversed. IR low light/night mode clicks when enabling... so not that big of a deal but say you have this near a tv or a lamp it will cycle itself in and out of low light mode and click each time.

Reviews.Title: Good picture from a budget camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera has worked very nicely so far. I haven't been able to check the sounds where I should be able to talk through it but it is nice to have an application on my phone and be able to hear what is going on at my house. The infra red can light up my whole living room which is about 30 feet in length.

Reviews.Title: wonders
Reviews.Author: H. Broeker "OORAH Semper Fi Do or Die!"
Reviews.Content: This camera works wonders. It will always reset it self and who needs to pay for those security system per month every month if you got this that will let you know when the motion or sound has been detected and lets me know through my smartphone.  Great product. I wish they made something like this that is weatherproof. I would recommend this product to another person and I did.

Reviews.Title: poor set up
Reviews.Author: mc
Reviews.Content: for remote access, forget it.  too complicated to set it up. So frustrated so I returned it.  not worth the time

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: texmexrocko
Reviews.Content: Good camera but the setup is atrocious. Had it for 6 months and still cannot get all the functions set like I want them.Great Picture. Good Audio.Notifications?? Don't know.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: jatachi
Reviews.Content: I was finding it hard to make the camera run wireless, so contacted foscam technical support spoke t scott, he quickly fixed up the issue for me and also helped me in remotely accessing the camera, I like the  camera and do recommend the camera to otherss as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras, Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Single Male 37 "hoopster"
Reviews.Content: This is my second 8910 foscam.  Both were easy to set up and work well.  I have one set up outside in a detached garage.  They claim the temperature rating isn't that great in the specs but mine works fine in the cold, so far down to 10F below zero with no issues.  My kids can check the cameras with their ipods and smart phones and it automatically sends me an email when motion is detected

Reviews.Title: Poor Wireless Performance
Reviews.Author: Smitty59
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these cameras (directly from Foscam.US) and all are having wireless issues. Even sitting 3 ft away from the router with the large 9db antennas, the cameras struggle to connect. If and when they do connect, the wireless performance is very poor. I have tested my network and have strong signal in the areas the cameras are placed. After allowing remote access to their support staff, the support person was not able to get them to work reliably. He indicated that they are having a lot of issues with the current firmware (11.37.2.48). He even downgraded the firmware to the previous version and still couldn't resolve the issues. I was told to return them for replacement. I will give the replacements a chance but if they have the same issues, they'll go back and I'll look elsewhere.  They are pretty good cameras if they are hardwired to the network, but are useless running wireless.

Reviews.Title: Just Too Hard To install
Reviews.Author: B. Fisher "HellFish"
Reviews.Content: camera is very good...great color, good in dim light, nice zoom/pan.  The hoops you must jump through to make images/video visible on the web proved to be insurmountable for me, despite two calls for tech support.  I speak english, tech support not so much.  So, discussing a complex issue with a language barrier thrown in is tough.  Second tech took control of my computer and set stuff up himself.  Great, but it still didn't work properly.  Long story short, if you want your camera to activate when sensing motion, take a picture/video, and then email it to you, there are much more simple solutions.  I suggest you google "tincam" for 30 day free trial of software and use a cheaper camera such as logitech c310. A snap to install, cheap, and it notifies you with an image if someone enters the cameras view.

Reviews.Title: Confusing set-up and no tech support
Reviews.Author: Stephane de Messieres
Reviews.Content: I was excited to buy this camera as a baby monitor after reading a bunch of positive reviews on both Amazon and other sites.  I knew that the tech set-up would be a bit challenging.  After several hours perusing the manual I've been able to set up the camera and view on my computer but only if the camera is connected by ethernet cable to the router; I can't figure out how to connect (and validate) the wireless connection between the camera and my router (a Linksys WRT160N). A call to Foscam tech support routed me to a voice mailbox that was already full.The product manual is poorly written by someone for whom English is not the native language - it is full of typos and confusing syntax.  Foscam would do well to improve their manual and tech support.I'm going to give this some more time but right now it looks like I'll need to return the product - very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Camera has good potential
Reviews.Author: Enoy Vongsay
Reviews.Content: The instructions are missing key setup information, and the hardware will constantly not take settings without a hard factory reset.  I keep getting "error: illegal params." when I try to change any of the basic settings, and I am sure it is a firmware issue.

Reviews.Title: I love it - bought two
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a baby camera for my second daughter. I've had nothing but great experiences with this paired wirelessly to my iPad and iPhone running the Foscam pro app.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. and with a simple modification to our wireless router called " port forwarding" we could download free apps and use the camer to watch our dogs  while we are out. the microphone is great very loud on the phone feed. talkign into the phone does work but the cameras speaker seems a little low on volume, im still investigating to see if there is a setting.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Davies "Just me"
Reviews.Content: The camera seems to work great - had some trouble with set-up - mostly because I have no idea what I am doing and the directions assume you do - but after a breif hold - maybe 10 minutes? - Sandra took over and got everything going in no time. Thank you Sandra!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Kurtz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after a lot of searching around for a good, inexpensive, and highly rated IP Camera, and I have to say that so far I am not disappointed. I’ve seen a lot of reviews on here about setting up the camera and how it can be difficult, but I had no problem setting it up. If you can follow the instructions and not get confused with the terminology in the manual, you’ll have it set-up and ready to go in under 10 minutes. Foscam’s website has a great Q&A; section that I recommend checking out if you have any questions since the question you want an answer to will probably be on there. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: video noise after 6months and support sux...
Reviews.Author: Raymond Dural
Reviews.Content: i've been using this device for 6months now and all of the sudden it has a tremendous amount of video 'noise' in the form of green dots.  i've attempted to contact support via their web site but it went nowhere.  i've left an email to their support contact and still no acknowledgement that they've received it and will get back to me in 'x' days.  just silence.i've tried all sorts of config/setup changes.  it just all of the sudden went to look like crap and there is no response from support.i thought of maybe doing (2) stars as it does somewhat work but it just sux that i've dropped a hundred bucks on a disposable device and not sure i want to gamble on their new HD model just released unless i can get some kind of response from their support team.below are the screenshots of a sample video i can see with and without the IR turned on.[...][...]Device Firmware Version  11.22.2.46Device Embeded Web UI Version  2.4.10.2

Reviews.Title: Decent cam
Reviews.Author: Shadow Moses
Reviews.Content: Bought these to supplement some old AV cams. Have to say big improvement. Very clear and handle movement pretty well. Those using these as wireless may run into issues with management (cams function ok but cannot log in to make changes or monitor). Found it was related to the router.When setting these up use DHCP and wired. Setup with the current settings for your Wifi. It worked with hidden SSID and MAC filter. Wifi MAC should be center sicker with login.Use a different IP to hard code the IP on the cam reboot the cam. Cam is back up on new IP. (Hard code the lease on the router once successful)Delete the lease on the router and unplug the ethernet cable.
