(You may need to power the cam back on and off)Cam should be using wireless now.I did clear my leases and reboot my router before starting.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: BENJAMIN SANCHEZ "Benjamin Sánchez López"
Reviews.Content: a great price for a very useful at times when environments require monitoring our interest at all distances.could be improved with an electrical power supply cable longer and at some point with lithium polymer batteries to give autonomy and ease of use

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: JCR
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 each of Foscam models FI8910W and FI8905W. They been in service for over 2 months indoors and outdoors with no issues installing or performance wise. I got what I expected to get and that's a well rounded and somewhat inexpensive home surveillance system.  The star deduction is for poor swivel mounts and lack of decent software to unify a multi-camera system. I bought better mounts at a total cost of $20. I don't use Foscam's software at all. I went with a 3rd party vendor for an additional cost of $50 and everything is just how I want it.  Networking the cameras was easy and remote viewing works fine.  I also got an Android app to remotely view the live feeds for about $2.  I did use the internal server to configure automatic still image email and uploads to my ftp site in addition to what the 3rd party software does.  I do think that people who don't understand networking especially configuring routers would have some difficulty trying to set up multiple cameras, remote viewing, and things like that.  That's just the nature of how all of these things work however.  If a persons only experience with routers is plugging one in to a cable/DSL modem and setting up DHCP they will probably need some help figuring out how to make things work.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Davis "moffetcat"
Reviews.Content: You can buy these in packs of three or more, like I did.  These are great little cameras that will work over wireless - even WPA2 - so there is no stepping down to WEP64 or WEP128 to connect like some other IP cameras I've used in the past.There are so many ways to use these cameras - traditional web browser, one of the iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch Foscam apps, or email on motion detection. I'm sure there are Android and Windows 8 Phone apps available as well.  These work very well in low light conditions too.  I've had these cameras in my home, running non-stop for the last five months, and reliability has never been a problem.Alternatively, they can be wired via Ethernet.I wish Foscam made an outdoor weatherproof case for these indoor cameras so I could mount them around the outside of my house as well.  I know Foscam makes outdoor cameras, but they're more expensive than the indoor camera.Excellent for security.  The picture / video quality is very clear and the two way audio works too - great way to get someone's attention.

Reviews.Title: I C U
Reviews.Author: W. D. Navan "RAVAN"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to compliment existing security system. I'm very happy with it. It's very flexible, locate it anywhere it can receive wifi signal, does not need a PC once it's setup. Would be nice if it could make a 360 degree turn, only makes ~270 degree.

Reviews.Title: TECH SERVICE DID A VERY GOOD JOB
Reviews.Author: Kory C. Victor
Reviews.Content: I COULDN"T GET THE CAMERA TO CONNECT TO THE WI_FI NOR COULD I GET THE PORT FORWARDING TO WORK BUT WHEN I CALLED THEY DID IT ALL FOR ME AND FELIX WAS GREAT! HE TOOK OVER AND DID THE WHOLE THING AND I BELIEVE IT NOW WORKS GREAT> I WILL UNDATE MY REVIEW ONCE I"VE TRIED IT OUT FOR ABOUT A WEEK> THE DIRECTIONS THAT THE CAMERA IS SUPPLIED WITH ARE HARD TO FOLLOW SO JUST CALL TECH SERVICES THEY WERE GREAT>

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jeff Schultz
Reviews.Content: Have used this a little bit and haven't found any negatives aside from build quality. I don't expect years of great performance out of this but I only want it as a baby monitor anyways. Should serve its purpose very well.Built in speaker is unusable but the microphone seems to work well.

Reviews.Title: Technical support
Reviews.Author: JOHN E DOLAN
Reviews.Content: Called for technical support to set up remote access and the app for iphone and spoke with Ralph Mendez and he was vey helpful. The product works perfect. I recommend this product highly.

Reviews.Title: PITA to install if you're a newbie
Reviews.Author: C. Schwab
Reviews.Content: I bought this on a Black Friday sale and was excited to use this in my son's room and be able to see him from my iPhone. I had two video monitors previously and both had crapped out in a matter of months.I am not a techie by any means and it took forever to install the camera. The directions were horrible. It wouldn't connect wirelessly, we didn't know the log name/pw for our router, it was a mess. I found a YouTube tutorial with step by step directions from user AwkwardHamster who was a great help! Eventually, we logged into the router for port forwarding and I created an account with no-ip.org (free) for DDNS. For some reason it still was not working and it turns out the antennae om the router were pointing sideways so I adjusted them and voila, connection!I recently bought second camera for my son's play room in the basement. This time, set up was a SNAP since I knew what the heck I was doing now.It can be frustrating to install, but once you know what you're doing, it's easy. Now I can watch both areas from my phone, computer, etc and my husband can check in from work, too.

Reviews.Title: Best Cam
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera!  Easy to install!  Best customer support!  Ask for Judy!The panning is outstanding! I would highly recommend this product and the company support!

Reviews.Title: Great Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Thoth
Reviews.Content: I'm a little tech savvy but I missed one step in my router config.  When I set up a new survice I forgot to hit the 'enable' button.  I called tech support, requested a call back and got the call back in less than 1 hour.  My tech was Ralph Mendez he was very nice and very fast.  To be honest, the best tech support I have had in a very long time.  I am sure I will be adding more cameras as time goes.  My next step will be to install an outside one.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support Great if you can get through
Reviews.Author: Lisa N
Reviews.Content: Customer Rep Ralph Mendez is amazing.  It took a while to get to a rep (5 tries, 20 minute hold times each and then call back), but when I got through it only took 15 minutes to get my camera set-up.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: patrick reinholdt
Reviews.Content: great camera just had to figure out to make it save files to hard drive put as a trusted site

Reviews.Title: good cam
Reviews.Author: Brian Crocker
Reviews.Content: iSpy is the best app I've found to use these with, works perfect. And, if you are savvy you can write a custom script to send email alerts with attached pic, and get the videos uploaded to google drive for free.Now for the cameras. They work with "tinyCam Monitor" Android app and my wife's iOS app, sound and mic, so that's definitely a plus. Overall I do like them. Gotta say I'm very disappointed with their performance though, 5FPS MAX on wifi. I've got an Amped R20000G wifi router and get 22-25mbit throughput with all cams off over the 2.4ghz link, 19-21mbit with 1 cam on, and 15-18mbit with two cams on, when testing through my phone. My point here is that I have plenty of bandwidth left over and it's definitely not my network. The whole time I'm testing the FPS on the cams stays right at 5FPS. They don't do 5ghz wifi either, only 2.4ghz, but at least it's wireless N and WPA2 compatible. Shame too, get 65mbit throughput easily from my phone.Despite their shortcomings in the performance category, the picture is crisp enough I can recognize peoples facing and such at a good 20-30 feet. And for the price, half off if your smart and choose amazon warehouse deals, is pretty dang good for the compatibility and use. I wanted to give them 4 stars, but for the price, compatibility, and my usage I wouldn't be able to find anything better. So 5 stars it is.*Update 01/05/2012*I did a lot of tweaking on my wifi and found that the 40mhz spread setting cuts the framerate by about 60%, which is odd cause it should have the opposite effect. The total bandwidth decreases but I guess the cams just aren't compatible with the signal. I dropped it to 20mhz and on wifi my cam's are getting 11fps each, pretty dang happy with that. Plus, since my wifi router has 5ghz radios as well it doesn't affect any of my PCs, I use the 2.4ghz radios exclusively for the cams.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Ruben Lopez
Reviews.Content: The IR cut filter makes a big difference.  I have the previous model of this cam and the colors on this newer model are a lot better.  The audio has also been improved, I don't hear clicking noises on this model like I did with the previous one.  The base is a bit bigger but that was not an issue for me.This is the 4th Foscam I've bought and this one has the best audio/video quality.

Reviews.Title: brilliant product. Absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Bingo "v2"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a replacement for Motorola MBP36, and boy am so happy that I bought this product.Here is the biggest problem with buying a traditional monitor - only one person can monitor the subject (my baby, in my case) since you are stuck with a single receiver. An IP cam solves that problem. Now, every device connected to the internet is a receiver. The number of apps available for viewing is amazing, and the good ones come with a ton on features (motion sensing beeps, ability to record, take snapshots and all sorts of other fancy features that you can only dream of in a traditional monitor.We absolutely love this product. One of the best investments I made recently...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brooke Horsley
Reviews.Content: Great product for the money.  A little complicated to install but if you contact customer service they will install it for you.  Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: We purchased one of these to use as a baby monitor and couldn't be happier.  We ended up ordering a second one as well to leave in a couple rooms.  We use the app Foscam Pro with our iPhone, and iPads and it works great.  I can check in on the baby and house from work or on the road. The night vision works amazingly well and I like being able to talk back and forth through the camera. I would recommend the black color as we have both and you can see some of the lights glow through the white one which is less appealing in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a while but then stopped working
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: It is a good product but it stopped working after a few months. It was difficult to use and has many problems during use. It would stop working and would need to be reset and restored to factory defaults.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera to use as a baby monitor for our dogs via phone while we are gone but didn't want to spend $250 or more. This IP camera is really the best. It costs way less, it has way more options (incl. moving the camera from your phone or pc) and the picture quality is just great! The night vision is also great quality! There is nothing bad to say about it.Set up is not bad at all. It might take you a few more minutes if you never did any hardware setup but the installation video that comes with the installation CD is really helpful. You can also add different users ( incl. passwords) and can set them as admin, operator or visitor.  I also used a free web address from no-ip so it's easier to remember than the IP address you get.My family who is thousands of miles away in Europe can also log in without any issues and even operate the camera and direct it.  I just love it!  I will buy another one or two later on to build a whole security system.There are also options to set alarms that will be triggered by motion or sound, you can add input and output audio and many more but didn't try those yet!Would and will buy it again!

Reviews.Title: My dog monitor
Reviews.Author: T S
Reviews.Content: Works very well as my dog monitor while I am at work. I set up an account with DYNDNS and I am able to access and control my camera anywhere I have internet access on a computer or on my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Worked correctly on the first hookup
Reviews.Author: William E. Horsfall "Glassman"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Value and Software installation was trouble free. The wireless feature gives location flexiblity. Use my PC and Iphone ot monitor easily.

Reviews.Title: Great camera bad service model
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Bartmess "TechUser"
Reviews.Content: Bought three, got  them all set up so I can monitor primary avenues and entries through my home and it works fabulous. So, I bought another one.The product works as anticipated but just be prepared to pay undisclosed fees should your product fail.  Most device manufacturers do not charge you to get your device fixed.  Not so with FOSCAM.  They sent me an RMA message that failed to tell me where to send the returned device, as if they had never done that before.  Then note I had to pay to ship the failed device, which they verified in a tech support contact was not recoverable and WAS within warranty, so it was not like I was just sending them an unexpected failed device.  I got on-line with them and for an hour or so went through all the steps they required to determine the device was bad.  Then when I sent them the device, the email acknowledging they received it told me I had to pay a $7.00 fee to get my replacement.I will argue that is bad policy and a worse business model.  But regardless, their tech support did not let me know of that charge ahead of time.  I will be looking for alternative solutions in the future because I do not believe bad service should be tolerated by the public.  We need to speak with our checkbooks, credit cards and purchases telling manufacturers these support policies are considered when we choose where to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great video
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: The video quality is very good, far better than my Edimax cameras.  Setup is easy.  It does quite well in the dark.  The 2 way audio is problematic because a plugin is needed and apparently there are no plugins for the Firefox browser.

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: Greg  Heitmann
Reviews.Content: Could never get it to connect to my apple airport extreme router. paid the vendor $40 for instruction book. still didnt work. Buy the dropcam. set up is a snap and grat software options.Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with Two-Way Audio and Night Vision (Black)

Reviews.Title: The most helpful reviews were right on
Reviews.Author: Mark Shapiro "mshapiro123"
Reviews.Content: I'm not all that tech savvy, but I was able to install this and get it working in about 20 minutes.  The manual isn't all that clearly written, but with a little trial and error I figured it out.  I installed the IP Cam Viewer app and can now view and control my camera from my iPhone.  Works great as a baby monitor with more versatility, range, features, and control than an out-of-the-box baby cam.  Would have given it five stars if the manual were written better.

Reviews.Title: Awesome IP cam!
Reviews.Author: HappyHARK
Reviews.Content: After much research, I decided to purchase the Foscam FI8910W camera to use as a baby monitor. Setup was not as bad as some folks have described, although I will admit I do have experience setting up networks and I didn't have any trouble. Documentation was adequate. As of this writing, I was successful in connecting this camera to my network and was able to view images via my iPhone, Galaxy S3, laptops and desktop computer. I haven't attempted to setup internet access yet as it's not a huge concern for me at the moment. I am using it over my WiFi so I'm not far from my child.Overall a very good camera and I recommend it to anyone who wants to setup for a baby cam or provide video surveillance. I plan on ordering a few more of these cameras to add additional coverage.

Reviews.Title: Great Features, easy to Install, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: R. W. Sumrall III "It is what it is!"
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a great device.  It was very easy for me to set up (although I should disclose that I am very familiar with electronic components).  It produces a good picture in light and in complete darkness.  I will use this as a baby monitor in the future, and from my weeks of testing and observations with it thus far, I am sure it will fit my needs perfectly.  I like being able to see the feed on my iPhone/iPad as well as on any computer.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS
Reviews.Author: M. Gerth
Reviews.Content: I have tried 3 times to get this camera installed.  LONG wait times on the phone, poor english speaking skills, and excuse after excuse for not being able to get the darn thing working.  Now its been over 30 days and I cannot return the damn thing at cost.  I am soooo frustrated/pissed.  This is absurd.  I am returning it for partial reimbursement.  Please don't be foolish enough to buy this unless you are computer savvy enough to get it to work on your own.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Maggie Mae
Reviews.Content: Was facing difficulty in remotely accessing the camera. Contacted foscam technical support spoke to Felix he help me out quickly & fix my problem. I love the camera & would recommend to everyone. Especially The technical Support is Excellent.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This camera worked right out of the box and Foscam actually provides live tech support that is pretty good.The camera will allow you to view the area remotely, including in complete darkness as it has IR. It will also detect motion and email you pictures of the motion.  Just be aware that motion also includes changes in light - sun up, sun down.The wifi connection is a little strange to setup.  You must connect via hardwire first, configure the WiFi and then disconnect from the hardwire Ethernet.  Beware - the hardwire connection and Wifi must be the same router.  It will not recognise a Wifi connection from a router that did not supply the initial hard wire connection.I was trying to use the camera on a Truconnect wifi hotspot but it was impossible. But if you have broadband wifi or a hardwire Ethernet connection, this works great.

Reviews.Title: Working with no problems
Reviews.Author: AKJason
Reviews.Content: Did not have any problem getting this connected and working on my home network, wired or wireless.The mic does pick up audio just fine, have not tested the sound coming from the unitNot sure of there customer service as I did not need to call them.The program they sent to find the IP Cam on my network worked just fine.Also set it up on DDNS.org with out any cost to meThis is my 3rd one and the same goes with the other 2, and looking at getting a 4th one soonOnly thing is and would not say its a problem, the cable for power seems a little short for something that's going to be mounted on a wall

Reviews.Title: excellent product and service, excellent tech support
Reviews.Author: wballenwmm
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 cameras,  very easy to use,  had to call tech support, they were great. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: stuck in reboot loop
Reviews.Author: Electropostie
Reviews.Content: I bought this (via Groupon, not from here) because I wanted to view my home remotely from Android, and the Foscam was the best supported protocol... (my previous camera wasn't supported at all by any of the android remote camera viewer apps) - unfortunately I got about an hour's worth of use out of it before the camera went into an infinite reboot loop.  It *was* configured and working, so more likely a hardware than a software issue.  It came with firmware 11.37.2.48 which is actually newer than the latest one at their website, 11.37.2.46.  Unfortunately several posts on the net say that 11.37.2.46 causes the wifi to stop working so I'm not willing to try the older software even if the machine were to stay up long enough to install it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dang Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Works as expected, way better than the Foscam FI8918W model, and it's weird since this is an older model, but works great !

Reviews.Title: Does exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Woolf-Books
Reviews.Content: I have the exact model, and was very happy with it. I bought a second camera.....the newer version, and it is awful, so I bought this same model again as my second camera. It is perfect for monitoring my second home while I am not there. The only issue with this model is that you may need to reset your IP if there is a power failure. The newer model does not require this...my reason for buying it, but it does not happen every time, and compared to the horrible newer model, it is a minor issue.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Terrible software
Reviews.Author: Yoyo5
Reviews.Content: This is a great ip camera.  I had no problem setting it up on my network and turning it on.  The problem came when I tried to port it through my firewall and access it over the internet.  Still working on this issue and will update once I have figured it out.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Joanie P
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and does it all. Pan tilt audio and good video. I will buy again. Good price good quality

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price
Reviews.Author: W. Foster III "WRF3"
Reviews.Content: I have worked with IP cameras for about 2 years. I had wanted one for my home to check on my pet dog. In the past I wanted to buy a Sony PTZ camera, but they are too expensive for my budget.This Foscam is very well priced and has a good image with an easy to use interface. An added feature is the wireless connectivity. After configuring this on a wired connection I placed this on a wall with a power source and the device has worked very well so far. The image quality is the same as the wired connection. The refresh rate of the image also appears to be the same as when the connection is wired. This is my second week of ownership. The basic functionality of the camera meets by basic needs.I found set up to be easy and the functionality and image offered by the camera to be well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Just got this and love it
Reviews.Author: Robert Peasley
Reviews.Content: Bought two and have one running the first day.  I am very impressed with image quality, better than I had expected reading the comments of other buyers.  I have an older security system at my home and these provide a better picture.  Considering the Pan/Tilt functions, this is a great deal.  I set up using hard wire network connection but have already tested the wifi and again, picture quality is better than I expected.  It wasn't clear on the Amazon listing, but they do come with the mounting bracket as well as the ethernet patch cable and power supply.Considering the price I paid I think these are great.

Reviews.Title: Does the work!
Reviews.Author: Shaolin
Reviews.Content: Pro: The price is very good for this type of IP camera.Con: Audio is not perfect, a little bit noise.

Reviews.Title: This is a very nice product.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got two when there's some discount, and I like them very much. I had some problem setting them up initially, with my very complex home network. Without changes, it didn't work at the beginning, I could only receive alert emails.So I simplified my home network, connected the wireless router directly to my cable modem, and setup the port forwarding, changed the cameras' ports and both of them work perfectly. I setup the email to send URL, and by click the URL, I can access my cameras from everywhere. After my home network changes, the setting for the camera is very easy to do.Also, I had a 802.11b/g router which didn't work with WPA2-PSK, I had to change the security to WPA for the camera to connect, but when I setup my N router, it worked without any problem.Also, the included camera setup software works great too. I had problem finding out the LAN address of the cameras without that software, and the software just helped to find those easily.This should be the easiest, cheapest way to setup your own home surveillance system. Although the image resolution isn't so great, but I'm not using it for video conference, and the resolution is good enough for the purpose.The whole camera quality is a bit low, all plastic, a bit shaky, that's why I'll give 4 stars, but for the price, it's good enough.

Reviews.Title: foscam customer service
Reviews.Author: David K. McAteer "dkmac"
Reviews.Content: hd an issue with port forwarding .. called the customer service they arranged a call back got a call frm the tech named harry foster he was able to remotely access my computer and was able to help me with the port forwarding. This was amazingly fast. I should have called a week Earlier!!!

Reviews.Title: Stop LOOKING at me!!
Reviews.Author: Dairen Wilcox "wildapples"
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty neat. It's does not have great resolution, but it is still pretty good. I use this as a baby-sitter monitor and it is a complete hoot. I get to watch my son have a great time with he's sitter and I can talk to him through the camera straight from my iPhone. I like it. Add to future wish list, better resolution. Otherwise, great! I have seen all the post about how hard it is to setup with your WiFi. I dunno, it was easy to me and I have never had a camera like this. My Apple computer and Apple's WiFi-Base-station is great. Just be sure to find the right tutorial online. Most are out-dated. You just have to hunt down the right tutorial for your WiFi system.

Reviews.Title: good produc
Reviews.Author: ramon sun
Reviews.Content: skip the first step in the setup and go straight to wireless connection step, i spent ages trying to get it to work through the cable connection by the router but my PC can not find it but once i connect to the wireless network they find it straight away. other that that the camera works fine on computers and smartphones, ngiht vision is great too.

Reviews.Title: DOA - Not Off To A Good Start
Reviews.Author: R. Dzek
Reviews.Content: Waiting for replacement.  Unit worked for less than 24 hours.  Then it stopped responding to web.  No network activity, and a reset had no effect.  We'll see what the replacement brings.  :(

Reviews.Title: Disconnects too frequently
Reviews.Author: MarriedRhombus
Reviews.Content: It's nice when it works. Setup is straightforward. I setup directly using the network because the DVD that came with the package was broken! The worst thing about this camera is the frequent disconnects which makes this camera very unreliable for security.I am returning this product back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great value and tech support
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: easy to use on any smart phone and view at home especially for small business owners. Easy to install and take advantage of the security camera system.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: works well and customer support is great. colr is good and remore access wrks well.  i recommend this camera and am going to get another one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome remote capabilities...
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Bought this to watch my baby while I'm at work. I travel for a living and found this to be the perfect way to stay in touch with the family. Had a little (beginner) trouble setting it up and called Foscam support. Within 5 minutes they had me up and running. Couldn't be happier. Will be purchasing a few more to monitor the house, in and out. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: D. V. Dang
Reviews.Content: Camera is equipped with 2.8mm lense not the 3.6mm.  The 2.8 has a wider angle.  The camera also came with built-in ddns server.  The black one didn't; save me the time and cost of signing up with dyndns.org srevices.

Reviews.Title: I love this little cam
Reviews.Author: lex
Reviews.Content: If you understand how to open up ports and configure your router this cam is a piece of cake.Awesome

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Michael Willyoung
Reviews.Content: Customer service is awesome  very helpful.  Spent a lot of time with me going over the product and how it works.  Very greatful.

Reviews.Title: Used as a baby monitor
Reviews.Author: A. Mota
Reviews.Content: We use this for our baby as a baby monitor and we love it. We have done a lot of research on video baby monitors and everything that was in our price range just looked like garbage. Someone mentioned having this as a monitor and I am so glad they did! It was very easy to set up and I just love that you can watch this camera anywhere. I use it on my Kindle and sometimes my husband can look at it on his Android when he is at work. The picture is great quality and the sound isn't bad either. I would highly recommend everyone to buy this rather than those other video baby monitors.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910W
Reviews.Author: Rch
Reviews.Content: Great camera, awesome tech assistance. I like that I can and search in and move the camera remotley. I highly recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized for what I have needed it for
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Used two of these in my chicken coop and after a few hiccups with the initial setup (port forwarding and ddns services) these have been running constantly for over a month now.  Sometimes the color is off when the transition from night to day gets goofed up somehow.  This is less than 5% of the time though.  They are mounted outside in an area protected from the rain and haven't fogged or anything like that yet.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good....
Reviews.Author: Reston Dane
Reviews.Content: I bought this mainly for the schedule-driven motion detection.  I bought a cheaper cam earlier which works great, but you can't tell it WHEN you want it to motion detect.  Setup for this was easier than a lot of people here make it out to be.  The first review with the individual steps was very helpful.  There are also a couple of videos on youtube that are great for setup help.  One thing I thought may have been buggy was the email service.  I couldn't get it to work.  Finally, I realized that I had it scheduled to video capture at 3:00am, not 3:00pm.  This is because the scheduler is in military time!  I wish it had zoom.  Sound and other features seemed to be better tailored for IE.  Spring for the four dollar app. if you want to use the iPhone. It is really good.  One thing I find interesting is the amount of heat this thing generates in the base.  No idea what causes that.  Another thing I find interesting is the price continues to climb on these cams.  I believe it was $69.99 at some point in the past.  I bought mine for $79.99 days ago.  Now it is $96.49!

Reviews.Title: Fos cam
Reviews.Author: R. J. Tillman
Reviews.Content: Met my expectations. I like the idea that I see my home from work on my phone. Looking at putting one in the barn next.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Clarity- Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Cory L. Parker "ItJustCory"
Reviews.Content: I was blown away by the clarity and features of this camera, especially having such a low price tag.A year and a half ago I had a security camera system professionally installed at my house which cost me $3200 for four cameras and a DVR. Needless to say I didn't go with pro install when I moved because the camera quality on those doesn't have anything on the Foscam. If you put the professional cameras and the Foscam side by side you would always pick the Foscam image thinking it must be the more expensive of the two.Setup was easy, took all of five minutes via WiFi. The picture clarity is amazing and the IR night function gives almost the same clarity as if it were daytime. Tilt/Zoom is great and there really isn't anywhere you can't see, pretty much no blind spots.I can pull up and use all pan/tilt/record/snapshot from anywhere I am and have the FoscamPro app installed on my iPad,iPhone, and android devices.Since they don't use a central receiver (they go off of wifi or hard wired) the range is as far as your home network extends which makes them even more dynamic. I currently have three up and running.I found a very easy way to monitor these (if you don't want to keep it on your computer or device)-I used the Logitech Revue, hooked it up to a small tv and now I have a central 24/7 Security monitoring screen.These cameras really couldn't be any easier to set up/manage and monitor than they already are.I have tried seven different brands and many cameras and none come close to the Foscam.I suggest you try Foscam, if you don't like it send back , that simple. But I have a feeling if you have ever tried any other home cameras you will not only keep it but buy several more.For the quality of images, quality of product itself, features and price- You can't go wrong.I buy over 400 items a year from Amazon and always give an honest review in order to help those trying to make a purchase decision.This product rates 5 stars for use-ability, construction and price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Monarchi
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the quality of this camera.  Set up was a breeze, and the images are great.  I was particularly surprised by the IR quality.  I have installed the same camera for friends, and they all think it's great too.

Reviews.Title: Does what it was intended
Reviews.Author: James R. Clinefelter
Reviews.Content: Camera seems to work well, but the setup directions are terrible.  You need a Philadelphia lawyer to figure it out.Would be nice if the camera had zoom on it.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality of product
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Good performance, used on long distance and work as well. Night vision with good definition, poor audio quality but in my case wasn't the first priority

Reviews.Title: Reliable
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Podzius "Mike P"
Reviews.Content: Works good for pc, android, and iOS.  Just started using it remotely and iOS won't let it work for some reason. But it works on the android. No major issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, but plan on spending hours to set up the audio
Reviews.Author: BC
Reviews.Content: I'm a fairly tech-savvy individual. I've rooted my last two android phones, rooted my HP Touchpad, and I've even got my router hacked to run a different firmware. So setting up all the port-forwarding and other stuff to get the video set up wasn't too rough. The problem I've been having is with the audio.I've bought two apps on my phone that allow audio functionality (the free versions don't have audio, so they make you pony up if you want it). They both worked flawlessly out of the box. All I had to do was type in my IP address and port, and I was good to go. However, getting it up and running on my Windows 7 64-bit box has been a whole other story.I've tried Google Chrome (my main browser), which requires the installation of a VLC plug-in. I use VLC as my media player already, so I was optimistic. This function is EXTREMELY buggy, to say the least. The audio will work, but only at full volume. There's a volume control on the plug-in, but as soon as you adjust it, the audio completely cuts out until you reload the page. Furthermore, after you adjust the volume, the volume control disappears from the screen!! The electronic hum that comes through the speaker is so loud that I have to turn my computer speakers down from 50% to about 5%. But that means using your computer for any other audio stuff is completely impossible. I watch videos, and constantly listen to music on my computer, so this won't work.I've tried Firefox, which also requires the VLC plug-in. With Firefox, I can get either audio or video, but not both. Furthermore, the same volume problem exists here too as with Chrome.I've tried Internet Explorer, which Foscam recommends. They indicate that you can only use a 32-bit version of Internet Explorer. Fine. They have a whole bunch of ActiveX security controls that you have to tweak. Fine. There are some Windows Volume settings that you have to enable. Fine. I did all of these, but still couldn't get the audio to work. I uninstalled IE 9 and tried using IE 8. Tweaked all the various settings again, but still no audio.I bought the thing so I could use it as a baby monitor, but with lots of friends having babies soon, I'm going to tell them to steer clear of this.

Reviews.Title: Quality of these cameras NOT improving.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: Pros:  Good Price, fulfilled extremely fast.Cons:  The feature to set/recall presets does not work even after performing the RESET procedure.  The camera's firmware and WEBUI are newer than the firmware/WEBUI upgrade files listed as the "newest" files in the support section on the Foscam website so updating these files on the camera to fix the problem is not an option.I have bought several Foscam and Agasio cameras over the past 9 months and the quality of the cameras and the online support has been terrible.  I would have hoped they would have improved in each of these areas but so far I haven't seen it.

Reviews.Title: Best IP Camera's Period!
Reviews.Author: Blaze
Reviews.Content: This is the best IP camera I've ever owned. Quite motors, great picture quality, fast stream of video feed and also very fast responsiveness to tilt camera or turn on and off features remotely. Very nice flat finish to camera. Sturdy built. A really easy setup. (You will have to know a bit about port forwarding and assigning static ip's to it from your router). You won't be disappointed. It is better than the DLink and Nexia camera's. I've tried them both.

Reviews.Title: Very easy setup and works great!
Reviews.Author: YYW
Reviews.Content: This is first time for me to use IP camera without network background. I bought one at the  first time since not sure if I can setup and thought it would take a lot time to get it work. Amazing, less than 10 minutes, thought manual I got it work. Then, I had ordered another 5 right after first one works.All other 5's I spent around 5 minutes to setup for each and now I have 6 points at home I can monitor my store inside remotely. Also, I installed foscam app in my iPhone and display high clear screen.Nice product!

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set up.
Reviews.Author: t gorman
Reviews.Content: This camera would get a great rating if I could only get it to work!  I have tried to set up internet access on two different routers without success.  Email to the company for assistance went unheeded.  I would not recommend the product to the average user.

Reviews.Title: Fun and easy to use but difficult to install.
Reviews.Author: D. M. Smith
Reviews.Content: Great product, but if you can't afford to hire an I/T or D/P expert, or aren't prepared to spend about a hundred hours online with an educated helper, don't even think of trying to hook one up for remote use via the internet.  It can be done, and I did it, but even with the experience I now have, I still don't really know how it works, OR HOW TO DO IT.  Bottom line, fine for home-network use, but rediculous for internet use.Oh, and good service, and reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but mobile app is weak
Reviews.Author: Joe B
Reviews.Content: The camera itself lives up to my expectations. However, it was difficult to set up unless you are quite computer literate and understand communication/network terminology. Once done, it's simple to use. the Foscam mobile app is useless, so I downloaded a free app, CamViewer that works fairly well. I had the camera on for a weekend trip recently, and it worked well except for a few false alarms. I'm still playing with the sensitivity setting to eliminate them, but it appears to be sensitive to light changes even with the "light sensitivity" box checked in the alarm settings. Alert messages are sent to my phone via email very quickly. In fact, when we got home, I received an alert (from my motion opening the door) before I was fully in the house.

Reviews.Title: nice product with problematical dvm_ipcam2.ocx
Reviews.Author: W.L.
Reviews.Content: Some features for Visitor and Operator seem to require installing a problematical ActiveX control but IE9 reports that "Windows has found a problem with this file: DVM_IPCam2.ocx". Neither the suggestions in User Manual 4.1.3 nor the ones on the Foscam.us site would help. Using Chrome can do most/all functions for Administrator but not all functions of Visitor or Operator.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: M. Zhou
Reviews.Content: Despite reading many of the reviews here saying the installation is a pain, I find the camera a great buy if one is looking for an inexpensive wireless security camera for everyday use. I need one just to make sure my front door or the package left at my front door is safe.The feature I was looking for: wireless connection, can be viewed via internet (no need to set up a server at home).I highly recommend this product to any one who is looking for the same features as I do. This is not a fancy product, but it gets the job done.BTW, the installation is a little bit tricky, but it took me less than an hour to get everything done. Follow the brochure just for the hardware installation, ignore the rest. Then go to their internet support page ---- [...] ----for all the necessary information.This is not a fake review. It's lame that I have to mention this, but one of the 1-star review mentioned that there are a lot of fake 5-star reviews on amazon and I feel strongly that I have to do this nice product some justice.

Reviews.Title: LOVING THIS!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this to use for a baby monitor, and it is working out PERFECT!!!! We have already decided to order one more for the playroom.  It took a little bit of work for my husband to get it all hooked up to the wireless but after a couple hours it is great! I downloaded an app to my android phone and tablet and can watch perfectly.  I also was able to give my sister and parents limited access too.  Kind of fun to be able to share my baby with everyone from all of our own houses. I will love being able to go off to work for a few hours after our next baby is born, and yet still be able to check in and actually see what is going on.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality All Around
Reviews.Author: Ketupia
Reviews.Content: There's not much I liked about this camera.  I suppose I could say* the build quality was good.* the network was setup for DHCP out of the box.I found the* video clarity poor* frames per second too low for much movement at all* IR views poorly contrasted.  I couldn't make out my own face.* motor noise too loud* software clunky.  I liked the interface better before upgrading the firmware, although that's not saying much.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Vadim Vapnyar
Reviews.Content: Relatively painless to setup, having basic home networking knowledge helps (e.g., dynamic vs. static, port forwarding) for more advanced configurations.  I bought this for its compatibility with Synology NAS (I'm using DS413), it works as advertised.  Any hick ups in the process I'm attributing to Synology Surveillance Station software camera registration process.  Camera looks a little cheap in terms of build quality and it only does 640, but comparing it to cameras that do 1080p and are more sturdy, you are looking at 10x increase in price.  Very good value.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied, affordable, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: D. Tirinnanzi
Reviews.Content: Got the camera today, set it up in 15 minutes, instructions are clear and easy to follow even though they're not written in the best english. I was able to connect via Internet Explorer and Firefox. IE, through Active X, gives the possibility to use 2 way audio, which I haven't been able to use with firefox. I also connected with my android phone, using a free app. the IR nightvision works well. overall great quality. there is an android app that should work with 2 way audio, but I haven't tried it yet. Might post an update if I get to try it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Krote345
Reviews.Content: Set this up in our nursery for use as a baby cam.  There are a multitude of apps for both iPhone and Android that make this very useful.  Our iPad is now the baby monitor screen.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service was awsome
Reviews.Author: amareth
Reviews.Content: I was having problems connecting wirelessly and I contacted customer support and got Harry Foster. He was great. He set up my camera in about 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: Premier
Reviews.Content: I love the new camera by Foscam, FI8910W.  During the installation process, I followed the instructions carefully.  After going wireless, the camera worked fine; however, it would periodically interrupt my internet access.  To restore it, I reset my router and reconnected to the internet.  Unfortunately this occurred repeatedly so I called Foscam's support.  Ralph Mendez did a wonderful job of walking me through the problem.  When I bought my Linksys router in 2010, I had my router automatically set my key which resulted in a 26 letter key.  I had my encryption set at 68 so after he set it to 128 bits, the problem seems to be resolved.  Thanks again for the great support.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Product and Support
Reviews.Author: GSR
Reviews.Content: Outstanding value.  Tricky to set up for i-phone viewing, but excellent support from Foscam (Anzen was the tech rep) solved all problems.  Recommend this product for basic surveillance needs.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cam
Reviews.Author: L. Estevez "lou34"
Reviews.Content: The item was received quickly and is a very good product.  The customer support is excellent and are very knowledgeable.  The camera features should be more Mac friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great for me!
Reviews.Author: kiltguy
Reviews.Content: I found this camera to be exactly what is was described to be. I am an IT professional, so set up was a breeze for me. I have this working in a windows and android enviroment, so I cannot comment on apple product compatibility. I have taken the time to look through Foscam's online support documents, and found them to be very complete.  I have had no need to call the company, so I can make no statement on how helpful they are/are not.  If you are not familiar with firewall rules, or setting dhcp reservations, this is probably not the product for you. If you can follow tech documents, give it a try.  I did not purchase this camera from amazon, because another authorized reseller had a better cyber monday deal.  I am using it as a baby monitor, which it is well suited for.  If I wanted to monitor a business, there are other products that I would use.

Reviews.Title: Great way to keep an eye on the kids
Reviews.Author: Anita Nagle
Reviews.Content: We just set this up in our basement, I can now watch the kids while they  play.  Love the functionality.  image quality is quite good.  easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Help
Reviews.Author: Jim From Ohio
Reviews.Content: I had my wireless gateway crash after a year of camera use.Bradley helped me reload the camera software & reset the gateway.A job I could not do myself. Very helpful people.Thanks for the excellent product support.

Reviews.Title: WATCHER
Reviews.Author: Amazoner "Amazoner"
Reviews.Content: This is a great security camera. Easy to set up. No need for customer service calls. The video is great, the audio is great and the movement of the camera is quiet during operation. Other cameras when you pan and tilt you can hear the gears move, but with the foscam FI8910w you do not hear anything. So this is an advantage is you are checking in on your house. You do see the red IR leds but that can not be help. It is the technology of the IR leds.Great remote operation, I use it on the iphone and it works flawlessly. You do need to buy the foscam app from the app store but it is worth it. I was able to check on my house when I was 8,000 miles away on vacation and I can tell you it was cool and comforting to check in.You will need to know how to port forward your ports with you broadband provider which is easy enough for an average computer user. Also some free advice, if you are a verizon DSL user IT IS FREE TO PORT FORWARD YOUR PORTS. Verizon DSL tried to charge me 50 dollars a month to have my ports forwarded. They are ripoffs. They use a third party customer service to maintain their dsl routers. Just google any issues you may have and you will get your answers for FREE.

Reviews.Title: A+ works outdoor and dependable
Reviews.Author: B. Chan
Reviews.Content: Good quality video capture and was a breeze to setup.  I can view my security cam from my iPhone, iPad or browser from the Internet!  Only gripe is that the motion sensing video capture trigger has some slight delay before it starts capture but that is to be expected with a product in this range.

Reviews.Title: Knowledgeable tech support
Reviews.Author: K. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: - Pro:Camera works great. Good quality video. IR is a good feature to have. Setting up (except for remote access) is easy. Just follow the Quick Installation Guide come with the camera and you will be able to setup camera for either wired or wireless viewing. Live feed can be view from its Foscam IP Camera Client software on Windows or many android apps on Android device. I happen to use tinyCam Monitor for my Android.- Con:A little bit hard to setup Remote Access fir a non-technical person.It took several tries to talk to technical support as they always seem to be busy.  The technical rep was very knowledgeable and friendly.  He was able to help me with setting up remote access in about 10 minutes.  Here is my setup and steps to setup Remote Access for those who have similar configurations. If you are not comfortable doing this yourself, just call them up.Service:  Version DSLModem:  Westell 6100GRouter:  NetGear WNR2000v21) Setting up Foscam. Follow the Quick Installation Guide to setup camera. Assign a static IP instead of using Dynamic. In the Foscam setting window, Basic Network Setting, uncheck the Obtain IP from DHCP Server box, assign a IP address (for ex, 10.0.0.11), Subnet Mask, Gateway, DNS Server can be found in your router. Choose a port and remember it.. Add users who can view the camera.. Verify that you can view the video.. Follow the Quick Installation Guide to register with a no-ip host.2) Setting up modem:- go to [...]- Firewall setting > Port Forwarding- In the Port Forwarding window, click Add- Pick the protocol, I picked both. U can just pick tcp as well. Enter the Name and the port (used in step 1)- In the New Port Forwarding Rule window, select the Name u entered above from the drop down menu, select Host, select your router, and click Apply- In the Port Forwarding window, u should see the new Service u just create3) Setting up Router- go to routerlogin.net- click on Port Forwarding/Port Triggering- click Add Custom Service- fill in all of the fields, using the port and ip address that u chose in step (1) above.- click ApplyYou are done. The camera can be accessed remotely using the no-ip address and port number u chose.Hope this is helpful and will save someone time and effort.

Reviews.Title: very good camera, but needed tech support to set up remote access
Reviews.Author: Matthew brown
Reviews.Content: I bought for great price on Amazon and it was relatively easy to set up, although the included instructions were not so great. I had to call technical support to help me set up the remote access capability, which was not explained very well at all. Although a bit difficult to understand, the support representative got the camera working in about 20 min and it works just fine. I don't think you can beat the price/performance combination of this device.

Reviews.Title: Great camera! Great functionality!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use with the Surveillance Station software on my Synology NAS.  So far the camera has exceed expectations and I love that I can manually control the view of the camera from my NAS software or from other third-party products on my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Andrew Darlow "Editor, ImagingBuffet.com"
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed overall with this product. The value is amazing for what you get. The color and sharpness during the day are excellent and the night vision is also superb. It gave me piece of mind when traveling to know that I could see areas of my home via my iPhone. I paid about $5 for the Foscam Pro app, though I probably could have found a free option on the app store. Setup was a bit confusing, but a YouTube search for the product brought me to a few videos that helped.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera to keep an eye on the house
Reviews.Author: BrnFrnld
Reviews.Content: I had been looking around for a while and looking at various IP cameras and when this was on sale during a lightning deal, i decided to give it a shot.Glad i did.I deducted one star because set up is a little involved if you want it to run seamlessly but if you know how to route ports and work on router settings, it will run very smoothly. There are a few reviews on here that will help you with how to do all that, as well as a simple search on the Foscam site will also guide you through setup.I am able to view this camera pretty much anywhere I have an internet connection including anywhere I have a good signal on my Android phone using an IP Camera app.On a good connection, the camera is very responsive and can be controlled remotely to look around the room. It does work best if mounted upside down and up high if you are wanting to view an entire room. The night vision with IR lights works great at night and in dark rooms.In the more advanced set up, you can set it so it will email you a series of pictures if movement is detected.I do plan on purchasing at least one more for another part of the house when the price drops again and I am also looking at installing another Foscam branded camera outside to keep an eye on the front door.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Casey Baker
Reviews.Content: Camera works excellent, facing  difficulty accessing the camera remotely, contacted technical support, they helped me through, i'm satisfied with the support and the camera would recommend the camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18910w
Reviews.Author: Chester Espinoza JR.
Reviews.Content: Camera has very good customer service. set up with customer service was very fast and easy.Use the camera for our retail store and have set it up to record and alarm us through email.Very happy with system and service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product, Easy to Install
Reviews.Author: Frank H. Campbell Jr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as a means to monitor our children's play-area from my iPad when having adult dinner gatherings.  The product works perfectly and does exactly whInstallation was incredibly fast and easy (less than 30 minutes), and everything functions exceptionally well.  Getting the sound to work was somewhat tricky, but after downloading and installing VLC, the audio worked just fine.  (I have not tried the 2-way audio).  I've worked with setting up networks in the past, so I do have some background in networking.  But I found the step-by-step instructions very straightforward and easy to understand.The IR is fantastic.  Turned it on when my kids were playing in the play-area in the dark, and I could see them clear as ever.I'm actually considering purchasing a second camera to install outside for security.

Reviews.Title: Good customer service
Reviews.Author: elshan
Reviews.Content: Good customer service for camera installation. Installation process was really easy because representative remote accessed the computer and set the camera up with out any problem.

Reviews.Title: Good for the cost
Reviews.Author: Alan C. Moore
Reviews.Content: I have one of these in the house behind a window and the other in my barn.  The IR doesn't work behind a window (of course) but the camera has good range and works well in the barn.

Reviews.Title: Great web camera
Reviews.Author: Stu
Reviews.Content: I'm using the web cam to view activity outside my home.  It works just as described.  I haveset it up to view remotely without much trouble.

Reviews.Title: Recommend
Reviews.Author: William Yates
Reviews.Content: This product works as advertised.  It was a little difficult to set up the remote access feature because my Internet is dynamic, but once I took the time to go through the process outlined in the manual it worked great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Lionberger
Reviews.Content: The Camera worked as described.  Really like the IR Cut and night viewing.  Had some issues with viewing on a windows 7 machine, but could have been the computer.

Reviews.Title: Ok but ip address constantly changes
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a baby camera.  You have to open the camera software application daily or more on the main computer that your router is connected to to find the IP address if you use the iPad or iPhone app because it constantly changes.  Luckily there is a great YouTube video out there by this guy that walks you thru initial installation.  Anyone technically challenged should use get the Motorola baby monitor.  Otherwise a great camera. Night vision and sound is excellent. A good money saver over a strictly marketed baby camera.Update! 1/2013Camera still works great and I don't have to constantly reset the IP address anymore- I have no idea why it is more stable now !Anyway I love this camera now that my toddler can walk.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: FPGAEngineer
Reviews.Content: Works as expected. Can't comment on long-term reliability, but it was quick and easy to get working. I didn't use any of the provided software. I followed the recommendation of another reviewer that said to plug it in, the find the IP address as reported by your DHCP server, and then connect to the camera in the browser and configure it from there. Very simple once you are in via the browser.

Reviews.Title: Software is questionable.
Reviews.Author: J. Frahm
Reviews.Content: Cameras work fine, but the software lacks the proper digital signatures and Windows 7 will refuse to load it without additional steps.  When you check the foscam website, your virus proteciton will begin warning you of viruses.  I love the camera, but am becoming concerned with the Chinese origins of the software.

Reviews.Title: Good camera after figuring setup.
Reviews.Author: WPL "Bill User"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and after a bit of struggling with setup they work great.  You need to set these up using a wired connection before using wireless.

Reviews.Title: Only for the sophisticated programer or network tech
Reviews.Author: ersatzs2
Reviews.Content: Having just spent my entire Saturday learning more than I wanted to know about remote dns servers, I have finally managed to get two Foscam FI8910W cameras minimally functional.  I still can't view on handheld despite downloading both Foscam's software ($4.99) and an independent viewer product (another $4.99)I think the hardware here is going to be just great; right now they are humming away in a dark room and show really clear infra-red images.  But it took a huge amount of time and had I known that I likely would've hired someone to do this.I think the packaging and promotion could be much clearer that this is a product only for the sophisticated power user.  If it were not for a helpful youtube production I never would've been able to get as far as I did.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: rob graff
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up via wired ethernet,WLAN not as easy to set up but did get it going,Remote access still have not figured that out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent support for this product
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first wireless camera, the Foscam F18910W. For a home computer user, the setup looked quite intimidating but in no time I was looking through my new camera with my computer. The Rest of the setup to be able to link it to my iphone didn't go as well. I was pleased to get a call from technical service (Albert)after leaving a message with a real person (imagine that !!!). Albert was very patient and helped me get the job done in no time. I was amazed to see how easy it is to use and how much it can do. My particular use of my camera is to look in to see how my animals are doing at home while I am at work. I am very pleased with the product and would recommend it to anyone. Its a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Technical Support
Reviews.Author: michael a trefry
Reviews.Content: Purchased Foscam FI8910W and had no issue with basic setup and wireless connection.  The Remote access setup may prove more difficult because there are so many more variables depending upon your home network equipment and the device you are trying to use for remote access.  After spending about 5 hours of trying to figure it out myself and researching it on-line, I ended up just calling Foscam technical support.  After a brief wait, <5 min, to speak to a real person, Ralph Mendez had my remote access up and running in about 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Rainer
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera , works great Suggest Camera as ad on .Felix Anderson was nice and competent !!!Support works perfect !!!

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: walter Wentzel
Reviews.Content: cameras were not working.sarah johnson did a great job getting cameras online and working. cameras are excellent and i am happy with my purchase of the foscam fi8910w camera

Reviews.Title: Can't beat what you get for the price
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Received the product a couple of days ago, arrived just as described with all listed accessories included.  Set up did take some time, especially the configuration to access the camera outside of my home network.  Being able to view the camera while still within my home network was pretty easy to set up, just takes some basic understanding of how a home network works and also how to modify settings on your wireless router.  Camera is suprisingly sharp compared to what I expected and the night vision with the IR on is very good.  I was able to see everything in a 30x30 room off of my house without a single light on.  I purchased this camera for the purpose of keeping an eye on our new puppy while she is home alone for short periods of time, but think I may be purchasing a couple more to add to the network to allow me to keep an eye on the house when nobody is home.  The mounting bracket allows easy placement and I've actually retrofit mine with magnets so that I can stick it to any metal drywall corner in the house without drilling any holes.  The remote access works well too, although you have to be patient with the pan/tilt controls as there is a lag.  I was able to use a free ip cam viewer app for my android phone to remotely view the camera and have no trouble connecting to it.  All in all, a really nice camera for the price you pay.  Sure you can pay more for a higher quality unit, but for a basic setup that lets you keep an eye on your home this sure provides peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Works well, easy setup
Reviews.Author: R. Plant
Reviews.Content: I got the camera to track our family pet at night to see which one was leaving presents for us. It worked. I found the image to be very nice with lights on and clear using the IR at night, just a black and white image. I had problems with it resetting its point of aim at random times by going back to home position. Tech Support was easy to contact and provided the instructions I needed to turn that feature off.The only thing not working is the audio. I have not been successful at getting that working. It looks like another e-mail to tech support will be needed.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but challenging to set up
Reviews.Author: Samuel Fjellanger
Reviews.Content: The camera was fairly easy to set up on my wireless LAN, but challenging to set up to access from outside my LAN.  Spent a lot of hours trying to figure it out and finally had to have someone from the help desk set it up for me.  Once I was able to reach someone (which took some effort, make sure to call early in the day), Judy, the woman who helped me was able to set it up for me quickly.  She was polite and easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam even if you are not a tech person
Reviews.Author: andrea aparecida tobias gallo
Reviews.Content: I love this camara, it was easy to set together, I am not a tech person how ever they have a great support team, I call and in less than 30 min, my camara was on even remote control,they even help me in open my ports in my modem, they explain how to log in form my I phone, I love it, and I will recomed it 100% I change my internet service i called and i have excellent technical support by Calvin thank you for your help

Reviews.Title: Nice ... but there are issues.
Reviews.Author: C. R. Stone "chadwick"
Reviews.Content: I gotta E3000 router and win 7 Ultimate 64bit PC. The CD that came with it was useless. Installed it, but nothing ever displays in the application ... eh, not a huge problem as they have a web interface! Plugged camera into my router, it displayed the cameras IP (DHCP) and I logged in using Google Chrome! Somewhat smooth and fairly simple so far. I had issues with IE9 64 bit and 32 bit versions. I went ahead and set it up wirelessly and it worked!! However, it assigned it another IP when it wireless. Not a problem though. Downloaded a few apps for my iPhone 4 and 4S and connected as well!! Sweet!!Problems I've seen: No zooming options; eh, it'd be nice. Problems with changing the security password!! I had to completely reset it, as it never would work right!!! WTH!?! I need to alter the default security. Will continue to work with this!I thought the color picture it displayed was great! Again, you won't be amazed nor will it clarify a license plate from 30 feet, but it does look pretty good.Love the fact that I can see my cams away from home on my smartphone!! So far so good!! Impressed and I recommend it.I'll update regularly with more details.

Reviews.Title: Great product  and Support
Reviews.Author: Frank Alimonda
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. Have lots of features. Was freaked out at first as had to do the port forwarding but the product support team was and very fantastic and the set the camera up and I am very very happy. We would be probaboly be buying another one soon.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Tech Support
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: Getting Foscam cameras set up.  The tech team was incredible, solved all my problems.  Ralph is the man!Love the cameras and exceeded my expectations.  Their support was very helpful and would definitely recommend this product and the quality of the support after the purchase.

Reviews.Title: great camera for live remote viewing
Reviews.Author: Tim Wachter
Reviews.Content: i was looking for a networked video camera system to put in my bar, but i didn't want to go through the hassle of setting up a dvr and hardwiring in cameras all over the place. i also didn't want to spend a bunch of money in the process. i had been eyeing this foscam camera for a few weeks, and when it popped up in the gold box for $70, i jumped on it. simply put, it's the best decision i could have made!setup was a bit involved (i took a similar path as reviewer "r. tickle" and manually set up the camera on the router, and purchased a dyndns.org account to use in conjunction with my bar modem's dynamic ip address to gain access over the web) but i had the camera up and running in less than an hour. taking r. tickle's advice, i installed the android app "ip cam viewer" and it is great for interacting with the foscam.now for the camera itself. first off, i have to say i was blown away with the quality of the video over the network. the framerate is slower than i had hoped over the internet (about 3-5 fps), but this is a function of the low up speed at the source. when connected on the same local network, this issue goes away. the pan and tilt speed is not the fastest, but it can be adjusted inside the web interface. i have the camera mounted high in a central location, and i can view the entire bar very well and identify faces of individuals as far as 40 feet away.(paragraph added as update 10/21/13) after pushing a firmware update into the camera, i have also set the motion detection to email me stills from the live feed if it sees anyone moving around in the bar after hours. this is great, because it removes the need to hook the camera up to a dvr or to buy software that will record video, and i still get hard evidence if someone breaks in overnight!i haven't tried the ir-cut, because it's never dark enough inside the bar to need it. the audio on the foscam is weak, but i don't use it anyway. but for all the things i do need this camera for, it performs exceptionally well. i'm considering buying another one to set up as a baby monitor in the nursery. i would suggest anyone looking into basic surveillance options start with this inexpensive, yet very versatile foscam camera.

Reviews.Title: Great tool and customer service
Reviews.Author: MB
Reviews.Content: Foscam camera is wonderful to use and user friendly with the interface. Had to call tech support and Sandra assisted me with minimal time and was very professional and knowledgeable. I would highly recommend her and this product for anyone using internal or external IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: customer support
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: i have camera was not working remotly .. spoke with Harry Foster he was able to remotly access the computer and was able to help me with the remote set up for the camera to view away frm the location . his service was excellent, polite, smart and helpful. i would buy this camera in the future.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup; horrible non-improved audio
Reviews.Author: Mr. Middle "Put it into Context"
Reviews.Content: While I did not expect the audio to be fantastic, this model has 3mm in/out (use in for mic).  Trying 2 different mics I still get the annoying "hmmmmm" from any website I log in to view from.The gripe is not because I would expect a camera of this price to have fantastic audio, but they explain on the page:  "Audio quality is improved" and I don't see how.I've even opened up the unit, and made sure the J12 (audio) lines were not touching the J6 (wifi) lines.

Reviews.Title: It is working OK.
Reviews.Author: Electronic Engineer
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine and I can watch my home from work via Iphone 4S using NO-IP services. In the near future, I would like the zoom feature in addition to Pan and Tilt. Until now I can not make the audio to work at all. It is a question of my time to work on it. In general I'm satisfied with the product as received and I will be buying more products from Amazon my #1 web store.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: DrSurround
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd foscam camera.. Needless to say I'm very pleased with all of them.  They easily configure and can be accessed through various video logging and viewing software.

Reviews.Title: Camera works fine, web software intuitive
Reviews.Author: Jack G "Jack"
Reviews.Content: Camera works as described, using mine as a wi-fi camera at home while away.  Using this with Google Chrome browser, connects and works fine.  Haven't tried this on Internet Exploder, I avoid it like the plague.Two annoyances which is why it's only 4/5 stars: to get sound from the camera, I had to download third-party software (using VLC) for this.  To get a firmware upgrade for the camera (which was available when I bought the camera, but not on the camera), I had to provide an email address and agree to have the manufacturer (Foscam) send me marketing emails as well.  Not very impressed with that part.  But the upgrade is an improvement over the the pre-installed firmware.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera but one drawback
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old DLink 930L which was being used to view out to my front porch remotely.  This camera is superior to the D-Link (which currently still sells for $70 on Amazon) in almost every way.  The picture quality is great, has a good lens viewing width, the ability to remotely control pan/tilt is a big plus, the "night vision" works well, the motion capture alarming works well, & the wireless connectivity is solid and fast.The biggest negative for this camera is that the cameras webserver does not support HTTPS/SSL.  When accessing this camera from inside your network or the internet, your credentials will be passed in clear text. Also being that this camera connects to my home network wirelessly, someone sniffing my wireless traffic locally could get the credentials while I'm logging in as well. There is the ability to change the default port/tcp80 that the webserver listens on.  With all the features that this camera includes, no SSL is very surprising...the Dlink 930L did have this. Hopefully a future firmware update will address this issue.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie Huizenga
Reviews.Content: I seen alot of reviews on this camera where people were having a hard time setting the thing up. I decided to take the challenge anyway and honestly it didnt put up much of a fight at all. I had it out of the box installed on the desktop and running on my ipad all in about an hour.... i gave it 4 stars cause i wish the picture quality was just a little better.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera with very good features
Reviews.Author: Pedro Wong
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it had the main features I needed and because it had a reasonable price.  It looked very solid and it had features like pan, audio, night vision, motion alerts, email and remote access.  I really thought it would be easy to install but this was nothing close to the truth.  Fortunately the support service that Foscam has is five stars (*****) they were very patient and very good; they helped me to setup the camera wirelessly, help me to configure it for remote access and set email alerts.  They even helped me to open my no-ip account.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: T. Downes "tech geek"
Reviews.Content: I will dispute the reviews that some say are fakeI just purchased my camera from amazon, and had to speak withtech support yesterday and today (ralph)He spent just under an hour handling all of my questions andsetup issues. Maybe some have not been legit, but I assure youthis review is 100% accurate and I am very pleased with my calls totech support and the camera is working greatTom DColumbia, mo

Reviews.Title: Great equipment for the price!
Reviews.Author: MeteorMagnet
Reviews.Content: This item has been described, analyzed, and detailed well by others. Mine arrived with a cracked CD, who h Amazon compensated for wonderfully, as usual. I've used a few similar cameras before, and found that setup was easy and straightforward even without the documentation. (Hint: tell the other camera type's app to search. It will find the camera and return the ip address found, but won't run it. Pop the ip in the browser, and the camera comes up. Add a Username and Password (Admin privilege) and set up for your network, phone, etc. Get rid of the default sign in. I am sure there we're goodies on the disk, and I've since downloaded replacements. But I've been up ad running fine ... Mostly on a Droid. Love it!

Reviews.Title: nice ip camera
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints.  For the money, i got exactly what I expected.  The motor is strong, the quality is nice, and the camera worked perfect out of the box.  I plugged it into my router, programmed it, and had it recording in 15 minutes.  I can also view it from my cell phone, control it, set it to record, etc.  The video quality is a little on the crappy side, but it's good enough for me.

Reviews.Title: Good Product...Hard to Set Up
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I am definitely not an expert on the computer, but usually manage to get things installed with few problems. I had no problems with the initial set up with ethernet able and then with moving on to wireless. However when it came to setting it up for remote online viewing I spent many, many hours without success. I did the router configuration , port forwarding and all the rest of that good stuff, and by the end of it I felt completely inadequate. I was never able to get around the port 80 blocking and forwarding, so I just decided to do the other forwarding....ie return it for a refund. I did enjoy the other functions of the camera but to me it was useless not being able to have access by connecting to it online via another computer when I am away from home, which is basically why I bought it.I think that Foscam has to make some improvements to their software and make it more of a plug and play device similar to other products on the market. Had I to do it over again, I would gladly pay another $50 and get a plug & play camera to start off with, rather than going through all this hassle.So if you are not a computer whizz, I would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Support.
Reviews.Author: Paul Vevera "Paul V"
Reviews.Content: Issue: To set the camera.Agent's Name: RickyCommands: I have received great customer support, by a quick resolution to my installations issues. My cameras are online in no time with Ricky's help.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, miserable to set up!
Reviews.Author: flutacious7
Reviews.Content: I am usually very good at setting up electronics in our house, but this was absolutely miserable.  I had to use two different computers, diactivate virus protection programs and ultimately switch browsers to get the set up to work.  I couldn't do it with Internet Explorer, only Firefox.  It was very frustrating.  But the camera works great.  Love that there is an app that can work on my cell in the house or externally.  We use this with our daughter as a video monitor.  It is nice that we can then use it as a security camera when our kids are older.  I like the camera, but be forewarned that set up is not easy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Elley
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! Had no installation issues, got it up & running on a Mac, pc and utilizing an app on my android phone. No other camera this price can even compare!

Reviews.Title: Good as nannycam, security cam
Reviews.Author: A. R. Irvine "TI317"
Reviews.Content: Decent quality,reliable connection, decent software. The image our be better quality as enlargements may not be helpful in identifying strangers.
